Ji dakon aŋpak kokwinɨgek gen morapmɨsi tagɨ yokeŋ. Mani Amɨn nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun top dɨma yosok. Gen morap uŋun yaŋban nandagɨm uŋun baŋ mɨktɨm amɨnon yaŋ teŋteŋosot.”
Pakbi yɨpmaŋek wɨŋakwal uŋudon gɨn Amɨn Tagɨ dakon Wup da Pilip aŋaŋ kɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn madep uŋun saŋbeŋek Pilip dɨma kagɨt. Mɨni kagɨt mani amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek aeni tamonikon pawɨŋ yɨgek kɨgɨt.
Mani mɨktɨm da mɨŋat aŋpulugaŋek gen kagani aŋtaŋ kɨŋakwan nugɨm yokwisi madep da pakbi uŋun wandɨkgɨt uŋun mɨktɨm da si naŋ mudagɨt.
Uŋun bɨlak dakon bɨsap madep mudaŋakwan meŋi datniyo tobɨl kokupnikon kɨk do kɨgɨmal. Mani Yesu Jerusalem sigɨn egɨpgut. Egakwan meŋi datniyo Yesu sigɨn egɨsak yaŋ dɨma nandagɨmal.
Yokwini paŋabɨŋ kakwaŋakwan Kwen Kokup da tɨlagon wɨgɨgɨt. Piŋkop da yokwi morapni agɨt uŋun pakyaŋsi nandaŋ kɨmokdok.
Ae yo kɨnda tap ɨdap madep yombem kagɨm. Uŋun tap ɨdapmon glas gat kɨndap gat ɨktagɨlbi. Tap ɨdap glas yombem uŋun da kɨdɨpmɨŋon amɨn morapmɨ akgwit. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ emaron teban taŋek joŋ kɨlap yokwisi gat ae wupni gat ae mani dakon nambani abɨŋ yɨpgwit amɨn. Uŋun gita Piŋkop da yomgut uŋun tɨmɨkgwit.
Asi, amɨn kɨlegɨ Lot uŋun Sodom amɨn da binapmon egek gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ aŋpakni yokwi uŋun pɨndakgɨt, ae gen yokwini yaŋakwa nandaŋ yomgut. Uŋun burɨ kɨlegɨsi taŋakwan, gen teban pabɨŋ yopyop aŋpak awit uŋun do nandaban yokwi taŋban burɨkon da jɨgɨsi nandagɨt.
Yawe kaloŋgɨn Piŋkop bamɨsi. Uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn tɨp madep da yaŋ dam aŋnimɨsak.
Kalɨpsigwan nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋek Yesu Kristo do aŋek iyɨ dakon monji egɨpneŋ do manjɨŋ nipgut. Uŋun iyɨ dakon galaktok yolek yaŋ agɨt.
“Monjɨsok kɨnda oni uŋun dakon bret tɨmɨ 5 bali baŋ wasaŋbi uŋun gat ae tap kɨlap bamorɨ gat taŋ ɨmaŋ. Mani on mɨŋat amɨn morapyo do yomno arɨpmɨ dɨma asak.”
Uŋun pɨdok pɨdok dɨma asak, ae dɨma yaŋ tɨdosak. Do kokup pap da kosiron amɨn kɨnda da tekni dɨma nandakdɨsak.
Uŋun Dat dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ, ae nakyo kɨsi dɨma nandaŋ namaŋ. Yaŋdo, yo morap uŋun aŋ damdaŋ.
Nak yaŋ gayɨsat, mango uŋun Pita. Aŋakwan tɨp uŋun da kwenon paŋmuwukbi kabɨno paŋ- muwuk yopbo Tɨpdom dakon tapmɨm da arɨpmɨ dɨma pabɨŋ yopmaŋakwan toktogɨsi taŋ aŋ aŋ kɨkdɨsak.
“Uŋun amɨn madep kɨlɨ agɨt, do iyɨ naŋ iyɨŋba kobogɨ dayɨsak.”
Uŋun kɨsisi jap do aŋ bɨsapmon gak da upmokgi do jomjom aŋ.
Gen uŋuden yoŋ amɨn da pakyaŋsi yaŋ nandani. Nin opno ji gat egɨpneŋ bɨsapmon papia damgumaŋon gen toŋ uŋun da arɨpmon aŋpak uŋun baŋ aŋek egɨpdamaŋ.
“Nandaki. Mɨŋat kɨnda amɨn gat dɨma pakbi kɨnda da monjɨ kwap awɨlek monjɨ wɨli kɨnda aŋalasak. Aŋalaŋban mani Emanuel yaŋ yoni.” (Emanuel dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: “Piŋkop nin gat egɨsak.”)
Piŋkop, kokwin tagɨsi aŋek nak dakon nandak nandak morap butnokon toŋ uŋun do nandaki. Aŋkewalek nandak nandak morapno do pakyaŋsi nandaki.
Jil tepmɨsi kɨŋ paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨnjil, ‘Uŋun Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ kɨlɨ aban pɨdak. Mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek Galili mɨktɨmon kɨk, do uŋudon kɨŋ koni.’ Nak gen on dayɨk do pɨt.”
Yesu da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ dɨwarɨ morapmɨsi aŋakwan paŋdetni da pɨndakgwit, uŋun on papiakon dɨma mandabi.
Yaŋdo, gen kɨnda yoŋ uŋun bamɨ, ‘Amɨn kɨnda da jap kwaokdak, ae kɨnda da bamɨ pasak.’
Do nin abɨsok on mɨktɨm dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi amɨn dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi do niaŋsi yoneŋ? Ae Moses dakon gen teban dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn do niaŋsi yoneŋ? Ae on mɨktɨm dakon gen yogok amɨn tagɨsi do niaŋsi yoneŋ? Piŋkop da on mɨktɨm dakon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi morap paŋupbal aban nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn dakon gen gɨn aŋ mudawit.
Piŋkop da papiakon yaŋ mandabi: “Nak da nandaŋ kokwini kɨlegɨsi taŋ yomaŋ amɨn dakon nandaŋ kokwini kɨlegɨ paŋtasɨk akdɨsat. Ae nandak nandakni toŋ amɨn dakon nandak nandakni wɨrɨrɨkgo pasɨl mudokdaŋ.”
Mani yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi kokup pap dɨwarɨkon kɨsi agek yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokeŋ. Nak Piŋkop da uŋun pi abeŋ dosi yabekgɨt.”
Ram uŋun Aminadap dakon datni. Aminadap uŋun Nason dakon datni. Nason uŋun Salmon dakon datni.
Nido Gen Bin Tagɨsi jikon aŋkɨgɨmaŋ uŋun gen naŋ gɨn dɨma aŋkɨgɨmaŋ. Uŋun tapmɨm gat ae Telagɨ Wup gat kɨsi da altaŋ damgut. Ae nandaŋ gadatnin uŋun tebaisi yaŋ dɨsi pɨndakgwit. Nin ji da binapmon egek ji paŋpulugok do pi agɨmaŋ uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ.
Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm nelagɨ toŋ uŋudon maŋ kwawit. Dɨwarɨ bamɨ 100, ae dɨwarɨ bamɨ 60, ae dɨwarɨ bamɨ 30 tawit.”
Ae kaŋapbo aŋelo tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨt. Uŋun gɨptɨmɨ gɨkwem naŋ wamgut, ae busuŋɨ da kwenon kɨlap baŋ kɨnda tagɨt. Tomno dabɨlni gɨldat da yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Aŋakwan kandap bamotni mɨleŋ asɨp yombem.
Gak tɨp madepno egek nak tagɨsi aŋkutnosol. Gak tɨp tebano ae dam tebano arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlɨ, do gen teban yɨpmaŋaki uwal da kɨsiron da pulugaŋ kɨkeŋ.
Mandaŋ dagaŋ ɨdapmon yɨpmaŋ aŋabɨŋ mɨŋatjok uŋun do ɨban aŋkɨ meŋi do ɨmgut.
Mani Josep yabekban uŋun da mibɨl taŋek uŋun da kalɨp paŋkɨ Isip mɨktɨmon egɨpgut. Peni padɨk padɨkyo da moneŋ tɨmɨt do nandaŋek amɨn dakon oman monjɨni egɨpjak do amɨn do yomgwit.
Piŋkop Datnin ae Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo dakon nandaŋ yawotni ae but yawotni jikon tosak do bɨsit amaŋ.
Piŋkop da Gen Bin Tagɨsi kɨlani abi do gamgut, uŋun kɨlani tagɨsi aŋ kɨmokgi. Telagɨ Wup nin da butgwan yɨkdak uŋun da gak pi uŋun do tagɨ aŋpulugosak.
Babɨkno Piŋkop da dabɨlon gulusuŋnin mɨni yaŋsi nandaŋek Piŋkop dakon pi awit, nakyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn pini asat. Kalbi ae gɨldarɨ yɨpmaŋ derɨ mɨni bɨsit aŋek gak do nandaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨsat.
Amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut uŋun mani Ananias. Mɨŋatni dakon mani uŋun Sapaira. Ananias uŋun mɨktɨm tɨmni kɨnda amɨn do yomɨŋek moneŋ tɨmɨkgɨt.
Mani nak gɨptɨm dakon paŋpulugok mɨŋat amɨnyokon dɨma tɨmɨkdat. Ae abɨsok jikon yo tɨmɨt do gen on dɨma yɨpmaŋdat. Nak jikon yo tɨmɨt do dɨma nandɨsat. Yo uŋun dɨma tɨmɨgek kɨmokgeŋ kaŋ uŋun da tagɨ. Nido pi aŋapbo amɨn da tomni dɨma namaŋ uŋun da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi namɨsak. Amɨn da yo namɨŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨkno gwayeni do dɨma galak tosot.
Amɨn Tagɨ but yawot ami, toktogɨsi yo morapmon butji paŋyawot aban butji yaworɨ tosak, ae ji morap gat kɨsi egɨpjak do bɨsit amaŋ.
Amɨn yokwi uŋun yoni mɨni amɨn gat ae wadak wadak aŋ amɨn yam do emat agak sɨbani yɨknikon baŋ ɨlɨkgaŋ, ae obip paŋɨlɨkgaŋ. Uŋun aŋpak kɨlegɨ yolgaŋ amɨn dapba kɨmot do aŋ.
ae wɨlisok ae mɨŋatjok ae amɨn pelaŋ ae mɨŋat monjɨyo, ji kɨsisi Yawe aŋkɨsini.
Ɨleŋon wɨgɨ altaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Paŋkewalon dɨma moni yaŋ do bɨsit ani.”
Yawe da yaŋban pakbi madep kɨbɨdoŋ, ae pakbi dabɨl dugoŋ.
Gak kokupgokon kwen egek sɨkak yɨpbɨ kabap morapmon moŋ. Pi asal dakon bamɨ da on mɨktɨmon tugosok.
Gen teban uŋun yaŋ teban tok gen Piŋkop da kalɨp yagɨt dakon uwalni? Uŋun dɨmasi. Piŋkop da gen teban nimɨŋek uŋun da egɨp egɨp damjak yaŋ yagɨt tam, gen teban yolyol kosiron da nin mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨlegɨ anom.
Agapno wɨsa dagaŋban Saidon kokupmon paŋkɨ akgɨmaŋ. Uŋudon Julius da Pol do nandaban tagɨ agɨt do yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kwi notgoni da yo nido wadasal uŋun tagɨ aŋpulugoni.”
Yesu da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsit aŋek dɨma kurak toni do tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt.
Koŋ uŋun da Yesu bɨsit tebaisi yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Nol nipbɨ abɨgɨneŋ kaŋ, uŋun bɨt kabɨ da butgwan pɨgɨneŋ do nandamaŋ.”
Iyɨŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Dɨma!” Wasɨp yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn pup gen yagɨt.
Aŋakwan tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋagek emat amɨn da satu wasok aŋek ɨmalni kokwinɨk tɨmɨkgwit.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ amɨn kɨlegɨ da amɨn dɨwarɨ do yo morapmɨ yomaŋ. Ae monjɨ gwayoni da meŋ datni kɨsɨk kɨsɨk yomaŋ.
Jerusalem kokup papmon amɨn dɨwarɨ da yawit, “On amɨn naŋ kɨla amɨn da aŋakba kɨmotjak do nandaŋ, ma?
Ji tebai agakwa nin dakon tapmɨm mɨni aŋ bɨsapmon nin uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk amaŋ. Ae ji nandaŋ gadat kalɨp tebai awit uŋun aŋkaluk aŋek aesi tebai atni do bɨsit amaŋ.
Nak Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨsat! Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dasi pulugaŋ nepdɨsak. Yaŋdo, nak nandak nandaknokon Piŋkop dakon gen teban yol do nandɨsat, mani but kalɨp egɨp egɨpmon nak yokwi dakon oman amɨn egɨsat.
Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami, ninon tobɨl apbi. Kwen Kokupmon da ninon sɨŋtaŋbɨ pɨŋakwan wain pi do kɨlani abi.
Yɨgek jap pi ae wain pi aŋek bamɨ ɨreŋɨsi paŋ.
Uŋun da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak paŋmuwukbi Epesas kokup papmon ekwaŋ uŋun dakon aŋeloni do gen yaŋ mandaki: Nak gɨk 7 kabɨ kɨsitno amɨn tet da tɨmɨgek teŋteŋɨ tamo gol baŋ wasaŋbi 7 kabɨ da binapmon agɨsat. Agek gen on yɨpbo gagon obɨsak.
Pɨgɨ uŋun kalbi Pol da burɨ pɨsaŋakwan dɨpmɨn yombem kɨnda kaŋakwan Masadonia amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak tap pɨdaŋek Masadonia mɨktɨmon obɨŋ nin paŋpulugoki.”
Aŋkɨ wasaŋek gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek yawit, “On amɨn da Israel amɨn kabɨ nin paŋupbal aŋek nin da Sisa do takis dɨma ɨmneŋ do yosok. Ae iyɨ do nak kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda, nak Kristo yaŋ yosok.”
Mani paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨ Taitaira ekwaŋ ji mɨŋat uŋun dakon gen dɨma yolgaŋ, ae ‘Sunduk dakon geni pasɨlɨ’ yaŋ yoŋ, uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do pini dɨma awit. Yaŋ dayɨsat, jɨgɨ kɨnda gat dɨma dabeŋ.
Kɨla amɨn madep, nak yaŋsi gayɨsat, gɨldat binap 12 kilok da tɨlagon kosiron kɨŋapbo teŋteŋɨ madep kɨnda Kwen Kokup da pɨŋban kagɨm. Teŋteŋɨ uŋun tapmɨmɨ toŋsi teŋteŋagɨt. Gɨldat dakon teŋteŋɨ yapgut. Teŋteŋɨ uŋun nak ae amɨn agɨpgumaŋ ninon yamgut.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨlegɨsi egɨp do nandɨsal kaŋ, kɨŋ yo morapgo yumaŋ naŋek uŋun dakon moneŋ baŋ yoni mɨni amɨn do yobi. Yaŋ aŋaki yo tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon taŋ gamdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek abɨŋ nak nol.”
Amɨn da yokwi aŋ daba kaŋ, kobogɨ do yokwi dɨma aŋ yomni. Ae yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ daba kaŋ, kobogɨ do yaŋba yokwi tok dɨma aŋ yomni. Kobogɨ do Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi aŋyomjak do bɨsit ani. Piŋkop da ji yaŋ aŋek dɨsi gɨsam tɨmɨtni do yaŋ damgut.
Ji gen on do pakyaŋsi nandani. Amɨn morap Yawe dakon pɨŋbinisi ekwaŋ, uŋun iyɨ do manjɨgɨt. Nak uŋun do yaŋ tɨdoko bɨsitno nandɨsak.
Piŋkop Wukwi Madep gat ekwaŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami da yoŋgamgwan egek yɨk yawot tagɨsi aŋ.
Mani Pita waŋga yoma kaga da kapmatjok akgɨt. Do paŋdet uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da nandaŋ ɨmgut uŋun da kɨŋ oman mɨŋat kɨnda yoma kɨla agɨt uŋun iyɨŋek Pita abɨdaŋban nagalgwan pɨgɨgɨmal.
ae kɨsi morap sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp ak amɨn dagɨn dɨma ekwaŋ, ae kɨsi morap gen amɨn da dɨma nandagɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yogok amɨn dagɨn dɨma ekwaŋ, ae kɨsi morap gen paŋtobɨl amɨn dagɨn dɨma ekwaŋ.
Asi, amɨn kɨmoron da dɨma pɨdoŋ tam, Kristo kɨmoron da dɨma pɨdagɨt.
Egɨp egɨpni Yawekon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ. Uŋuden amɨn iyɨ do nandaba wɨkwaŋ amɨn dɨma yolgaŋ, ae kokup kɨdat dɨma gawak yomaŋ.
Ji abɨsok Piŋkop dakon gwakni ekwaŋ, do Piŋkop da Monji dakon Wupni yabekban nin da buron kɨlɨ pɨgɨgɨt. Aŋakwan Wup da paŋtagap aban Piŋkop do “Aba, Dat” yaŋ yaŋ tɨdomaŋ.
Uŋudon kanek kapbɨ egɨpgut. Egek don tap wakgakon da Siria mɨktɨmon kɨk do tagap tagɨt. Mani Juda amɨn da Pol aŋat do aŋek yaŋ nandat aŋ dakon geni nandagɨt. Do yum pɨndagek Masadonia mɨktɨmon ae tobɨl kɨk do nandagɨt.
Kosiron kɨŋ amɨn kɨnda kokup pap kɨk do apban kawit, mani Saimon. Uŋun Sairini kokupmon nani kɨnda, Aleksanda gat Rupas gat dakon datni. Emat amɨn da Saimon gen tebai iyɨŋba Yesu dakon tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨkban kɨwit.
Amɨn bamot uŋun Antiok bɨsap dubakgok egɨpgumal. Egek don paŋmuwukbi da galok gen yoyɨŋek but yawot gat kɨnjil yaŋ yoyɨŋek yopba amɨn yabekba kɨgɨmal kabɨkon aeni kɨgɨmal.
Yesu nandaban jɨgɨ madepsi aŋakwan bɨsit tebai sigɨn agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan kɨŋkɨŋni yawi da yaŋ mɨktɨmon mawit.
Amɨn egɨp egɨpni iyɨkon tosok yaŋ nandaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨmotdaŋ. Uŋuden amɨn nandak nandak tagɨ mɨni. Uŋun amɨn yoni morapmɨ do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ, mani uŋun kɨmotdaŋ.
Amɨn uŋun yoni morapmɨ taŋ ɨmgwit, do gen uŋun nandaŋ but yokwi nandaŋek si kɨgɨt.
Do gak amɨn dɨ yabekbɨ kɨŋ amɨn kɨnda mani Saimon ae mani kɨnda Pita uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋop do Jopa kɨni. Pita uŋun bulmakau gɨp paŋmɨlɨp ak amɨn kɨnda mani Saimon uŋun da yutnon egɨsak. Yutni uŋun tap ɨleŋon tosok.’
Tap Ɨdap Gami Israel amɨn pɨndagek pasal kɨgɨt. Ae Jodan Pakbi ɨsal taŋek dɨma pak kɨgɨt.
Nak aŋpak morap ani do dayɨŋ dekgo nandawit, ae aŋpak morap abo nandawit, uŋun aŋpak morap ji bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ aŋ kɨmotni. Aŋakwa Piŋkop but yawot ami da ji gat egɨpjak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Koŋ kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda yɨpmaŋ degek kɨŋ mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon agek yɨk yawot tamo wɨsisak. Mani tamo kɨnda dɨma kosok, do yaŋ yosok, ‘Nak aeno tobɨl yut kalɨp egɨpgumon kɨkeŋ.’
Nak pɨrɨropmaŋ dubagɨsi kɨndakon kɨŋ mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋon egɨpbeŋ.
Datgo da amɨn do bupmɨ nandɨsak, do jiyo yaŋ gɨn amɨn do bupmɨ nandani.”
Uŋun nak da naga yabekgo abeŋ do gak uŋun gat pɨgɨ kɨk do but bamot dɨma aki.”
Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ man madepni do yoŋ. Ae pɨlɨni pɨlɨni mibɨlni yaŋakwa nandamaŋ.
Joŋ kɨlap yokwisi uŋun kalɨp egɨpgut da abɨsok dɨma egɨsak, uŋun kɨla amɨn madep uŋun 8. Mani kɨla amɨn madep 8 uŋun 7 kabɨ da kabɨkon nani. Uŋun wagɨl pasɨldɨsak.
Amɨn egɨp egɨpni moneŋon gɨn toŋ yaŋ nandaŋek pɨbɨt tɨdok aŋ amɨn uŋun da nak aŋgwasɨŋek aŋupbal ak do aŋ. Mani uŋun aŋ amɨn do dɨma pasolgeŋ.
Aŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen da uŋun mɨktɨm da kokup morap kɨsi ɨreŋ tagɨt.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda ji but dasi tɨmɨkdak, uŋun nak naŋ abɨdosok. Amɨn kɨnda nak abɨdosok, Piŋkop nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun naŋ abɨdosok.
“Ji gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn do pɨndak kɨmotni. Uŋun ɨmal dubagɨ baŋ paŋek agɨp do galak toŋ. Ae yumaŋ gwayek tamokon amɨn da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨni do galagɨ nandaŋ. Ae muwut muwut yutnon tamo tagɨsikon yɨt do galak toŋ. Ae jap noknok bɨsap madepmon tamo amɨn mani toŋ do tɨlak abi uŋudon yɨt do galak toŋ.
Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Anas ae dabɨni dɨwarɨ, ae Kaiapas gat Jon ae Aleksanda gat kɨsi muwukgwit.
Papia uŋun abɨdaŋakwan yo 4 kabɨ egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ, ae kɨla amɨn 24 kabɨ gat da Sipsip Monɨŋ da kapmatjok maŋ pakgwit. Kɨsisi kaloŋ kaloŋ gita monɨŋni gat ae gol ɨdapni gat tɨmɨk tɨmɨk awit. Gol ɨdapmon yo kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi tugawit, uŋun Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo dakon bɨsitni.
Yawe, butnokon da ya yaŋsi gayɨkeŋ. Pi tagɨsi morap agɨl uŋun do mɨŋat amɨnyo yoyɨkeŋ.
Yut wɨgɨni uŋudon gɨn yɨk egɨyo aŋakwa jap daba noni. Pi agak amɨn uŋun tomni tagɨ tɨmɨkgaŋ. Ji yurɨ yurɨ dɨma agɨpni.
Yaŋ dayɨsat, ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Nak jikon opbo egɨpneŋ bɨsapmon gen tebai dɨ dayɨkom. Jikon amɨn dɨwarɨ da yabekbi nin da on mɨktɨmon amɨn dakon aŋpak yolek pi amaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ. Nak uŋuden amɨn gen tebai arɨpmɨ tagɨ yoyɨkeŋ.
Aba Sekaraia da yo kɨnda kaŋ ɨba kɨlda mandɨsak do tɨlak aŋ yoban ɨba yaŋ mandagɨt, “Mani uŋun Jon.” Yaŋ mandaban nandaba yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Yawe nak gat egɨsak, do arɨpmɨ dɨma pasolgeŋ. Amɨn da nak do yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
Yoyɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ tosok, do ji but tobɨl ani.”
Kweŋ mibɨsi yosak bɨsapmon nin mal wambɨlgamaŋ uŋun da tɨlak tepmɨsi kulabɨk akdamaŋ. Kweŋ yaŋban amɨn kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit uŋun kɨmoron da pɨdokdaŋ, ae buŋon arɨpmɨ dɨma mɨk tokdaŋ. Ae nin kalugɨ sigɨn ekwamaŋ amɨn kulabɨk akdamaŋ.
Aŋek nandaŋ gadatni mɨni do, uŋun do nandaban ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋek kokup taŋ aŋaŋ kɨwit uŋudon kɨŋ Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban uŋudon gɨn wudani kɨbɨdaŋakwa gɨptɨmni kɨlek tagɨt.
Yutji mɨni do jap pakbiyo arɨpmɨ dɨma ani, ma? Piŋkop dakon paŋmuwukbi do yo ɨsalɨ yaŋ nandaŋek japni mɨni amɨn paŋmayak ak do nandaŋ, ma? Ni gen baŋ dayɨkeŋ? Ji aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yaŋ dayɨkeŋ, ma? Uŋun dɨmasi!
Josep uŋun mɨktɨm tɨmni kɨnda amɨn do yomɨŋek moneŋ tɨmɨk paŋkɨ yabekbi kabɨ do yomgut.
Uwalnin da gak dakon telagɨ yutgo dakon yo morap kɨlɨ paŋtasɨk awit. Abɨŋek yo morap paŋtasɨk awit uŋun pɨndakgi.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Yawe nak da kapmatjok ekwan nandɨsat. Kapmatjok egek tapmɨm namɨsak, do yo kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋkwakwalɨtjak.
Banabas gat nit pi aŋapdo pi amak dakon yumaŋ nogɨ amɨn da nit do jap pakbiyo tagɨ paŋpulugogɨ.
Piŋkop dakon papia da yaŋ yosok, “Wup uŋun Piŋkop da nin da butgwan yɨpgut uŋun yo morap yopmaŋ mudaŋek iyɨ dogɨn galaktaŋ kɨmotneŋ do nandɨsak.” Gen uŋun gen ɨsalɨ yaŋ nandaŋ, ma?
Aŋpak morapno do kɨlɨ nandagɨm, aŋek tobɨlek gengo guramɨt do agɨm.
Ji dɨsi dakon kɨla aŋek paŋmuwukbi morap dakon kɨla kɨsi ani. Paŋmuwukbi kabɨ uŋun Piŋkop da Monji dakon yawi naŋ yumaŋ nagɨt. Uŋun sipsip kabɨni ji da kɨla ani do Telagɨ Wup da ji manjɨŋ depgut.
Kɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn 25 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun yomɨŋ gwayek aŋakwan 25 tausen danari kɨnda gat noman tagɨt.
Nido nin nandamaŋ, “On mɨktɨm gat yo morapni gat toŋ uŋun kɨsi morap uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gɨn.”
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu iyɨ gɨn bɨsit pi agɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni kɨsi uŋudon egɨpgwit. Egɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kabɨ madep da nak do namɨn yaŋ yoŋ?”
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek ji do Kristo dakon amɨn kabɨ yaŋ nandaŋek pakbi koleŋ damjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dakon yumaŋ nogɨ dɨma pasɨl ɨmjak.”
Mani Pita da wasɨp yaŋek yagɨt, “Mɨŋat, uŋun amɨn dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨsat.”
Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨ gat ae Parisi amɨn dɨ gat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda abɨ kaŋek asi gak Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asal yaŋ gandaneŋ.”
Nin ɨleŋɨkon tagɨsi wɨgɨgɨmaŋ. Wɨgek mɨktɨm tɨmjok kɨnda tap binap tosok uŋun mani Malta uŋudon obɨmaŋ yaŋ kokup amɨn da niyɨŋba nandagɨmaŋ.
Uŋun nin mani. Uŋun da nin Juda amɨn ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da kabɨkon baŋ manjɨŋ nipgut.
“Namɨn da pi uŋun abi do yaŋ mudaŋ gamgut da yo uŋun asal? Ae namɨn da man madep gamgut?”
Amɨn kɨnda da yo tagɨsi morapmɨ tɨmɨkdak, uŋun da tɨlak yaŋ teban tok gengo do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi asat.
Do mɨŋatjok sakwabat egɨpni uŋun amɨn paŋek monjɨ paŋalaŋek yutni kɨla ani do nandɨsat. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, uwal da aŋpakni tagɨsi uŋun kaŋek gen yokwi arɨpmɨ dɨma yaŋ ɨmni.
Amɨn da kɨsiron jap dɨ ɨsalsi dɨma tɨmɨkgɨmaŋ. Nin si yumgumaŋ. Jɨgɨ dɨma damneŋ yaŋ do gɨldarɨ ae kalbi pi tebaisi agɨmaŋ.
Gen pasɨlɨ on dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun madepsi, mani nak uŋun yaŋ yosot, gen on Kristo gat paŋmuwukbini gat do yosok.
Piŋkop da amɨn yokwi dakon tapmɨm wɨrɨrɨkban pasɨldaŋ. Mani amɨn kɨlegɨ do tapmɨm madepsi yomdɨsak.
Mɨŋat ji esi dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨtni. Nido, ji Amɨn Tagɨ dakon, ae aŋpak uŋun Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlegɨsi.
Uŋun da yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak da Kenan mɨktɨm gak do gabeŋ. Mɨktɨm uŋun babɨgoni do tosak.”
“Uŋun bɨsapmon ji dɨsi do kɨla ani. Amɨn da gen pikon depdaŋ ae Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon pawɨgɨ nap kɨrɨŋbaŋ baljokdaŋ. Ji nak nandaŋ namaŋ do amɨn da ji paŋkɨ mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep da ɨŋamon depba atdaŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon nak dakon gen yoyɨni.
Ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek amɨn kɨsisi da yaŋ yokdaŋ, “Yesu Kristo uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ.” Yaŋ yaŋakwa Piŋkop Dat da man madep pasak.
Ji yumabi aŋpak gat, ae aŋpak ɨŋani morap dɨmasi ani, ae amɨn dakon yo do pɨndak galaktok dɨmasi ani. Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo nin, uŋuden aŋpak dakon gen dɨmasi yoneŋ.
Uŋun but dakon galaktok yokwi uŋun mɨŋat kɨnda da monjɨ kwapmɨ awɨldak yombem da don yokwi aŋalon aban noman tosok. Ae yokwi da si tagosok bɨsapmon kɨmot aŋalon asak.
Gɨldat morapmɨ egɨ mudaŋakwa Juda amɨn da muwugek Sol aŋat do gen yawit.
Gak da yo morap nin dakon pɨŋbi egɨpni do yaŋ mudaŋ nimgul.” Uŋun da yo morap kɨlani ani do yaŋ yosok, do yo kɨnda ɨsal dɨma tosak, yo kɨsisi kɨlani ani. Mani abɨsok yo morap pɨndatno kɨlani dɨma aŋ, yo dɨwarɨ dakon kɨlani baŋ gɨn aŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda yutni ak do aŋek gapma wayɨkban mibɨlɨsigwan pɨgakwan mɨktɨmgwan tɨp madep da kwenon gwak magɨt. Aŋek don yut uŋun da kwenon agɨt. Aban pakbi madepsi ɨgek yutni tɨdaŋ tuwɨl do agɨt mani yutni tebaisi agɨt, do tebaisi akgɨt.
Amɨn nak dakon gen nandaŋek burɨkon yɨpmaŋdak uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da saŋbeŋek nandak nandak tagɨ madepsi ɨmdɨsak. Mani amɨn nak dakon gen nandaŋek burɨkon dɨma yɨpmaŋdak uŋun amɨn nak dakon gen dɨwarɨ nandagɨt uŋun pasɨl ɨmdɨsak.
Gen bin yokwi nandɨsak bɨsapmon pasol pasol dɨma asak. Yawe tebaisi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsak.
Yaŋ iyɨŋbal yut burɨ madep kwen nani do dolɨkdɨsak. Uŋudon jap noknok tamo gat ae amɨn yɨtyɨt tamo gat kɨsi toŋ. Uŋudon jap paŋkosit anjil.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Parisi amɨn da iyɨwit, “Yaŋ kaŋ ae mibɨlɨ nido Moses da gen teban kɨnda yaŋ mandagɨt? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni kwɨnɨt do kaŋ, mɨŋat paŋkwɨnɨt papia kɨnda mandaŋ ɨmɨŋek kwɨnɨtjak.’ ”
Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep uŋun do pasalgwit, do Yesu niaŋon da abɨdaŋek aŋatno kɨmotjak uŋun do nandak nandak awit.
Gak yum pɨndagaki uwal da obɨsi bamaŋ nimgwit. Aŋaki nin kɨndap ae pakbi madep kagagwan agɨpgumaŋ. Mani abɨsok gak da kokup tagɨsikon paŋabɨl.
Moneŋ sɨmɨl kɨnam, ae yɨk, ae kandap gwɨl dɨma tɨmɨgek kɨni. Aŋek kosiron amɨn pɨndak ‘Gɨldat tagɨ!’ yaŋ dɨma yoyɨni.
Uŋun nak kutnok do aŋek palɨ kɨmakgɨmal. Do nak gɨn dɨma, Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon paŋmuwukbi morap kɨsi da uŋun bamot do but galak nandaŋek ya yaŋ yomaŋ.
Piŋkop dakon gen uŋun yaŋ tosok naŋ manjɨgɨt: “Sipsip dap do aŋ ae sipsip monɨŋ daŋgwi mandak do aŋakwa gen dɨma yoŋ, uŋun da tɨlagon gen kɨnda dɨma yagɨt.
Yaŋ nandawit do kɨrat madep tap wakga abɨdaŋban akgaŋ uŋun dakon napni mandaŋ dagaŋba tap kagagwan tawit. Yaŋ aŋek uŋudon gɨn tap wakga aŋtobɨlakwa agɨsak dakon kɨndap kwɨk dakon napni wɨtdalgwit. Aŋek mɨrɨm da tap wakga pɨsoŋban kɨsak do ɨmal ɨlɨkba kwen wɨgɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwa tap wakga uŋun tap kɨdɨpmɨŋ tetgɨn kɨgɨt.
Dewit kɨsi da uŋun do yagɨt. Amɨn aŋpak tagɨ ak do pi madep dɨma aŋ uŋun Piŋkop da dabɨlon amɨn kɨlegɨ dagoŋ, ae uŋun da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani uŋun do yagɨt.
wain kɨnam kɨnda kapmatjok tagɨt. Do yo kɨnda gugɨdan yombem abɨdaŋ wainon sɨbɨŋba tugaŋban, isop kɨndap dakon kɨlɨŋɨkon walɨk yɨpba Yesu da dulumon wɨgɨgɨt.
Amɨn dɨ da nɨkba kɨmotdɨsat. Gak da si pabɨŋ yopmaŋek paŋɨŋ tok abi, aŋaki mayaktok pani. Amɨn dɨwarɨ nak dakon jɨgɨno do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ. Gak da wɨrɨrɨkbi tobɨl kɨŋakwa pabɨŋ yopbi dosi nandɨsat.
Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, yo uŋun ni bɨsapmonsi altokdaŋ? Ni tɨlak da mibɨltok altaŋakwan kaŋek yo kɨlɨ uŋun altokdaŋ yaŋ nandaneŋ?”
“Yoni mɨni amɨn egek kɨmakban aŋelo da abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ yɨpba Abraham gat egɨpgumal. Egakwal yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun yo kɨsi kɨmakban wayɨkgwit.
“Nandani, yo jɨgɨsi morap uŋun dɨma altaŋakwa mibɨltok dayɨsat.
Uŋun dɨmasi! Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji but tobɨl dɨma ani kaŋ, uŋun amɨn kabɨ da kɨmakgwit jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn kɨmotdaŋ.
Asi, amɨn dɨwarɨ gen teban uŋuden yolek nin Piŋkop bamɨsi gawak ɨmamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, mani dɨmasi. Ae iyɨ do nandaba pɨŋakwa gɨptɨmni paŋupbal aŋek Piŋkop da uŋun do tagɨsi nandaŋ nimɨsak yaŋ nandaŋ. Uŋun gen teban yolek nandak nandak tagɨsi baŋ yolgamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, mani dɨmasi. Uŋun gen teban morap da nin paŋpulugaŋba but kalɨp dakon aŋpak arɨpmɨ dɨma pabɨŋ yopneŋ.
Yawe, gak da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgi do gayamaŋ. Gak da nin paŋpulugaŋbɨ yo morap ano tagɨsi gɨn noman toni.
Mɨŋat monjɨyo da yoyɨŋdetni da tɨlagon egɨpni kaŋ, uŋun tagɨ. Ae oman amɨn da madepni da tɨlagon egɨpni kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ. Yut dakon ami nak do Belsebul yaŋ nayɨni kaŋ, gwakni ji do nandaba pɨŋbisi aŋakwa man wagɨl yokwisi damdaŋ.”
Bo tap kɨlap do iyɨŋban tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ kɨnda tagɨ ɨmjak? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi.
Yaŋ tɨdaŋakwa uŋudon gɨn Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji si teban taŋek egɨpni. Nak naga abɨsat. Dɨma pasolni.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak mɨktɨmon kɨndap sokeŋ do pɨgɨm. Kɨlɨsi kwaŋ sok tam tagɨ.
Not kabɨ, Piŋkop da yaŋ daban Yesu yolyol amɨn dagawit bɨsap do nandani. Jikon da morapmɨ mɨktɨm amɨn da dabɨlon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi mɨni da egɨpgwit. Ae jikon morapmɨ tapmɨmji mɨni da egɨpgwit. Ae jikon da morapmɨ amɨn man bini toŋ da kabɨkon nani dɨma.
Yokwi agɨt amɨn kobogɨ tɨmɨtjak do jikon amɨn morapmɨ da yawit uŋun arɨpmɨ. Jɨgɨ dɨ gat tɨmɨtjak do dɨma yoni.
Mani bɨsap dubak dɨma agapno mɨrɨm madepsi tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda apgut. Mani uŋun Nod Tet Mɨrɨm yaŋ yoŋ. Uŋun mɨrɨm da Krit mɨktɨm tɨmon da apgut.
Bɨsit aŋek abɨŋ pɨndakban paŋdetni dɨpmɨn do yokwisi aŋek aeni dɨpmɨn sigɨn pakgwit. Paŋyolban pɨdaŋ ni gen naŋ iyɨneŋ yaŋ do ɨŋtaŋek ɨsal yɨkgwit.
Pakbisi da wain dagagɨt do jap noknok kɨla amɨn da aŋkɨlɨk kok do naŋ nandaban galagɨsi agɨt. Oman amɨn pakbi kolewit uŋun da Yesu da yo agɨt uŋun kawit, mani kɨla amɨn dɨma kagɨt, do wɨli mɨŋat pagɨt uŋun yaŋ ɨban
Kɨsitgo da nak wasagɨl. Nandak nandak namɨŋaki gen teban morapgo nandaŋ pɨsokeŋ do pi tagɨsi abeŋ.
Yaŋ do aŋek Piŋkop da mɨktɨm wasagɨron da kombɨ amɨn morap dapba kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon kobogɨ amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi yopmaŋek yutnon wɨgakwan paŋdetni da Yesukon kɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Joŋ pigaga kwoŋ dakon tɨlak gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yaŋbɨ nandano.”
Nak Piŋkop dakon man aŋkɨsisat. Uŋun bɨsitno nandaban ɨsalɨ dɨma agɨt. Aŋek nak do but dasi sigɨn galak taŋ namɨsak.
Kɨnda da abɨŋ nandaŋek top yaŋ namɨsak. Aŋek sotno dakon mibɨlɨ nandaŋek kɨŋ amɨn yoyɨŋek aŋupbal ak do yosok.
Nak da gak aŋkutnaŋapbo gaga dakon amɨn kabɨ ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da gak dɨma aŋupbal ani. Gak yabekgo Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon kɨŋ
Yesu uŋudon da kɨŋ amɨn kɨnda kagɨt mani Matyu, uŋun takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt yut kabeŋon yɨkgɨt. Kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋ nak nol.” Yaŋban Matyu pɨdaŋ Yesu yolgɨt.
Amɨn Tagɨ da sakwabat uŋun kaŋek bupmɨsi nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kunam dɨma takgi.”
Jekop dakon Piŋkop, gak da tebai yoyɨgɨl, do os gat ae amɨn ɨlɨk pawɨlgaŋ tamo gat kɨsi wayɨŋɨ mɨni.
Iyɨ da tapmɨm madepmon da tɨmɨk paŋopgut. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Kɨla amɨn madep da yaŋ yosok, “Yawe da yo madep kɨnda nayɨgɨt uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋokdɨsat. Yaŋ nayɨgɨt, ‘Gak Monjino. Abɨsok nak gak dakon Datgo dagosot.
Kosiron kɨŋek pakbi kɨndakon altaŋek amɨn madep uŋun da Pilip yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kosol, pakbi oni. Mibɨlɨ nido telagɨ pakbi dɨma sokeŋ?”
Nido nak abɨŋ dandako aŋpak nak da si galak tosot uŋudeŋ aŋ amɨn dɨ dɨma ekwa pɨndakgeŋ yaŋ do nak tɨmɨsok dɨ pasoldot. Ae jiyo kɨsi da nak nandaba aŋpak ji da si galaktoŋ uŋudeŋ agak amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ dɨma dɨ egɨpbom. Nak obɨŋ dandako gen emat, ae amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok, ae butjap, ae dɨsi dogɨn nandaŋek egɨp egɨp, ae amɨn do yaŋba yokwi tok, ae manji gen, ae pɨbɨt tɨdok aŋpak, ae pi paŋupbal ak aŋpak, uŋun aŋpak morap jikon taŋba pɨndakgeŋ yaŋ do pasoldot.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da wain pini aŋek amɨn da moneŋ pini dɨ aŋek pi ami do bamɨ dɨ paŋ ɨmni yaŋ nandaŋek pi uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm tɨmɨ dɨgwan bɨsap dubagɨ egɨp do kɨgɨt.
Gapman dakon emat amɨn da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ gapman dakon yut madepmon wɨgakwa emat amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsi abɨŋ Yesu aŋgwasɨŋek akgwit.
Asi, nak madepsi pasoldot, aŋek gɨptɨmno madepsi nɨmnɨmɨkdak. Pasol pasol da obɨsi abɨŋ nepmaŋdak.
Uŋun da tap ɨdap pudaŋban tap ɨdap terɨ terɨ agakwan Israel amɨn binapmon da paŋkɨgɨt.
Gen teban da yo kɨnda aŋmɨlɨp aban tagɨsisi dɨma agɨt. Yaŋdo, Piŋkop da kosit ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda wɨtdalban pɨsagɨt uŋun tagɨsisi ae gen teban yapmaŋdak, ae uŋun kosiron da Piŋkop da kapmatjok tagɨ kɨneŋ yaŋsi nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom amaŋ.
Ae abɨsok bɨsapmon iyɨ kokwin agakni uŋun kɨlegɨsi yaŋ nolɨk do amɨn morap Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ yoyɨsak.
Mani jap tebai uŋun amɨn madep kɨlɨ abi dakon. Uŋuden amɨn bɨsap morapmɨ aŋpak jit da tagɨ ae jit da yokwi uŋun paŋkɨlɨgek kɨlɨ kokwinɨkgwit, do abɨsok tagɨsi nandaŋ pɨsaŋ mudaŋ.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni yo ni gat tɨlak abo?
Gen morapmɨ toŋ, mani papiakon mandak do dɨma nandɨsat.
Yaŋ aŋek nin uŋun gat amɨn kɨla aneŋ do manjɨŋ nipgut, ae iyɨ dakon Piŋkop ae Datni uŋun dakon oman aneŋ do mukwa sogok amɨni egɨpneŋ do manjɨŋ nipgut. Bɨsap mudok mudogɨ mɨni Yesu Kristo dakon tɨlɨmni ae tapmɨm madepni taŋ ɨmdɨsak. Uŋun asi.
Yaŋ kosok, do kɨŋ koŋ 7 kabɨ iyɨ yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi gat tɨmɨkban kwa uŋun yutnon egek aŋpak yokwisi aŋ. Mibɨltok uŋun amɨn yokwi egɨpgut, mani abɨsok uŋun yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi egɨsak. Yaŋgɨn abɨsok yokwi pakpak amɨn ekwaŋon yaŋ gɨn altosok.”
Yaŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da geni nandawit, ae wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ aban kaŋek gen yagɨt nandak do mɨrak pakyaŋsi yopgwit.
Melkisedek uŋun Salem kokup pap dakon kɨla amɨn madepni, ae Piŋkop Wukwisi dakon mukwa sogok amɨni egɨpgut. Abraham da emat aŋek kɨla amɨn madep dapmaŋek kokupmon apgut bɨsapmon, Melkisedek da kosiron domdom aŋek gɨsam ɨmgut.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn, amɨn dɨwarɨ aŋpakni tagɨsi noman gɨn toŋ. Mani, amɨn dɨwarɨ aŋpakni tagɨsi uŋun noman dɨma toŋ, uŋun don noman tokdaŋ.
Gak niaŋ nandɨsal? Sisa do takis ɨmno tagɨ asak?”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Dabɨl uŋun gɨptɨm dakon teŋteŋɨ. Dabɨlgo tagɨsi kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo kaloŋ teŋteŋɨni toŋ.
Nak yaŋsi nandɨsat: Egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon yo morap abeŋ uŋun da Kristo man madep ɨmdɨsak. Ae kɨmokgeŋ kaŋ, abɨsok egɨp egɨp asat uŋun si yapmaŋek yo wukwisi abɨdokdɨsat.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda Jerusalem egɨpgut uŋun mani Simeon. Uŋun amɨn aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi ae Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨŋ aŋkɨsiŋyo aŋek egɨpgut. Piŋkop da Israel amɨn kabɨ but yokwikon egɨpgwit uŋun butni paŋteban asak do manjɨkbi amɨn uŋun do jomjom aŋek egɨpgut. Simeon uŋun Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon tugaŋbi amɨn kɨnda.
Amɨn Tɨpdomon kwaŋ uŋun kɨbaŋ uŋun da kɨmot dakon kɨbaŋni asak, mani amɨn Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak uŋun kɨbaŋ uŋun da egɨp egɨp dakon kɨbaŋni asak. Namɨn dasi yabekbi pi arɨpmɨ tagɨ asak? Nin da arɨpmɨ dɨma.
Yaŋban notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Ninon bret mɨni uŋun do bo yosok?”
Egek uŋudon gɨn Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut agek Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋek yagɨt, “Yesu uŋun Piŋkop dakon Monji.”
Yaŋban yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak Rom amɨnsi dagok do tomni madepsi yumgɨm.” Yaŋban Pol da iyɨgɨt, “Gak yaŋ agɨl mani nak altagɨmon da Rom amɨnsi kɨnda egɨpgum da egɨsat.”
“Papia yut mɨŋat monjɨyo da yoyɨŋdetni dɨma yapmaŋgaŋ. Ae oman amɨn da madepni dɨma yapmaŋgaŋ.
Aŋpak yokwi ak do gen yaŋ paŋteban aŋek yaŋ yoŋ, “Aŋpak yokwi kɨnda ak do dakon nandak nandak tagɨsi amaŋ. Yo uŋun akdamaŋ uŋun amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo asak.” Amɨn dakon but nandak nandakyo arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaneŋ. Uŋun pasɨlɨsi.
Toktogɨsi tebaisi agek jɨgɨ guramɨtni, yaŋ aŋakwa uŋun aŋpak da jikon teban tosak. Yaŋ aŋek Piŋkop dakon aŋpak kɨnda do wadak wadak dɨma ani. Aŋpakji da tagɨsi ae kɨlegɨsi akdɨsak.
Amɨn morapmɨsi kokup morap tawiron da abɨŋ muwukgwit. Abɨŋ muwugakwa Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Not kabɨno, wasɨp do yaŋ dayɨsat, ji Amɨn Tagɨ dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani. Kalɨp papia dɨwarɨ ji do mandaŋ damgum uŋudeŋ ae mandak do dɨma kurak tosot, nido gen uŋun da ji paŋpulugokdɨsak. Gen uŋun yaŋ:
Ae abɨsok Piŋkop da yaŋban kundu gat mɨktɨm gat kɨndap da noman taŋek paŋupbal ani do jomjom aŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon gen kokwin bɨsap madep noman tosak, ae amɨn Piŋkop do manji ɨmgwit uŋun wagɨlsi tasɨk tokdaŋ.
Iyɨŋbal yagɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji man madep pasak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun kwaŋ tosok.
Yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon kosit nolayɨki. Aŋkutnaŋaki yokwi kɨnda da nak abɨŋ nep do pi dɨma asak.
Yaŋ awit do uŋun mɨktɨm tɨm uŋun do Yawi Mɨktɨm yaŋ yawit da yoŋ.
Gak kaloŋgɨn pasɨlɨ tamono ae pasɨkno. Gengo da nak tagɨ aŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat.
Dɨwarɨni yɨpmaŋ ɨmɨŋek butni aŋteban ani. Butjɨk madepsi nandaban uŋun da obɨsi dɨ abɨŋ yɨpban.
Yaŋdo, nin Amɨn Tagɨ do pasolgomaŋ, do mɨŋat amɨnyo nandak nandak kulabɨk aŋek Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do pi tebai amaŋ. Piŋkop da nin dakon but pɨndakdak. Ae jiyo kɨsi butjikon da nin pi kɨlegɨsi amaŋ yaŋ nandani do nandɨsat.
Not kabɨ, babɨknin Dewit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ do asisi dayɨŋ teŋteŋoko. Dewit uŋun kɨmakban kɨlɨsi wayɨkgwit. Bumjotni dakon tamo abɨsok on kokupmon komaŋ.
Pakbi da ɨgek amɨn tɨmɨk paŋabɨkwa kɨmokgoŋ, uŋudeŋ gak da amɨn abɨ kɨmokgoŋ. Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok ekwaŋ, uŋun dɨpmɨn yombem gɨn pɨndakgaŋ.
Nak nandɨsat, nak da buron yo tagɨ kɨnda dɨma tosok. Uŋun but kalɨpno do yosot. Asi, nak aŋpak kɨlegɨ ak do nandɨsat, mani arɨpmɨ dɨma abeŋ.
Paŋmuwukbi Masadonia ae Akaia provins bamoron ekwaŋ uŋun da Jerusalem telagɨ paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon wadak wadak amɨn ekwaŋ uŋun paŋpulugok do tagɨsi nandaŋek moneŋ paŋmuwukgwit.
Ji asi paŋmuwukbi notji Masadonia provinskon dukwan dukwan ekwaŋ uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ. Mani, uŋun aŋpak sigɨn saŋbeŋek madepsi aŋakwa pap tosak dosi dayamaŋ.
Mani gagon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt tosok, do nin gak do pasal gamneŋsi.
Yo uŋun kosirɨ kapbɨ altaŋ ɨmɨŋek uŋudon gɨn aeni Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨt.
Aŋakwa pɨlɨn taŋakwan Yesu dɨma opban kaŋ iyɨ gɨn bot kɨndakon wɨgek Kapaneam kokupmon kɨk do pakbi ɨdap binap naŋ kɨwit.
Toktogɨsi uwalno da sɨtnok aŋ namɨŋek yaŋ yoŋ, “Piŋkopgo dukon egɨsak?” Gen uŋun da gobɨŋ da yaŋ yamaŋ namɨŋakwan kɨmot do nandɨsat.
Mani aŋpak yokwi aŋakwa dɨkba tepmɨ pani kaŋ, Piŋkop da ji do nandaban tagɨ asak? Uŋun dɨma. Mani aŋpak tagɨ baŋ aŋakwa dɨkba uŋun do tepmɨ pani kaŋ, Piŋkop da yaŋ do galak tosok.
Uŋuden amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak, do uwal da pabɨŋ yopmaŋek paŋupbal ani bɨsapmon uwal da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ yopdɨsak.
Piŋkop, Tap Gami da gak gandagɨt bɨsapmon si pasalek kwakwalɨkgɨt.
Aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da yaŋ yokdaŋ, “Asisi, Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ do kobogɨ do tomni tagɨsi yomɨsak. Asisi, Piŋkop da gen pikon amɨn morap dakon aŋpak kokwin asak.”
Ji yaŋ aŋek babɨkji dakon gen teban guramɨgek Piŋkop dakon gen teban maba kɨsak.
Amɨn kɨnda Piŋkopmon da altosok uŋun Piŋkop dakon egɨp egɨpni uŋun amɨnon tosok, do yokwi dɨma aŋ aŋ asak. Piŋkopmon da altaŋbi, do yokwi arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋ aŋ asak.
Ae kɨmakbi tamokon kɨlɨ pakgwit kabɨ da gak da but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsal yaŋ dɨ yoŋ bo dɨma? Si tasɨk togɨ tamokon da gak da kɨlanin tagɨsi asal yaŋ dɨ yoŋ bo dɨma?
Kɨsitnokon abɨdaŋaki tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ. Aŋaki toktogɨsi gengo do nandaŋ egɨpbeŋ.
Yaŋ awit bɨsapmon Juda mɨŋat amɨnyo Yawe dakon telagɨ yut dagawit. Israel amɨn Piŋkop da kɨla agɨt.
Nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsal, uŋun dakon bamɨ nolɨŋek yo tagɨsi aŋnibi. Tapmɨm madepgokon da nin paŋpulugosol. Nin gak da kapmatjok egek uwalnin da dɨma nindani do pasɨlgamaŋ.
Yawe da kɨlani tagɨsi aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda da kɨdatni kɨnda dɨma jokgaldɨsak.
Ae gɨldaron aŋelo kɨnda akban kagɨm. Uŋun da mɨnam kwen binap akwaŋ do yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop dakon jap noknok madep do abɨŋ muwutni.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Juda amɨn dakon Yapyap Bɨlak Madep kwaŋ tagɨt.
Golji gat ae silwasi gat uŋun maŋut aŋ mudaŋ. Uŋun maŋut da ji dakon yokwisi paŋnoman aban nomansi teŋteŋokdaŋ, aŋek maŋut da gɨptɨmji kɨndap da yaŋ soŋba sokdaŋ. Mibɨ bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋunjok noman tokdɨsak, aŋakwan ji ɨsal dogɨn yo morap gat moneŋ gat paŋmuwukgaŋ.
Ji kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji kalɨp egɨpgut kokupmon aeni tobɨl wɨgɨsak kaŋ, ji niaŋ nandani?
Ae uŋun yutnon amɨn da ji but dasi tɨmɨtni kaŋ, ji dakon but yawot uŋun amɨnon tosak. Mani but dasi dɨma tɨmɨtni kaŋ, but yawotji uŋun dɨsikon gɨn tosak.
Aŋek yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Nin kalɨpsi babɨknin da bɨsapmon egɨpgumaŋ tam, nin paŋpulugaŋek kombɨ amɨn dɨma dapnom.’
Nap kɨsirɨkon abɨsɨwit dɨma wɨtdalek Anas da Yesu yabekban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Kaiapaskon aŋkɨwit.
Yawe Saion kokup papmon egɨsak uŋun da gɨsam tagɨ damjak. Ji mɨktɨmon egɨpni bɨsap morapmon Jerusalem kaŋakwa tagɨsi tosak dosi nandɨsat.
Kɨŋ uŋudon gɨldat 40 japmɨ mɨni egek jap do madepsi agɨt. Aŋakwan Sunduk da aŋkewalgɨt.
Yaŋsi nandamaŋ, amɨn gak do uwal aŋ gamaŋ, uŋun kɨmotdaŋ. Yo yokwi aŋ amɨn pabɨŋ yopbɨ bɨrapmɨgɨ dukwan dukwan kɨkdaŋ.
Nak amɨn da kɨmoron da pɨdot pɨdot uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dayɨkeŋ. Moses da gen kɨnda mandagɨt ji manjɨŋ nandaŋ bo dɨma? Moses da kɨndap kɨnda soŋban kaŋakwan Piŋkop da gen yaŋ iyɨgɨt: ‘Nak Abraham, Aisak, ae Jekop dakon Piŋkop.’
Piŋkopno da but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak, ae uŋun da abɨŋ aŋpulugokdɨsak. Piŋkop da nak yum nandaŋek nepban pɨndagapbo uwalno pabɨŋ yopdɨsak.
iyɨ dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni dakon kɨla amɨn gat yopban tagɨsi ekwaŋ.
Jap noknok bɨsap madep binapgwan Yesu uŋun Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun da nagalon pɨgek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Mani Parisi amɨn da yaŋ yawit, “Koŋ dakon kɨla amɨn madep da tapmɨmon koŋ yoldak.”
Nak naga dakon egɨp egɨpno kɨla tebaisi agɨm, ae butno gwaljɨgɨ mɨni tosok, ae yokwi dɨ dɨma agɨm. Uŋun ɨsal dogɨn agɨm, ma?
Jap yet tɨŋtɨŋaŋakwan dɨwarɨ da kosiron maŋba mɨnam da abɨŋ nawit.
Uŋun Piŋkop manji ɨmgwit, do Piŋkop da yum pɨndagakwan aŋpak mayak mayagɨ ak do but kɨndap pawit. Aŋek mɨŋat da mɨŋat eyo dakon aŋpak yɨpmaŋek mɨŋat notni gat aŋpak yokwisi awit.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn kɨmakbi ɨmal naŋ kɨsit kandap tomni dabɨlyo wamgwit walɨmbɨl waŋga pɨgɨt. Pɨŋban Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ɨmalni wɨtdalek yɨpba kɨsak.”
Do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek bɨsap madep dakon jap noknok aneŋ. Mani bret kalɨpmɨ yisni toŋ baŋ dɨma noneŋ, nin bret kalugɨ baŋ noneŋ. Bret kalɨpmɨ uŋun aŋpak yokwi morap dakon tɨlak asak, aŋakwan bret kalugɨ uŋun but kɨlegɨsi ae gen bamɨsi dakon tɨlak asak.
“Jikon da amɨn kɨnda sipsipni 100 baŋ kaloŋɨ da pasɨljak kaŋ niaŋ asak? Uŋun da sipsip 99 joŋ tɨmon yopban egakwa kaloŋɨ pasɨldak uŋun wɨsɨŋek don aŋalon asak.
Yo madep agɨt do namɨn da uŋun dakon geni tagɨ yaŋ teŋteŋosak? Ae aŋpak tagɨsi morap agɨt uŋun da arɨpmon namɨn da mani tagɨ awɨgɨsak?
‘Betlehem, Judia mɨktɨmon tosok, gagon kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda altokdɨsak, do gak Judia mɨktɨm dakon kokup morap yapmaŋdal. Uŋun amɨn da amɨn kabɨno Israel uŋun dakon kɨla amɨn madep egɨpdɨsak.’ ”
Jikon da kɨnda jɨgɨ pasak kaŋ, Piŋkop do bɨsit asak. Ae kɨnda dakon but kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun Piŋkop dakon man aŋkɨsik do kap yosak.
Nak nandaŋ gadat mɨŋat samɨnin Pibi dakon mibɨlɨ do dayɨkdɨsat. Uŋun mɨŋat tagɨsi kɨnda, paŋmuwukbi Senkria kokupmon ekwaŋ uŋun dakon oman mɨŋatni egɨsak.
Nak Yawe Piŋkopnin dakon telagɨ yut do nandaŋek bɨsit yaŋ abeŋ, “Yo kɨnda do wadak wadagɨ mɨni tagɨsi egɨpni.”
Gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋakwan aŋelo tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda da tɨp madep kɨnda abɨdagɨt. Tɨp uŋun wit mɨsɨŋɨkgaŋ dakon tɨp dakon tɨlak, madepsi. Tɨp uŋun aŋenak maban tap kaga pɨgɨgɨt. Maban pɨgakwan yaŋ yagɨt, “On asat yaŋ gɨn uŋun kokup pap madep Babilon abɨdaŋ tebaisi maba pɨgɨkdɨsak. Maba pɨgakwan amɨn da ae saŋbeŋek dɨma kokdaŋ.
Amɨn da wit mibɨltok paŋ uŋun baŋ dɨwarɨ tɨmɨgek bret wasaŋek Piŋkop do paret aŋ. Yaŋ aba bret dɨwarɨ kɨsi telagɨ gɨn aŋ mudoŋ. Ae kɨndap dakon gelɨ uŋun telagɨ kaŋ, kɨlɨŋɨ yo kɨsi telagɨ gɨn.
Gileat mɨktɨm gat Manase mɨktɨm gat uŋun nak dakon. Epraim mɨktɨm uŋun nak dakon busuŋ kutnokno. Aŋakwa Juda mɨktɨm uŋun kɨla amɨn madep kalɨŋ kɨrɨŋno.
“Kwaŋakwa pɨndagek pi monjɨ da kɨŋ pi ami aŋalon aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gak pigokon jap yet tagɨ baŋgɨn yopgul kagagwan joŋ yokwi uŋun niaŋon da kwawit?’
Nak amɨn kɨnda tekni dɨma nandɨsat uŋun da gen yaŋban nandɨsat. Uŋun da yaŋ yosok, “Nak yo jɨgɨ morap ji da kwapmon tawit uŋun kukwaŋ yopgum. Ae mɨktɨm sɨmɨl gok paŋpulugoko mibɨlɨkon yopba taŋakwa pi teban saŋbeŋek dɨma awit.
Amɨn kɨnda mɨktɨm dakon yo morap paŋek egɨ kɨmotjak bɨsapmon iyɨ pasɨljak kaŋ, uŋun yo morap da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋpulugokdaŋ.
Do pi uŋun aŋ mudoni kaŋ tagɨsi. Kalɨp butji pɨdaŋba pi uŋun ak do galagɨsi nandawit, do abɨsokyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yo taŋ damaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon tepmɨ aŋ mudoni kaŋ tagɨsi.
Nin Piŋkop dakon pi amɨn uŋuden paŋpulugoneŋ kaŋ tagɨsi. Yaŋ aŋek kaŋdo nin uŋun gat pi kaloŋɨ aŋek Piŋkop dakon gen bamɨ joŋɨtneŋ.
Piŋkop kaloŋ dagɨn yokwikon baŋ abɨdaŋek man madep namɨsak. Uŋun da tɨp madepno agakwan tebaisi akdat. Uŋun dagɨn dam madepno agakwan tagɨsi aŋkutnosok.
Dɨma apdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek egakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋudon apdɨsak. Yaŋdo, ji tagap taŋek egɨpni.”
Amɨn morapmɨ da pi amaŋ uŋun do toktogɨsi uwal aŋ nimɨŋek nindapba kɨmotneŋ do aŋ. Do amɨn kɨmoron da dɨma pɨdoni tam, nin mibɨlɨ nido uŋun pi amaŋ?
Nak mɨktɨmon naŋ aŋenotni bɨsapmon amɨn kɨsisi ɨlɨkgo nagakon apdaŋ.”
Ae sot teban kɨnda da kalbi altaŋ gamjak, bo gɨldat binap yo yokwisi kɨnda da gak aŋupbal asak yaŋ do pasol pasol dɨma abi.
Aŋakwa Yesu da gen yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok ji gat egek yabekban pɨgɨm amɨnon tobɨl wɨgɨkeŋ.
Pi masɨ masɨmɨsi asak do aŋkɨsini. Mani uŋun wagɨl wukwisi do aŋkɨsini.
Pɨlɨn ae saŋbeŋek dɨma tokdɨsak. Aŋakwan lam gat ae gɨldat gat pini mɨni, nido Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkop da iyɨ mɨŋat amɨn teŋteŋaŋ yomdɨsak. Aŋakwan oman monjɨni kɨla amɨn madep dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨ wɨgɨkdaŋ.
Abɨsok mɨŋat amɨnyo nawa gengo kɨrɨŋɨkgaŋ uŋun Yawe gak da kobogɨ yobi dakon bɨsap.
Do gak Amɨn Tagɨnin dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋok do mayaktok dɨma pabi. Ae nak Yesu dakon dam tebanon amɨni nak do mayaktok dɨma pabi. Piŋkop dakon tapmɨm abɨdaŋbɨ Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok pikon nak gat kɨsi jɨgɨ pandeŋ.
Nido, gen ŋwakŋwarɨkon da bɨsit abeŋ kaŋ, wupnokon da bɨsit asat, mani nandak nandaknokon da yo bamɨ kɨnda dɨma nandɨsat.
Yaŋ iyɨŋek amɨn kabɨ madep gat paŋdetni gat yoyɨŋban iyɨ akgɨron apgwit. Apba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon yɨyɨtni tagɨsi tosak do nandaŋek pi madep asak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni pasɨl ɨmjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek, ae Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi do nandaŋek, egɨp egɨpni do nandaban yo madep dɨma asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn asak. Amɨn kɨnda nak nol do nandɨsak kaŋ, iyɨ dakon galaktok manji yomɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek noljak.
Pol bɨlak bamorɨ egek Piŋkop gen yaŋakwan Esia mɨktɨmon Juda amɨn ae Grik amɨn egɨpgwit uŋun kɨsi morap da Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen nandawit.
Mani Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt.
Nit yabekbi dɨwarɨ ae Amɨn Tagɨ dakon padɨge ae Pita yo da aŋ uŋudeŋ Yesu yolyol mɨŋat paŋek kɨsin agek pi agagɨ.
Mɨrɨm bɨsap kaloŋ pɨsono kwaŋ uŋun da tɨlak bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsi ekwamaŋ. Wupnin gɨldaron tepmɨsi altaŋ pasɨlgaŋ uŋun da tɨlak bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn ekwamaŋ.
Niaŋsi aneŋ? Gak ɨdon kɨlɨ apgul yaŋ nandaŋ gamdaŋ.
Uŋun aŋelo papia gɨroŋɨkbi monɨŋ kɨnda kɨsirɨkon abɨdagɨt, ae papia uŋun wɨtdal kwi da tagɨt. Uŋun kandapmɨ amɨn tetgɨn do tap kwenon yɨpgut, aŋek kandapmɨ terɨ kɨnda mɨktɨmon bamagɨt.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Epesas amɨn da Yesu Yolyol Kosit do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek upbalap madepsi awit.
Uŋun amɨn yo morap noman taŋ yomaŋ uŋun do nandaba yokwi tok aŋek gen morapmɨ yoŋ. Uŋun iyɨ dakon butni dakon galaktok yokwi uŋun yol do galak toŋ. Uŋun gen pap yaŋek gɨptɨm pawɨgɨk aŋek iyɨ dakon man pawɨkwaŋ. Aŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun paŋpulugoni do paŋgalak aŋ.
Yo ni da gen teban yapyap amɨn kosit sopmaŋ ɨmɨŋakwan tepmɨ dɨma noman tosok uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ. Ni bɨsapmon noman togɨ uŋun bɨsapmonsi noman tokdɨsak.
Uŋun gɨldarɨ ae kalbi kokup pap dakon tɨp dam da kwenon akwaŋ. Kokup pap dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo gulusuŋ morapmɨ gat ae yokwi morapmɨ aŋ.
Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨ do ni gen baŋ saŋbeŋek dayɨkeŋ? Gideon, ae Barak, ae Samson, ae Jepta, ae Dewit, ae Samuel, ae kombɨ amɨn morap do dayɨkeŋ kaŋ bɨsap arɨpmɨ dɨma.
Gen yaŋ yoyɨŋakwan meŋi padɨk padɨkni da abɨŋ yomakon agek Yesu yomakon pɨsak do gen yɨpba wɨgɨgɨt.
Yo uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da agɨt, aŋakwan nin da kono yo masɨ masɨmɨsi asak.’ ”
Amɨn kɨmakbi kɨmoron da dɨma pɨdoni tam, mibɨlɨ nido amɨn dɨwarɨ da amɨn kɨmakbi paŋpulugok do telagɨ pakbi sosoŋ? Arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨdoni tam, nido uŋun aŋpak aŋ?
Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo dakon nandaŋ yawotni ji da wupmon tosak.
Kɨrɨrɨŋ 7 kabɨ yaŋakwa gen yawit uŋun mandak do agɨm, mani Kwen Kokupgwan da tek kɨnda yaŋ noman tagɨt, “Kɨrɨrɨŋ 7 kabɨ dakon gen uŋun nandak nandakgokon gɨn toni. Dɨma mandabi.”
Nin da wupji paŋpulugok do yo tagɨsi ji da binapmon kwaokgɨmaŋ, do ji da nin do gɨptɨm dakon yo paŋpulugoni uŋun da jɨgɨ damjak, ma?
Yawe da bɨsitno nandɨsak, do nak but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat. Asisi, bɨsitno nandɨsak.
Amɨn Tagɨ yɨpmaŋ degapno nin do nandaban yokwi tok aŋ nimjak do nandamaŋ, ma? Nin dakon tapmɨm da uŋun dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋgamaŋ, ma?
Ji Yesu Kristo da nandak nandak pagɨt yaŋ gɨn pani.
Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Abraham Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgut, do Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt.”
Ae amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop dakon telagɨ yut do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, telagɨ yut gat ae Piŋkop yutnikon egɨsak uŋun gat kɨsi do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak.
Yawe, gak da nak kɨla amɨn madep manjɨgɨl, mani uwal da yaŋsul aŋ namaŋ. Dukwan dukwan morap kɨsat yaŋsul aŋ namaŋ gɨn.
Do yaŋ yosot, “Bupmɨsi, nak kɨnarɨm da yaŋ pɨtno toŋ ak do nandɨsat. Aŋek pɨrɨropmaŋ kɨŋ yɨk yawot tamo kɨnda wusɨŋ kaŋ uŋudon yɨkgeŋ.
Piŋkop uŋun da amɨn kaloŋɨsikon da amɨn kabɨ morapmɨ wasagɨt. Wasaŋban ɨreŋ taŋek kɨŋ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ arɨpmɨsi agɨt. Egɨpni dakon bɨsap gat ae mɨktɨm egɨpni dakon kɨlapmɨ kɨsi kokwinɨk yomgut da ekwaŋ.
Ji da aŋpak aŋ uŋun do butnokon da nɨrɨp soŋek ŋwakŋwarɨsi nandɨsat. Piŋkop da Kristo dakon nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek ji yaŋ damgut, mani ji tepmɨsi yɨpmaŋ degek gen bin ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda yolgaŋ.
Abɨdaŋek Epesas kokup papmon kɨŋ altawit. Altaŋek Prisila gat Akwila gat uŋudon yopmaŋek Pol iyɨ Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wukwan Juda amɨn gat Piŋkop dakon gen dakon mibɨlɨ do gen emat aŋek nayɨŋbi gayɨko awit.
Uŋun aŋelo madep serabim kɨnda da kwenon yɨkban pɨrɨropmaŋ abɨgɨt. Ae mɨrɨm mɨnam da yaŋ pɨrɨ toŋ da Piŋkop abɨdaŋ tepmɨsi abɨgɨt.
Amɨn uŋun wasok wasoksi aeni pɨdoni amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani. Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn iyɨ do manjɨgɨt, do kosirɨ kɨnda gat arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨmotdaŋ. Uŋun Piŋkop ae Kristo dakon mukwa sogok amɨn egek Kristo gat bɨlak 1 tausen kɨla amɨn madep egɨpdaŋ.
Emat agak sɨba geni tepmɨsi kɨnda, gen kaganigwan da wɨgɨt. Uŋun emat agak sɨba naŋ amɨn kabi morap mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun pabɨŋ yopdɨsak. “Ain kɨrɨŋ naŋ abɨdaŋek amɨn kabɨ morap kɨlani tebaisi akdɨsak.” Yaŋ aŋek wain sop pɨŋtɨl tɨp gapmakon wain sop bamaŋ tɨldɨsak. Uŋun Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami dakon butjapni dakon tɨlak asak.
Amɨn dakon gɨptɨm uŋun kaloŋɨ gɨn, mani gɨptɨm dɨwatni morapmɨ. Ae uŋun gɨptɨm dakon dɨwat morap uŋun gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ kɨnda dakon gɨn. Kristo dakon gɨptɨm kɨsi yaŋ gɨn.
Yaŋban nandaŋek Juda amɨn da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Datnin uŋun Abraham.” Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji asi Abraham dakon monjini tam, Abraham da iyɨ aŋpak agɨt uŋun baŋ abam.
Yaŋban Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Israel amɨn dakon yoyɨŋdet kɨnda da yo morap on dɨma nandabɨ pɨsosok, ma?
Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da wasɨp do yaŋ yagɨt, “Yaŋgɨn buŋon amɨn da mibɨltokdaŋ, aŋakwa mibɨltok amɨn da buŋon amɨn akdaŋ.”
Kristo da iyɨ aban nin but yawot egek kaloŋɨ ekwamaŋ. Kalɨp Juda amɨn ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ uwal uwal aŋek egɨpgwit. Uŋun uwal uwal aŋpakni da Juda amɨn ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da binapmon dam da yaŋ tagɨt. Mani Kristo gɨptɨmni paregek dam uŋun wagɨl tuwɨlek uwal uwal aŋpak uŋun aŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek paŋmuwukbi kabɨ morap egɨ aŋaŋ kɨwit uŋun do kɨla amɨni manjɨŋ manjɨŋ awit. Aŋek Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egek bɨsit pi aŋek egɨpgwit. Aŋek uŋun kɨla amɨn kabɨ egɨp egɨpni Amɨn Tagɨkon tosok yaŋsi nandawit amɨn uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da kɨsiron yopgumal.
Piŋkop, nak mɨŋat amɨnyo da mango madepsi awɨgɨni do nandɨsat. Tɨlɨmgo yɨpbɨ noman taŋakwan mɨŋat amɨnyo mɨktɨm morap kɨsikon ekwaŋ uŋun da koni.
Yaŋ yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn dɨwarɨ gat da gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋba gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yoyɨgɨt.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn Sunduk da pudaŋ kɨ kabi bamot aŋek iyɨ emat wamjil kaŋ, amɨn kabɨni tebai dɨma egɨpdaŋ. Yaŋ ani kaŋ pasɨl mudokdaŋ.
Nataniel uŋun gen nandaŋek yaŋkwok yaŋ agɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak Piŋkop dakon Monji. Gak Israel amɨn dakon Kɨla Amɨn Madep.”
Nak Dewit do yaŋ teban tok agɨm. Nak telagɨsi, do top dɨmasi yosot.
Kalɨp mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn kabɨ morap egɨpgwit uŋun yum pɨndagakwan galaktokni yolek egɨpgwit.
Yɨpba taŋakwan don Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn da abɨŋ muwuk Pol aŋgwasɨŋek akgwit. Yaŋ aŋakwa pɨdaŋban kokup papmon aeni pɨgɨwit. Pɨgɨ pakgwit da wɨsa dagokdo Banabas gat uŋun kokup pap yɨpmaŋek Debe kokup pap kɨgɨmal.
Gak egɨp egɨp dakon kosit kɨlɨ nolɨŋbɨ kagɨm. Nak gak gat egek kɨsɨk kɨsɨkgo da butnokon pɨgɨ tugosak.’
Piŋkop da papiakon tɨmɨ kɨndakon gɨldat 7 do yaŋ yagɨt: “Piŋkop da gɨldat 7 non pi morap aŋ mudagɨt pɨndakgɨt, aŋek uŋun gɨldaron yɨk yawot agɨt.”
Yaŋban kɨla amɨn da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, monjino dɨma kɨmagakwan tepmɨ pɨki.”
Gak gen on mɨŋat amɨnyo yoyɨŋdekgi. Gak yaŋ mudaŋ gabi, do gen on guramɨtni do paŋtagap abi, ae gen pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun aŋpakni paŋmɨlɨp ak do gen tebaisi yoyɨki. Gak yum pɨndagaki amɨn da gengo do yo ɨsalɨ yaŋ dɨma yoni.
Yaŋdo, ni tomni naŋ abɨdokeŋ? Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yo tɨmɨrɨsi uŋun dɨma tɨmɨkdat. Mɨŋat amɨnyokon Gen Bin Tagɨsi ɨsalsi yaŋek tomni dɨma tɨmɨgek tagɨsi nandɨsat, uŋun da tomnino asak.
Paŋdetni dɨwarɨ Yesu kawit bɨsapmon kɨnda uŋun notni gat dɨma egɨpgwit, mani uŋun Tomas (ae mani kɨnda Yayat).
Mani Solomon da uŋun yut awalgɨt.
“Gen dayɨkdɨsat uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani. Amɨn Dakon Monji amɨn da kɨsiron yɨpdaŋ.”
Kundu gat ae mɨktɨm, ae tap ɨdap gat ae tap kɨlap ae yo morap tap kagagwan ekwaŋ, ji kɨsi morap Piŋkop dakon man awɨgɨni.
Aŋakwa yo dabɨl da kaŋ nandaŋyo awit amɨn uŋun da koŋ da aŋupbal abi amɨn niaŋon da kɨlek tagɨt uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨwit.
Ji amɨn dakon yo tɨmɨt do tebai dɨma yoyɨni. Ji amɨn paŋkewalek kabokon da yo tɨmɨt tɨmɨt uŋun aŋpak tagɨ yaŋ dɨma nandani. Moneŋ ae yo kabɨyosi ɨreŋ taŋba uŋun do butjikon da uŋun yo madep yaŋ dɨma nandani.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu aeni yaŋ tɨdaŋek wupni yɨpban kɨŋakwan kɨmakgɨt.
Ji dɨsi baŋ dɨ paŋkewalbam. Amɨn kɨnda ji da binapmon mɨktɨm dakon yo morap kɨsi nandaŋ mudosot yaŋ nandaŋek “Nak nandaŋ kokwino tagɨsi” yaŋ yosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn on mɨktɨm dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi uŋun si yopmaŋek nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi amɨn tagɨ dagosak.
Mani nak gen dɨma yosot. Nak gen mapmɨt gɨn asat. Nido, gak da gaga nak do yo uŋun asal.
Ae Piŋkop dakon gen kɨnda gat yaŋ tosok: “Amɨn da gɨptɨmɨ sugawit uŋun kokdaŋ.”
Gen yaŋakwan on mɨktɨm noman tagɨt. Gen tebai yaŋakwan noman tagɨt do mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn kɨsisi Yawe do pasalek tamtam yaŋ ɨmnisi.
Gak da bulmakau da noni do joŋ yopbɨ kwoŋ. Ae yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ abɨ kwaŋakwa nin jap uŋudon pamaŋ.
Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma. Nin gat kɨsi agek nin paŋpulugaŋban nin kɨsi da paret uŋun tɨmɨk paŋkɨneŋ do paŋmuwukbi da manjɨwit. Nin Amɨn Tagɨ man madep ɨm do nandamaŋ, ae mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋpulugok ak do galagɨsi nandamaŋ uŋun amɨn da kaŋ nandaŋyo ani do pi uŋun amaŋ.
Yesu da amɨn uŋun yaŋ ɨban kɨgɨt uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak jap noknok kɨnda asal kaŋ, notgo, bo ae pego padɨk padɨkgo bo ae yawi dɨwatgo bo ae yoni morapmɨ amɨn dɨbaŋ dɨma yaŋ yobi. Uŋun da kobogɨ do don yaŋ gamdaŋ.
do dɨma pasolni. Mɨnam monɨŋ monɨŋ morapmɨ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun madep dɨma, mani ji dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun wukwisi.”
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da “Piŋkopji dukwan egɨsak?” nido yaŋ niyaŋ?
Amɨn kɨŋ ap awit uŋun da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek wunda kwalkwal aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit,
Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨp aŋkutnok do nandɨsak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni pasɨl ɨmdɨsak. Mani amɨn kɨnda egɨp egɨpni paretjak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni kutnaŋban taŋ ɨmdɨsak.
Nin kɨŋapno mɨŋatjok uŋun Pol gat nin gat da buŋon nolek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “On amɨn uŋun Piŋkop Wɨkwisi Madep dakon oman monjɨni. Piŋkop da ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak dakon gen dayaŋ.”
Amɨn gɨptɨmɨ pap tosak bo ae uŋudon gɨn maŋ pagek kɨmotjak yaŋ nandawit. Mani bɨsap dubagɨ egɨ kaŋba Pol da gɨptɨmon yo kɨnda dɨma altaŋ ɨmgut yaŋ kaŋek nandak nandakni kulabɨk aŋek yawit, “On amɨn uŋun piŋkop kɨnda.”
On yawino. Piŋkop gat amɨn gat saŋbek saŋbek abi uŋun aŋteban asak. Amɨn morapmɨ dakon dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yom do parekdat.
“Paŋpulugokji, Gen Bamɨ Dakon Wup, Daron egɨsak. Nak da jikon yabekgo pɨkdɨsak. Uŋun da Daron da pɨŋek mibɨlno do yaŋ teŋteŋok akdɨsak.
Juda amɨn da gen uŋun nandaŋek aeni tɨp tɨmɨgek aŋakba kɨmotjak do awit.
Ji monjɨ dakon pɨŋbini egek gawak ɨmni. Butjap tepmɨ nandɨsak, do japmɨ nandaŋ daban dɨ kɨmakbam. Amɨn morap paŋkutnosak do Piŋkopmon kwaŋ uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.
Mani amɨn morapmɨ da Jon do kombɨ amɨn bamɨsi kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ, do ‘Amɨn dakon pi’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ kaŋ Jon dakon man bin aŋupbal ano mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da tɨp baŋ nindapdaŋ.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop dakon pi uŋun yaŋ: Ji Piŋkop da amɨn yabekban apgut uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni.”
Yo monɨŋɨsok uŋuden ji da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi agagɨ, do nido yo dɨwarɨ morap do nandaba kɨk aŋ?
Gen uŋun yaŋapbo Juda amɨn da Telagɨ Yut Madepmon abɨdaŋek nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do pini awit.
On amɨn bamot paŋabeŋ uŋun Telagɨ Yut Madepnin dakon yo dɨ kabo dɨma nagɨmal. Ae nin dakon piŋkop mɨŋat do yaŋba yokwi tok kɨnda dɨma agɨmal.
Yaŋ aŋakwa aŋelo kɨnda gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da apban kagɨm. Uŋun da Piŋkop egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ dakon tɨlak amɨnon yop do yo kɨnda abɨdaŋek apgut. Abɨŋek aŋelo 4 kabɨ Piŋkop da mɨktɨm gat tap gat paŋtasɨk ani do tapmɨm yomgut uŋun do madepsi yaŋ tɨdagɨt.
Top gen kɨnda dɨmasi yawit. Gulusuŋni mɨni egɨpgwit.
Mɨŋat monjɨ kabɨno, ji Kristokon gadani. Yaŋ aŋakwa abɨŋ noman tosak bɨsapmon nin tebaisi agek ɨŋamnikon mayaktok dɨma paneŋ.
Yesu tagaŋek nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi taŋ ɨmgut, ae Piŋkop da galak taŋ ɨmɨŋakwan amɨnyo kɨsi da galak taŋ ɨmgwit.
Jikon amɨn kɨnda amɨn kɨnda gat gen toŋ bɨsapmon nido paŋmuwukbi dakon pi amɨn si yapmaŋek Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ kabɨ dakon pi amɨnon kwaŋ? Uŋudeŋ ak do pasol pasolji mɨni, ma?
Piŋkop, aŋkutnoki do gagon obɨsat, do kɨlano aki.
Piŋkop da Moses gen iyɨgɨt yaŋ nandamaŋ, mani uŋun amɨn dukwan da apgut uŋun nin dɨma nandamaŋ.”
Gak but tobɨl abi. Yaŋ dɨma abi kaŋ, nak kɨlɨ uŋunjok gagon obɨŋek gen kaganokon emat agak sɨba tosok uŋun naŋ uŋun amɨnon emat akdɨsat.
Piŋkop da bupmɨ nandaŋ nimɨŋek pi on nimgut, do jɨgɨ noman taŋ nimaŋ bɨsapmon pi dɨma yɨpmaŋgamaŋ.
Nandaŋ gadatji uŋun paret yombem kɨnda naŋ Piŋkop do ɨmaŋ. Ae naga jɨgɨ pasat uŋun da Piŋkop do paret aŋek wain tagalgaŋ uŋun yombem asak. Yaŋ do aŋek but galaksi nandɨsat.
Piŋkop dakon mukwa sogok amɨn kabɨni yaŋ yoni, “Dagok dagogɨ mɨni nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak.”
Kokup kɨdat dakon alta wasaŋakwa uŋun do aŋek Piŋkop da butjap madep nandagɨt. Piŋkop yɨpmaŋek kokup kɨdat gawak yomɨŋakwa nandaba yokwi tok aŋ yomgut.
Mani yo tagɨsisi uŋun yabekbi nin mɨktɨm kwoba tepmɨ tasɨk togɨ yombem da kagagwan ninon toŋ. Amɨn da uŋun tapmɨm madepsi daman uŋun nin dakon dɨma, uŋun Piŋkop dakon tapmɨmni yaŋ kaŋ nandaŋyo ani do aŋek nin da gɨptɨmon toŋ.
Ae amɨn kɨnda gɨptɨmɨ dɨma mandabi da gen teban guramɨkdak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gɨptɨmɨ mandabi yombem.
Ae amɨn yurɨ kɨnda dakon amɨn da pudaŋ kɨ kabɨ bamot aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yut tebai dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
Piŋkop dakon papia da yaŋ yosok: “Amɨn mibɨltogɨ, Adam, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ dagagɨt.” Mani mibɨ Adam da amɨn do egɨp egɨp yomyom Wup dagagɨt.
Amɨn bamot gen bamɨ dakon kosit kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgɨmal. Uŋun yaŋ yomal, “Mɨŋat amɨn morapyo kɨmoron da pɨdokdaŋ dakon bɨsap madep kɨlɨ noman tagɨt.” Gen on naŋ mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ dakon nandaŋ gadat paŋupbal amal.
Gɨldat wɨsak bɨsapmon tamonigwan si paŋkɨ pokgoŋ.
Kɨla amɨnji kɨlasi aŋ uŋun don pi awit dakon mibɨlɨ Piŋkop iyɨkdaŋ, do gawak yomɨŋek geni guramɨtni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, kɨsɨk kɨsɨgon da pini akdaŋ. Mani butjɨk pani kaŋ, uŋun da ji dɨma paŋpulugokdɨsak.
Dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn dabɨlni paban pɨsaŋban sɨŋtoŋ. Ae jɨgɨ da tebai pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun jɨgɨni kukwaŋ yomɨsak. Yawe uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨ do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak.
Amɨn yokwi da iyɨ do nandaba wɨgakwa aŋpak yokwini aŋ uŋun do pɨbɨt tɨdok aŋ.
Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat pasɨldamal, mani nak dakon gen uŋun dɨmasi pasɨldɨsak.”
Mɨŋat monjɨ kabɨno, amɨn da kosit kɨlegɨ yɨpmaŋ detni do top dayɨkdaŋ do kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn kɨnda aŋpak kɨlegɨ asak uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨ, Kristo yombem egɨsak.
Aŋakwan amɨn kabi kɨnda da amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi kɨnda wamaŋ aŋaŋ opgwit. Uŋun wayɨgon yɨpba pagakwan aŋaŋ Yesu da akgɨron awɨgɨk do awit.
Nak da amɨn do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ amɨn obɨsi paŋupbal akdɨsat. Iyɨ do nandaba wɨgɨsak amɨn gat dɨma egɨpneŋ.
Yaŋban mɨŋat da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, gak pakbi tɨbɨtgo mɨni, ae pakbi gapma uŋun dubagɨ. Do gak pakbi egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun dukon naŋ aŋapbi?
Yaŋban monjɨ uŋun da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Juda amɨn da aŋwa gak da Pol yɨpbɨ gen kokwin amɨn kabɨkon pɨgɨsak do gen yaŋ aŋteban ayɨŋ. Pol dakon mibɨlɨ dɨ gat nandaneŋ yaŋon da top gayɨkdaŋ.
Abɨsok gen on dayɨko jɨgɨsi nandaŋ.
Gen pɨlɨn kaga dayɨsat, uŋun gɨldat kalba yaŋ teŋteŋoni. Gen pɨsɨk mɨrakjikon dayɨsat uŋun yut kwenon da agek yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomni.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da uŋun aŋpak yopmaŋek gen ɨsalɨ baŋgɨn yaŋek ekwaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋba mɨŋat amɨnyo da gen uŋun do nandaba galagɨ aban amɨn 7 kabɨ yaŋ manjɨwit. Kɨnda Stiwen, uŋun nandaŋ gadatni tebaisi ae Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon tugaŋbi, ae Pilip, ae Pokorus, ae Nikano, ae Timon, ae Pamenas ae Nikolas. Nikolas uŋun Antiok kokup pap amɨn kɨnda. Uŋun Juda amɨnsi dɨma mani kulabɨk aŋek Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨŋek Juda amɨn kabɨkon saŋbegɨt.
Bɨsitno nandaŋek uwalno do butjap madepsi nandaŋ yomgut. Aŋek mɨktɨm aban wudɨp madepsi agɨt. Aŋakwan ɨleŋ dakon mibɨlɨ madepsi kwakwalɨkgwit.
Nin Rom pɨgɨno Pol iyɨ gɨn yut kɨndakon egakwan emat amɨn kɨnda da kɨlani aban egɨpjil do yawit.
Datno da yutnon yut burɨ morapmɨsi toŋ. Yaŋ dɨma kaŋ, gen uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma dayɨkom.
Os uŋun dakon tapmɨmni gen kagani gat ae paljɨgɨ garon tawit. Paljɨgɨ uŋun tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ yombem. Paljɨgɨ dɨwarɨkon tuŋon amɨn dakon busuŋɨ toŋ, do uŋun baŋ amɨn paŋupbal awit.
Kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo 24 kabɨ da kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo uŋun aŋgwasɨŋek taŋba pɨndakgɨm. Uŋun tamokon kɨla amɨn 24 kabɨ da yɨkgwit. Uŋun kɨla amɨn ɨmalni kwakwagɨ baŋ pawit, ae busuŋɨkon pelɨt kɨldani toŋ gol baŋ wasaŋbi baŋ pawit.
Mani Yawe uŋun kɨla amɨn madep dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨ wɨgɨsak. Uŋun kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon yɨgek gen kokwin pi ak do kɨlɨ tagap tagɨt.
Kɨŋakwan yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon da kɨnda dakon monji bo bulmakauni Sabat bɨsapmon pakbi gapmakon maŋban tepmɨ tagɨ ɨlɨkba wɨsak bo dɨma?”
Tobɨl nagon abɨŋek bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi. Meŋno da kalɨp gak dakon pi agɨt, abɨsok monji nakyo kɨsi pigo asat, do nak dakon but aŋteban aŋek yokwikon naŋ pulugaŋ nepbi.
Notnonisi, nin mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop manji ɨmaŋ amɨn do yomaŋ, mani nandamaŋ, ji jɨgɨ uŋuden dɨma tɨmɨtdaŋ. Piŋkop da ji paŋpulugaŋek yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt.
Iyɨŋban uŋudon gɨn dabɨlɨ kɨlek taŋban Yesu yolek Piŋkop aŋkɨsigɨt. Yaŋ aban mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi da kaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiwit.
Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn gat gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn yokwi pakpak amɨn not aŋyoban yɨgek jap noŋ.”
Babɨknin mibɨltogɨ Abraham da yo tagɨ tagɨ morap emaron tɨmɨkgɨt uŋun kokwin aban kabi 10 aŋakwan uŋudon baŋ kabi kɨnda Melkisedek do ɨmgut. Do yaŋsi nandamaŋ, Melkisedek uŋun man madepni toŋ!
Gɨldat gat kanek gat jil aŋkɨsinjil. Gɨk morap teŋteŋoŋ ji aŋkɨsini.
Mal kwen binap terɨ terɨ kɨsi teŋteŋoŋ, yaŋ gɨn Amɨn Dakon Monji apdɨsak. Do amɨn da ‘Asoni egɨsak’ bo ‘Oni egɨsak’ yaŋ dayɨŋba dɨma yolni.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo dakon nandaŋ yawotni, ae Piŋkop dakon amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpakni jikon tosak, ae Telagɨ Wup da ji paŋpulugaŋban but kaloŋsi egɨpni dosi nandɨsat.
Piŋkop, pɨdaŋ abɨŋ nin paŋpuluga. Butdasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpakgo do nandaŋek nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨgaki kɨmot dɨma aneŋ.
Amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da yabekban apgut uŋun Telagɨ Wupni tagapmɨsok dɨma, tugok tugogɨsi taŋ ɨmɨsak, do Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋosok.
Ji bɨt kɨlapyo kokup kɨdat do dapmaŋ paret aŋ uŋun dɨma noni. Ae yawi dɨma noni. Ae si tɨpba kwoŋ uŋunyo kɨsi dɨma noni. Aŋek mɨŋat wɨliyo yumabi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dɨma ani. Ji kaŋ kɨmagek uŋun aŋpak morap yapni kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi. Nin dakon gen yaŋ gɨn. Do ji tagɨsi egɨpni.”
Yaŋban koŋ da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek monjɨ uŋun maban bumjot yombem pagakwan koŋ yɨpmaŋek wɨŋ kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da monjɨ kaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kuŋwakni.”
Piŋkop da Saion kokup pap aeni wasaŋek tɨlɨmni mɨŋat amɨn kabɨkon yolɨkdɨsak. Aŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morap Yawe do pasolni, ae mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep morap tɨlɨmni do pasal ɨmdaŋ.
Nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do aŋek yo asal uŋun dabɨlno da kɨlɨ uŋun kosot.
Nagon tobɨlek bɨsitno nandagɨt, do mɨktɨmon egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon bɨsit dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekgeŋ.
But dasi ji tɨmɨt do dɨma kurak tomaŋ, mani ji da nin but dasi tɨmɨt do kuragɨ nandaŋ.
Piŋkop dakon amɨn ekwaŋ uŋun da gen morap yosok uŋun nandaŋ. Mani ji Piŋkop dakon amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ, do geni dɨma nandaŋ.”
Nak aŋpak tagɨ baŋ aŋ yomɨŋapbo, uŋun da kobogɨ do aŋpak yokwi baŋ aŋ namaŋ. Do but yokwi nandɨsat.
Nin ji do nandaŋek Piŋkopnin da ɨŋamon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi aŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨno arɨpmɨ dɨma asak.
Yaŋban amɨn da Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋatni do tebaisi sigɨn yawit. Yaŋ yaŋakwa Pailat dakon gen tapmɨmni maŋakwan
Aŋek Yesu da kandap mibɨlon gawak ɨmɨŋek ya yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Amɨn uŋun Samaria amɨn kɨnda.
Gaga da tapmɨmon kabap morap wasaŋ yopgul da tamonikon toŋ. Gak tapmɨmgo madepsi.
Saimon Pita gat ae paŋdet kɨnda gat Yesu yol aŋaŋ kɨgɨmal. Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da uŋun paŋdet nandaŋ ɨmgut, do Yesu yol aŋaŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da nagalon pɨgɨgɨt.
Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo kalɨp iyɨ do manjɨgɨt uŋun manji dɨma yomgut. Ji Piŋkop da papiakon Elaija do gen mandabi uŋun dɨma nandaŋ bo? Elaija Israel amɨn do gen yaŋ yomɨŋek Piŋkop yaŋ iyɨgɨt:
nido Erot da Jon do pasalek yaŋ nandagɨt, “Jon uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨ ae telagɨsi.” Yaŋ nandaŋek si aŋkutnagɨt. Erot da Jon dakon gen nandaŋek but morap agɨt, mani geni nandak do galak tagɨt.
Mani nandaki. Piŋkop da gak wagɨlsi aŋupbal akdɨsak. Gak tebaisi abɨdaŋek yutgokon naŋ maban abɨgɨkdɨsal. Aŋek obɨsi gɨkban pasɨlaki mɨktɨmon saŋbeŋek dɨma egɨpbi.
Amɨn ji, bɨsap niaŋ da man madepno abɨŋ yɨp do pi ani? Bɨsap niaŋ da yo ɨsalɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ kɨmotni? Bɨsap niaŋ da top aŋpak yolni?
Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨ da yo morap uŋuden wusɨŋ pɨndat do pini aŋ. Mani Datji da yo uŋun do wadak wadak aŋ uŋun nandɨsak, do ji jap pakbiyo dukon baŋ noneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek nandaba kɨk dɨma ani.
Egɨ don Juda amɨn dakon jap noknok bɨsap madep kɨnda altaŋakwan Yesu Jerusalem kɨgɨt.
Burɨ pɨsaŋba tɨp kɨnamon da tobɨl kɨŋek yo pɨndak nandaŋyo awit uŋun yabekbi 11 kabɨ gat, ae amɨn dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi yoyɨwit.
Mani oman monjɨ kɨnda pi yokwi asak uŋun burɨkon da yaŋ nandɨsak, ‘Amɨn tagɨno uŋun tepmɨ dɨma apdɨsak.’
Juda amɨn dakon Ɨmal Yut Kabeŋ Bɨlak uŋun dakon bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan
Do kɨnda da gɨptɨm tɨmni dɨma aŋkutnosak. Jil bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨ dɨma pagek bɨsit pi ak do but kaloŋ amal kaŋ uŋun tagɨ. Mani don gɨptɨmjil ae paŋmuwutjil. Gɨptɨmjil dakon galaktok kɨlani tagɨ dɨma abal Sunduk da dɨ paŋkewalban.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋat monjɨyo da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak abɨdoŋ uŋun da tɨlak dɨma abɨdoni kaŋ, uŋungwan arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨkdaŋ.”
Pol kɨŋ yut uŋun da maŋ wɨgɨgon altaŋakwan amɨn da Pol si aŋakba kɨmotjak do gwayan tebaisi awit. Yaŋ aba emat amɨn da pasalek Pol si kendak aŋaŋ wɨgɨwit.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ ‘Nak Kristo’ yaŋ yokdaŋ. Ae dɨwarɨ da ‘Nak kombɨ amɨn kɨnda’ yaŋ yokdaŋ. Yaŋ yaŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ akdaŋ. Aŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ Piŋkop da iyɨ do kɨlɨ manjɨkbi uŋun paŋkɨlɨkba kosit kɨlegɨ yɨpmaŋ detni do pini madep akdaŋ. Mani arɨpmɨ dɨma akdaŋ.
Yoni mɨni amɨn ji gat bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ egɨpdaŋ, do tagɨ paŋpulugoni. Mani nak ji gat bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ dɨma egɨpdamaŋ.
Nin Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek iyɨkon gadaŋek dɨma pasolneŋ. Kristo uŋun Piŋkopmon kɨŋ altoneŋ dakon kositnin, yaŋsi nandaneŋ.
Kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Top amɨn si egɨpgut bɨsapmon gen kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Gɨldat kapbɨ mudaŋakwa kɨmoron da pɨdokeŋ’ yaŋ yagɨt.
Yawe, gak da nak uwal da kɨsiron baŋ abɨdagɨl. Pasɨkgo nabɨ uŋun da manjigwan pasɨldat. Kɨsitnokon abɨdaŋaki tebai akdat. Aŋpulugosol, do mɨŋat amɨnyo da dabɨlon man madepno toŋ.
Masadonia mɨktɨmon abɨŋ altagɨmaŋ bɨsapmon yɨk yawotjok kɨnda dɨma agɨmaŋ. Uŋudon jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ terɨ terɨ da abɨŋ noman taŋ nimgwit. Amɨn da nin gat gen emat morapmɨ awit, ae butningwan da pasol pasol madepsi nandagɨmaŋ.
Yawe, nak naga do nandako dɨma wɨgɨsak. Mano dɨma awɨgɨsat. Nak yo kɨnda ni da wɨkwisi asak ae yo uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma nandako pɨsosak uŋun do nandaba kɨk dɨma asat.
Korin amɨn, Piŋkop dakon gen jikon da noman tagɨt yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Ae geni ji dagɨn abɨdawit, aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ dɨma abɨdawit yaŋ nandaŋ, ma?
Mɨŋat amɨnin da pi tagɨsi aŋek yo do wadak wadak aŋ amɨn paŋpulugoni dakon nandak nandak tɨmɨtni. Paŋmuwukbi ɨsal egek Piŋkop dakon aŋpak dɨma yolni kaŋ, uŋun tagɨ dɨma.
Iyɨ uŋun egɨp egɨp dakon malunsi egɨpgut. Uŋun egɨp egɨp da amɨn teŋteŋaŋ yomgut.
mani nandak nandakni mɨktɨm dakon yo morap do nandaŋ, ae moneŋ paŋmuwut dakon galaktok da Piŋkop gen wɨtjɨŋba bamɨ dɨma tosok.
Mani egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨnikon kɨgɨk dakon wigat gat ae kositni uŋun gɨtnisi, uŋudon kɨgɨk dakon pini jɨgɨsi. Amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ dagɨn wigat uŋun kaŋ kwoŋ.”
Amɨn kosit kɨlegɨkon akwaŋ, ae gulusuŋni mɨni, ae Yawe dakon gen teban guramɨkgaŋ, uŋuden amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da mɨŋat uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaŋ gadatgo do aŋek Piŋkop da gak yokwikon naŋ abɨdosok. Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan kɨki.”
Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo morap dayɨt uŋun da altaŋakwa mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep kɨlɨ uŋunjok kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandani.
Yesu da meŋi gat ae paŋdet but dasi galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun kapmatjok akbal pɨndagek meŋi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat, on gak dakon monjɨgo.”
Nak da Saion kokup pap dakon mukwa sogok amɨn kabɨni yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgo uŋun da ɨmalni yombem asak. Aŋapbo Saion dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yokdaŋ.
Mani gen uŋun ɨsal dogɨn dɨma nandani, si guramɨtni. Ɨsal dogɨn nandaŋ kaŋ, dɨsi baŋ paŋkewalgaŋ.
Pi agak bamorɨ mudaŋakwal Kana kokup, Galili mɨktɨmon mɨŋat pakpak kɨnda dakon soŋnok madep kɨnda awit. Aba Yesu dakon meŋi da kɨŋ pɨndakgɨt.
Ji Saion kokup pap dakon dam madepni gat, ae yut tebani gat, uŋun pakyaŋsi pɨndatni. Yaŋ aŋek don altoni amɨn yoyɨni.
Gak nin do tagɨsi nandaŋek jap pakpak bɨsapmon jap madepsi paŋɨreŋaŋ nimɨsal. Jap tamokon jap morapmɨsi tugaŋ wɨgɨsak.
“Yaŋ yaŋban yoni morapmɨ amɨn da gen tebaisi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Yaŋ kaŋ, dat, nandaŋ namɨŋek Lasarus iyɨŋbɨ datno da yutnon kɨŋ
Uŋun telagɨ yutnikon Saion kokup papmon egɨsak. Uŋun da gak aŋpulugaŋek aŋteban asak dosi nandɨsat.
Ae wain kalugɨ meme gɨp kalɨpmɨkon dɨma koleno pɨgɨsak. Yaŋ kaŋ, wain da paptaŋban meme gɨp sulukwan wain gat meme gɨp gat kɨsi yokwi tokdamal. Amɨn da wain kalugɨ meme gɨp kalugɨkon koleŋba wain gat meme gɨp gat kɨsi tagɨ tomal.”
Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ jap arɨpninon nibi.
“Do nin da gen kɨnda gayɨno gak yaŋ gɨn abi. Aŋaki gakyo kɨsi gen teban guramɨkdal yaŋ gandani. Nin gat amɨn 4 kabɨ ekwamaŋ. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ Piŋkopmon yaŋ teban tok gen kɨnda kɨlɨ awit. Gak uŋun amɨn kabɨ tɨmɨkbɨ Piŋkop da dabɨlon gen teban yolek gɨptɨm paŋkɨlek ak dakon aŋpak ani. Ae mukwa sok do uŋun dakon yo gak da gaga yubi. Yaŋ aŋaki uŋun amɨn kabɨ busuŋ daŋgwani tagɨ mandani. Yaŋ abɨ amɨn da gandaŋek top yaŋ ɨmgumaŋ yaŋ gandani.
Kokup pap kɨndakon bo ae kokup monɨŋ kɨndakon kɨŋ altoni kaŋ, uŋun kokupmon amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda wusɨŋ kaŋ uŋun gat gɨn egek yɨpmaŋ kɨni.
Gɨkwem gat ae pɨlɨn gat da aŋgwasamal. Aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da amɨn kɨla asak.
Gen yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dɨma yoni. Amɨn alegɨ tagɨ paŋteban ani dakon gen baŋgɨn yoni. Gen uŋuden nandaŋ amɨn uŋun dakon butni paŋteban asak.
On Piŋkop uŋun bɨsap mudok mudogɨ mɨni Piŋkopnin egɨ wɨgɨsak. Uŋun da kosit nolɨŋakwan wɨgɨ kɨmot da paŋ dagosak.
Juda amɨn ji yaŋ nandaŋ, Piŋkop da gen tebani nin do nimgut, do nin do tagɨsi nandɨsak. Ae ji dɨsi dakon man pawɨgek, “Nin Piŋkop dakon notnisi ekwamaŋ” yaŋ yoŋ.
Aŋek amɨn da maket tamokon ‘Yoyɨŋdet, gɨldat tagɨ’ yaŋ yoyɨni yaŋ do galak toŋ.
“Gen uŋun iyɨŋban nandaŋek Moses pasal Midian mɨktɨmon paŋkɨ egek uŋudon mɨŋat kɨnda paŋek monjɨ bamorɨ paŋalagɨt.
Nido kalɨp ji pɨlɨn tukgwan egɨpgwit, mani abɨsok Amɨn Tagɨ da teŋteŋɨkon depgut, do ji teŋteŋɨ dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo da yaŋ agɨpni.
Kɨlɨ Sabat bɨsap dakon yo paŋtagap ak gɨldat agɨt. Uŋun Sabat uŋun bɨsap madepsi kɨnda, do Juda amɨn da tɨlak kɨndapmon bumjot dɨma toni do nandawit. Yaŋ nandawit do amɨn tɨlak kɨndapmon akgwit dakon kandapni dapmaŋ jokgal do Pailat iyɨwit. Yaŋ aba tepmɨ kɨmakba bumjotni paŋkɨni yaŋon da yawit.
Ji yaŋ ani, nido nak yaŋ dayɨsat, Kristo uŋun Juda amɨn dakon oman amɨni dagagɨt. Aŋek Piŋkop uŋun gen bamɨ yogok amɨn yaŋ yolɨk do aŋek babɨkni do yaŋ teban tok aŋ yomgut uŋun arɨpmɨsi agɨt.
“Asisi dayɨsat, nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namjak amɨn da nak da pi asat uŋun akdɨsak. Nak Daron wɨgɨkdɨsat, do nak da pi agɨm si yapmaŋek madepsi akdɨsak.
Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn da gen teban kɨnda yaŋ yɨpgwit, Amɨn kɨnda da Yesu uŋun Kristo yaŋ yosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon dɨmasi wɨgɨsak. Gen teban yaŋ yɨpgwit, do meŋi datni da Juda amɨn do pasalek yaŋ yagɨmal,
Abɨsok yosi morapmɨ taŋ damaŋ, do wadak wadak aŋ amɨn tagɨ paŋpulugoni. Ae don, ji da wadak wadak ani kaŋ, uŋun yoni morapmɨ taŋ yomnikon ji tagɨ paŋpulugoni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, ji kɨsi morap tɨlak kaloŋɨkon gɨn tagɨ egɨpni.
“Don aeno Jerusalem tobɨl abɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madepmon wɨgɨ bɨsit aŋ egek dabɨlno kulabɨk aŋakwan dɨpmɨn yombem kɨnda kagɨm.
Kosit yaŋ tosok do kalɨp Piŋkop da Abraham dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni nin do yo tagɨsi aŋ nim do yaŋ teban tok aŋ nimgut. Ae nandak nandakni kulabɨk dɨma asak yaŋ nomansi nolɨk do aŋek iyɨ dakon gen aŋteban ak do gen yaŋ aŋteban agɨt.
Ji dɨsi baŋ paŋkɨlɨgek Piŋkop aŋkewalneŋ yaŋ dɨ nandabam. Ji da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi. Ni jap yet naŋ kwaokgi uŋun naŋgɨn pakdɨsal.
Wup dakon egɨp egɨp da mibɨltok dɨma altagɨt. On mɨktɨmon egɨp egɨp da mibɨltok altagɨt, aŋakwan wup dakon egɨp egɨp da don altagɨt.
Do top aŋpak uŋun yɨpni. Ji morap kɨsi paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨ do gen bamɨ gɨn yoyɨni. Nido, nin morap kɨsi gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ dakon dɨwatni.
“Wain sop pakpak bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekban wain bamɨ tɨmɨk paŋopjak do kɨgɨt.
Iyɨŋba yagɨt, “Disi jap yoba noni.” Yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn morapmɨsi ekwaŋ, do moneŋ 200 danari baŋ jap yumneŋ kaŋ arɨpmɨ asak. Yaŋ aneŋ do yosol, ma?”
Mani amɨn kɨnda nak dakon gen nandaŋek dɨma guramɨkdak amɨn uŋun amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun yutni teban tokni mɨni ɨsal mɨktɨm kwenon gɨn agɨt. Don pakbi ɨgek yut uŋun tɨdaŋban uŋudon gɨn tuwɨl kɨ madepsi tasɨk tagɨt.”
Yesu kokup uŋun yɨpmaŋek Tair ae Saidon kokup bamot tomal uŋudon kɨgɨt.
Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn kosirɨ 7 kabɨ yokwi aŋ gamɨŋek abɨŋ ‘But tobɨl at’ yaŋ gayɨsak kaŋ, yokwini yɨpmaŋ ɨmɨŋ ɨmɨŋ abi.”
Yesu yaŋ yaŋek ae kɨnda gat yaŋ yagɨt, “Notnin Lasarus uŋun yum dɨpmɨni pokdok, do nak da kɨŋ aŋyolbo pɨdosak.”
Ji gen uŋuden baŋ yoŋ, mani aŋwa yo ni da noman toni uŋun dɨma nandaŋ. Egɨp egɨpji mukwa da yaŋ noman taŋek bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn taŋek wagɨl pasɨlgaŋ uŋun yombem.
Yawe, uwal da nak aŋupbal akdaŋ, do kosit yɨpmaŋ namɨŋaki aŋpakgo kɨlegɨ uŋun yolbeŋ. Kosit agɨpbeŋ do nandɨsal uŋun nolɨki.
Uŋun kokupmon amɨn morapmɨ da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
Mani gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma iyɨwit. Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu da amɨn uŋun abɨdaŋek aŋmɨlɨp aŋek dɨgo kɨ yaŋ iyɨŋban si kɨgɨt.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Pilip da gen uŋun manjɨgɨt uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ iyɨŋek Yesu dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi iyɨgɨt.
Gak toktogɨsi nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsal uŋun dakon geni yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ wɨgɨkeŋ. Gak gengo aŋteban aŋek nin tagɨsi paŋpulugosol. Uŋun aŋpak kundu da tebai tosok uŋudeŋ toktogɨsi tokdɨsak.
Kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo madepmon yɨkgaŋ uŋun pabɨŋ yopmaŋek mani mɨni amɨn paŋenokdok.
Ae dabɨlgo da yokwi aki do gayɨŋban kaŋ, dabɨlgo pɨlɨkgi. Gwɨnɨmbɨl egek Tɨpdomon kɨndap tebanon pɨgɨki yaŋ do dabɨlgo kɨnda pɨlɨgek tagapmɨ Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asagon tagɨ wɨgɨki.
Bɨsap morapmɨ Piŋkop da yaŋ yaŋban nandagɨm, “Nak naga Piŋkop, tapmɨmno madepsi.
Simeon Telagɨ Wup da aŋtagap aban Telagɨ Yut Madepmon kɨgɨt. Aŋakwan Yesu meŋi datniyo da gen teban yolek Yesu aŋaŋ opgumal.
Wuwɨk uŋun nandaŋek uŋun mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi da muwugek amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ mɨrak paŋ nandaba Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn kabɨ da iyɨ da genonsi da gen yawit. Yaŋba nandaŋek nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi
Bɨsap kɨndakon gen teban dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn kɨnda da pɨdaŋ agek Yesu aŋkewal do aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, yo ninaŋ aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokeŋ?”
Mani Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da jap madepsi kɨnda paŋkosit aŋek amɨn morapmɨ yaŋ yomgut.
Gak mɨŋat amɨnyo da dabɨlon gulusuŋni mɨni amɨn baŋ manjɨki. Uŋun mɨŋat kaloŋɨ dakon eni egɨpjak. Ae uŋun amɨn dakon monjɨ gwayoni Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni, ae Piŋkop da dabɨlon aŋpak garagɨ tagɨ yolek dɨma ani, ae kwen wɨgɨk aŋek meŋ datyo dakon gen pabɨŋ yop aŋpak yolek dɨma ani.
Yaŋban paŋdetni nandaŋ wɨrɨpdagek yaŋ yawit, “Yaŋ kaŋ namɨn amɨn da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak?”
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni amɨn kabɨ madep yopmaŋ degek boron wɨkwa paŋdetni gat kɨsi kɨwit. Ae bot dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi kɨwit.
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ kalɨp nin gat egɨpgumaŋ da nipmaŋ kɨwit. Mani uŋun nin da kabɨkon nani dɨma. Nin da kabɨkon nani tam nin gat sigɨn egɨpnom. Mani kɨlɨni kɨwit uŋun da nolɨsak, uŋun nin da kabɨkon nanisi dɨma.
“Korasin ae Betsaida amɨn, awa! Nak wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ abo pɨndagek ji but tobɨl dɨma awit. Tair kokupmon amɨn gat Saidon kokupmon amɨn gat da pɨndakgwit tam, but tobɨl bamɨsi abam. Aŋek bupmɨ dakon yɨk ɨmalyo paŋek abɨlagon yɨkbam.
Uŋun kaloŋgɨn dagok dagogɨ mɨni tapmɨm morap kɨsi taŋ ɨmɨsak. Uŋun asi.
“Aŋakwan oman monjɨ uŋun waŋga pɨgɨ pi ɨsalni kɨnda uŋun goman moneŋ 10 danari taŋ ɨmgut uŋun kagɨt. Kaŋek tegɨkon tebai abɨdaŋek gen tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gomano agɨl uŋun paŋop!’
Nak Jems, Piŋkop ae Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo dakon oman amɨni. Papia on Israel amɨn 12 kabɨ ji kokupji yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm ŋwakŋwarɨkon kɨwit da ekwaŋ ji do mandaŋ yɨpbo obɨsak. Gɨldat tagɨsi.
Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopno, nak but dasi gak aŋkɨsikeŋ. Toktogɨsi mango aŋkɨsiŋ wɨgɨkeŋ.
Piŋkop da Telagɨ Wupni dam do kɨlɨ yaŋ teban tok agɨt. Ji ae mɨŋat monjɨyosi ae amɨn dubagɨkon ekwaŋ, ae amɨn kɨsi morap Piŋkop da yaŋ yomɨsak uŋun Telagɨ Wupni damjak.”
Gak da kalɨp Dewit do yaŋ teban tok tebaisi aŋ ɨmgul, ae gengo kulabɨk arɨpmɨ dɨma akdɨsal. Yaŋ iyɨgɨl, “Nak da monjɨ kabɨgokon kɨnda yɨpbo kɨla amɨn madep egɨpjak.
Yaŋban Juda amɨn da yawit, “Nin bɨlak 46 kabɨ da butgwan telagɨ yut on agɨmaŋ. Gak da gɨldat kapbɨ dogɨn wɨtjɨk do yosol, ma?”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Pita, nak yaŋ gayɨsat, abɨsok kalbi pup gen dɨma yaŋakwan gak da kosirɨ kapbɨ nak do wasɨp yokdɨsal.”
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ, nak abɨsok ji do gen on dayɨkdɨsat. Piŋkop da nak jikon yabekbi pi abeŋ do yaŋ namgut. Nak pi uŋun asat uŋun do tagɨsi nandɨsat,
Wɨli ji dɨsi dakon gɨptɨm do galak toŋ, yaŋ gɨn mɨŋatji but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatni do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsak, uŋun amɨn da iyɨ do yaŋ gɨn nandɨsak.
Pailat da aeni gapman da yutnon wɨgɨ Yesu iyɨŋban opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep, ma?”
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn morapmɨ da paŋdet kabɨkon saŋbeŋba paŋdet morapmɨsi awit. Aŋakwa uŋun kabɨkon da amɨn dɨwarɨ Grik gen yawit uŋun da Aram gen yawit amɨn uŋun do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Ji gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ bupmɨ amɨn do jap yomɨŋek sakwabat ninon ekwaŋ uŋun do jap dɨma yomaŋ. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.”
Nak jikon tepmɨsi tobɨl opbeŋ do bɨsit aŋ kɨmotni.
Pɨndakgi! Amɨn yokwi mɨktɨmon pɨlɨgɨ maŋ da pokgoŋ, ae arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨdokdaŋ.
Piŋkop, Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu dakon Piŋkopni ae Datni nak top dɨma yosot yaŋsi nandɨsak. Nin toktogɨsi mani aŋkɨsineŋ.
Aŋakwan pɨlɨndo paŋdetni da abɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon ekwamaŋ, ae gɨldat kɨlɨ pɨgɨkdɨsak, do yoyɨŋbɨ amɨn kabɨ madep kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ kɨŋek iyɨ do jap yumaŋ noni.”
“Parisi amɨn, awa! Ji muwut muwut yut madepmon tamo mibɨltogɨ uŋudon yɨt do galagɨ nandaŋ. Ae amɨn da maket tamokon nandaba wukwan damɨŋek gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayɨni do galagɨ nandaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋek pakgwit da Sonda wɨsa dagokdo tɨp kɨnamon kɨk do kɨŋakwa gɨldat wɨgɨt.
Kalbi binap nawa gengo kɨlegɨsi do ya yaŋ gayɨk do pɨdosot.
Jiyo kɨsi kalɨp but kalɨpmɨ dakon aŋpak baŋ awit. But kɨndap toptopmɨ da but kalɨpmɨ joŋɨkban wagɨl yokwisi asak. Do ji aŋpak kalɨpmɨ uŋun wɨrɨrɨk mudaŋek but nandak nandakji kulabɨk aba kalugɨsak.
Nak gat ae paŋmuwukbi notno nak gat ekwamaŋ nin da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn morap Galesia provinskon ekwaŋ ji do gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayamaŋ.
Uŋun amɨn da amɨn dɨwarɨ dapba kɨmakgwit, ae sot mawomyo aŋek yo tapmɨmɨ toŋ dɨwarɨ pawɨlgwit, ae yumabi awit, ae amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon yo kabɨ paŋkɨsɨbɨwit. Mani but tobɨl aŋek yo uŋun yop do dɨma nandawit.
Yesu Galili mɨktɨm morap kɨsi agek muwut muwut yutnikon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Aŋek Piŋkop da amɨn kɨla akdɨsak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek sotni toŋ ae gɨptɨmni yokwisi awit amɨn kɨsi morap paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋek Moses gat ae kombɨ amɨn morap dakon gen gat baŋ wasaŋek Piŋkop da papia morapmon gen iyɨ do mandabi uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Gen morapgo uŋun bamɨsi gɨn. Nawa gen morapgo kɨlegɨsi uŋun toktogɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ.
“Mani kɨla amɨn da monji kaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, ‘Amɨn on da egɨ don datni dakon yo morap tɨmɨtdɨsak, do aŋatno kɨmagakwan wain pini nin do aŋawatneŋ.’
Ae Esia gapman dakon amɨn madep dɨ uŋun Pol dakon notni, uŋunyo kɨsi da Pol muwut muwut yut madepmon dɨmasi kɨsak do gen yɨpba apgut.
Piŋkop mɨktɨm dɨma wasagɨt bɨsapmon, Kristo da ji yumaŋ nosak do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt, ae abɨsok mibɨ bɨsap on ekwamaŋon, Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugosak do Kristo yɨpban kɨlɨ altaŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Ae mɨŋat, gen kɨnda yolni do nandɨsat uŋun yaŋ: Nin kaloŋ kaloŋ amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ yomɨŋ aneŋ. Gen teban uŋun kalugɨ dɨma. Ji nandaŋ gadat si wasaŋek awit bɨsapmon da uŋun gen teban kɨlɨ abɨdawit da abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ obaŋ.
Nin nandamaŋ, mum baŋgɨn noŋ amɨn uŋun amɨn monɨŋ. Aŋpak kɨlegɨ uŋun niaŋ uŋun dɨma nandaŋ.
Do butjap nandaŋek yaŋ teban tok aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨm, ‘Asisi, ji nak dakon yɨk yawot kokupgwan dɨmasi pɨgɨni.’ ”
Not, gak Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo morap but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ kɨmagek butni paŋteban asal. Yaŋ aŋaki uŋun da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi namɨŋakwan butno yaworɨsi tosok.
Yesu nin do aŋek kɨmakgɨt. Sigɨn egapno apjak bo kɨmagapno apjak uŋun iyɨ gat egɨpdamaŋ gɨn, mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋek kɨmakgɨt.
Gak toktogɨsi Yesu Kristo do nandaki. Uŋun Kɨla Amɨn Madep Dewit da kabɨkon nani, uŋun kɨmagek aeni pɨdagɨt. Nak Gen Bin Tagɨsi on naŋ yaŋ teŋteŋosot.
Nido Piŋkop da mɨŋat dakon gɨptɨm naŋ wɨli dɨma wasagɨt, wɨli dakon gɨptɨm naŋ mɨŋat wasagɨt.
Aŋakwan mɨŋat dɨwarɨ dubagɨsogon da agek pɨndak nandaŋyo awit. Uŋun mɨŋat kabɨkon kɨnda mani Maria, kokupni Makdala, ae Maria ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda uŋun Jems buŋon nani gat Josep gat dakon meŋi, ae Salome gat kɨsi akgwit.
Isip amɨn Israel do madepsi pasalgwit, do kɨŋ mudaŋakwa but galak nandawit.
Yaŋ yaŋek uŋun amɨn kabɨ muwukgwit kɨsi da pɨdaŋ Yesu iyɨŋ ɨlɨk aŋaŋ Pailaron kɨwit.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, on akgaŋ kabɨkon dɨ dɨma kɨmagek Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni tapmɨmɨ toŋsi apban kokdaŋ.”
“Amɨn Tagɨ, gak dakon kombɨ amɨngo kɨlɨ dapba kɨmakgwit, ae gak dakon altago tuwɨlgwit. Abɨsok nak kaloŋ dagɨn egapbo nakyo kɨsi nɨkba kɨmotdɨsat.”
Yawe da Isip amɨn dakon butni paŋtobɨlban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni do uwal aŋ yomgwit. Aŋek Yawe dakon oman amɨni do yokwi aŋ yom do kosit wusɨk awit.
Nido ji nandaŋ, yo noman taŋek nandaŋ gadatji paŋkɨlɨkdak, uŋun da tebai agek jɨgɨ guramɨtneŋ dakon aŋpak paŋalon asak.
Yaŋ yaŋek wigaron pɨgakwan oman mɨŋat kɨnda Pita kaŋek amɨn uŋudon akgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn uŋun Yesu Nasaret amɨn gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.”
Nawa gengo uŋun kɨlegɨsi, do gɨldat morap kɨsi nak gak do ya yaŋ kosirɨ 7 kabɨ yaŋ yaŋ asat.
Ɨmɨŋba abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ ɨmal garagɨ mɨni kɨnda naŋ wamaŋek
Nido Piŋkop da kɨndap uŋun iyɨ dakon kɨlɨŋɨ uŋun paŋsanɨkgɨt, do ji dɨsi do nandaba wɨgɨsak kaŋ, jiyo kɨsi paŋsanɨtdɨsak.
Gak paŋpulugokno egɨsal, do nak gak da pɨt kagagwan tagɨsi egek gak do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yosot.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo nin do jɨgɨ morapmɨ nimgul. Uŋun wain baŋ yaŋ nibɨ naŋ mudaŋek but upbal obɨsi agɨmaŋ.
Ji dɨsi do ‘Nin Abraham dakon babɨkni’ yaŋ dɨma yoni. Yaŋsi dayɨsat, Piŋkop da yaŋban on tɨp kabɨ da Abraham dakon babɨkni tagɨ dagoni. Ji uŋun Abrahamon da altawit uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak.
Yawe, aŋkutnoki do gagon obɨsat. Nak aŋkutnaŋaki mayagɨ dɨma pakeŋ.
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Butno jɨk taŋakwan kɨmot kɨmotno noman taŋ naban nandɨsat. Do ji nak gat kɨsi ɨdon Piŋkop do nandaŋek egɨpneŋ.”
Do yaŋsi dayɨsat, Piŋkop da amɨn kokwin ak do bɨsap yɨpguron Sodom amɨn da jɨgɨ pakdaŋ uŋun si yapmaŋek ji da jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ni tɨlak gen kɨnda naŋ dayɨko amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun dakon aŋpak do nandaba pɨsosak? Uŋun niaŋen amɨn dɨ da ekwaŋ?
Uŋun bɨsapmon mɨŋat monjɨ kwapni toŋ, ae mɨŋat monjɨ mum noŋ uŋun bupmɨsi.
Amɨn kɨlegɨ uŋun nandak nandakni kɨlegɨ morapmɨ butnikon toŋ, do aŋpak kɨlegɨsi asak. Aŋakwan amɨn yokwi uŋun nandak nandak yokwi butnikon toŋ, do aŋpak yokwi asak. Nandak nandak niaŋ amɨn butgwan toŋ, uŋun gen kagakon da yoŋ.”
Mɨŋat monjɨyono, ji Piŋkop dakon amɨn kabɨ ekwaŋ. Wup jikon egɨsak uŋun da wup yokwi mɨktɨm amɨnon pi asak uŋun yapmaŋdak, do ji kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ uŋun kɨlɨ pabɨŋ yopgwit.
Gak egɨp egɨp dakon mibɨlɨsi. Gak gaga teŋteŋɨ amisi, do teŋteŋɨgokon yo morap tagɨsi pɨndakgamaŋ.
Yaŋban Pailat da yagɨt, “Nak Juda amɨn kɨnda dɨma! Gaga dakon amɨn kabɨgo gat ae mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨgo gat da gak abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ nagon aŋobeŋ. Gak ninaŋ agɨl?”
Piŋkop da ji dakon nandaŋ gadat aŋkɨlɨk kok do aŋek paŋkɨlɨt yum pɨndagakwan abaŋ. Nin nandamaŋ, gol uŋun yo tagɨsi, mani gol uŋun yo tasɨk togɨ, do ji dakon nandaŋ gadat da gol yapmaŋdak ae wagɨl tagɨsisi. Amɨn da gol uŋun asi gol bo yaŋ do kɨndapmon soŋek aŋkɨlɨk koŋ. Do nandani, paŋkɨlɨt mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ altaŋ daba nandaŋ gadatji tebaisi sigɨn tosak kaŋ, mibɨ gɨldaron Yesu Kristo noman altosak bɨsapmon ji do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandaŋ damɨŋek man madep damdɨsak.
Yo kabɨsi tagɨsi dukwan toŋ, but nandak nandakyosi kɨsi uŋudon gɨn tokdɨsak.”
