Ji teban taŋek bɨsit aŋek egɨpni. Yaŋ aŋek egɨpni kaŋ, paŋkewalon arɨpmɨ dɨma moni. But da nak nol do galak tosok mani gɨp dakon teban tokni mɨni.”
Yaŋ aba yokwi iyɨkon gɨn tosok yaŋ nandani do kandapnikon kɨmbabaŋ tawit uŋun tɨdaŋbal kɨŋakwa Ikoniam kokup papmon kɨgɨmal.
Not kabɨ, yaŋ do nandaŋek yosot. Bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋ tosok, do mɨŋatni toŋ amɨn uŋun mɨŋatni mɨni yombem da egek Yesu yol kɨmagek egɨpni.
Mibɨltok abeŋ amɨn uŋun moneŋ 1 danari tɨmɨgek pi uŋun dakon ami do nandaba yokwi taŋban
Israel amɨn ɨdon abɨŋ Yawe ya yaŋ iyɨni do kalɨp kɨlɨ yoyɨgɨt uŋun gen yolek abɨŋ abɨŋ aŋ.
Nak uŋun gat saŋbek saŋbek agɨmak dɨma kɨrɨŋɨkgeŋ, ae geno kulabɨk kɨnda dɨma abeŋ.
Mɨŋat amɨn morapyo, Yawe da nin uwal da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nipgut, do yaŋsi yaŋek mani aŋkɨsini.
ji paŋtagap aban egɨp egɨpjikon yo tagɨsi morap da tugaŋ daba iyɨ dakon galaktok yol kɨmotni dosi nandɨsat. Yesu Kristo da pi agɨt do aŋek uŋun da ninon pi aban aŋpak morap iyɨ galak tosok uŋun aŋ mudoneŋ. Tɨlɨmni dagok dagogɨ mɨni taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak, do mani aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmotneŋ. Uŋun asi.
Yo madepsi uŋun yaŋ: Piŋkop da ni aŋpak yolneŋ do kɨlɨ niyɨgɨt uŋun tebaisi tɨmɨgek yolneŋ.
“Nak dakon gen guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun amɨn kɨnda yombem. Uŋun amɨn nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi, yutni mɨktɨm tebaikon wɨtjɨgɨt.
Uŋun da aŋ pulugaŋakwan tagɨsi egɨpgum. Tagɨsi nandaŋ namgut do aŋek nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdagɨt.
Uŋun da iyɨ dakon amɨn kabɨ Israel uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek paŋteban asak do aŋek aŋkɨsaŋ. Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Muwut muwut yutnikon baŋ ji dolek uŋun gat dɨma muwutni do yaŋsop aŋ damdaŋ. Bɨsap kɨnda apjak, uŋudon amɨn da dɨkba kɨmagakwa uŋun amɨn da nin da Piŋkop do yo tagɨsi aŋ ɨmamaŋ yaŋ nandakdaŋ.
Abɨsok but galak madepsi nandɨsat, nido ji da aŋpak kɨlegɨsi gɨn akdaŋ yaŋsi nandɨsat.
Ji yo morapji taŋ damaŋ uŋun yopba amɨn da yumaŋ noni. Yaŋ aba moneŋ tɨmɨgek yoni mɨni amɨn do yomni. Aŋek yo kabɨsi tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon paŋmuwuk yopba uŋudon tagɨsi tokdaŋ. Uŋun tamokon toni kaŋ, yo kabɨsi dɨma pasɨldaŋ, ae kabo noknok da dɨma tɨmɨtdaŋ, ae yo monɨŋ da dɨma nokdaŋ.
Paŋmuwukbi toptopmɨ dɨ muwut muwutninon paŋabɨŋ kabokon da pɨndak nandaŋyo ak do yɨkgwit. Yesu Kristo da nin kɨlɨ pulugaŋ nipgut, mani uŋun amɨn da nin gen teban dakon oman monjɨ ae egɨpneŋ do nandaŋek yɨkgwit.
Aŋakwan yaŋ pɨndakgwit: mɨleŋ asɨp amɨn mel yombem da noman taŋ waseŋ kɨ amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ da kwenon yɨkgwit.
Gen kaga uŋun kɨndap kɨnda, yokwini uŋun madepsi daman. Uŋun da kɨndap tepmɨsi kwaŋ sosok uŋun da tɨlak aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ paŋalon aŋek egɨp egɨpnin madepsi paŋupbal asak. Ae Sunduk Tɨpdomon egɨsak uŋun da amɨn da gen kagakon kɨndap uŋun yɨpban sosok.
Ji kɨsi morap Kristo dakon gɨptɨm tɨm ekwaŋ, ae ji kaloŋ kaloŋ gɨptɨm dɨwatni ekwaŋ.
Yawe, yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki do jomjom asat. Nak gen tebango guramɨkdat.
Yo uŋun pɨndagek paŋdet bamot tobɨl kokupmon kɨgɨmal.
Nin jikon dɨma kɨŋek Pilipai kokupmon egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon aŋpak yokwi mayak mayagɨ aŋ nimgwit, ae nindapba tepmɨ pagɨmaŋ, uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ. Mani jikon opgumaŋ bɨsapmon Piŋkopnin da nin paŋteban aŋakwan uwalnin yum pɨndagek jikon Gen Bini Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋagɨmaŋ.
“Jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ paŋek wararɨ nandaŋ amɨn, ji nagon opba bɨkbɨk dabo yɨk yawotni.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji apjak bɨsapmon Kwen Kokup dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae aŋelo kabɨni gat abɨŋek kɨla amɨn madep yɨyɨt tamokon uŋudon yɨtdɨsak.
Aŋek iyɨ dakon paŋdetni gat ae Erot da kabɨkon amɨn dɨwarɨ gat yabekba kɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak gen bamɨ yogok amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandamaŋ. Gak amɨn do dɨma pasoldol. Amɨn mani toŋ ae mani mɨni uŋun kɨsi Piŋkop dakon aŋpak yoyɨŋ dek mudosol.
Amɨn kɨnda nandaŋ gadat asak, mani nandaŋ gadatni dɨma teban tagɨt kaŋ, uŋuden amɨn kokwin dɨma aŋek but dasi abɨdoni. Mani uŋun gat aŋpak dɨwarɨ agagɨ bo dɨma agagɨ uŋun do ji gen emat dɨma ani.
do gen tebai dɨma gayɨkeŋ. Amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak da nit kɨsi tɨmɨkdak, do nak gen yaworɨsok gayɨkeŋ. Nak Pol, Yesu Kristo dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋok asat, ae Kristo dakon pi uŋun do aŋek dam tebanon egɨsat.
Kɨlɨ aŋelo 4 da ɨdap madepni gɨldaron tagalgɨt. Tagalakwan Piŋkop da gɨldat do tapmɨm ɨmɨŋakwan gɨldat da madep taŋek amɨn soŋ yomgut.
Oman monjɨ, ji kɨla amɨnji dakon gen morap guramɨk kɨmotni. Nindaba tagɨsi asak yaŋ do aŋek kapmat egek dandɨsak bɨsapmon pi tagɨsi dɨ abam. Dɨma. Ji Amɨn Tagɨ do pasal ɨmɨŋek pi ani uŋun but dasi nandaŋek ani.
Ae bret 7 kabɨ baŋ amɨn 4 tausen do yobo naŋakwa dɨwarɨ yɨk morapmɨ sɨmɨlba tugawit ji uŋun do si ɨŋtoŋ?
Yaŋ yoyɨŋba obip amɨn moneŋ tɨmɨgek geni guramɨkgwit. Gen uŋun Juda amɨn da yaŋ aŋ ɨreŋ aba abɨsokyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yoŋ.
Meŋi datniyo kaŋ wɨrɨpdagek meŋi da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ, gak nido yaŋ aŋaki wusamak? Datgo gat nit gak do nandaba kɨk aŋek wusamak.”
Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da gen teban dakon nandak nandak amɨn yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Niaŋ nandɨsal, uŋun amɨn kapbɨ da kabɨkon namɨn da kabo noknok da aŋakgwit amɨn uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmgut?”
Nido, toktogɨsi amɨn da yaŋ nayaŋ, gak Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmokdol, ae Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ kɨmokdol.
Nak mɨŋat yopbo wɨli dakon mibɨltok amɨn egek Piŋkop dakon gen do yoyɨŋdet ani do dɨmasi nandɨsat. Mɨrak gɨn yopmaŋek egɨpni.
Ae amɨn kɨnda pigaga egɨpjak kaŋ, yutnon ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni kɨŋ abɨdok do nandak nandak dɨmasi asak.
Israel amɨn kalɨp Isip yɨpmaŋ degek kɨwit. Jekop dakon dɨwatni da amɨn gen ŋwakŋwarɨ yoŋ kabɨ dakon kokup yɨpmaŋek kɨwit.
Iyɨŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Monjɨsok kɨnda mɨŋat pak do asak bɨsapmon monjɨsok notni gat kɨsi ekwaŋ, do bupmɨ dɨma nandaŋ. Mani don monji uŋun gwayeŋ aŋaŋ kɨŋakwa notni uŋun bɨsapmon Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek ekwaŋ.”
Jit da tagapmɨ, amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi yaŋ iyɨkdo, ‘Dɨwarɨgo wɨrɨrɨk gamɨsat’, bo uŋudeŋ iyɨkdo, ‘Pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek pɨlɨk bamok aki’?
Uŋun bɨsapmon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn Jon uŋun abɨŋ altagɨt. Abɨŋ altaŋek Judia mɨktɨmon amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋudon kwa Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
Ji nandanisi, Amɨn Tagɨ sigɨn jomjom aŋek nin do yaworɨ aŋ nimɨsak. Uŋun yaŋ asak, nido nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do nandɨsak. Piŋkop da notninsi Pol do nandak nandak tagɨsi ɨban uŋunyo kɨsi da gen oden baŋ mandaŋ damgut.
Uŋun paŋdet da uŋun yo morap dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋek gen uŋun mandagɨt. Nin nandamaŋ, gen uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋosok uŋun bamɨsi.
Yaŋban Pol da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak Sisa dakon gen kokwin amɨn kabɨkon akdat. Ɨdon gɨn gen yaŋ namgwit dakon geni nandagɨ. Nak Juda amɨnon gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨm uŋun gaga pakyaŋsi nandɨsal.
Emat amɨn morap gapman dakon kɨla amɨn madep dakon yut on kɨla aŋek ekwaŋ gat, ae mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ gat da nak Kristo yoldat uŋun do aŋek dam tebanon nepmaŋ yaŋ kɨlɨ nandawit.
Yesu gen on Kapaneam kokupmon Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon egek amɨn yoyɨŋ degek yagɨt.
Mani pakbi da uwal wutjɨba kɨmak mudawit, kɨnda dɨma egɨpgut.
Altaŋ ɨban kɨŋ Yesu dakon paŋdet kabɨni kunam takba pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Amɨn kɨnda uŋun aŋpak yolek Kristo dakon pi asak, uŋun Piŋkop da kaŋban tagɨsi aŋakwan amɨn da nandaba wukwan ɨmdaŋ.
Aŋek mɨnam baŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨnamji tɨmɨk waŋga paŋabɨgɨt! Ji da kulabɨk aba Datno dakon yut moneŋ ɨlɨt tamo yombem dɨma asak!”
Aŋakwa Sailas gat Judas gat uŋun kombɨ amɨn bamorɨ do gen tagɨsi morapmɨ paŋmuwukbi yoyɨŋek burɨ paŋteban agɨmal.
Ji nandaŋ kokwinji tagɨsi, do gen dayɨsat dɨsi kokwinɨtni.
Piŋkop da ji but dasi galak taŋ damɨsak. Aŋakwan monjɨ gwayonisi ekwaŋ, do aŋpak iyɨ asak uŋun baŋ ani.
“Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Nak asisi dayɨsat, yo morap amɨn mani mɨni do dɨma awit uŋun nak do awit.’
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Sol da yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ gak namɨn?” Yaŋ iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Nak Yesu, nak naŋ aŋupbal ak do pi asal.
Dɨmasi. Nin aŋpak mayagɨ ae top aŋpak morap manji kɨlɨ yomgumaŋ. Nin amɨn dɨma paŋkewalgamaŋ, ae Piŋkop dakon gen kulabɨk dɨma amaŋ. Nin gen bamɨ nomansi yaŋ teŋteŋaŋapno amɨn da nin dakon aŋpak kokwinɨgek Piŋkop da dabɨlon pi kɨlegɨsi amaŋ yaŋ kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn aŋgwasɨŋek yɨkgwit kabɨkon dabɨl sɨŋtaŋek yagɨt, “Nak dakon meŋno ae padɨk padɨkno oni.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Gen yosok uŋun koŋni toŋ amɨn dakon gen naŋ dɨma yosok. Koŋ da dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋmɨlɨp agagɨ.”
Dat da nak yabekban pɨgɨm. Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ da galak togon nagon arɨpmɨ dɨma apjak. Dat da nandak nandakni aŋtagap aban nagon tagɨ opjak. Ae mibɨ gɨldaron nak da kɨmoron naŋ abo pɨdokdɨsak.
Abɨsok Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn gat aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun saŋbeŋ yoba dɨma aŋ, aŋakwa uŋun do wɨrɨpdagek pɨdaŋ gen yokwi dayaŋ.
Yesu da nandaŋ gadatni pɨndagek yagɨt, “Not, dɨwarɨgo yopmaŋ gamɨsat.”
Mani Segius da Yesu dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmjak do amɨn bamot uwal aŋ yomgut. (Ba-Yesu uŋun sot wamwam amɨn kɨnda do Grik genon da Elima yaŋ iyɨwit.)
Ae ji dakon Madepji kaloŋɨ uŋun Kristo, do amɨn kɨnda do gawak ɨmɨŋek madepno yaŋ dɨma iyɨni.
Gak jamba but amɨn. Mibɨltok gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun abɨ kɨŋakwan notgo da dabɨlon jɨmjɨmjok tosok uŋun kaŋbɨ pɨsaŋakwan tagɨ paki.
Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ mandabi: Kristo uŋun tepmɨ paŋek gɨldat kapbɨ egek kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.
Yaŋ nandaŋakwa Yesu uŋun burɨkon da pɨndak nandaŋ yomɨŋ mudaŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido butjikon da nandak nandak uŋun nandaŋ namaŋ?
Mani Piŋkop gen papia da yosok, “Yokwi da mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi dam tebanon yopgut,” do Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da kalɨp yaŋ teban tok agɨt yo uŋun tagɨ abɨdoni.
Uwal morapno uŋun tapmɨmɨ toŋsi. Uŋun da ɨsal dogɨn uwal aŋ namaŋ.
Yaŋba Pailat da iyɨ yaŋ nandagɨt, “Gen yoko dɨma nandaŋek emat madepsi akdaŋ.” Yaŋ nandaŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da dabɨlon kɨsitni pakbikon sugaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn kɨmakban nak da dɨwarɨ dɨma pakeŋ, ji da pani.”
Piŋkop dakon galak tok dɨma yolyolɨ dakon gen morap manji yobi. Gen uŋuden da amɨn ɨlɨk paŋpaŋ Piŋkop dakon kosit da dubagɨkonsi sigɨn paŋkɨkdaŋ.
Joŋ kɨlap yokwisi uŋun kagɨm uŋun joŋ pusiket madep lepat yaŋ yoŋ, uŋun yombem. Mani kandapmɨ uŋun bea dakon yombem, ae gen kagani laion dakon yombem. Nugɨm yokwisi madep uŋun da iyɨ dakon tapmɨm, ae kɨla amɨn yɨtyɨt tamoni, ae kɨla agak dakon yaŋ dagok madepni, uŋun joŋ kɨlap yokwisi do ɨmgut.
Piŋkop, nak yaŋ teban tok agɨm uŋun gak da nandagɨl. Yo tagɨsi gak do pasolgoŋ amɨn kabɨ do yomɨsal uŋun nak do kɨlɨ namgul.
Mukwa sogok amɨn da Israel amɨn dakon yoni kabi kɨnda tɨmɨk tɨmɨk aŋ, uŋun amɨn kɨmot do gɨn ekwaŋ. Mani Melkisedek, Abraham dakon yoni kabi kɨnda tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn, uŋun Piŋkop dakon papia da sigɨn egɨsak yaŋ yosok.
Piŋkop iyɨ uŋun Wup, uŋun do aŋek gawak ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon da, ae aŋpak bamɨsikon da gawak ɨmni kaŋ uŋun kɨlegɨsi.”
Ae dat, ji monjɨ gwayosi tebaisi yoyɨŋba ji do nandaba yokwi tok dɨ aŋ dabam. Yaŋ aba yo tagɨ dɨ nin da arɨpmɨ dɨma aneŋ yaŋ dɨ nandabam.
Amɨn Tagɨ da nandak nandakji paŋtagap aban Piŋkop da amɨn do but dasi galak tosok aŋpak gat, ae Kristo da tebaisi agek jɨgɨ pagɨt uŋun pakyaŋsi nandaba pɨsosak dosi nandamaŋ.
Japno tagɨsi uwalno da dabɨlon nomansi paŋnoman asal. Yutgokon but galagon da abɨdaŋek bɨt nelak busuŋnokon tagaldal. Yo galagɨ ɨreŋɨsi ɨdawukbɨ ɨdapno si tugosok.
Gak da tɨlak kɨlɨ yɨpgul, do tap ɨdap tɨlak uŋun dɨma ɨratjak. Tap ɨdap mɨktɨm morap aeni dɨma wutjɨsak.
Yawe, Amɨn Tagɨnin, mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ gak dakon man pɨdaŋbisi.
Ae aŋelo do nandani. Dɨwarɨ uŋun Piŋkop da pi yomgut uŋun ak do dɨma galak tawit, aŋek kokupni yɨpmaŋ dekgwit. Yaŋ awit do Amɨn Tagɨ da nap teban tebaisi uŋun baŋ paŋteban agɨt, ae dam teban pɨlɨn tuksigwan yopgut da ekwaŋ. Uŋun Piŋkop da kobogɨ do yo yokwisi yomdɨsak dakon bɨsap madep do jomjom aŋek ekwaŋ.
Abɨsok kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asat, mani ji da butjɨk pawit do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma asat. Butjɨk uŋun pawit da jikon but tobɨl paŋalon agɨt uŋun do aŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asat. Piŋkop da iyɨ butjɨk uŋun damgut, do nin da gen yɨpgumaŋ uŋun da ji dɨma paŋupbal agɨt.
Mani gak gen uŋun abɨdagɨl da tebaisi nandaŋ gadasal, uŋun gen tebaisi abɨdoki, nido gayɨŋ dekgɨmaŋ amɨn gaga nandaŋ nimɨsal.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn, Kristo mɨŋat amɨnyo morapmɨ dakon yokwini dakon jɨgɨni tɨmɨt do aŋek bɨsap kaloŋ kɨndagɨn iyɨnaŋ paregek kɨmakgɨt. Ae bɨsap kɨnda gat don apdɨsak, mani uŋun bɨsapmon yokwi wɨrɨrɨt do dɨma apdɨsak. Mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun do jomjom aŋ amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do apdɨsak.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Egakwan gɨn nak aeno tobɨl apbeŋ do nandakeŋ bo dɨma, uŋun nak dakon yo. Gak nak nol.”
Yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit: “Kɨla Amɨn Madep on Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak, uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨgakwan abɨsak. Kwen Kokupmon but yawot tosak. Piŋkop Wɨkwisi aŋkɨsino!”
Amɨn kɨlegɨ dakon yoni kaloŋɨsok uŋun da amɨn yokwi dakon yoni morapmɨ yapmaŋ mudosok.
Emat amɨn da dam tebanon amɨn pakbi pudaŋek wagɨl kɨkdaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek si dapba kɨmotni do nandawit.
Amɨn morap Monjɨgo da kɨla asak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨmgul. Yaŋdo, amɨn morap ɨmɨsal uŋun da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni tagɨ yomjak.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Banabas da Sol aŋaŋ yabekbi kabɨ da egɨpgwiron aŋkɨgɨt. Aŋkɨŋek Sol da kosiron Amɨn Tagɨ kagɨt ae Amɨn Tagɨ da gen iyɨgɨt uŋun dakon geni yoyɨgɨt. Yoyɨŋek Sol da Damaskus Yesu dakon mani pasol pasolɨ mɨni yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomgut uŋun kɨsi do yoyɨgɨt.
Nak sipsip kabɨno nandaŋ yomɨsat. Uŋun tekno nandaŋek nolgaŋ.
Ae amɨn kɨnda da kombɨ gen on papiakon toŋ dɨ wɨrɨrɨtjak kaŋ, Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi on papiakon toŋ uŋun wɨrɨrɨk ɨmjak. Aŋakwan uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp yomyom kɨndapmon jap dɨma paŋ nosak, ae Piŋkop da telagɨ kokup papmon uŋudon dɨma egɨpjak. On papiakon uŋun dakon geni toŋ.
Pakbi ɨsal dogɨn tagal kɨ mudoŋ, uŋun da tɨlak tapmɨmno mɨnisi aŋ. Kɨdatno dakon saŋbekni kɨsi kalkalaŋ mudoŋ. Bɨt nelak da pakbi dagoŋ uŋun da tɨlak butno wagɨlsi tapmɨmɨ mɨni pakbi ɨdap asak.
Amɨn uŋun sot asak bɨsapmon Yawe da aŋmɨlɨp aban tapmɨm kaluk pakdɨsak.
Amo amɨn kabɨ dakon kɨla amɨn madep Sion aŋakban kɨmakgɨt, ae Basan dakon kɨla amɨn madep Ok, ae Kenan mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep morap gat kɨsi dapban kɨmakgwit.
Amɨn kɨnda da joŋ uŋun baljaŋ paŋmuwuk wamaŋek dɨma paŋkɨsak.
Yaŋban Yesu da kɨsitni amɨn uŋun kwenikon wɨtjɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨlek toki do nandɨsat, do pasɨl gamni!” Yaŋ yaŋban uŋudon gɨn wuda tebani pasɨl ɨmɨŋakwa kɨlek tagɨt.
Gen uŋun yaŋban paŋdetni notni pɨndak pɨndak awit. Namɨn amɨn do yosok uŋun dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda but dasi galak taŋ namjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da nak dakon gen guramɨtjak. Datno da uŋun amɨn but dasi galak taŋ ɨmjak. Aŋakwan nit op do uŋun amɨn gat egɨpneŋ.
Yawe da mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon nandak nandakni paŋtagap aban yo madep madep agɨt uŋun do sigɨn nandaŋek ekwaŋ. Yawe bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nandaŋ yawok nimɨŋek nin do bupmɨ nandɨsak.
Yesu Kristo, Piŋkop dakon gen bamɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok amɨn, uŋun kɨmoron da mibɨltaŋ pɨdagɨt. Ae uŋun kɨla amɨn madep morap mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ uŋun dakon Amɨn Tagɨni. Uŋun kɨsi da but yawot nandaŋ damaŋakwan butji yaworɨ tosak. Yesu da nin but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak, ae iyɨ dakon yawi da yokwinin wɨrɨrɨk mudagɨt.
Amɨn bamot uŋun mɨktɨm daman dakon Amɨn Tagɨni da ɨŋamon olip kɨndap bamot ae lam bamot akgamal uŋun mani.
Amɨn kɨnda mani Lasarus uŋun sot agɨt. Kokupni uŋun Betani, uŋun Maria gat peni Mata gat dakon kokupni.
Uŋun tɨlak tapmɨmɨ toŋ Isip mɨktɨmon Soan mɨktɨm tɨmon agɨt uŋun do dɨma nandawit.
Yesu iyɨ niaŋen amɨn kɨnda uŋun amɨn dɨma yoyɨni do yaŋsop aŋyomgut.
Aŋek yaŋ teban tok kɨnda aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yo nido nayɨki, tagɨ gabeŋ.”
Paŋdet kabɨ yo uŋun noman tok do aban kaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, emat agak sɨbanin baŋ tagɨ dapneŋ?”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Saimon, Jon dakon monji, gak kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ abi. Gen yal uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn kɨnda da dɨma golɨgɨt. Kwen Kokup Dat da iyɨ golɨgɨt.
Pɨndakgi. Nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do yubɨŋ ekwaŋ. Yawe, yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨm, mani amɨn yokwi emat agak amɨn uŋun nɨt do muwukgaŋ.
Aban Yesu dakon bumjotni tɨlak kɨndapmon naŋ abɨdaŋ abɨŋ ɨmal kwakwagɨ kɨnda naŋ wamgut. Wamaŋek aŋkɨ kɨmakbi tamo kɨnda kalɨp tɨpnaŋ pasɨwit, ae bumjot kɨnda uŋudon dɨma yɨpbi, uŋudon yɨpgut.
Dewit uŋun Piŋkop da yutnon wɨgɨ bret Piŋkop do parekbi uŋun tɨmɨkgɨt. Bret uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dagɨn tagɨ noknogɨ. Mani Dewit da naŋek amɨn kabɨni kɨsi do yomgut.”
Juda amɨn da yo agɨt uŋun kaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Ni wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda naŋ nolɨŋbɨ kaŋek gak yaŋ mudaŋ gamɨŋbi da uŋun yo asal yaŋ gandaneŋ?”
Mɨktɨm galegɨ ae kabap mɨktɨm kɨsi uŋun iyɨ dakon.
Yaŋek Yesu Kristo da manon telagɨ pakbi soni do yoyɨgɨt. Telagɨ pakbi soŋ mudaŋek Pita gɨldat kabi dɨ gat uŋudon egɨpni do iyɨwit.
Koŋ da amɨn uŋun yɨpmaŋ detjak do Yesu da kɨlɨ iyɨgɨt, uŋun do madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek gen uŋun yagɨt. Uŋun amɨn koŋ da bɨsap morapmɨ aŋupbal awit, do amɨn da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨlani tebaisi aŋek nap teban tebaisi baŋ kɨsit kandapyoni paŋteban awit. Mani nap teban uŋun paŋdagaŋek koŋ da ɨmɨŋ sugaŋakwan mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon kɨŋ kɨŋ agɨt.
Wɨsa dagaŋakwan Betani kokup yɨpmaŋ dek obɨŋ kosiron Yesu jap do agɨt.
Gak top amɨn. Amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋupbal ak dakon gen dogɨn galak tosol.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban bret tɨmɨ 5 bali baŋ wasaŋbi naŋ dɨwarɨkgwit uŋun yɨk madep 12 kabɨ sɨmɨlba tugawit.
Mani telagɨ aŋkɨsineŋ. Amɨn morap Yawe gawak ɨm do uŋun da kapmatjok kwaŋ uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madep ani.
Piŋkop da Abraham gat babɨkni don altaŋek egɨpdaŋ uŋun do nandaŋ yawok yomɨŋek yaŋ teban tok aŋ yomgut. Do Piŋkop da yo uŋun manjɨŋ yomgut uŋun tɨmɨt do nandaŋ gadat aŋek tagɨ tɨmɨtni. Uŋun yo gen teban yolgaŋ amɨn dogɨn dɨma toŋ, amɨn morap Abraham da nandaŋ gadat agɨt yaŋ gɨn aŋ amɨn kɨsi da yo uŋun tɨmɨtdaŋ. Abraham uŋun nin morap kɨsi dakon datnin.
Nandaba kɨkno gat ae jɨgɨ morap noman taŋ namaŋ uŋun kɨsi iyɨŋ mudosot.
Moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda aŋobɨŋ ɨba abɨdaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On wup gat ae man mandabi gat uŋun namɨn dakon?” Yaŋban yaŋ yawit, “Sisa dakon.”
Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon yoma wɨtdal gabeŋ. Gen mɨktɨmon yaŋ aŋteban abi, Kwen Kokupmon Piŋkop da yaŋ gɨn yaŋ aŋteban asak. Ae gen mɨktɨmon yaŋ wɨtdalbi, Kwen Kokup-mon Piŋkop da yaŋ gɨn yaŋ wɨtdaljak.”
Piŋkop da ji yumaŋ nagɨt, do yo morap gɨptɨm da ani uŋun Piŋkop man madep ɨm do ani.
Piŋkop, nak aŋpuluga! Pakbi wɨŋaŋek teknokon kɨlɨ wɨk.
Amɨn kɨnda dabɨlɨ mɨni meŋi da yaŋ aŋalagɨt naŋ amɨn kɨnda da wasok aban dabɨlɨ pɨsagɨt yaŋ kɨnda dɨma nandagɨmaŋ. Mɨktɨm wasok wasogɨkon da egɨ aŋaŋ obɨŋek abɨsok ekwamaŋon gen bin kɨnda yaŋ dɨma nandamaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋek tobɨl paŋdetni kapbɨ egɨpgwiron kɨŋ pɨndakban dɨpmɨn pakgwit pɨndagek Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ji nak gat awa kaloŋɨ da arɨpmon gɨn Piŋkop do nandaŋek dɨma egɨpneŋ?
“Ji yɨk monɨŋjikon gol bo silwa moneŋ bo kopa moneŋ dɨma sɨmɨlek agɨpni.
Abraham Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadat agɨt, do Piŋkop da yaŋ ɨmgut bɨsapmon Abraham Piŋkop dakon gen guramɨkgɨt. Uŋun kokupni yɨpmaŋ degek Piŋkop da mɨktɨm kɨnda ɨban iyɨ dakon mɨktɨm dagosak do nandagɨt uŋudon kɨgɨt. Abraham dukwan kɨkeŋ uŋun dɨma nandagɨt, mani nandaŋ gadat aŋek kɨgɨt.
Sailas gat Timoti gat Masadonia yɨpmaŋek pɨŋakwal Pol ɨmal yut pi agɨt uŋun yɨpmaŋek Piŋkop dakon pi gɨn agɨt. Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋek Juda amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yesu uŋun asi Kristo.”
Yesu da uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Tair kokupmon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ yut kɨndakon wɨgek pasɨlɨ egek yɨk yawot akeŋ yaŋ nandagɨt, mani pasɨlɨ egɨp do aŋtɨdok agɨt.
Yaŋban Yesu da nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “O mɨŋat, nandaŋ gadatgo uŋun wukwisi. Yo nido yal uŋun yaŋ gɨn altaŋ gamdɨsak.” Yaŋ iyɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn gwi kɨlek tagɨt.
Yesu gen uŋun yaŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep kabɨgwan da mɨŋat kɨnda da pɨdaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Meŋgo si aŋalaŋek mum gaban nagɨl uŋun dasi kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak!”
Saŋbeŋek yo yokwisi dɨma aŋ nabi. Yum nandaŋaki butno ae tagɨsi asak. Aŋaki don kɨmagek on mɨktɨm wagɨl yɨpmaŋ dekgeŋ.
Nin da Judas gat Sailas gat gen on mandamaŋ uŋun naŋ gɨn dayɨnjil do yabekgamaŋ.
Aŋakwa notni bot kɨndakon agɨpgwit amɨn da abɨŋ paŋpulugoni do kɨsit da tɨlak aŋ yomgwit. Tɨlak aŋ yoba apba tap kɨlap bot bamot kɨsikon yopba tugaŋ jɨk taŋek pakbi kagagwan pɨgɨk do agɨmal.
Yaŋ aban uŋun mɨktɨm tɨmon sot amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsisi apba paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Do mibɨltok Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun wɨsɨŋ kok do pini ani, ae aŋpakni kɨlegɨ wusɨk do pini ani. Yaŋ aŋakwa yo dɨwarɨ do wadak wadak aŋ uŋun kɨsi damdɨsak.
Aban Josep da kɨŋ ɨmal kwakwagɨ kɨnda yumaŋ aŋabɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjot tɨlak kɨndapmon naŋ abɨŋ uŋun ɨmal naŋ wamgut. Wamaŋ aŋkɨ tɨp kɨnam kɨndakon yɨpmaŋek tɨp madepsi kɨnda aŋtobɨlban abɨŋ yoma sopgut.
“Peni da padɨge si aŋakba kɨmotjak do gen pikon yɨpdɨsak. Ae dat da monjɨ gwayoni yaŋ gɨn akdɨsak. Aŋakwa monjɨ gwayoni da meŋi datniyo do uwal aŋek si dapba kɨmotni do amɨn yoyɨkdaŋ.
Yesu dakon padɨk padɨkni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak on kokup yɨpmaŋek Judia Provinskon kɨŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ aŋaki paŋdetgoni da koni.
“Dat da nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak, yaŋ gɨn nak da ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat. Nak ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat, ji toktogɨsi uŋun kagagwan egɨpni.
“Uŋun do aŋek ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Ji yut dakon ami ni bɨsapmon apjak uŋun dɨma nandaŋ. Apjak bɨsap uŋun pɨlɨndo bo kalbi binap bo pup da gen yosok bɨsapmon bo wɨsa dagokdo uŋun ji dɨma nandaŋ.
Monji do man madep ɨmdɨsak. Yaŋ uŋun tepmɨsi akdɨsak.
Uwalni da emaron arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ yɨpni. Ae amɨn yokwi da arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ yɨpni.
Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yaŋsi dayɨsat, egɨp egɨpji do nandaba kɨk aŋek ‘Jap dukon baŋ noneŋ’ bo ae gɨptɨmji do nandaba kɨk aŋek ‘Ɨmal dukon baŋ paneŋ’ yaŋ dɨma nandani.
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On wup gat ae man mandabi gat uŋun namɨn dakon?”
Nak abɨŋ nepdosi nandaŋ teban taŋ, do kandap tamono yolek aŋdɨgat ayɨŋ da ekwaŋ.
Aŋek uwal gat emat aŋek yolban kɨŋ mudawit. Pabɨŋ yopmaŋakwan mayaktok toktok teban pawit.
Jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ altaŋ naba kɨlano aŋaki dɨma kɨmokdot. Uwalno da nak do japmɨ nandaŋ, mani gak tapmɨmgo madep, do si pabɨŋ yopmaŋek nak aŋpulugosol.
Nak dɨma kɨmagek sigɨn egɨpbeŋ kaŋ, Kristo dakon pi abo bamɨ tagɨsi tokdaŋ. Egɨpbeŋ bo kɨmokgeŋ? Ni kosit da tagɨ asak uŋun dɨma nandɨsat.
Pailat yaŋ yagɨt nido iyɨ nandagɨt: mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ Yesu do nandaba yokwi taŋban top yaŋek gen pikon yɨpgwit.
Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Meŋno padɨk padɨkno uŋun namɨn?”
“Dat kabɨ, ji kabɨkon da monjɨsi kɨnda da tap kɨlap do dayɨŋban tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ kɨnda tagɨ ɨmni?
Yawe da nin uwal da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨk aeni Saion kokup papmon paŋapgut bɨsapmon dɨpmɨn yombem pɨndakgɨmaŋ.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ namɨŋek yaŋ yoŋ, “Pol nin gat kaloŋɨ ekwamaŋ bɨsapmon pɨŋbi egɨsak, mani dubagɨkon kɨsak bɨsapmon tebai niyɨsak.” Mani nak Pol da ji Kristo da pɨŋbi egek amɨn do aŋpak yaworɨsi aŋ yomgut uŋun do nandaŋek gen dayɨkdɨsat uŋun do pakyaŋsi nandani do nandɨsat.
Yaŋban Saimon da iyɨgɨt, “Goman madepni dɨma sopjak do iyɨgɨt amɨn uŋun da, yaŋ nandɨsat.” Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kokwin kɨlegɨsi aŋek yosol.”
Yaŋek paŋdetni kabɨkon kɨsit sugaŋek yagɨt, “Meŋno padɨk padɨkno oni.
Moses uŋun Piŋkop dakon oman amɨni egɨpgut, egek Piŋkop dakon gen guramɨk kɨmagek Piŋkop da yutnon pi agɨt. Uŋun Piŋkop da yo don yaŋ teŋteŋosak uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok amɨn egɨpgut.
Ji papia on manjɨŋek Laodisia paŋmuwukbi do yɨpba kwan uŋunyo kɨsi da manjɨni. Ae papia Laodisia do yɨpbo kɨgɨt, uŋunyo kɨsi ji da tagɨ manjɨni.
Nak mum dabo nawit. Jap tebai baŋ dɨma damgum, nido ji jap tebai tɨmɨt do dɨma tagap tawit. Abɨsok yo kɨsi jap tebai tɨmɨt do dɨma tagap toŋ,
Amɨn Kɨla Agakgo yɨpbɨ ninon apjak. Gak dakon gen guramɨt Kwen Kokup tosok, mɨktɨmon ninon yaŋ gɨn tosak.
Pɨdaŋ agek yut uŋun yɨpmaŋ degek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “On amɨn si kɨmotjak bo ae dam tebanon egɨpjak da arɨpmon gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨt.”
Yo morap Amɨn Tagɨ da gen tebanon tosok uŋun aŋ mudaŋek tobɨl Galili provinskon iyɨ da kokup Nasaret uŋudon kɨwit.
Piŋkop gen papia da uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Nin gak dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo ekwamaŋ, do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ amɨn da nin si nindapba kɨmokgomaŋ. Uŋun da nindaba nin sipsip si dapba kɨmorɨ yombem da ekwamaŋ.”
Eliut uŋun Eleasa dakon datni. Eleasa uŋun Matan dakon datni. Matan uŋun Jekop dakon datni.
Ji Yawe dakon oman amɨni Abraham dakon babɨni kabɨ, ji Jekop da kabɨkon nani, Yawe da iyɨ do manjɨkbi kabɨ, Yawe da pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ ae yo masɨ masɨmɨ agɨt uŋun do aesi nandani. Ae amɨn yokwi do kobogɨ yokwi yomgut uŋun do nandani.
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ kɨnda mɨŋat pasak bɨsapmon uŋun jap noknok bɨsap madep kɨnda, ae monjɨ notni gat ekwaŋ, do jap kelek tagɨ dɨma egɨpni.
Tapmɨm madepni do ɨŋtawit, ae uwal da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt uŋun do dɨma nandawit.
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn mɨŋatjok pɨdaŋek kɨŋ ap aban kaŋek yaŋ kɨmakgwit. (Mɨŋatjok bɨlakni 12 kabɨ.)
“Yaŋ yaŋban kɨlegɨ kabɨ da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨni, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, ni bɨsapmon jap do abɨ gandaŋek jap gamgumaŋ, ae ni bɨsapmon pakbi do asal yaŋ gandaŋek pakbi gamgumaŋ?
Yesu dakon man bin ɨreŋ taŋban kɨla amɨn madep Erot uŋun kɨsi da nandagɨt. Amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesu do yaŋ yawit, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn uŋun kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt, aŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agak dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmɨsak” yaŋ yawit.
Egɨp egɨpno Piŋkopmon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋek geni bamɨsi do nandak nandak aŋek mani awɨgɨsat. Nak Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek yo kɨnda do dɨma pasolgeŋ. Amɨn da nak do yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
Amɨn morap gwak kwenon da maŋ dapba bɨsal kɨkdaŋ, ae gwak da amɨn morap da kwenon mosak uŋun wagɨl bɨsal kɨ mudokdaŋ.”
Aŋakwan kadɨm da gen yawit, ae kandapmɨ yokwi ae gɨreŋɨkbi da kosit agɨpgwit, ae dabɨlɨ mɨni da sɨŋtawit. Amɨn da uŋun pɨndagek Israel dakon Piŋkop do tamtam yaŋek aŋkɨsiwit.
Yaŋ iyɨŋek kɨsirɨ amɨnsi tet do abɨdaŋek aŋpulugaŋban pɨdagɨt. Pɨdaŋek uŋudon gɨn kandapni ae baŋniyo kɨsi teban tawit.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ae gen kɨnda babɨk da abɨdawit uŋun ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Notgo do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek uwalgo do nandabɨ yokwi toni.’
Monjɨ uŋun Yesu da akgɨron obɨŋakwan koŋ da monjɨ uŋun ukwayɨkban mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek nɨmnɨmɨkgɨt. Mani Yesu da koŋ tebaisi iyɨŋek monjɨ uŋun aŋmɨlɨp aban kɨlek taŋban datni do aŋtobɨl ɨmgut.
Ae ji amɨn dakon yo kabɨ kɨlani tagɨ dɨma ani kaŋ, namɨn da yo kabɨ dɨsi do damjak?
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji butji dɨma jɨk toni. Egɨp egɨpji Piŋkopmon tosok yaŋsi nandani, ae egɨp egɨpji nagon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋ namni.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Juda amɨn Tesalonaika egɨpgwit uŋun da Pol uŋun Beria kokupmon egek Piŋkop dakon gen yosok yaŋ nandawit. Yaŋ nandaŋek obɨŋ amɨn dakon but sugaŋ paŋupbal awit.
Abɨsok gak pɨdaŋ kokup papmon pɨgɨki. Pɨgaki amɨn kɨnda da yo ninaŋsi aki uŋun da don gayɨsak.”
Paŋmuwukbi kɨnda dakon tapmɨm mosok bɨsapmon nak dakon tapmɨm kɨsi mosok. Ae Yesu yolyol amɨn kɨnda amɨn kɨnda da yokwi asak do iyɨŋban yokwikon mosok bɨsapmon nak uŋun do japmɨsi nandɨsat.
Top amɨn ji, Piŋkop da ji do yo ni baŋ aŋ damjak?
Amɨn da pabɨŋ yopmaŋakwa yokwi ekwaŋ amɨn Yawe da aŋpakni kɨlegɨkon da gen kokwin tagɨsi aŋ yomɨsak.
Kɨŋek Silisia ae Pampilia Provins bamot yapmaŋek tap binap mandaŋek kokup pap Maira uŋudon kɨŋ altagɨmaŋ. Maira uŋun Lisia Provinskon tosok.
(Pita gat notni gat madepsi pasalgwit, ae ni gen baŋ yoneŋ yaŋ kɨnda dɨma nandawit, do Pita gen uŋun yumsi yagɨt.)
Bupmɨ nandaŋ namɨŋek aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdokeŋ bɨsapmon nandaŋ nabi. Bɨsit aŋek kɨsitno paŋenokgo telagɨ yutgo da tet do wɨgɨsak.
Ae aŋelo da yaŋ nayɨgɨt, “Gen yaŋ mandaki: ‘Amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Sipsip Monɨŋ da mɨŋat pakdɨsak da soŋnok madepmon kɨni do yaŋ yomɨsak uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.’ ” Ae saŋbeŋek yaŋ nayɨgɨt, “Gen on Piŋkop dakon gen bamɨsi.”
Do nak gen kɨnda dayɨk do nandɨsat. Amɨn Tagɨ da manon da gen tebaisi yaŋ yosot: Ji Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da aŋpak yokwi aŋ uŋudeŋ saŋbeŋek dɨma ani. Nandak nandakni wagɨlsi upbal taŋ,
Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu tobɨl paŋdetni baŋgɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji da yo pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋ, uŋun pɨndakgaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋba Pita da yo morap altaŋ ɨmgwit uŋun do yoyɨgɨt.
Aŋakwa amɨn bamot uŋun nandaŋakwal amɨn kɨnda da Kwen Kokupgwan da tebai yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil ɨdon wɨnjil.” Yaŋakwan uwalni pɨndagakwa amɨn bamot gɨkwem kagagwan wɨgek Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨmal.
Mɨktɨm uŋun garam aŋek kwaokbɨ kwaŋek gelɨ dubagɨsi pɨgɨwit. Pɨgakwa madepsi kwaŋek mɨktɨm kɨsi ɨlɨmɨkgɨt.
Nak bulmakau dakon sabamni gat ae meme dakon yawi gat uŋun nosot yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun dɨmasi.
Not kabɨ, kombɨ amɨn kalɨp Amɨn Tagɨ da manon yaŋ teŋteŋok awit uŋun do nandani. Uwal da yo yokwisi aŋyomgwit, mani butni yaworɨ taŋakwa jɨgɨ uŋun guramɨkgwit. Ji uŋun dakon aŋpak tɨmɨgek yolni.
“Yaŋ iyɨŋban oman monjɨ da yaŋ gɨn aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, yo abeŋ dosi nayɨl uŋun kɨlɨ aŋmudat, mani tamo toŋ.’
“Asi, not kabɨ ji gat ae kɨla amɨn kabɨsi gat dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek Yesu aŋakgwit.
Ji amɨn sugaŋek aŋpakni kokwin aŋ amɨn yaŋ dayɨsat, ji dɨsi do suŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨmaŋ yaŋ yogogɨ mɨni. Ji amɨn sugaŋek aŋpakni kokwin aŋ bɨsapmon, uŋun dɨsiyo kɨsi do yoŋ. Nido, aŋpak yokwi aŋ uŋun dɨsiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ.
Amɨn madep kabɨgwan da amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek aŋpulugosak do yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, monjɨno kaloŋɨ kɨndagɨn. Do kɨŋ koki do nandɨsat.
Piŋkop da gen kokwin kɨlegɨsi asak, do jɨgɨ damaŋ amɨn uŋun kobogɨ do jɨgɨ iyɨ yomdɨsak.
Piŋkop da yo morap wasagɨt, mibɨltok yo morap ak do nandagɨt dakon nandak nandakni si aŋkɨsɨbɨgɨt. Yaŋ aban kalɨp bɨsap morapmɨ nandak nandak uŋun pasɨlɨ tagɨt. Mani, abɨsok nandak nandakni uŋun nomansi yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ do pi namgut.
Ji Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo ɨmal naŋ yaŋ pani. Ae but kalɨp dakon galaktok yol do nandak nandak dɨma ani.
Piŋkop da Yesu nin dakon dɨwarɨnin wɨrɨrɨtjak do yum kaŋakwan amɨn da aŋakba kɨmakgɨt. Ae nin da kɨlegɨ man paneŋ do aŋek kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt.
Not kabɨno, Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo tɨlɨmni madepsi, uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ, do amɨn kɨnda do aŋpak tagɨ aŋek ae kɨnda do manji ɨmni kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma.
Yaŋakwa dɨwarɨ da yawit, “On amɨn uŋun Kristo.” Ae dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Dɨma. Kristo uŋun Galili Provinskon da dɨma altosak.
Yawe da nak dɨma aŋpulugagɨt tam, bɨsap dubak dɨma kɨmakbi tamokon pakgɨm.
Namɨn amɨn dɨ da Kwen Kokup egek nak dakon kɨla aŋ? Amɨn dɨ mɨnisi, gak kaloŋ gɨn. Piŋkop, nak gak do but dasi galak taŋ gamɨŋ kɨmokdot. Gak do but dasi galak tosot uŋudeŋ mɨktɨm dakon yo morap do dɨma galak tosot.
Piŋkopno, egɨp egɨpno gagon tosok yaŋsi nandɨsat. Aŋpulugaŋaki mayagɨ dɨma pakeŋ, ae uwalno da abɨŋ nepmaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma ani.
Ae uŋun da kwenon amɨn morapmɨsi pɨndakgɨm, uŋun manjɨrɨ mɨni. Amɨn uŋun amɨn kabi kabi egɨ egɨ aŋ uŋun morap kɨsi dakon. Ae mɨktɨm morap kɨsi, ae gɨptɨm mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun kɨsi kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo, ae Sipsip Monjɨ da ɨŋamon akgwit. Uŋun ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk kwakwagɨsi ae dubagɨ baŋ pawit. Ae kɨsirɨkon jopbaŋ tam baŋ tɨmɨkgwit.
Mani Piŋkop genon ni gen tosok? Gen yaŋ tosok: “Oman mɨŋat uŋun gat monji gat yolni. Nido oman mɨŋat dakon monji uŋun da dat gat ae mɨŋatsini dakon monji gat dakon yo dɨwat dɨma tɨmɨtjak.” Uŋun Piŋkop gen da yosok.
Gɨldat dabɨl uŋun kundu dakon dɨwarɨkon da altaŋ wɨŋek terɨ kɨnda kɨsak. Tedepnikon yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma pasɨljak. Piŋkop dakon geni uŋun wagɨl tagɨsi
Nak top yoŋ amɨn gat dɨma yɨkgamaŋ. Ae jamba but amɨn gat dɨma akwamaŋ.
Bɨsap mudok mudogɨ mɨni butjap sigɨn nandaŋ nimɨŋ wɨgɨkdɨsal? Babɨkon da babɨkon yaŋ gɨn taŋ aŋaŋ wɨgɨkdɨsak?
Aŋakwa aŋelo da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dɨma pasolni. Nandani, nak gen tagɨsi kɨnda aŋabɨsat. Uŋun amɨn kɨsi da nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi akdaŋ.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek paŋdetni baŋgɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Tɨlak gen dayɨt dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ. Jap yet uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen.
Nak dakon amɨno kɨlegɨsi uŋun nandaŋ gadaron egɨpdɨsak. Mani duwalɨk pɨgɨsak kaŋ, tagɨ dɨma nandaŋ ɨbeŋ.”
Ae yo kɨnda do wadak wadak aban amɨn kɨsit da yo uŋun wasaŋek Piŋkop aŋpulugogɨ uŋun dɨma tosok. Piŋkop da iyɨ egɨp egɨp ae mɨrɨm ae yo morap gat kɨsi amɨn kɨsi do yomɨsak.
Pakyaŋsi nandani, nin amɨn gat emat dɨma wamaŋgamaŋ. Nin wup yokwisi tapmɨmɨ toŋ gat, ae koŋ mɨktɨm kɨla aŋ gat, ae yo tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ on pɨlɨn tuk tosok bɨsapmon mɨktɨm kɨla aŋ, ae koŋ kwen ekwaŋ gat emat amaŋ.
Abɨsok gen on yaŋ namaŋ dakon bamɨ kɨnda dɨma golɨkdaŋ. Uŋun top yoŋ.
Nak naga egɨp egɨp dakon bret.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Yesu paŋdetni 12 kabɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ae jiyo kɨsi nepmaŋ dek kɨkdaŋ?”
Yɨgakwan amɨn da “Yesu Nasaret amɨn obɨsak” yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek gen madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yagɨt, “Yesu, Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam!”
Pareŋka kɨndap mibɨlon yɨpbi da tosok. Kɨndap morap bamɨ tagɨ dɨma toni uŋun mandaŋ kɨndapmon maba pɨgɨ sokdaŋ.”
Nin uŋun gat kɨsi uŋun telagɨ ɨleŋon egek gen uŋun Kwen Kokupgwan da apban nandagɨmaŋ.
Yawe da tapmɨm namɨŋek pasɨkno asak. Yaŋ asak do aŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsat. Yawe da nak aŋpulugosok uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Nak ya yaŋ iyɨŋek kap morapmɨ yosot.
Ae amɨn morapmɨsi da yaŋ, gen yaŋba nandagɨm. Wuwɨkni uŋun pakbi madepsi pokdok uŋun dakon wuwɨk yombem. Ae uŋun kɨrɨrɨŋ da yaŋ madepsi yawit. Uŋun da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Piŋkop aŋkɨsino! Amɨn Tagɨnin Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami kɨla amɨn madep egek pini asak.
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋek Yesu uŋun saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ dakon binap amɨn egɨsak. Uŋun mɨŋat amɨnyo saŋbek saŋbek mibɨltogɨ sigɨn tagɨt bɨsapmon yokwi awit dakon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt do aŋek kɨmagek mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon egɨp egɨpni yumaŋ nagɨt. Do mɨŋat amɨn morap Piŋkop da yaŋ yomɨsak, uŋun da Piŋkop da kalɨp monjɨ gwayoni do gɨsamni dagok dagogɨ mɨni yom do yagɨt uŋun tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Pɨndakgamaŋ, nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi amɨn gat, ae nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn gat, ae burɨ mɨni amɨn uŋun kɨsi kɨmotdaŋ. Kɨmagakwa yo morapni amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ da tɨmɨtdaŋ.
“Yaŋ yaŋban ji da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨkdaŋ, ‘Nin gak gat kɨsi egek jap pakbiyo agɨmaŋ. Ae kokup papnin dakon kosit madepmon agek niyɨŋ dekgɨl.’
Iyɨŋban meŋi da gwi nandak nandak ɨban Erot yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn uŋun dakon busuŋɨ ɨdapmon yɨpmaŋ nabi.”
Nak Amɨn Tagɨsi ae Yoyɨŋdetji da kandapji sugat. Do jiyo kɨsi notji dakon kandap sugaŋ sugaŋ ani.
Uŋun mɨŋat amɨn morapyo nandaŋ gadat awit do aŋek Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo tagɨsi yaŋ nandaŋ yomgut. Mani mɨktɨmon egek Piŋkop da yo yom do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun dɨma tɨmɨkgwit,
“Nak dakon amɨn kabɨno, nawa dayɨko nandabɨt. Israel amɨn, nak dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨtni do madepsi nandɨsat.
Abɨsok amɨn dɨ yabekbɨ amɨn kɨnda Jopa kokup papmon egɨsak uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋop do kɨni. Amɨn uŋun mani Saimon ae mani kɨnda Pita yaŋ iyaŋ.
Yaŋdo, kɨsitji alek taŋbi uŋun paŋenagek pi ani, ae ŋwakji tapmɨmɨ mɨni paŋteban aŋek
Yawe dakon man aŋkɨsino! Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨnikon nak but dasi nandaŋek ya yaŋ iyɨkeŋ.
On Juda amɨn kabɨ nak asɨdon gen kokwin amɨn kabɨni da ɨŋamon agapbo kɨlɨ nandawit. Do ni gulusuŋno naŋ kawit uŋun naŋsi gayɨni do yoyɨ.
Yaŋban amɨn uŋun yaŋ yagɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nak monɨŋɨsogon da gen teban morap guramɨk aŋ aŋ opgum da obɨsat.”
Nak papiakon da ji paŋpasol ak do dɨma nandɨsat.
Yaŋ sɨmɨl aŋek tɨlɨm madepni do nandaŋek Yawe aŋkɨsini. Paretji tɨmɨgek Telagɨ Yut Madepni da nagalgwan pɨgɨni.
Yaŋ tɨdaŋek ɨmal dubakni ɨlɨk maba kɨŋakwa kɨmbabaŋ tɨmɨk maba kwen wɨgɨwit.
Tɨlak gen uŋun yoyɨŋ mudaŋban paŋdet kabɨni da abɨŋ iyɨwit, “Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo madep gen yoyɨŋek tɨlak gen baŋ nido yoyɨsal?”
Aban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak emat agak sɨbago yɨgɨkon sɨmɨl. Emat agak sɨba pawɨlgaŋ amɨn uŋun emat agak sɨba da mandaŋ yoba kɨmokgoŋ.
Amɨn Tagɨno, nak gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ gak do bɨsit asat, do nak do bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi.
Orep Kabapmon uŋudon egek gol baŋ bulmakau wup kɨnda wasaŋek uŋun Piŋkopnin yaŋ yaŋek gawak ɨmgwit.
Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek nak kɨsit kɨlda nandak nandakni tagɨsi yombem kɨnda naŋ manjɨgɨt. Aban yut ak do gwak magɨm. Aŋapbo amɨn dɨwarɨ da yut uŋun gwak magɨmon wɨtjaŋ. Mani mɨŋat amɨnyo morap kaloŋ kaloŋ yut uŋun aŋ uŋun pakyaŋsi kaŋ kɨmagek wɨtjɨni.
Kalɨp Piŋkop da Monji yaŋ iyɨgɨt: “Gak nak da amɨn tet do yɨgaki wɨgɨ uwalgo yopbo pɨŋbigo egɨpni.” Mani ni bɨsapmon aŋelo kɨnda do Piŋkop da gen uŋuden kɨnda yagɨt? Dɨmasi!
Dabɨlgo uŋun gɨptɨmgo dakon teŋteŋɨ. Dabɨlgo tagɨsi kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo kaloŋ teŋteŋɨni toŋ. Mani dabɨlgo yokwi kaŋ, gɨptɨmgo pɨlɨn tuksi tosok.
Gen kagakon da Amɨn Tagɨ Datnin aŋkɨsamaŋ. Mani bɨsap dɨwarɨ nin da mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop da iyɨ yombem wasagɨt uŋun jobɨt yomamaŋ.
Yawe da gɨldaron but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak. Kalbi ya yaŋ iyɨk do kap yosot. Piŋkop egɨp egɨp namɨsak uŋun bɨsit iyɨsat.
Jikon da kɨnda sot asak kaŋ, paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ yoba opni. Abɨŋek Amɨn Tagɨ da manon bɨt nelak gɨptɨmɨkon soŋ ɨmɨŋek Piŋkop da aŋpulugaŋban kɨlek tosak do bɨsit ani.
Yaŋ ani kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon but yawotni jikon tosak. Uŋun but yawot amɨn nin da mibɨlɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoneŋ. But yawotni da butji ae nandak nandakji paŋkutnaŋban Yesu Kristokon gadaŋek tagɨsi egɨpni.
Gak dakon gen teban do galagɨsi nandɨsat, do uŋun dakon kosit nolɨŋbɨ uŋun naŋ kɨkeŋ.
Ae Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban yolek paret ak do kɨgɨmal. Gen teban uŋun yaŋ tosok: “Kɨnarɨm bamorɨ bo ae yɨgɨ yɨgɨ bulagɨ bamorɨ baŋ mukwa soni.”
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ mɨŋat gat yumabi dɨma aŋek gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi egɨpgwit. Kokup morap Sipsip Monɨŋ da kɨk do agɨt, uŋun yol awɨlgaŋ gɨn. Uŋun Piŋkop da mɨktɨmon amɨn da binapmon baŋ yokwikon baŋ yumaŋ naŋ yopgut, do uŋun Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni mibɨltoksi tɨmɨkgɨt da yaŋsi egɨpdaŋ. Yaŋ agɨt, do iyɨ gat ae Sipsip Monɨŋ gat dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ egɨpni.
Uŋun mɨŋat monjɨyo da yaŋ, yumaŋ gwayek tamokon yɨgek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yoŋ: ‘Nin kasɨsɨŋ kɨlɨ pɨsomaŋ, mani ji kap ak do dɨma nandayɨŋ. Nin bupmɨ kap yamaŋ, mani ji bupmɨ nandaŋek kunam tat do dɨma nandayɨŋ.’ ”
Ae pi aban aŋpak kɨlegɨ dakon mibɨlɨ nandaba pɨsokdɨsak, nido nak Daron wɨgapbo ae saŋbeŋek dɨma nandakdaŋ.
Gak da aŋpakgo kɨlegɨkon da nak yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ nepgul, uŋun dakon geni dɨma wɨtjɨko tagɨt. Gengo guramɨgek nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨl uŋun dakon yaŋkwok asat. Amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal ae aŋpak bamɨsi gɨn asal uŋun dakon geni amɨn morapmɨ muwugakwa yoyɨŋ teŋteŋosot.
Kɨlɨ Piŋkop aŋkɨsik do kap yono. Aŋek Kɨla Amɨn Madepnin kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yaŋ ɨmno.
Wɨsa dagokdosi gɨldat dɨma wɨŋakwan Yesu uŋun pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon akban kawit, mani uŋun Yesu yaŋ dɨma kaŋba pɨsagɨt.
Aeno kaŋek os kwakwagɨ kɨnda kagɨm. Uŋun da kwenon amɨn kɨnda obipni abɨdaŋek yɨkgɨt. Uŋun amɨn do kɨla amɨn madep dakon pelɨt kɨnda ɨmgwit. Ɨba emaron teban tagɨt da tɨlagon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋek emat morapmɨ sigɨn aŋek teban tokeŋ yaŋon da nandaŋek kɨgɨt.
Aban pɨdaŋban awɨgɨ iyɨ da amɨnsi tet do yɨpgut da nin dakon kosit niyɨŋ nolɨk amɨn, ae yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨnin yɨkdak. Do Israel amɨn but tobɨl aŋapno yokwinin tagɨ wɨrɨrɨk nimjak.
Aŋakwa Juda amɨn dɨwarɨ da agek Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da manon da koŋ yol do aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Pol da amɨn kɨnda dakon mibɨlɨ yaŋ teŋteŋosok, uŋun Yesu. Uŋun da manon gayɨko abɨgɨ!”
Yesu paŋdetni 12 kabɨ yaŋ yoban opba, bamot bamot Piŋkop dakon gen yoni do yabekgɨt. Yabegek koŋ yolni do yaŋ mudaŋ yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Kalɨp ji yokwi dakon oman amɨn egɨpgwit, mani abɨsok Piŋkop da geni daban but dasi nandaŋek guramɨkgaŋ, do ya yaŋ iyɨneŋ.
Telagɨ yutnon gandagɨm. Tapmɨmgo madep gat ae tɨlɨmgo gat pɨndakgɨm.
Yawe, tapmɨmgo madepsi do gak dakon man aŋkɨsik do kap yoneŋ.
Nit Piŋkop gat pi kaloŋɨ amaŋ. Ae ji Piŋkop dakon pigagani. Ji Piŋkop dakon yutni.
Kɨŋ Sisaria kokup papmon altaŋek uŋudon da Jerusalem wɨgɨ paŋmuwukbi gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨŋek Antiok kokup papmon pɨgɨgɨt.
Yawe, nak gak do bɨsit tebai asat. Bɨsitno nandaŋaki gen morapgo guramɨkgeŋ.
Israel amɨn tɨmɨk paŋobɨŋakwan Isip yɨpmaŋ dekgwit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Do butjikon da kokwin tagɨsi aŋek bret gat wain kapmon noni.
Maria yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Mɨŋat gak kunam nido takdal?” Yaŋbal yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨno abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ dukwan yɨpmaŋ uŋun dɨma nandɨsat.”
Piŋkop yo morap kɨsi do egɨp egɨp yomɨsak uŋun da dabɨlon, ae Yesu Kristo Pontias Pailat da ɨŋamon tebaisi agek gen bamɨ yagɨt uŋun da dabɨlon nak tebaisi yaŋ gayɨsat,
Yaŋ do aŋek aŋpak ɨŋani mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat ae aŋpak yokwi morap jikon madepsi ɨreŋ tosok, uŋun wɨrɨrɨtni. Aŋek dɨsi do nandaba pɨŋakwa egek Piŋkop da gen uŋun butjikon kwaokgɨt uŋun naŋ abɨdoni. Gen uŋun da ji yokwikon baŋ tagɨ tɨmɨtjak.
Uŋun da madepsi paŋpulugosok. Piŋkop da Juda amɨn do yo tagɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yomgut. Mibɨltok uŋun da geni kɨla ani do yomgut.
Ji da gen tebanon gen yaŋ tosok, Amɨn bamorɨ da gen kaloŋɨ naŋgɨn yaŋkwok amal kaŋ, uŋun da gen bamɨ asak.
Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil ni gen baŋ yaŋ nandat aŋek kwamal?” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban bupmɨ tomno dabɨlyo aŋek akgɨmal.
Mani Piŋkop, nak wadak wadak amɨn, ae nak naga arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋpulugokeŋ, do tepmɨsi abɨŋ aŋpulugoki. Yawe, gak gaga nak dakon paŋpulugokno ae yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨno. Jomjom dɨma abi, tepmɨsi aŋpulugoki!
Uŋun wasok wasok amɨn kɨmoron da pɨdoŋ amɨn. (Amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨmakgwit uŋun bɨsapmon egɨp egɨp dɨma abɨdawit. Uŋun bɨlak 1 tausen mudaŋakwan don egɨp egɨp abɨdokdaŋ.)
Piŋkop da dabɨlon asisi dayɨsat. Gen mandɨsat uŋun top dɨma.
Amɨn kɨnda aŋpak gwaljɨgɨ mɨni asak kaŋ, gak da aŋpakgo gwaljɨgɨ mɨni uŋun yolɨsal. Mani amɨn kɨnda aŋpak yokwi asak kaŋ, kakgɨmansi kaŋek kobogɨ ɨmɨsal.
Uŋun da Jekop dakon dɨwatni dakon kɨla amɨn madepni bɨsap dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨ aŋaŋ kɨŋek kɨlani akdɨsak.”
Saimon Pita, ae Tomas (Yayat yaŋ iyɨwit), ae Nataniel (Galili mɨktɨm, Kana kokupmon nani kɨnda), ae Sebedi dakon monji bamot gat, ae Yesu dakon paŋdetni bamorɨ gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.
Mɨktɨm amɨn morap da ji nandaba yokwi tok arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋ damni, mani nak aŋpak yokwi aŋ uŋun do yaŋ kwok asat, do uŋun do nandaba yokwi tok aŋ namaŋ.
Yaŋban Agripa da Pol yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gen nayɨŋbɨ Kristo Dakon Amɨn kɨnda dagokeŋ yaŋ nandɨsal, ma?”
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsit asaron, nak gak do nandaŋek Piŋkopno ya yaŋ iyɨsat.
Gen on nak da naga mandɨsat. Kɨlda mibɨl madepmon da gen mandɨsat uŋun do koni.
Nak da yokwi toko nandaŋek tagɨsi nandaŋ. Gak da mayaktok sigɨn yomɨŋaki aŋpak yokwini do gembɨŋ pɨkpɨksi nandani dosi nandɨsat.
Amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni egɨpgut da sɨŋtagɨt uŋun iyɨŋ aŋaŋ Parisi amɨnon kɨwit.
Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Amɨn da nak tagɨsi yaŋ nandaŋ namni yaŋon da gen on yosot? Uŋun dɨma. Piŋkop da nak amɨn tagɨsi yaŋ nandaŋ namjak yaŋon da yosot. Amɨn da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani yaŋon da yokeŋ kaŋ, nak Kristo dakon oman monjɨ dɨma.
Yaŋba Pol da yoyɨgɨt, “Kaŋ ji ni telagɨ pakbi naŋ sowit?” Yoyɨŋban yawit, “Nin Jon dakon telagɨ pakbi naŋ sogɨmaŋ.”
Nak wadak wadak amɨn. Mani Amɨn Tagɨ da nak do nandak nandak asak. Piŋkop, gak dagɨn paŋpulugok amɨno, ae nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdosol. Do jomjom dɨma abi. Tepmɨsi nak aŋpulugoki.
Amɨn kɨnda but dasi dɨma galak taŋ namɨsak, uŋun amɨn nak dakon gen dɨma guramɨkdak. Gen on nandaŋ uŋun nak dakon gen dɨma, gen on Dat yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun dakon gen.
Melkisedek Abraham gat domdom agɨmal bɨsapmon Liwai Israel amɨn dakon yo tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn uŋun babɨkni Abraham da yawikon egɨpgut, do nin yaŋ tagɨ yoneŋ, Abraham da Melkisedek do yo ɨmgut bɨsapmon Liwai da ɨmgut yaŋ asak.
Gɨldat kanek ae gɨkyo tɨlɨmni ŋwakŋwat ŋwakŋwat. Ae gɨk morap tɨlɨmni iyɨkon iyɨkon taŋ yomaŋ.
Yaŋban nandaŋek Ananias pɨlɨgɨ maŋ kɨmakgɨt. Kɨmakban uŋun dakon gen bini nandawit amɨn morap uŋun madepsi pasalgwit.
Uwal da abɨŋ amɨn dɨwarɨ emat agak sɨbabaŋ dapba kɨmotdaŋ. Ae dɨwarɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ paŋkɨ yopba oman amɨni do egɨpdaŋ. Aŋakwa Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da Jerusalem bamaŋ ɨktagɨldaŋ. Uŋun amɨn da Jerusalem kɨlani aŋakwa Piŋkop da bɨsap yɨpgut uŋun mudosak.”
Nak Jerusalem amɨn do moneŋ yomyom pi abo dagaŋakwan Spen kɨk do obɨŋek ji dandakeŋ.
Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgwit da kapmatjok pi kɨnda tagɨt. Uŋun pigagagwan kɨmakbi tamo kalugɨ kɨnda tagɨt. Uŋun tamokon bumjot kɨnda dɨma yɨpbi.
Ae tap wakga yo kɨsi do nandaneŋ. Tap wakga uŋun yo madepsi daman, ae mɨrɨm madepsi da pɨsoŋakwan tap ɨdapmon agɨsak. Ae tap wakga aŋtobɨlakwa agɨsak dakon kɨndap kwɨk uŋun monɨŋɨsisok. Mani tap wakga awɨldak amɨn tɨmɨ kɨndakon kɨk do asak kaŋ, uŋun tap wakga dakon yo uŋun aŋtobɨl tobɨl aŋakwan dukwan kɨk do nandɨsak uŋudon kɨsak.
Yoyɨŋbɨ amɨn kɨnda do gen gɨreŋ kɨnda dɨma yoni, aŋek gen emat dɨma ani. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yaworɨsi egek mɨŋat amɨn morap kabɨkon iyɨ do nandaba pɨŋakwa aŋpak tagɨsi baŋ aŋyomni.
Not kabɨ, notji do yaŋba yokwi tok dɨma aŋ aŋ ani. Piŋkop da gen pikon dɨ depban. Nandani, Gen Kokwin Amɨn Madep yoma kagakon akdak.
Nak da yokwini wɨrɨrɨk yomɨŋek, ae saŋbeŋek dɨma nandakeŋ.’ ”
Uŋun kokupmon amɨn da kaŋba Pol da kɨsiron tuŋon amɨn uŋun telɨŋ telɨŋ aban kawit. Yaŋ kaŋek iyɨ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “Koni, on amɨn uŋun amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmakgɨt. Tap kaga pɨgɨ dɨma kuŋwak, mani abɨsok kobogɨ yomyom piŋkop da dɨma egɨpjak do nandɨsak, do kobogɨ ɨmɨsak.”
Amɨn Tagɨ, bɨsitno nandaki. Aŋpulugoki do gayɨsat, do nandaŋ nabi.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni abɨŋ muwutni da dabɨlon nak kalɨp Yawe do yo ak do yaŋ teban tok agɨm uŋun abo pɨndatdaŋ.
Yum pɨndagaki uwalno da emaron dɨma abɨŋ nepni. Yo uŋun ak do nandaŋ uŋun paŋtobɨlbɨ iyɨkon noman toni.
Yaŋdo, not kabɨno, Amɨn Tagɨ dakon telagɨ jap nok do muwutni bɨsapmon amɨn dɨwarɨ do jomjom aŋek don noni.
Amɨn kɨnda paŋmuwukbi tuwɨl do aŋpak dɨ aban kaŋ, nandak nandakni aŋmɨlɨp ak do mama gen dɨ iyɨki. Kosit kaloŋ bo kosit bamot gengo dɨma nandaban kaŋ, manji ɨmɨŋek wagɨl yɨpmaŋ dekgi.
Nak mɨktɨmon teŋteŋɨ da yaŋ apgum. Do nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namni amɨn uŋun pɨlɨn tukgwan dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
Kɨŋ yutnikon wɨgapno Konilias da yaŋ niyɨgɨt, ‘Aŋelo kɨnda da altaŋ namɨŋek yaŋ nayɨgɨt, “Jopa kokup papmon amɨn kɨnda egɨsak mani Saimon, ae mani kɨnda Pita. Uŋun amɨn kɨŋ iyɨŋba opjak do amɨn dɨ yabekbi kɨni.
Aeni nandawit, Piŋkop uŋun tɨp damanin. Piŋkop Wukwisi uŋun yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨnin.
Mɨŋat uŋun monjɨ kwapni toŋ. Monjɨ altok do aŋakwan tepmɨ nandaŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdagɨt.
Juda amɨn da Yesu abɨdaŋ Kaiapas dakon yut yɨpmaŋek gapman dakon amɨn madep da yutnon aŋkɨwit. Uŋun kɨlɨ wɨsa dagagɨt, do iyɨ gapman dakon amɨn madep da nagalon dɨma pɨgɨwit, nido pɨgɨneŋ kaŋ Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek taŋek Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noknoknin aŋsuŋ akdamaŋ yaŋ nandawit.
Wɨli kɨnda gɨptɨmni mandabi da don Piŋkop da yaŋ ɨlɨkgɨt kaŋ, dɨma mandabi yaŋ koni dakon pi dɨma asak. Ae wɨli kɨnda gɨptɨmni dɨma mandabi da don Piŋkop da yaŋ ɨlɨkgɨt kaŋ, gɨptɨmni dɨma mandɨsak.
Amɨn kɨnda geno nandaŋek dɨma guramɨtjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dɨma kokwinɨkgeŋ. Nak on mɨktɨmon amɨn kokwin ak do dɨma pɨgɨm. Yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do pɨgɨm.
Tap uŋuden mɨktɨm arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋpulugogɨ. Bo bulmakau dakon kok gat ɨktagɨlɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma. Tap uŋuden ɨsal mamno kwaŋ. Mɨrakni toŋ amɨn da gen on pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
Piŋkop, nin gak da telagɨ yutgwan egek gak da nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsal uŋun do nandaŋek ekwamaŋ.
“Bɨsap morapmɨ apban gen kokwin amɨn madep da aŋpulugok do kurak tagɨt. Mani don yaŋ nandagɨt, ‘Nak Piŋkop do dɨma pasoldot ae amɨn do nandako yo ɨsalɨ aŋ.
Egɨp egɨpno kokwin tagɨsi abi. Aŋpak yokwi dɨ nandak nandaknokon dɨ taŋbam. Egɨp egɨp teban dakon kosit naŋ aŋaŋ kɨki.
“Kombɨ amɨn Samuel gat ae uŋun da buŋon kombɨ amɨn morap noman tawit uŋun kɨsi da abɨsok yo noman toŋ uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok awit.
Gen yaŋ tosok, do amɨn wam da bamorɨ dɨma, gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ amal. Uŋun do Piŋkop da mɨŋat wɨli kɨlɨ paŋmuwukgɨt, do amɨn da dɨma paŋwasekdo.”
Ae amɨn kɨnda da wain kalugɨ tɨbɨrɨ meme gɨp baŋ wasaŋbi kalɨpmɨ kɨndakon kolesak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, wain da pukwa paptaŋ meme gɨp kɨrɨŋɨgakwa wain maŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae meme gɨpyo kɨsi yokwi tokdɨsak.
Jap pakbiyo madep aŋek mɨŋat pakpakyo kɨsi awit. Yaŋ aŋek egakwa Noa tap wakgakon wɨgɨgɨt. Wugakwan pakbi madepsi paptaŋ wɨŋek amɨn kɨsisi wɨtjɨŋban pasɨlgwit.
Mani mɨktɨm amɨn da nak da Dat but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat yaŋ nandani uŋun do aŋek yo morap abeŋ do Dat da nayɨgɨt uŋun da arɨpmonsi asat. Kɨlɨ pɨdaŋba kɨno.”
Mani yaŋ dayɨsat, jareŋ pɨndakgaŋ uŋun dakon tɨlɨmni da kalɨp kɨla amɨn madep Solomon dakon tɨlɨmni tagɨsi pagɨt uŋun yapmaŋdak.
Ji yaŋ aŋakwa nak gen kɨnda dɨma yagɨm. Do nak dɨsi yombem yaŋ nandaŋ namaŋ, mani dɨmasi. Abɨsok nak tebai dayɨŋek nomansi gen pikon depdɨsat.
Jikon abɨŋ altosak bɨsapmon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ da manon da abɨdoni. Asi, uŋuden amɨn do man madep yomni.
Uwal da jɨgɨ morapmɨ yomɨŋakwa uŋun dakon tapmɨm da yoŋgamgwan egɨpgwit.
Don Yesu da Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon pɨgek amɨn uŋun kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaki, gak kɨlek tal. Yo yokwi saŋbeŋek dɨma aki. Aki kaŋ sot agɨl uŋun yapmaŋek yo jɨgɨsi da altaŋ gamdɨsak.”
Amɨn kɨnda egɨp egɨpnikon aŋpak yokwi wɨrɨrɨk mudaŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨni asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn ɨdap kɨnda pi tagɨsi ak do tosok uŋun yombem. Uŋun Piŋkop dakon amɨnsi egek Amɨn Tagɨni tagɨ aŋpulugosak. Uŋun da pi tagɨsi morap ak do tagap tokdɨsak.
Yokwino wɨrɨrɨkbɨ kɨlegɨsi egɨpbeŋ do nandɨsat. Sugaŋ nepbɨ ais kwakwagɨsi uŋun da tɨlak kɨlegɨsi egɨpbeŋ.
Aŋakwa aŋpak yokwi da madepsi ɨreŋ taŋ aŋ aŋ kɨkdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋakwa amɨn morapmɨ da not do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak yɨpba wɨtdal kɨkdɨsak.
Dɨsi do kɨla tebai aŋek nandaŋ gadaron tebai atni. Tebaisi agek yo kɨnda do pasol pasol dɨma ani.
Mani mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep burɨ sugaŋek yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji Pailat da Barabas naŋ pulugaŋek Yesu naŋ aŋakban kɨmotjak do iyɨni.”
Ae don gen yɨpban mɨrɨm aŋakwan ais pakbi dagaŋek pokgoŋ.
Kalɨp Janes gat Jambres gat da Moses uwal aŋ ɨmgumal, yaŋ gɨn, amɨn aŋpak uŋun aŋ uŋun gen bamɨ naŋ uwal aŋ ɨmaŋ. Uŋun nandak nandakni wagɨlsi upbal tawit, ae Piŋkop dɨmasi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋek aeni tobɨlek kɨŋ bɨsit mibɨltok agɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn agɨt.
Nak Yawe da aŋpulugosak do nandaŋek jomjom asat. Aŋek geni do tebaisi nandaŋ gadasat.
Yawe da kɨla amɨni pabɨŋ yopban mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ ae kosit mɨnikon ɨsal yumgɨn akwaŋ.
Nin uŋun yutgwan kosit kalugɨ egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋudon da tagɨ wɨgɨneŋ. Kosit uŋun Yesu da iyɨ dakon gɨptɨm paregek wɨtdalgɨt, uŋun Telagɨ Yut Dakon Burɨ Telagɨsi dakon yoma kaga do ɨmal madep abɨsɨŋba magɨt uŋun wɨtdalek wɨgɨgɨt.
Judas gen iyɨwit uŋun nandaban tagɨ aŋakwan Yesu abɨdaŋ kɨsitnikon yɨp do kosit wusɨk agɨt. Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu amɨn morapmɨ gat dɨma egakwa uŋudon uwal da kɨsiron yɨpbeŋ yaŋ do jomjom agɨt.
Aba uŋun akgwit kabɨkon da kɨnda da emat agak sɨbani ɨlɨkgɨt. Ɨlɨgek mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman monjɨ mɨragɨ mandaŋ dagagɨt.
Wɨgakwan Yesu uŋun pik kɨndap akgɨron abɨŋ kwen sɨŋtaŋek Sakius kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sakius, gak tepmɨ pɨ. Nak abɨsok gak da yutnon paŋkɨ yɨtdeŋ dosi nandɨsat.”
“Gen kagani uŋun kɨmakbi tamo yombem. Top gen morapmɨ yoŋ.” “Tuŋon amɨn dakon pakbi emarɨ toŋ gen dulumnikon da moŋ.”
Amɨn tebai, gak nido Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo do aŋpak yokwi aŋ yomgul uŋun do pɨbɨt tɨdok asal? Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawot aŋ yomɨsak.
“Yaŋ nayɨŋban yagɨm, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ gak namɨn?’ “Yaŋ yoko Amɨn Tagɨ da yagɨt, ‘Nak Yesu. Nak naŋ aŋupbal ak do pi asal.
Yesu da gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Sotni mɨni amɨn wuda wamagon dɨma kwaŋ. Sotni toŋ amɨn dagɨn wuda wamagon kwaŋ.
Kalɨp Josua da yɨk yawot kokup yomgut tam, Piŋkop da bɨsap kɨndakon don yom do dɨma yaŋban.
Yawe Tapmɨm Ami, mɨŋat amɨnyo gak nandaŋ gadaŋ gamaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.
Ji mɨŋat amɨnyo pulugaŋkwi da yaŋ egɨpni. Mani “nin pulugaŋbi” yaŋ nandaŋek kɨŋ aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dɨ abam. Piŋkop dakon oman monjɨ da yaŋ egɨpni.
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da nin do yaŋ yoŋ, “Piŋkopni dukon egɨsak?” Uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Uwal da oman amɨngo dapba kɨmakgwit, do yawinin dakon kobogɨ do gak da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ yo yokwisi aŋ yomɨŋaki gandak do nandamaŋ.
Yaŋdo, nak naga aŋpak yokwi uŋun dɨma asat. Yokwi nak da buron egɨsak uŋun da asak.
Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon nani da tagɨsi nandaŋek Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen do but galaksi nandawit. Aŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn morapyo egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdoni do manjɨŋ yopgut uŋun da nandaŋ gadat awit.
Yawe bɨsitno nandaki. Mɨrakgo yopmaŋek aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot uŋun nandaki. Gak amɨn kɨlegɨsi, ae bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ dɨma nepmaŋ dekdal, do bɨsitno nandaki.
Yaŋban Yesu da uŋun do bupmɨ nandaŋek kɨsitni amɨn uŋun da kwenon wɨtjɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨlek toki do nandɨsat, do pasɨl gamni!”
Yaŋ yaŋban binap gen kɨnda paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon kɨŋ ɨreŋ tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Uŋun paŋdet dɨma kɨmotdɨsak.” Mani Yesu da paŋdet uŋun dɨma kɨmotjak yaŋ dɨma yagɨt. “Egakwan gɨn nak aeno tobɨl apbeŋ do nandakeŋ bo dɨma, uŋun nak dakon yo”, uŋun gɨn yagɨt.
Uŋun bɨsapmon sot aŋek kɨmakgɨt. Kɨmakban bumjotni pakbinaŋ sugaŋ awɨgɨ yut kɨnda kwen nani tagɨt uŋudon yɨpgwit.
Aŋpulugaŋaki man madepni madepsi tosok. Kɨla amɨn madep dakon tɨlɨmni wagɨl tagɨsisi gak da ɨmgul.
Yawe, bɨsap niaŋ da butjap nandaŋ nibi? Gak toktogɨsi butjap nandaŋ nimdɨsal bo? Gepmaŋ dekgɨmaŋ do butjapgo kɨndap da yaŋ soŋek dɨma kɨmotdɨsak, ma?
Asi, Kristo kalɨp tapmɨmni mɨni naŋ tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgwit, mani abɨsok Piŋkop da tapmɨmon kalugɨ egɨsak. Nin uŋun gat gadagɨmaŋ ae tapmɨmninyo kɨsi mɨni, mani nin Piŋkop da tapmɨmon uŋun gat kalugɨ egek ji paŋpulugok do pi akdamaŋ.
Uŋun paŋkɨlɨron ji Kristo da tepmɨ pagɨt uŋudeŋ paŋ, do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani. Ae Kristo dakon tɨlɨmni altaŋ teŋteŋosak bɨsapmon ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi aŋek butji tagɨsi tokdɨsak.
Geni do nandaba bamɨ asak amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da gen bamɨ yosok yaŋ nandaŋ gadaŋ.
Samaria amɨn nin dakon babɨknin on ɨleŋon Piŋkop gawak ɨmgwit. Mani Juda amɨn ji da yaŋ yoŋ, Jerusalem gɨn kɨŋek Piŋkop gawak ɨmneŋ kaŋ tagɨsi.”
“Uŋun Moses dagɨn Israel amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Piŋkop da nak aŋalon aŋ nepgut yaŋ gɨn ji kabɨkon naŋ kombɨ amɨn kɨnda don aŋalon aŋ damjak.’
Mani butno dakon galaktok madep kɨnda da butnogwan pi aban nandɨsat. Uŋun galaktok da nandak nandaknokon nak abɨŋ nep do emat aŋek yokwi da dam tebanon nepmaŋek gɨptɨmno kɨla asak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yagɨt, “Ji amɨn dakon aŋpak dɨma kokwinɨtni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, Piŋkop da jiyo kɨsi kokwin akdɨsak.
“Noa da bɨsapmon amɨn egɨpgwit uŋudeŋ gɨn Amɨn Dakon Monji apjak bɨsapmon yaŋ gɨn aŋ egɨpdaŋ.
Ae don Jems altaŋ ɨmgut. Ae don yabekbi kɨsikon altaŋ yomgut.
Dɨwarɨno aego dɨma pɨndakgi. Yokwino kɨsi wɨrɨrɨk mudoki.
Yo si nono pɨkwaŋ uŋun do Piŋkop da nandaban yokwi dɨma asak. Mani gen yomaŋ uŋun do Piŋkop da nandaban yokwi tosok.”
Yaŋ aŋakwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da kalɨpsigwan gen mandagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Iyɨ sotnin mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ iyɨ do tɨmɨgakwan kɨlek tagɨmaŋ.”
Yesu da mɨŋat amɨnyo nandaŋ gadat amaŋ uŋun Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawot kagagwan pɨgɨneŋ do yoma wɨtdal nimgut da nin abɨsok uŋudon tebaisi akgamaŋ. Aŋek nin Piŋkop da abɨŋ tɨmɨkban Kwen Kokupmon iyɨ da tɨlɨm madepgwan egɨpneŋ do nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom amaŋ, ae nin uŋun do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk amaŋ.
Galili amɨn uŋun kɨsi Yapyap Bɨlak bɨsapmon Jerusalem kokup papmon egek Yesu da yo morap agɨt uŋun pɨndak nandaŋyo awit, do Yesu uŋun Galili kɨŋ altaŋakwan but galagon da abɨdawit.
Mani Juda amɨn dɨwarɨ dɨma nandaŋ gadawit uŋun da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon but sugawit. Sugaŋba nandaŋ gadat awit mɨŋat amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok aŋyomgwit.
Piŋkop yolek gawak ɨmɨsat yaŋ yoŋ mɨŋat pi tagɨsi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ani. Uŋun da tɨlɨmni bamɨsi asak.
Jems gat Jon gat, Sebedi dakon monjɨ bamot, uŋun da Yesukon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Yoyɨŋdet, nit yo kɨnda do gayɨkdamak, uŋun gak da abi do nandamak.”
Nak Onesiporus dakon gwakni Amɨn Tagɨ da bupmɨ nandaŋ yomjak dosi nandɨsat. Bɨsap morapmɨ Onesiporus da nak dakon but aŋteban aban butno tagɨsisi agɨt. Ae dam tebanon yɨkgɨm uŋun do mayagɨ dɨma pagɨt.
Mani mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi uŋun lamni tɨmɨgek lam kolek do pakbi dɨ gat kɨsi tɨmɨgek kɨwit.
Paŋdet 72 uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨgon da tobɨl abɨŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak dakon man yaŋapno koŋ da genin guramɨkgaŋ!”
Yaŋ agɨt do niaŋ yoneŋ? Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugosok, do namɨn da uwal aŋek nin pabɨŋ nipjak?
Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋ egakwa Yesu tɨlak gen kɨnda yoyɨgɨt. Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kɨlɨ kɨŋ aŋkapmat agɨt, ae amɨn da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Akdɨsak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun kwaŋ tokdɨsak yaŋ nandawit do
Yutni telagɨ uŋun kabapmon agɨt. Kwen kundu wasagɨt, ae mɨktɨm wasagɨt da tebai tomal, uŋudeŋ yutni aŋteban aban tebaisi toktogɨsi tokdɨsak.
Nin kɨla amɨn yopmaŋ degek tap wakga abɨdaŋek nomansi mɨktɨm tɨmjok kɨnda tap binap tosok uŋun mani Kos uŋudon wɨgɨgɨmaŋ. Wɨgek uŋudon da gɨldat kɨnda do mɨktɨm tɨmjok kɨnda tap binap tosok uŋun mani Rodes wɨgek uŋudon da Patara kokup papmon kɨgɨmaŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda yɨk ɨmalyo tagɨsi baŋ paŋek ae kɨsit tamɨkon sip gol naŋ wasaŋbi kɨnda yɨpmaŋek ji dakon muwut muwut yutjikon wɨgakwan yoni mɨni amɨn kɨnda ɨmalni dagaŋbi ae yokwisi kɨnda uŋunyo kɨsi wugɨsak,
Uŋun yo morap wasagɨtgwan amɨn nin da wukwini egɨpneŋ do aŋek iyɨ dakon galaktok yolek gen bamɨ niban mɨŋat monjɨni dagagɨmaŋ.
Aŋakwa mɨŋat dɨwarɨ dubagɨsogon da agek yo uŋun pɨndakgwit. Yesu Galili mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋ abɨŋakwan uŋun mɨŋat kabɨ da yol awɨlek oman aŋ ɨmɨŋek agɨpgwit.
Ae don Yawe da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni paŋpulugaŋban gwakni morapmɨ awit. Ae paŋpulugaŋban tapmɨmni da uwalni dakon tapmɨm yapgut.
Mani abɨsok kɨla amɨn madep manjɨgɨl uŋun do butjap nandaŋ ɨmɨsal. Kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgɨl, aŋek manji ɨmgul.
Nin nandamaŋ, mɨŋat da monjɨ paŋalak do tepmɨ paŋ uŋun da tɨlak yo morap Piŋkop da wasagɨt tepmɨ paŋ. Aŋek kɨsi morap da iyoŋ iyoŋ yawit da yaŋakwa wɨk da abɨsok bɨsapmon wɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋek boron wɨgek mɨktɨm amɨn da dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon kɨwit.
Yaŋban Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ni yo?” Yaŋban yagɨmal, “Yesu Nasaret amɨnon yo altawit uŋun do yomak. Uŋun kombɨ amɨn kɨnda. Gen yagɨt, ae pi agɨt, uŋun Piŋkop da dabɨlon, ae amɨn kɨsi da dabɨlon, tapmɨmɨ toŋsi aban kawit.
Yaŋban Pol da yagɨt, “Nak Juda amɨn kɨnda. Kokupno uŋun Tasas, Silisia mɨktɨmon tosok. Kokup madepno amɨn morap da man bini nandaŋ. Amɨn gen tagɨ yoyɨkeŋ?”
Pailat da Yesu pulugaŋ yɨpban kɨsak dosi nandagɨt, do mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep dakon burɨ moni do aeni gen yoyɨgɨt.
Kɨŋ kono tap wakga kɨnda Ponisia mɨktɨmon kɨk do aban kagɨmaŋ. Kaŋek uŋudon wɨgɨno kɨgɨmaŋ.
Uŋun amɨn bamot kɨŋek yo morap altawit dakon geni yaŋ nandat agɨmal.
Nin Amɨn Tagɨ ya yaŋ iyɨneŋ. Uŋun da amɨn tagɨ morap yapmaŋ mudosok. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Yesu bɨlakni 12 aŋakwan Yapyap Bɨlak dakon aŋpak yolek Jerusalem kɨwit.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek Tomas yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak abɨŋ kɨsitno wɨtjɨŋek pɨndat. Aŋek kɨsitgo awɨŋ gekgeknokon wɨtjɨki. Gak but bamot dɨma aŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ nabi.”
Amɨn bamot Yesu yɨpmaŋ det do aŋakwal Pita da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nin ɨdon tagɨsi ekwamaŋ. Nin yut kabeŋ kapbɨ aneŋ. Kɨnda gak do, ae kɨnda Moses do, ae kɨnda Elaija do aneŋ.” (Pita gen uŋun naŋ yosot yaŋ uŋun dɨma nandaŋek yum yagɨt.)
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ amɨn si nandaŋ gamaŋ uŋun amɨn but dasi galak taŋ yobi. Burɨ tagɨsi amɨn paŋpulugaŋaki tagɨsi egɨpni.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, kombɨ amɨn morap kokup kaloŋni da geni dɨma nandaŋ yomaŋ.
Yaŋban yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakbɨ kɨmotjak!”
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ da kabɨkon mɨŋat wɨliyo iyɨ dage dɨma ekwaŋ. Mɨŋat uŋun wɨli dakon paŋpulugokni, ae wɨli uŋun mɨŋat dakon paŋpulugokni.
Yawe gak dagɨn nin paŋpulugaŋbɨ teban tomaŋ. Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo nin yo tagɨsi aŋ nibi dosi nandɨsat.
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji amɨn kɨmakba yopmaŋgaŋ tɨp kɨnam yombem. Kwen da kwak soŋbi do kwakwagɨ tagɨsi asak. Mani mɨkgwan amɨn kɨdat gat ae yo garagɨ tɨgɨ morapmɨ toŋ.
Piŋkop uŋun Kwen Kokup muwut muwut madep dakon mibɨltok amɨn yɨkdak. Mɨktɨm morap dakon kɨla amɨn da muwugakwa nandak nandakni kokwinɨkdak.
yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji yaŋsi yoni, ‘Nin kalbi pak ɨŋtaŋapno paŋdetni da abɨŋ bumjotni kabo aŋkɨsɨbeŋ.’
Nak Kristo dakon amɨn, do bamɨsi yosot. Top dɨma yosot. Nak gen on yosot uŋun Telagɨ Wup da nandak nandakno si joŋɨgakwan gen uŋun bamɨ yosot yaŋsi nandaŋek yosot.
Mani nak gen bamɨ yosot, ae ji geno do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji gen emat nido aŋ?”
Nin ji do but dasi galak taŋ damgumaŋ, do Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi damgumaŋ. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, notsi agɨmaŋ do aŋek ji paŋpulugok do egɨp egɨpnin kɨsi parekgɨmaŋ.
Ji yoni mɨni amɨn ae monjɨ datni kɨmakbi paŋpulugoni. Aŋek jɨgɨ paŋek yokwi ekwaŋ amɨn uŋun paŋkutnoni.
Uwalgo da gen pap yaŋek gen yokwi yaŋ gamaŋ. Uŋun toktogɨsi madepsi yaŋ tɨdoŋ. Piŋkop, aŋpak yokwini do dɨma ɨŋtaŋ yobi.
“Kwen Kokup gat, ae Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ gat, ae yabekbi kabɨ gat, ae kombɨ amɨn kabɨ gat, ji kɨsi uŋun kokup papmon abɨsok yo noman tosok uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani. Piŋkop da uŋun kokup pap da jikon aŋpak yokwi aŋdamgut uŋun kokwinɨgek uŋun dakon kobogɨ ɨmɨsak.”
Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun yaŋ gɨn kɨlɨ agɨt. Amɨn da oman aŋ tyuɨmni do dɨma pɨgɨt. Iyɨ mɨŋat amɨn morap paŋpulugokdo, ae iyɨ dakon gɨptɨmnaŋ paregek yumaŋ naŋ yop do pɨgɨt.”
Kundukon gɨk kanekyo kɨsitgo da wasaŋ kwen yopgul da toŋ uŋun pɨndagek yaŋ nandɨsat.
Uŋun do aŋek not kabɨ gen uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋomaŋ uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani. Uŋun amɨn da nin dakon yokwi wɨrɨrɨt amɨnin egɨsak. Moses dakon gen teban guramɨgek ji amɨn kɨlegɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma ani. Yokwisi sigɨn taŋ damni. Mani uŋun amɨn da amɨn morap iyɨ do nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun yokwini wɨrɨrɨk yomɨŋek amɨn kɨlegɨsi yaŋ yoyɨsak.
Nak Pol, Yesu Kristo yoldat do aŋek dam tebanon egɨsat. Nak gat ae notnin Timoti, nit da papia on Pilimon gak do mandamak. Gak notnin tagɨsi ae pi ɨsalnin.
Amɨn da gen yoŋ uŋun nandaŋ gadamaŋ, mani Piŋkop da Monji do gen yagɨt uŋun da amɨn dakon gen yapmaŋdak.
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn madep da yaŋ nandawit: On amɨn bamot amɨn ɨsalɨ, papia yutnon dɨma yɨkbi, mani pasol pasolɨ mɨni gen tapmɨmɨ toŋ yomal. Yaŋ pɨndagek but morap nandaŋek on amɨn kalɨp Yesu gat egɨpgwit yaŋ nandaŋ kokwinɨkgwit.
Yaŋ aba mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ ae kabapgwan binap agek gopbat ae gapmagwan egɨ egɨ awit. Uŋun nandaŋ gadat amɨn da mɨktɨm amɨn dɨwarɨ yapmaŋ mudaŋek amɨn wukwisi ae tagɨsi awit.
Yaŋ nandat aŋek egakwal amɨn jomjom aŋegek Sekaraia nido bɨsap dubak Telagɨ Yut Madepmon egɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek but morap awit.
Jamba but amɨn nak da yutnon dɨma egɨpni, ae top yoŋ amɨn nak gat dɨma egɨpneŋ.
Abɨsok nak nandɨsat. Yawe da kɨla amɨn madepni iyɨ manjɨgɨt aŋpulugosok. Uŋun Kwen Kokup kokupni tagɨsikon egek bɨsitni nandɨsak. Iyɨ da tapmɨmon aŋpulugaŋek uwalni da kɨsiron naŋ abɨdosok.
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji kap ɨdapyo dakon manji sugoŋ, mani burɨgwan da kabo ae sukwap nandak nandakyo tugawit da toŋ.
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon Piŋkop gen dɨma yoyɨneŋ yaŋ do kosit sopsop ak do pi aŋ, nido Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ dɨma tɨmɨtjak do nandaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek kalɨpgwan da yokwi sigɨn aŋek yokwini paŋmuwuk kakwaŋba madepsi aŋakwan apmeŋon Piŋkop dakon butjapni pabɨŋ uŋun amɨnon tagɨt.
Naŋakwa ae wain kɨnam abɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Wain kɨnam on nak da ji gat saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ asat uŋun dakon tɨlak. Nak yawino naŋ ji do tagaldat.
Yaŋ aban kaŋakwa Elaija gat Moses gat altaŋbal Yesu gat gen yaŋ nandat aba pɨndakgwit.
Piŋkop Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun do gen yokwi yaŋ ɨmaŋ. Aŋek iyɨ dakon man pawɨgek amɨn morap da geni guramɨtni do pi tebaisi aŋ kɨmokgoŋ.
Butjikon da nandaba yokwi tok, ae butjapmon da gen pap yogok, ae butjap, ae but sɨgok, ae yaŋba yokwi tok, ae aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun wagɨlsi yopmaŋ mudoni.
Aŋakwa monjɨ kabi kɨnda da abɨŋ bumjotni ɨmalnaŋ wamaŋ aŋkɨ gapmagwan yɨpgwit.
Yawe Tapmɨm Ami nin gat egɨsak. Jekop dakon Piŋkop uŋun dam tebanin arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlɨ egɨsak.
Nin mɨnam da yaŋ amɨn kɨnda da pat yɨpguron yokwalgɨmaŋ da pulugaŋ kɨgɨmaŋ. Pat uŋun tuwɨl kɨgɨt, do nin pulugaŋ kɨgɨmaŋ.
Pigaganin da jap bamɨ morapmɨ taŋakwa jap paŋ yopyop yut madepsi tugaŋ toni do nandamaŋ. Aŋakwa sipsipnin da monjɨ morapmɨ sigɨn paŋalani.
Gaius da gɨldatni tagɨ damɨsak. Uŋun da nak gat ae paŋmuwukbi morap gat kɨsi yutnikon kɨlanin tagɨsi asak. Erastas uŋun kokup pap dakon moneŋ kɨla amɨni, ae notnin Kwatas da gɨldatni tagɨ ji do damamal.
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon bret niaŋ da toŋ?” Yaŋban yawit, “Ninon bret 7 ae tap kɨlap monɨŋgok bamorɨsok dagɨn taŋ nimaŋ.”
Uŋun amɨn nak but dasi galak taŋ namɨŋek yaŋ teŋteŋok pi aŋ, nido Piŋkop da nak Gen Bin Tagɨsi aŋteban abeŋ do dam tebanon nepgut yaŋ nandaŋ namaŋ.
Mani amɨn dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Uŋun da dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn aŋmɨlɨp aban sɨŋtagɨt. Yaŋ agɨt, do ae nido uŋun amɨn dɨma aŋpulugaŋakwan kɨmakgɨt?”
Amɨn yokwi uŋun jɨgɨ dɨ dɨma noman taŋ yomaŋ. Aŋakwa yoni morapmɨsi, ae sigɨn ɨreŋ toŋ.
Yawe da yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋban dɨma kɨmokdot. Ae but dasi galak taŋ namɨŋek bupmɨ nandaŋ namɨsak.
Iyɨŋban Pailat da emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ ɨban opban iyɨgɨt, “Asi Yesu kuŋwak, bo dɨma?”
Aŋakwa bɨsap kɨndakon koŋ kɨnda da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Yesu nandaŋ ɨmɨsat, ae Pol yo kɨsi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Mani ji namɨn?”
Jikon amɨn dɨ nak da yabekgo opgwit, uŋun kabɨkon da kɨnda da galaktokni yolni do pasɨlɨkon da ji paŋkɨlɨgek yo kabɨsi tɨmɨkgwit, ma?
Mɨŋat amɨn morapyo Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨsi yaŋ yoyɨsak. Kosit ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda dɨma tosok. Amɨn morap Piŋkop da dabɨlon arɨp gɨn.
Ae kweŋ kɨlegɨ dɨma yosak kaŋ, amɨn niaŋon da emat do tagap toni?
Iyɨ do pasolgoŋ amɨn jap yomɨsak. Saŋbek saŋbek agɨt uŋun dɨma ɨŋtosok.
Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ ɨmal tɨm da tomno dabɨlni wɨtjɨŋakwan Gen Bin Tagɨsi nin da yaŋ teŋteŋomaŋ uŋun dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoŋ kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Tɨpdom dakon kosit naŋ agek dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoŋ.
‘Uŋun amɨn kabɨ gen kaga dagɨn nak man madep namaŋ, mani but dasi nak dɨma nandaŋ namaŋ.
Gengo do tagɨsi nayɨŋ dekdal, do toktogɨsi mango aŋkɨsikeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Yawe yaŋ iyɨsat, “Gak Piŋkopno.” Yawe, nak aŋpulugoki. Yaŋ tɨdosot, do nandaŋ nabi.
Juda uŋun Peres gat Sera gat dakon datni. (Meŋi uŋun Tamar.) Peres uŋun Esron dakon datni. Esron uŋun Ram dakon datni.
Luk kaloŋ dagɨn nak gat ekwamak. Mak abɨdaŋbɨ gak gat kɨsi opjil, nido uŋun da nak pikon aŋpulugosak amɨn tagɨsi.
Yesu nap kelɨ toŋ baŋ pelɨtni wamaŋ ɨmgwit gat ae ɨmal dubak gami kɨsi kwenikon sigɨn taŋakwa waŋga pɨgɨt. Pɨŋakwan Pailat da amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kabɨt, uŋun amɨn oni.”
Yaŋba yutgwan amɨn kɨnda da Yesu iyɨgɨt, “Meŋgo padɨk padɨkgo yomakon abeŋ da gak gat yaŋ nandat ak do yoŋ.”
Amɨn yokwi da gen yaŋ yoŋ, “Piŋkop da yo nin da amaŋ uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma nandɨsak. Piŋkop Wukwisi da nin dakon aŋpaknin dakon mibɨlɨ nandɨsak dakon kosit kɨnda dɨma tosok.”
Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ gat muwugek mani aŋkɨsinisi, ae kɨla amɨn muwut muwuron mani aŋkɨsinisi.
Amɨn kɨnda ya yaŋ nayɨsak, uŋun paret naŋ yaŋ namɨsak. Uŋun amɨn da mano awɨgɨsak. Ae nak da amɨn geno guramɨtni uŋun yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsat.”
Mani saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ nak da Israel mɨŋat amɨnyo gat akdɨsat, uŋun yaŋ: Nak da gen teban morapno nandak nandaknikon yopdɨsat, aŋek geno butnikon mandakdɨsat. Aŋek nak da Piŋkopni egapbo, uŋun nak dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ egɨpdaŋ.
Nak si kɨmokgeŋ da arɨpmon suŋ kɨnda agɨm kaŋ, tagɨ nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ. Mani top yaŋek gen pikon nepgwit kaŋ, amɨn kɨnda da nak Juda amɨn da kɨsiron dɨmasi nepjak. Rom dakon kɨla amɨn madep Sisa dagɨn geno nandɨsak do nandɨsat.”
Not kabɨ, nak ji dakon nandak nandak paŋpulugok do aŋek Apolos gat nit do gen on dayɨsat. Ji nit do nandaŋek aŋpak kɨlegɨ Piŋkop gen papia da yosok uŋun gɨn yolni. Yaŋ aŋek pɨbɨt tɨdok aŋek amɨn kɨnda awɨgek ae kɨnda dɨma abɨŋ yɨpni.
Yesu aeni bɨsap kɨnda gat Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek amɨn kɨnda kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi kɨnda yɨkban kagɨt.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun yo yokwisi kapbɨ da dɨma dapba kɨmakgwit amɨn but tobɨl dɨma awit. Koŋ gat ae kokup kɨdat iyɨ kɨsit da wasawit gat sigɨn gawak yomgwit. Kokup kɨdat uŋun gol ae silwa ae ain kɨnda mani bras ae tɨp ae kɨndap baŋ wasawit, uŋun dɨma sɨŋtoŋ ae gen dɨma nandaŋ ae kosit dɨma akwaŋ.
Yawe, gak amɨn do bupmɨ nandaŋek but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal uŋun do nandaki. Kalɨpsigwan da aŋpak uŋun agɨl da aŋaŋ obɨsal.
Aban meŋi datni da uŋun kaŋek tamtam yagɨmal. Mani Yesu da tebai yoyɨgɨt, “Jil on yo noman taŋban komal uŋun do amɨn dɨmasi yoyɨnjil.”
Yaŋdo, mɨŋat amɨnyo Yesu Kristokon gadawit uŋun yokwi dakon kobogɨ dɨmasi tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Uŋun amɨn, amɨn dɨwarɨ do aŋpak yaworɨ aŋ yom do dɨma nandagɨt. Uŋun yoni mɨni amɨn gat, ae yo do wadak wadak awit amɨn gat, ae butjɨk madepsi nandawit amɨn gat paŋsopmaŋek dapban kɨmakgwit.
Yawe, toktogɨsi but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal, do bɨsitno nandaki. Gak kɨlegɨsi, do kɨlano aŋaki egɨpbeŋ.
Dɨwarɨnin dakon kobogɨ yokwisi tɨmɨrɨ mani dɨma nimɨsak. Nin yokwi morapmɨsi amaŋ uŋun dakon kobogɨ do yo jɨgɨsi tɨmɨrɨ mani dɨma nimɨsak.
Mani yaŋsi nandaki, mibɨ bɨsapmon jɨgɨ morapmɨ yokwisi da noman tokdaŋ.
Piŋkop yaŋ aŋkɨsiŋek emat agak sɨba geni tepmɨsi baŋ tɨmɨgek
Yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “On mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon bret morapmɨ dukon baŋ on mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yomno noni?”
Uŋudeŋ gɨn yo morap dayɨt uŋun da altaŋakwa mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep kɨlɨ uŋunjok kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandani.
Ji datji dakon aŋpak uŋun baŋgɨn aŋ.” Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Nin gwamda dɨma. Datnin uŋun Piŋkop kaloŋ gɨn.”
Gɨldat pɨgakwan pɨlɨndo koŋni toŋ amɨn morapmɨ paŋpaŋ apba gen yaŋek koŋ yol yomgut. Aŋek sot amɨn kɨsisi paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Yesu da yaŋ yaŋban Judas kɨnda, uŋun Judas Iskariot dɨma, uŋun da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak niaŋon da gaga ninbaŋ gɨn nolɨkdɨsal, mani mɨktɨm amɨn morap dɨma yolɨkdɨsal?”
Yum pɨndagaki uwal da nak dɨma abɨdawit. Aŋpulugaŋaki tagɨsi egɨsat.
Yaŋdo, ji kaloŋ kaloŋ dɨwarɨsi Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyokon yaŋkwok ani. Aŋek ji kaloŋ kaloŋ Piŋkop da amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋpulugosak do bɨsit ani, aŋakwa Piŋkop da ji paŋmɨlɨp asak. Amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda da bɨsit asak kaŋ, bɨsitni uŋun tapmɨmɨ toŋ, ae amɨn dɨwarɨ tagɨsi paŋpulugogɨ.
Nak gen on ji paŋpulugok dogɨn yosot. Uŋun da gen teban kɨnda dɨma asak.
Uŋudon da mibɨlɨsigwan sɨŋtaŋek kundu gat mɨktɨm gat pɨndakdak.
Mani not kabɨ, ji pɨlɨn tukgwan dɨma ekwaŋ, do uŋun gɨldat kabo noknok da yaŋ noman taŋ daban dɨma wɨrɨpdatdaŋ.
Yaŋba Yesu yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn da gen kɨnda yoŋ uŋun yaŋ: ‘Wuda wamak gaga dakon gɨptɨm aŋmɨlɨp a.’ Uŋun gen nak nayɨkdaŋ, ma? Ae ‘Kapaneam kokupmon wasok agɨl do amɨn da yaŋba nandagɨmaŋ uŋun yomaninon yaŋ gɨn abi do nandamaŋ’ yaŋ nayɨkdaŋ, ma?
Gak yaŋsi abi, nido nak kɨlɨsok uŋun kɨmotdɨsat. Aŋapbo yawino da Piŋkop do wain paret aŋ ɨmaŋ uŋudeŋ tagaldɨsat. Kɨkeŋ dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋ tosok.
Mani Piŋkop da paŋmuwukbi madepni wasok do aŋek gwak teban kɨlɨ magɨt da gwak uŋun tebaisi akdak. Ae uŋun gwagon gen yaŋ mandagɨt: “Amɨn Tagɨ da iyɨ dakon mɨŋat amɨni nandaŋ yomɨsak,” ae “Amɨn morap nin Amɨn Tagɨ dakon amɨn yaŋ yoŋ amɨn uŋun aŋpak yokwi uŋun manji yomɨŋ kɨmotni.”
Dat da aneŋsi do yagɨt uŋun da arɨpmon mɨŋat gak dakon mɨŋat monjɨyo dɨwarɨ da gen bamɨ yolgaŋ. Nak uŋun dakon gen nandaŋek but galak madepsi nandagɨm.
Ji teban taŋek bɨsit aŋek egɨpni. Yaŋ aŋek egɨpni kaŋ, paŋkewalon arɨpmɨ dɨma mokdaŋ. But da nak nol do galak tosok mani gɨp dakon tapmɨmni mɨni.”
Jon uŋun lam kɨnda da yaŋ soŋek teŋteŋagɨt. Ji bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok uŋun dakon teŋteŋɨ do galak tawit.
Piŋkop da oman monjɨni aŋnoman aŋ mibɨltok ji do yabekban apgut. Ji kɨsi kaloŋ kaloŋ aŋpakji yokwi yopmaŋek gɨsamɨ toŋ egɨpni yaŋ do aŋek yabekgɨt.”
Kɨŋ Sol kaŋ abɨdaŋban Antiok apgumal. Apbal paŋmuwukbi gat Antiok bɨlak kɨnda egek amɨn morapmɨsi Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋ dekgɨmal. Antiok kokupmon amɨn da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn uŋun Kristo Dakon Amɨn Kabɨ yaŋ wasaŋek yoyɨwit.
Yaŋ yaŋban gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋudon yɨkgwit uŋun da burɨ da yaŋ nandawit,
Gen morap uŋun Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ yoyɨgɨt uŋun tɨlak genon dagɨn yagɨt. Gen noman dɨma yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Tɨlak gengɨn yoyɨgɨt.
Pol da Esia mɨktɨmon bɨsap noknok dɨma aneŋ yaŋ nandagɨt, do nin tap wakgakon da Epesas kokup pap si yapmaŋek Miletus kokup pap kɨgɨmaŋ. Bɨsap noknok dɨma aŋek tepmɨ kɨneŋ kaŋ, Pentikos Bɨsap Madep Jerusalem koneŋ yaŋ nandagɨt.
Bɨsap kɨndakon peni padɨge 7 kabɨ egɨpgwit. Mibɨltok nani uŋun mɨŋat paŋek monji mɨni egek kɨmakgɨt.
Piŋkop da kundu ae mɨktɨm ae tap ae yo morap uŋungwan toŋ wasagɨt. Toktogɨsi yo morap ak do yosok uŋun akdɨsak.
Yawe bɨsit iyɨŋek ya yaŋ iyɨno. Pi madep madep agɨt uŋun dakon geni yoyɨno mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn da nandani.
Uŋun amɨn da yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo morap pɨndakdal uŋun papiakon mandaŋ yopbɨ paŋmuwukbi 7 kabɨ do kɨni. Mandaŋ yopbɨ paŋmuwukbi Epesas kokup papmon ekwaŋ, ae Smena, ae Pegamum, ae Taitaira, ae Sadis, ae Piladelpia ae Laodisia do kɨni.”
Piŋkop da amɨn kɨsi morap pɨndakban egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ ekwaŋ, do Piŋkop uŋun amɨn kɨmakbi dakon Piŋkop dɨma, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ dakon Piŋkop.”
Gita tɨdaŋek kap yaŋek Yawe aŋkɨsini.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yawe, gak dasi pulugaŋ nepdɨsal yaŋ nandaŋek egɨsat. Nak monɨŋɨsogon da nandaŋ gadaŋ gamɨŋ aŋaŋ wɨgɨm.
Sipsip Monɨŋ da kendol pakbi baŋ papia aŋteban abi 2 uŋun pakdekgɨt. Pakdegakwan yo egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ 2 uŋun da yagɨt, “Gak op.”
ae Jems, Sebedi dakon monji, ae Jems dakon padɨge Jon (uŋun bamot mani Boanages yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ Kɨrɨrɨŋ Amɨn),
Yawe, nak ya yaŋ gayɨsat uŋun da paretno asak, uŋun tɨmɨkgi. Gen tebango do nayɨŋ dekgi.
Gak dakon man madepgo mɨŋat amɨnyo abɨsok ae don altaŋek egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ uŋudon yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ aŋaŋ kɨkeŋ. Aŋapbo toktogɨsi mɨŋat amɨnyo da mango aŋkɨsiŋ wɨgɨkdaŋ.
Ae aŋelo 6 da ɨdap madepni pakbi madep Yupretiskon tagalgɨt. Tagalban pakbi wagɨlsi kɨbɨdaŋakwan amɨn tagɨ madep gɨldat da si wɨsak tetgɨn da opni do kosit aŋnoman agɨt.
Monjɨ uŋun Amɨn Dakon Monji egɨsak, do Dat da yaŋ mudaŋ ɨban gen kokwin asak.
Kalɨp kɨla amɨn bamot Orep gat ae Sep garon agɨl uŋudeŋ gɨn emat amɨni dakon mibɨltok amɨni paŋupbal aki. Kɨla amɨn madep bamot Seba gat ae Salmuna garon agɨl uŋudeŋ gɨn kɨla amɨni pabɨŋ yopbi.
Ji dɨsi gen on kokwin ani. Mɨŋat kɨnda busuŋni dɨma wɨtjɨŋek bɨsit asak kaŋ, uŋun aŋpak tagɨ naŋ asak?
Piŋkop da kaŋban uŋun kokup pap da kombɨ amɨni dapgut ae mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni dapgut dakon gulusuŋni madepsi taŋ ɨmɨsak. Ae mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨnyo uwal da dapba kɨmakgwit, uŋun dakon gulusuŋni kɨsi Babilon dogɨn tosok.
Amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop gen yaŋ teŋteŋok pi abɨdagɨt kaŋ, Piŋkop da iyɨ yosok yaŋ nandaŋek gen yosak. Ae amɨn kɨnda amɨn paŋpulugok pi asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da tapmɨm ɨmɨsak uŋun da arɨpmon pi uŋun aŋ kɨmotjak. Yaŋ aŋakwa mɨŋat amɨnyo da yo morap ani uŋun pɨndatni, aŋek Yesu Kristo da manon Piŋkop dakon man aŋkɨsini. Uŋun man madepni ae tapmɨmni dagok dagogɨ mɨni taŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak. Uŋun asi.
Piŋkop, gak tɨlɨmgo uŋun madepsi, ae gak kɨla amɨn madep mibɨltogɨ. Gak wukwisi, man madepgo da kabap madep dakon man madep yapmaŋ mudosok.
Ae Jekop, Israel amɨn dakon babi, saŋbek saŋbek uŋun toktogɨsi tosak do Yawe da iyɨgɨt.
Emat amɨn gat ae mibɨltok amɨn madepni gat, ae Juda amɨn dakon obip amɨn gat da Yesu abɨdaŋek nap teban naŋ abɨsɨwit.
Amɨn morapmɨ mɨktɨm dakon aŋpagon da mani pawɨkwaŋ, do nakyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn abeŋ.
Oman monjɨni Dewit da kabɨkon da nin paŋpulugosak do amɨn tebaisi kɨnda aŋnoman agɨt.
Yaŋban amɨn gen yagɨt do nandaba tagɨsi aŋakwan yawit, “Mao! On Josep dakon monji da niaŋonsi da gen galagɨsi on yosok?”
Not kabɨ, mibɨ do yaŋ dayɨsat. Aŋpak morap Piŋkop da pɨndakban tagɨsi aŋ uŋun anidosi nin da kɨlɨ dolɨgɨmaŋ, ji uŋun baŋ yolek aŋ. Mani abɨsok Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da manon uŋun aŋpak sigɨn saŋbeŋek madepsi aŋ kɨmotnisi do dayɨŋ paŋteban amaŋ.
Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun gɨptɨmni yokwi da altoŋ, ae dɨwarɨ amɨn da yabi pabi, ae dɨwarɨ Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon pi do nandaŋek egɨp egɨpni parekgaŋ, yaŋ do aŋek mɨŋat dɨma paŋ. Gen on abɨdok do nandaŋ amɨn uŋun tagɨ abɨdoni.”
Yesu dakon pi ak do nandaŋek kɨŋ pi uŋun aŋek Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨkon paŋpulugok dɨ dɨma tɨmɨkgaŋ.
Nandak nandakno mɨnisi agɨt. Joŋ kɨlap burɨ mɨni da yaŋ gak da dabɨlon aŋpak agɨm.
Gak da Isip dakon tapmɨm madepni tuwɨlek obɨsi aŋupbal agɨl. Aŋek tapmɨm madepgokon da uwalgo pabɨŋ yopgul.
Wigat amɨn kɨlegɨ da tagɨ pɨgɨgɨ uŋun wɨtdal namɨŋaki pɨgek Yawe ya yaŋ iyɨkeŋ.
Ji Kristo do nandaba wukwan ɨmɨŋek notji gawak yomɨŋ yomɨŋ aŋek egɨpni.
Yaŋban Nataniel da iyɨgɨt, “Yo tagɨ kɨnda Nasaret kokupmon tagɨ dɨma altogɨ nandɨsat.” Yaŋban Pilip da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Abɨŋek ka.”
Yawe, man bingo tagɨsi tosak do yokwikon naŋ pulugaŋ nepbi. Gak amɨn kɨlegɨsi, do jɨgɨ morap pasat uŋun wɨrɨrɨk nabi.
Jap pi gat ae yo morap uŋungwan toŋ, ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani. Uŋun bɨsapmon kɨndap morap koron toŋ uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yokdaŋ. Yawe da buron kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ, nido Yawe abɨŋ gen kokwin aŋek mɨktɨm daman kɨsi dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon aŋpak kokwin aŋ yomdɨsak. Aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da, ae gen bamɨkon da, mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn morapyo gen kokwin aŋyomdɨsak.
Aŋek nin amɨn monɨŋ da arɨpmon saŋbeŋek dɨma egɨpneŋ. Aŋek amɨn paŋgalak aŋ amɨn, ae amɨn paŋkewal, ae top dakon mibɨlɨ pakyaŋ nandaŋ amɨn uŋun dakon geni da ji dakon nandak nandak paŋkɨ paŋabɨŋ paŋabɨŋ dɨma ani.
Yawe da Jekop iyɨ do aŋawakgɨt. Israel uŋun Piŋkop iyɨ dakon amɨn kabɨ.
Wugakwal uŋudon gɨn wudɨp madepsi kɨnda aŋakwan kokup pap dakon tɨmɨ kɨnda tasɨk tagɨt. Aŋakwan tɨmɨ 9 kabɨ dagɨn tagɨ tawit. Uŋun wudɨp da amɨn 7 tausen yaŋ dapban kɨmakgwit. Aŋakwa si egɨpgwit amɨn madepsi pasalek Kwen Kokup Piŋkop dakon man yaŋ aŋkɨsiwit.
Mani Sol (mani kɨnda Pol) uŋun Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon tugaŋban Elimas tebaisi kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut, uŋun bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni kɨldani toŋ tagɨsi ae ɨmalni gami baŋ paŋek yoni arɨpmɨsi taŋ ɨmɨŋakwa yaworɨsi egɨpgut.
Not kabɨ, nin bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ ji do nandaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyamaŋ. Yaŋ amaŋ uŋun da tagɨsi, nido nandaŋ gadatji uŋun pap taŋek teban tosok, ae ji morap kaloŋ kaloŋ notji do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak uŋun sigɨn pap taŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak.
Mani Piŋkop da iyɨ nandaŋ kokwinɨgek yerɨ kaloŋ kaloŋ do obi tamɨyo iyɨkon iyɨkon wasosok.
‘Piŋkop da nak dakon Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak abɨŋ nak da amɨnsi tet do yɨkbɨ don uwalgo kandap gɨbaŋgogwan yopbo gengo guramɨtni.” ’
“Mani takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn dubagɨkon agek but yokwi nandaŋek Kwen Kokup sɨŋtok do mayak taŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Piŋkop, nak yokwi pakpak, do bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi!’ ”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da gak pik kɨndap mibɨlon yɨkbɨ gandat yaŋ gayɨko uŋun do aŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsal. Don uŋun si yapmaŋek wasok ŋwakŋwarɨsi pɨndatdɨsal.
Ae aŋpak kɨlegɨ dakon bamɨ Yesu Kristokon da abɨsak uŋun da jikon tugosak. Aŋakwan amɨn da kaŋek Piŋkop man madep ɨmɨŋek aŋkɨsini.
Yaŋdo, nin notnin dakon aŋpak kokwin dɨma aŋ aŋ aneŋ. Nin nandak nandak tagɨsi baŋ paŋek notnin kɨnda yokwikon mosak dakon pi dɨmasi aneŋ.
Juda amɨn da uŋun amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni egɨpgut da sɨŋtagɨt uŋun do nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt. Yaŋ nandawit do uŋun amɨn dakon meŋi datniyo apjil do gen yɨpgwit.
Jekop nandaŋ gadat aŋek si kɨmot do aŋek Josep dakon monjɨ bamot do gɨsam yomgut. Aŋek busuŋni wɨn kɨrɨŋni da dɨwarɨkon wɨtjɨŋek Piŋkop gawak ɨmgut.
Piŋkop dakon aŋelo da nugɨm yokwisi madep maba pɨgɨgɨt. Nugɨm yokwisi madep uŋun kalɨpsigwan egɨpgut, mɨktɨmon amɨn morap yokwi ani do paŋkewaldak. Mani kɨnda Koŋ, ae mani kɨnda Sunduk yaŋ yoŋ. Uŋun maba mɨktɨmon pɨgɨt, ae aŋeloni kɨsi uŋun gat maba pɨwit.
Piŋkop dakon yaŋ teban tok geni morapmɨ toŋ, ae uŋun yaŋ teban tok morap da bamɨ toŋ ani do Kristo da “Nak da akeŋ” yaŋ yosok. Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do nin Yesu da manon da Piŋkop dakon man awɨgek “Uŋun asi” yaŋ yomaŋ.
Gen teban da yaŋ yosok: “Yumabi dɨma ani. Amɨn dɨma dapba kɨmotni. Kabo dɨma noni. Ae pɨndak galaktok dɨma ani.” On gen teban gat ae gen teban dɨwarɨ toŋ uŋun gen teban kaloŋɨ kɨnda dagɨn kɨsi tɨmɨkdak. Gen teban uŋun yaŋ: “Gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.”
Yaŋ nandaŋek Pita dam teban yutnon yɨpban kɨlani awit. Mani paŋmuwukbi da Piŋkop da Pita aŋpulugosak do bɨsit pi madepsi awit.
Wusɨŋ dɨma aŋalon aŋ aeni tobɨl Yesu wusɨŋek Jerusalem kɨgɨmal.
ae Sebulan da kabɨkon 12 tausen ae Josep da kabɨkon 12 tausen ae Benjamin da kabɨkon 12 tausen. Uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop dakon tɨlak tɨmɨkgwit.
Mɨŋat eyoni mɨni amɨn gat, ae sakwabat gat do yaŋ yosot. Ji nak yombem ɨsal egɨpni kaŋ uŋun tagɨ.
Pɨlɨn kɨlɨ uŋunjok mudokdɨsak, aŋakwan wɨsa yo kɨsi kɨlɨ uŋunjok dagokdɨsak. Yaŋdo, nin pɨlɨn tuk dakon aŋpak yokwi morap yopmaŋek teŋteŋɨ dakon yo baŋ pasɨk yaŋ paneŋ.
Kɨnda, uŋun mani Kliopas, uŋun da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Dubagɨkon amɨn Jerusalem apgwit da ekwaŋ uŋun da bɨkbɨgon gak kaloŋ dagɨn yo on bɨsapmon noman taŋ uŋun dɨma nandal?”
Yaŋ yaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt dakon galagɨ dɨ pabam. Yo kabɨsi uŋun morapmɨsi kaŋ, uŋun da egɨp egɨp bamɨsi arɨpmɨ dɨma damdaŋ.”
Nido Yawe uŋun Piŋkop tapmɨmɨ toŋsi egɨsak. Uŋun Kɨla Amɨn Madep tapmɨmɨ toŋsi egek amɨn da piŋkopnin yaŋ yoŋ yo morap yapmaŋ mudosok.
Amɨn da Yesu uŋun kɨla amɨn madepnin egɨ nimjak do aŋteban aneŋ yaŋ nandaŋakwa Yesu da butni pɨndak mudagɨt, do yopmaŋek iyɨ gɨn tobɨl ɨleŋon wɨgɨgɨt.
Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ da joŋ kelɨ toŋ tɨmgwan mawit. Uŋun joŋ kelɨ toŋ gat kɨsi kwaŋek wutjɨŋba kɨmak mudawit.
Judas uŋun yoni mɨni amɨn do nandaba kɨk aŋek dɨma yagɨt. Iyɨ uŋun kabo noknok amɨn kɨnda Yesu gat paŋdetni gat dakon moneŋ kɨnam kɨla agɨt, do bɨsap morapmɨ moneŋ yopgwit uŋun Judas da kabo tɨmɨkgɨt.
Piŋkop da yo nim do manjɨgɨt uŋun abɨdok do gen teban yol kɨmotneŋ kaŋ, yaŋ teban tok agɨt do aŋek dɨma abɨdomaŋ. Mani nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun yo morap Abraham do ɨm do kɨlɨ yaŋ teban tagɨt.
Ae Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da wain pini aŋek nagal agɨt. Aŋek uŋun nagalon wain sop bamaŋ tɨl do gapma kɨnda wayɨkgɨt. Aŋek kɨla amɨn da kabo noknok pɨndat do yut dubak kɨnda wɨtjɨŋban wɨgɨgɨt.
