Aŋek uŋun amɨn Sunduk da kɨsiron yɨpba gɨptɨmni aŋtasɨk asak. Yaŋ aba Amɨn Tagɨ dakon bɨsap madepmon Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn dakon wupni yokwikon naŋ tagɨ abɨdosak.
“Yaŋban amɨn tagɨ da oman monjɨ uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak oman monjɨ wagɨl yokwisi! Gaga gen yosol uŋun dogɨn gen pikon gepbeŋ. Nak teban teban amɨn kɨnda ae amɨn da yo yopmaŋgaŋ tɨmɨkdat, ae jap amɨn da kwaokgaŋ uŋun pɨlɨkdat yaŋ nandaŋ namɨsal.
Uŋun telagɨsi ae tɨlɨmni ŋwakŋwarɨsi, do Yawe gawak ɨmni. Amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ, ji nɨmnɨmɨgek pasal ɨmni.
Yaŋdo, nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da amɨn kɨnda do bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨm do nandɨsak kaŋ, bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae amɨn kɨnda aban but teban asak do nandɨsak kaŋ, galaktokni yolek aban but teban asak.
Aŋek Juda amɨn Grik gen yawit uŋun gat gen emat aŋ aŋ awit. Aŋek Sol si aŋakba kɨmotjak do nandawit.
Mani Israel amɨn Moses dakon gen teban yolek mɨŋat amɨn kɨlegɨ egɨp do pi tebaisi awit, mani dɨma kɨlek tawit,
Mani niaŋon da dabɨlɨ sɨŋtak uŋun nit dɨma nandamak. Ae namɨn da dabɨlɨ aban pɨsak, uŋunyo kɨsi nit dɨma nandamak. Uŋun amɨn madep kɨlɨ agɨt, do iyɨnaŋ iyɨŋba kobogɨ tagɨ dayɨsak.”
Jɨgɨ pasat uŋun gak da nandɨsal. Aŋek nak uŋun do jɨgɨsi nandaŋek kunam tagegɨsat. Kunam pakbino niaŋ da moŋ uŋun gak da manjɨŋek papiagokon kɨlɨ mandal.
Kandap da “Nak kɨsit dɨma, do gɨptɨm dakon dɨwatni dɨma” yaŋ tagɨ yosak, mani uŋun gɨptɨm dakon dɨwatni sigɨn tosok.
Piŋkop, nak naga do nandako pɨŋbisi asak uŋun da paret si galak tosol asak. Amɨn iyɨ do nandaba pɨŋakwa but tobɨl aŋ uŋun manji dɨma yomɨsal.
Yɨgek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak tepmɨ dɨma paŋek ji gat on Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noneŋ uŋun do tagɨsi kɨlɨ nandagɨm da sigɨn nandaŋ egɨsat.
Gak da yopbɨ notnoni da manji namgwit. Gak da nepbɨ nak amɨn yokwisi dagaŋapbo madepsi pasal namaŋ. Uŋun da tebai abɨdaŋakwa arɨpmɨ dɨma pulugaŋ kɨkeŋ.
Pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Genesaret mɨktɨmon kɨŋ ɨleŋɨkon wɨgakwan
Aŋek sotni toŋ amɨn paŋmɨlɨp ani, ae amɨn kɨmakbi paba pɨdoni, ae wuda tebani toŋ paŋmɨlɨp ani, ae koŋni toŋ amɨn koŋni yol yomni. Ji yo yumaŋ nogɨ mɨni yumsi tɨmɨkgaŋ, do amɨn do yumsi yomni. Tomni do dɨma nandani.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da yoŋ uŋun da tɨlak Amɨn Tagɨ yo aban noman toni do yaŋ teban tagɨt uŋun ak do yawot yawot dɨma asak. Uŋun amɨn kɨnda pasɨljak do dɨma nandɨsak. Amɨn morap kɨsi but tobɨl ani do nandɨsak, do but yaworon da ji do jomjom aŋegɨsak.
Bɨsap morap amɨn jobɨt yomɨsak, ae top gen yosok, ae amɨn dap do yosok. Yokwi ak do ae jɨgɨ paŋalon ak do gen tepmɨsi yosok.
Nak da pi agɨm dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ. Naga da kɨsit da pi aŋek yo nido wadak wadak agɨm uŋun tɨmɨgek notno pi agɨmaŋ uŋun kɨsi paŋpulugagɨm.
Yaŋbal Yesu bupmɨ nandaŋek kɨsit da dabɨlɨ wɨtjɨŋban uŋudon gɨn sɨŋtaŋek Yesu yolgɨmal.
Ae kaŋakwan sakwabat kɨnda uŋun yoni mɨni, uŋun da moneŋ gɨmanjok bamorɨ paret ɨdapmon yopgut.
Piŋkop da nak iyɨ dakon geni yaŋ teŋteŋok abeŋ do yabekbi pi namgut. Top dɨma yosot, bamɨsi yosot. Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon kɨŋ yoyɨŋdet abo Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek gen bamɨ nandani do aŋek pi uŋun namgut.
Nin telagɨ egɨpneŋdo, kalɨpsigwan mɨktɨm Piŋkop da dɨma wasaŋban noman taŋakwan Yesu gat gadat gadat aneŋ do kɨlɨsi manjɨgɨt. Telagɨsi egek Piŋkop da dabɨlon mɨŋat amɨnyo gulusuŋni mɨni da egɨpneŋ do agɨt.
Do bɨsap noknok dɨma abi. Pɨdaŋek telagɨ pakbi soŋek mani yaŋaki uŋun da dɨwarɨgo wɨrɨrɨk gaban.’
Yaŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji but bamot dɨma aŋek nandaŋ gadat bamɨsi aŋek egɨpni kaŋ, pik kɨndapmon wasok at jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn tagɨ akdaŋ. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, on ɨleŋ pɨdaŋ tap kaga pɨgɨsak do iyɨni kaŋ, yaŋ gɨn akdɨsak.
Nin da Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon tapmɨm madep gat ae tobɨl apdɨsak uŋun do dayɨgɨmaŋ bɨsapmon nin amɨn da nandak nandagon morap gen ɨsalɨ noman tawit uŋun baŋ dɨma dayɨgɨmaŋ. Dabɨlnin da Yesu dakon teŋteŋɨ ae tapmɨmni noman taŋ ɨban kagɨmaŋ.
Abɨsok nin mɨktɨm amɨn Adam yombem da ekwamaŋ. Uŋudeŋ gɨn don Kwen Kokup amɨn Kristo yombem akdamaŋ.
Ji dɨsi nandaŋ, Juda amɨn wɨli dakon gɨptɨm mandaŋek ji do “Gɨptɨmni dɨma mandaŋ amɨn” yaŋ yoŋ. Uŋun amɨn dagɨn gɨptɨmnikon wasok aŋ uŋun do yosok. Pakyaŋsi nandani, kalɨp ji Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon da altawit.
Nak Amɨn Tagɨ do yosot uŋun Wup do yosot. Ae Amɨn Tagɨ dakon Wup amɨn kɨndakon egɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn pulugaŋbi da egɨsak.
Aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “On mɨktɨm madep kɨsi kɨlani aki do yaŋ mudaŋ gabo man madep paki. On mɨktɨm madep kɨsi nak dakon, do amɨn kɨnda do ɨm do nandakeŋ kaŋ tagɨ ɨbeŋ.
Mani Isip dakon kɨla amɨn madep gat ae emat amɨni gat yopban pakbi naŋ kɨmakgwit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Kaŋ abɨdosok bɨsapmon but galak nandaŋek notni gat ae kokup ɨsalni gat yoyɨŋban obɨŋ muwukba yaŋ yoyɨsak, ‘Moneŋno pasɨlak uŋun kɨlɨ wɨsɨŋ kat, do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ano.’ ”
Gak do bɨsit asat bɨsapmon nandaŋ namɨsal. Aŋek tapmɨm namɨŋek butno aŋteban asal.
Aŋek but galak nandaŋek moneŋ dɨ tagɨ gamneŋ yaŋ iyɨwit.
Nak tɨlak gen kɨnda yoko. Gen teban da yosok uŋun da arɨpmon mɨŋat kɨnda amɨn paban eni gat gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ amal. Mani eni kɨmokdok bɨsapmon gen teban da saŋbeŋek dɨma wamaŋdak.
Ji amɨn kokwin aŋ uŋun mɨktɨm da aŋpagon kokwin aŋ. Nak amɨn kɨnda dɨma kokwinɨkdat.
“Yesu, Nasaret amɨn, gak nibaŋ aŋnim do nandɨsal? Nin paŋupbal ak do abɨl? Nak nandaŋ gamɨsat, gak Piŋkop Dakon Telagɨ Amɨni.”
Amɨn mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ geni mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yoŋ, ae gɨptɨmni mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋon da amɨn morapmɨsi da gɨldat kapbɨ ae gɨldat terɨ kɨnda amɨn bamot dakon bumjot pɨndatdaŋ. Ae yum pɨndagakwa amɨn da bumjotni dɨmasi wayɨtni do yokdaŋ.
Yawe gak dagɨn kɨlano aŋaki tagɨsi egɨsat, do yo kɨnda do dɨma pasalek tamokon pokdot bɨsapmon tepmɨsi pak ɨŋtosot.
Gen uŋun nandaŋek nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt. Mani Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Monjɨnoni, amɨn Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨgɨk do aŋtɨdok aŋ.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Pita da pɨdaŋ pɨgɨ amɨn uŋun yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn wɨsaŋ uŋun nak mani. Ji mibɨlɨ nido abeŋ?”
Yoyɨŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nit sɨŋtok do nandamak.”
Nandak nandak amɨn uŋun kɨŋ mudaŋakwa, Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo da Josep dɨpmɨnon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Erot da Monjɨ aŋakban kɨmotjak do wɨsɨkdɨsak, do gak pɨdaŋ monjɨ ŋakŋak gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkbɨ Isip mɨktɨmon pasal kɨni. Isip sigɨn egakwa nak da aesi apni do don gayɨkeŋ.”
Amɨn Tagɨ da ji paŋtagap aban ji kabɨkon ae amɨn morap kɨsikon but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak uŋun madepsi paptaŋ ɨreŋ tosak do nandamaŋ. Nin da ji do madepsi but dasi galak taŋ damamaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon ani dosi nandamaŋ.
Wudɨp madepsi akdaŋ, ae mɨktɨm dɨkon amɨn da jap do madepsi aŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ da kɨmotdaŋ, ae amɨn morapmɨsi sot akdaŋ. Ae kundukon tɨlak masɨ masɨmɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ altaŋakwa pɨndagek pasal nɨmnɨmɨkyo akdaŋ.
Uŋun pi yaworɨsi aŋek geni pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn dakon nandak nandakni paŋmɨlɨp asak. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, Piŋkop da paŋpulugaŋban but tobɨl aŋek gen bamɨ do nandaŋ pɨsoni.
Nak but galaksi nandaŋek yaŋsi nandɨsat: Nak mayaktok arɨpmɨ dɨma pakeŋ. Nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do yoni kaŋ, nak teban taŋek naga aŋpak asat uŋun aŋpak naŋgɨn yolek Kristo aŋkɨsikeŋ. Bo egɨpbeŋ do yoni kaŋ, aŋpak morap asat uŋun da Kristo man madep ɨmjak yaŋsi nandɨsat.
Aŋakwan Parisi amɨn morapmɨ gat Sadyusi amɨn morapmɨ gat telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomjak do Jonon apgwit. Apba pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ dakon gwakni kabɨ, Piŋkop da butjap nandaŋek yokwi pakpak do yo yokwisi aŋ yomdɨsak. Piŋkop dakon butjap apdɨsak namɨn da uŋun dakon but pɨso dayɨk da uŋun yap do pasal kwaŋ?
pɨdaŋ Yesu yolba kokup da waŋga pɨgɨgɨt. Kokup uŋun ɨleŋon tagɨt, do tɨpdomon maba pɨgɨsak do aŋkɨwit.
Kristo da gen teban kɨnda nimgut uŋun yaŋ: Amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, paŋmuwukbi notni do yaŋ gɨnsi asak.
Nandaŋ gadat dakon aŋpak kɨsi yaŋ gɨn. Nandaŋ gadat ɨsal taŋek aŋpak tagɨ kɨnda dɨma noman tosak kaŋ, uŋun yo ɨsalɨ.
Nak Yawe yaŋ iyɨgɨm, “Gak Amɨn Tagɨno. Yo tagɨsi morap tɨmɨkdat uŋun gak da kɨsiron dagɨn abaŋ.”
Pol gat Banabas gat bɨsap dubagɨ Ikoniam egek Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen madepsi yoyɨgɨmal. Aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ da tapmɨm yomɨŋakwan wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ morapmɨ agɨmal. Yaŋ aŋakwal amɨn da Piŋkop asi amɨn do nandaŋ yawok yomɨsak yaŋ nandani do Amɨn Tagɨ da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun yolɨgɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni burɨ yokwi taŋba kaloŋ kaloŋ yaŋ yawit, “Nak dɨma, ma?”
Aŋpulugaŋaki jɨgɨ morapno da dɨma abɨŋ nepgwit. Dabɨl da pɨndagapbo gak da uwalno pabɨŋ yopgul.
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “12 kabɨ jikon kɨnda nak gat bret ɨdapmon sɨbɨŋek nomak uŋun.
Do ni bɨsapmon amɨn morap paŋpulugoki dakon bɨkbɨk pɨsaŋ gaban kaŋ paŋpulugoki. Ae nandaŋ gadat amɨn notji baŋsi pɨndagek paŋpulugonisi.
Yabekbi kabɨ da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ aŋakwa amɨn morapmɨ uŋudon kɨŋ gadaŋakwa mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat dabɨni gat da pɨndagek nandaba yokwi tok aŋ yomgwit. Uŋun amɨn uŋun Sadyusi da kabɨkon nani.
Uŋun amɨn kwen wɨgɨk aŋek amɨn kɨlegɨ do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋyomaŋ, do uŋun top yogok amɨn paŋtasɨk abɨ gen dɨma yoni.
Nin dakon gɨldat tagɨ yɨpno kɨla amɨnji gat ae Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni kɨsikon abɨsak. Ae amɨn kabɨ Itali mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋ apgwit uŋunyo kɨsi gɨldatni tagɨ yɨpba jikon abɨsak.
Mɨŋatjok uŋun yaŋ sigɨn yaŋakwan gɨldat morapmɨ agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan Pol uŋun nandaŋek kuragɨsi nandaŋ tobɨl koŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yesu Kristo da yaŋ dagok aŋnamgut do yaŋsi gayɨsat, gak mɨŋatjok on yɨpmaŋ degek wɨŋ abɨgɨ!” Yaŋ iyɨŋban uŋudon gɨn koŋ mɨŋatjok uŋun yɨpmaŋ dekgɨt.
Ji kɨsi morap sipsip kɨnda pasɨlgɨt da dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek agɨsak uŋun da tɨlak agɨpgwit. Mani abɨsok Sipsip Kɨla Amɨn Tagɨsikon tobɨl apgwit. Uŋun wupji dakon Kɨla Amɨn Tagɨsi.
Nak amɨn 5 tausen do bret 5 kabɨ pɨdaŋ yomgum bɨsapmon, ji jap dɨwat yɨk madepsi niaŋ da sɨmɨlba tugawit?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yɨk madepsi 12 kabɨ.”
Amɨn kɨnda da mɨktɨm dakon yo morap paŋ egakwan egɨp egɨpni pasɨljak kaŋ, uŋun yo morap da niaŋ aŋek aŋpulugoni? Bo egɨp egɨpni aeni abɨdok do tomni ninaŋ yumjak?
Nak abɨsok jikon opbo bɨsap kapbɨ akdɨsak, ae uŋun bɨsapmon kɨsi jɨgɨ dɨma dabeŋ. Nak ji dakon yo kabɨsi tɨmɨt do dɨma nandɨsat, nak dɨsi baŋ tɨmɨt do nandɨsat. Dɨsi nandaŋ, mɨŋat monjɨyo da meŋ datyo paŋpulugok do yo dɨma paŋmuwukgaŋ, meŋ datyo da mɨŋat monjɨyoni paŋpulugok do yo paŋmuwukgaŋ.
Ae mɨŋat amɨnyo dage dage aŋek ekwaŋ uŋun dɨwatni paŋalon aŋyoban tagɨsi yɨkgaŋ. Ae dam tebanon ekwaŋ amɨn pulugaŋban kokupmon tagɨsi ekwaŋ. Mani kwen wugɨk aŋ amɨn mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨm yokwisikon paŋkɨ egɨpdaŋ.
don uwalgo kandap mibɨlgogwan yopbo gengo guramɨtdaŋ.” ’
Meŋ da butgwan pasɨlɨ tamogwan tagok tagok agɨm bɨsapmon gak da pɨndagaki kɨdat morapno tagaŋek notnikon saŋbewit.
Yaŋ aŋek yo wagɨl tagɨsisi ae yo madepsi nim do yaŋ teban tok agɨt. But sulugɨk aŋpak da mɨktɨm amɨn ninon taŋek nin madepsi paŋupbal asak, mani Kristo da nin paŋpulugaŋban aŋpak uŋun tasɨk togɨ uŋun yapmaŋek Piŋkop iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨp ae aŋpak abɨdoneŋ do aŋek yo tagɨsi morap uŋun nimgut.
Amɨn morap telagɨ pakbi soŋakwa Yesu yo kɨsi sogɨt. Soŋek bɨsit aŋakwan kundu wɨtdal kɨgɨt.
Yɨpban agakwan paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek on amɨn monɨŋ but dasi abɨdosok, uŋun nak naŋ but dasi abɨdosok. Ae amɨn kɨnda nak but dasi abɨdosok, uŋun Dat nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun naŋ but dasi abɨdosok. Ji kabɨkon kɨnda da pɨŋbisi egɨ damjak kaŋ, uŋun da mibɨltok amɨnji asak.”
Gɨldat da gɨldat kalba ae kanek da kalbi arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋupbal anjil.
Piŋkop da Sodom gat Gomora gat tasɨk tonjil do yaŋek uŋun kokup bamot soŋbal abɨlakni dagɨn taŋek wagɨlsi tasɨk tagɨmal. Piŋkop da yaŋ aban mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop manji ɨmni amɨn da uŋun do nandaŋek yo yokwisi ninon kɨsi yaŋ gɨn noman taŋ nimdaŋ yaŋsi nandani.
Sonda wɨsa dagokdo pɨlɨn tuk taŋakwan gɨn Maria Makdala kokupmon nani kɨmakbi tamokon apgut. Abɨŋ kaŋban kɨmakbi tamo dakon yoma sopgwit dakon tɨp kɨlɨ aŋtobɨlba kɨgɨt kagɨt.
Yo yokwi kɨnda yaŋ ak, do tagɨ aŋatneŋ yaŋ kɨnda dɨma kawit. Mani Pailat da aŋakban kɨmotjak do madepsi yawit.
Nak paŋmuwukbi morap ji dakon oman amɨn dagaŋek egɨsat, nido Piŋkop da iyɨ nak ji Israel amɨn kabɨkon nani dɨma uŋudon gen morapni yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ do nak manjɨgɨt.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋ. Ae Piŋkop dakon teban tok tosok uŋun kɨsi dɨma kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋ. Uŋun do aŋek ji gen gulusuŋ yoŋ.
Piŋkop dakon kabap uŋun wagɨl tagɨsi ae dubagɨsi. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn da Saion Kabap do but galaksi nandaŋ. Kɨla Amɨn Madep Wukwisi dakon kokup pap uŋun kabapmon tosok.
Butnokon dɨwarɨno tawit uŋun yaŋkwok dɨma agɨm tam, Amɨn Tagɨ bɨsitno dɨma nandaban.
Mukwa sogok amɨn da yo daŋgwi toŋ altakon dapbi uŋun baŋ noŋ. Mani nin altanin ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda tosok. Uŋun altakon mukwa sogok amɨn da jap arɨpmɨ dɨma noknogɨ.
Ae sɨkak kulabɨk aŋek ais gat ae mal gat baŋ yopban pɨwit.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn tagɨni da uŋun oman monjɨ iyɨŋban yo morapni kɨla akdɨsak.
Nak dakon man yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek jɨgɨ pasak uŋun yolɨko pɨndatjak.”
Kundu da Piŋkop dakon tɨlɨmni nolɨsak. Kwen yo morap da Piŋkop uŋun napbɨsap amɨnsi yaŋ nolɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋban yokwi pakpak terɨ kɨnda aŋakbi uŋun da gen tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Piŋkop do dɨma pasoldol, ma? On amɨn da tepmɨ pasak nityo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn pamak.
Yawe, aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot, do aŋpulugaŋaki mayagɨ dɨma pakeŋ. Yokwi pakpak amɨn paŋmayak abi. Aŋaki kɨmakbi tamogwan pagek gen dɨma yoni.
Yaŋba Yesu da nandaŋek yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn sotni mɨni uŋun wuda wamagon dɨma kwaŋ. Amɨn sotni toŋ uŋun dagɨn wuda wamagon kwaŋ. Nak amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ ɨlɨt do dɨma opgum, yokwi pakpak yaŋ ɨlɨt do opgum.”
Amɨn nak gat agɨpgumaŋ uŋun teŋteŋɨ kawit. Mani gen uŋun nayɨgɨt uŋun dɨma nandawit.
Damaskus egɨpgum bɨsapmon Kɨla Amɨn Madep Aretas dakon kɨla amɨni da nak abɨdaŋ dam tebanon nep do aŋek emat amɨni yoyɨŋban kokup pap dakon tɨp dam madep dakon yoma kagakon nak abɨdok do kɨla aŋek akgwit.
Uŋun aŋpagon Telagɨ Wup da yaŋ nolɨsak, telagɨ yut uŋun sigɨn tagɨt bɨsapmon, Yut Burɨ Telagɨsigwan wɨgɨneŋ dakon kosit dɨma pɨsagɨt.
Uŋun meŋ datyo da yawikon da dɨma altawit. Ae amɨn da galak togon da dɨma. Piŋkopmon da altawit.
Kokup pap Tesalonaika egapbo ji da moneŋ ae yo dɨ nak aŋpulugok do bɨsap morapmɨ yopmaŋ namgwit.
Mani Piŋkop da iyɨ dakon gobɨŋ baŋ yamaŋ yomdɨsak. Aŋakwan uŋudon gɨn wuda madepsi noman tokdaŋ.
Amɨn Kwen Kokup da pɨŋ mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn morapyo do egɨp egɨp yomɨsak uŋun Piŋkop dakon bretni.”
Yesu abɨdawit amɨn uŋun Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Kaiapas da yutnon aŋkɨwit. Uŋudon gen teban dakon yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat ae kɨla amɨn gat kɨsi muwukgwit.
Jɨgɨsi nandɨsat, nido nandak nandak bamorɨ asat. Kɨnda uŋun yaŋ: Nak kɨmagek egɨp egɨpno yɨpmaŋek kɨko Kristo gat egɨp do nandɨsat. Uŋun da mɨktɨmon egɨp egɨp yapmaŋek wukwisi asak.
Asisi, bɨt madepsi kamel uŋun da ɨmal bupbup da kosit gwagagon arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨgɨ asak. Mani uŋun yapmaŋek yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pɨgɨgɨ asak.”
Yawe, pabɨŋ yopmaŋaki mayaktok madepsi pani. Aŋek gak tapmɨmgo madepsi yaŋ yokdaŋ.
Yesu uŋun do nayɨkdaŋ yaŋ pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun yat dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do dɨsi gɨn yoŋ, ma? Yaŋ dayɨt, ‘Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok nak saŋbeŋek ae dɨma nandakdaŋ. Ae bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok egek ae donjok nandakdaŋ.’
Yesu da tebaisi yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsak, uŋun amɨn nak kaloŋ naŋgɨn dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsak. Uŋun Dat yabekban pɨgɨm uŋunyo kɨsi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsak.
Yawe uŋun teŋteŋɨno ae yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨno, do namɨn do pasolgeŋ? Yawe da nak aŋkutnosok, do nido pasol pasol abeŋ?
Piŋkop da yaŋ nimgut bɨsapmon niaŋ egɨpgumaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon gɨn egɨpneŋ.
Yaŋgɨn, nin mɨŋat amɨnyo morapmɨ mani nin Kristokon gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ agɨmaŋ. Ae nin kɨsi gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ dakon dɨwatni da ekwamaŋ.
Nin Juda amɨn kabɨkon da altagɨmaŋ. Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ yokwi pakpak kabɨkon da dɨma altagɨmaŋ.
Yaŋsi ani, nido Piŋkop da iyɨ jikon pi asak. Uŋun da geni guramɨtni do ji dakon but paŋtagap asak, ae galaktokni yolni do tapmɨm damɨsak.
Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek dam tebanon yɨp do awit, mani bɨsapni dɨma agɨt do amɨn kɨnda da dɨma abɨdagɨt.
Kɨla amɨn madep uŋun yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun nak dakon pi ani do manjɨgɨm, do aŋpak yokwi dɨma aŋyomni. Nak dakon kombɨ amɨno do yokwi dɨma aŋyomni.”
Jon da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek paŋdetni bamot Yesu yolgɨmal.
Pita uŋun wawi Saimon uŋun da yutnon egɨsak. Wawi uŋun bulmakau gɨp paŋkɨlek ak amɨn kɨnda. Yutni tap kɨdɨpmɨŋon tosok.”
Aŋek gɨldat kɨnda do tap wakga dakon pi monjɨ da tap wakga dakon yoni dɨwarɨ maba pɨgɨwit.
Yaŋakwan Kwen Kokup aŋelo kɨnda da pɨŋ Yesu aŋteban agɨt.
Asisi, amɨn morap Yesu Kristo gat gadaŋek Piŋkop dakon aŋpak ak do nandaŋ, uŋun aba amɨn da yo yokwi aŋ yomdaŋ.
Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Gak don tɨlɨmgo gat yɨkgi bɨsapmon nit kɨnda da gak da amɨn tetdo, ae kɨnda da gwandeŋ tet do yɨtdeŋ do nandamak.”
“Kabɨt. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da aŋpulugaŋek aŋteban asak do dɨma nandagɨt. Uŋun moneŋ yo morapni do nandaŋ gadagɨt, aŋek aŋpak yokwi da aŋpulugaŋakwa tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ yaŋ nandagɨt.”
Gen teban on da gen teban dɨwarɨ yapmaŋ mudosok.
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Mibɨlɨ nido? Ni gulusuŋ naŋ agɨt?” Yaŋban mibɨltok yawit si yapmaŋek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakbɨ kɨmotjak!”
“Kɨŋ altaŋba wain pi dakon kɨla amɨn da uŋun pi monjɨ tɨmɨgek, kɨnda aŋak ukwayɨtyo awit, aŋek kɨnda aŋakba kɨmagakwan, kɨnda tɨp baŋ aŋakgwit.
Ji abɨŋek Yawe da wasok asak uŋun do pɨndakgɨt. Mɨktɨmon wasok masɨ masɨmɨ asak uŋun pɨndatni.
“Ae kɨnda da abɨŋ yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gol moneŋ tabɨlgo oni. Gak teban teban amɨn kɨnda yaŋ gandɨsat. Yo amɨn da yopmaŋgaŋ uŋun gak da sɨgo tɨmɨkdal. Ae jap amɨn da kwaokgaŋ uŋun yo kɨsi sɨgo pasal. Yaŋ asal do pasalek ɨmal dɨwatjok kɨndakon wamaŋ yɨpbo tagɨt.’
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban nandaŋakwa Sol Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn gat Jerusalem egɨpgwit. Egek pasol pasolɨ mɨni agek Yesu da manon Piŋkop gen yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Ji aesi kalɨp Piŋkop dakon teŋteŋɨ abɨdawit bɨsap uŋun do nandani. Uŋun bɨsapmon jɨgɨ tepmɨyo madepsi pawit, mani ji tebaisi akgwit.
“Yaŋ yoyɨŋek egɨ pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo pi ami da kɨŋ pi monjɨ dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Pi monjɨ yaŋ paŋmuwugek moneŋni yobi. Buŋonsi abeŋ uŋudon da wasaŋek yomɨŋaki wɨgɨ mibɨltok abeŋ uŋudon dagosak.’
Uŋun da tɨlak ji abɨsok but yokwi aŋ. Mani aeno dandakeŋ bɨsapmon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Ae amɨn kɨnda da kɨsɨk kɨsɨkji arɨpmɨ dɨma gwayesak.
Piŋkop da yaŋ teban tok aŋ ɨban but bamot aŋek nandaŋ gadatni dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekgɨt. Nandaŋ gadatni sigɨn teban taŋakwan Piŋkop do man madep ɨmgut.
Kalɨpsigwan yo morap ak do nandagɨt uŋun Moses naŋ iyɨgɨt. Ae pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨt uŋun Israel amɨn do yolɨŋban pɨndakgwit.
Pol da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da manon telagɨ pakbi sowit.
Pɨndagakwan gen kɨnda da yaŋ noman taŋban nandagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Pita, gak pɨdaŋ on dapmaŋ na.”
“Mani Piŋkop da iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak nandaŋ kokwingo tagɨ mɨni. Gak abɨsok kalbi kɨmotdɨsal. Yo morapgo gaga do paŋkosit agɨl uŋun amɨn da tɨmɨtdaŋ.’ ”
Gengo da nak aŋpulugaŋban kosit kɨlegɨ agɨpbeŋ dakon lamno asak. Ae kosit agɨpbeŋ dakon teŋteŋno asak.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Jon dakon paŋdetni gat ae Juda amɨn kɨnda gat gen emat awit. Ni kosiron da pakbi soŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon tagɨ kɨlek togɨ yaŋ do gen emat awit.
Yesu Lasarus da sot agɨt uŋun dakon geni nandaŋek kokup egɨpguron gɨldat bamorɨ gat egɨpgut.
Gen uŋun yoyɨŋakwan kɨla amɨn kɨnda da abɨŋ Yesu burɨkon gawak ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwano ongwanjok kɨmokdok, mani gak da kɨŋ kɨsitgo da kwenikon wutjɨŋbɨ pɨdosak.”
Dabɨlgo dakon pakbi mawit, nak uŋun do nandaŋek abɨŋ aeno gandakdosi nandɨsat, aŋek but galaksi nandakeŋ.
Nin Yesu Kristo gat gadaŋek telagɨ pakbi sogɨmaŋ bɨsapmon nin morap kɨsi Yesu gat kɨmot kaloŋɨ agɨmaŋ. Ji uŋun dɨma nandaŋ, ma?
Emat amɨn da Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋagek ɨmalni tɨmɨkgwit. Tɨmɨgek kokwin 4 kabɨ aŋakwa kaloŋ kaloŋ da ɨmalni kaloŋ kaloŋ tɨmɨkgwit. Ae paba pɨgɨk dubakni kɨsi abɨdawit. Paba pɨgɨkni saŋbekni uŋun mɨni ɨmal dɨwat kaloŋɨ naŋ bupbi kawit.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Sipsip kabɨsok, ji dɨma pasolni. Datji da iyɨ Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan egɨpni do tagɨsi nandɨsak.
Uwalno nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do muwugek aŋupbal ak do gen yaŋ paŋteban aŋ.
Ji da dɨma yokdaŋ. Datji dakon Wup da ji da dulumon da yokdɨsak, do pasol pasol dɨma ani.
Yo uŋun Yawe da asak uŋun papiakon mandano babɨ kabɨ don altoni da Yawe da pi uŋun agɨt dakon gen nandaŋek mani awɨgɨni.
Amɨn da uŋun gwak da kwenon yut wɨtjɨni bɨsapmon dɨwarɨ da gol baŋ akdaŋ, ae dɨwarɨ da silwa baŋ, ae dɨwarɨ da tɨp tomni wukwisi baŋ, ae dɨwarɨ da kɨndap baŋ, ae dɨwarɨ da gurɨk baŋ, ae dɨwarɨ da wit dakon obi baŋ akdaŋ.
Nin Piŋkop da ji paŋpulugaŋakwan yokwi kɨnda dɨma ani do bɨsit amaŋ. Ji da nin do Kristo dakon pi amɨn yaŋ nindani yaŋon da gen on dɨma yomaŋ. Ji da nin do pi amɨn toptopmɨ yaŋ tagɨ nandani, mani yo madep uŋun ji da aŋpak tagɨsi baŋgɨn ani do nandamaŋ.
Egek wain naŋ mudaŋba Yesu meŋi da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Wain kɨlɨ mudaŋ.”
Noa da bɨsapmon amɨn egɨpgwit uŋudeŋ gɨn Amɨn Dakon Monji apjak bɨsapmon yaŋ gɨn egɨpdaŋ.
Amɨn da mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo ekwaŋ uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ mudaŋakwa bɨsap madep uŋun apdɨsak.”
Amɨn 12 uŋun gat egɨpni do yabekbi kabɨni tɨmɨkgɨt. Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji yabekgo kɨŋ Piŋkop gen amɨn yoyɨni, ae koŋ yolni do yaŋ mudaŋ dabo koŋ yolni.”
Nin jikon kɨk do nandagɨmaŋ. Nak Pol da jikon kosirɨ morapmɨ kɨk do pini agɨm, mani Sunduk da kosit sopmaŋ nimgut.
Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋatjok uŋun dakon wupmɨ aeni tobɨl abɨŋ pɨgakwan uŋudon gɨn pɨdagɨt. Pɨdaŋakwan Yesu da jap dɨ ɨba nosak do yoyɨgɨt.
Amɨn da yo yokwisi aŋ nimaŋ, mani Piŋkop da nin dɨma nipmaŋ dekdak. Amɨn da nindapba mɨgon maŋ pokgomaŋ, mani nin dɨma tasɨk tomaŋ.
Ae nak nandɨsat, jikon opbeŋ bɨsapmon Kristo dakon gɨsamni nagon madepsi tugaŋ naban uŋun da ji tagɨsi paŋpulugokdɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋek uŋudon gɨn Yesu da amɨn kabɨ madep yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nak do kabo noknok kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋek emat agak sɨba ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋyo tɨmɨgek nak abɨdok do abeŋ, ma? Nak gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan ji gat egek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨm. Uŋun bɨsapmon nak abɨdok do dɨma nandawit.
Piŋkop, yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨnin, kalɨpsi nin tagɨsi egɨpgumaŋ abɨsok paŋkaluk abɨ yaŋgɨn egɨpneŋ. Butjap saŋbeŋek dɨma nandaŋ nibi.
Uŋun da amɨn tagɨsi yaŋ dandani yaŋ do kapmatjok egɨpni bɨsapmon pi tagɨsi dɨ abam. Dɨma. Nin Kristo iyɨ dakon oman monjɨ gɨn ekwamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek butjikon da Piŋkop dakon galaktok yol do but galaksi nandani.
Mani Yesu da yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da ɨgayɨŋ namɨŋakwan tapmɨmno dɨwarɨ kwan nandat.”
Amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak uŋun yaŋ: Nin da Piŋkop do galak taŋ ɨmgumaŋ uŋun da yo bamɨ dɨma agɨt, mani Piŋkop da nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋek Monji yabekban nin dakon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt do kɨmakgɨt.
Mani don monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ kɨŋakwa notni uŋun bɨsapmon jap kelek ekwaŋ.”
Yaŋdo, Piŋkop amɨn manjɨt do nandɨsak kaŋ, amɨn dakon galaktok bo amɨn dakon teban tebanon da dɨma manjɨsak, uŋun bupmɨni do aŋek manjɨsak.
Monjɨ bulagɨ egɨpgum bɨsapmon da wɨŋ abɨsok egɨsaron, jɨgɨ paŋek kɨlɨ uŋunjok kɨmotdɨsat. Gak da yo yokwisi pasol pasolɨsi aŋ namɨŋaki tapmɨmno mɨni asak.
Mani nak naga dakon egɨp egɨp do yo madep kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋek egɨp egɨpno aŋkutnok do dɨma nandɨsat. Nak kosit uŋun agɨsat naŋgɨn agek Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da pi namgut uŋun aŋ mudokeŋ. Pi uŋun Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek yo madepsi ninon asak uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi gayɨsat, abɨsok kalbi pup kosit bamot dɨma yaŋakwan gak da nak do wasɨp kosit kapbɨ yokdɨsal.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da yo asat uŋun abɨsok dɨma nandabɨ pɨsosok, mani don nandabɨ pɨsokdaŋ.”
Yawe, kɨlano abi do gagon obɨsat, do uwalno da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nepbi.
Gak dasi tapmɨm madepgokon da tap pudagɨl, aŋek uŋun tap pakbi kagagwan nugɨm madep mani Liwaiatan uŋun dakon busuŋɨ paŋsulɨkgɨl. Aŋek gɨptɨm tɨmni mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ nɨmani toŋ tɨmon joŋ kɨlap do yobɨ nawit.
Pɨŋakwa kombɨ amɨn kɨnda mani Agabus uŋun da pɨdaŋ agek Telagɨ Wup da aŋpulugaŋakwan yaŋkwok kɨnda yagɨt. “Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ jap mɨnisi akdɨsak,” yaŋ yoyɨgɨt. (Uŋun dakon bamɨ Klodias da kɨla amɨn madep egɨpgut bɨsapmon jap do awit.)
Yesu uŋun tɨlak gen yoyɨŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn yaŋ yobi uŋun da morapmɨsi asak, mani yutnon amɨn tagɨ gat yɨtni do kokwinɨkbi uŋun da tagapmɨ.”
Amɨn dɨwarɨ ɨsal dogɨn uwal aŋ namaŋ. Yum pɨndakbɨ nak abɨŋ nepmaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨ abam. Uŋun ɨsal dogɨn nandaba yokwi tok aŋ namaŋ. Do yum pɨndagaki nak dakon jɨgɨ do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma ani.
Aŋelogo da yolban kɨŋakwa kositni aban pɨlɨn tuk ae sagalegɨyo ani dosi nandɨsat.
Do nandamaŋ, mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit, mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋek yɨk yawot kokupnikon dɨma kɨni do yagɨt.
Uŋudon gɨn gen yogokni pɨsaŋakwan gen wasaŋek yaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsigɨt.
Yaŋ nandagɨl, do moneŋno beŋon yopgul tam uŋun tagɨ. Yaŋ agɨl tam abɨŋ nak da moneŋno gat ae beŋ da dɨwarɨ saŋbesak uŋun gat tagɨ tɨmɨkgom.’
Yaŋ iyɨŋban yo dɨ namdamal yaŋ nandaŋek tebai pɨndakgɨt.
Nak Troas kokup papmon Yesu dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok ak do abɨŋ altagɨm bɨsapmon, Amɨn Tagɨ da geni yoyɨkeŋ do kosit tagɨsi yɨpmaŋ namgut.
Bɨsit aŋwasɨp aŋakwa yut muwukgwit uŋun kwakwalɨkgɨt. Yaŋ aban Telagɨ Wup da amɨn kɨsi da buron pɨgɨ tugaŋ yoban Piŋkop dakon gen pasol pasolɨ mɨni tapmɨmɨ toŋsi yawit.
Ji dɨsi dogɨn nandaba kɨk aŋek yo dɨma ani, bo man madep pak do aŋek yo dɨma ani. Amɨn dɨwarɨ do gawak yomɨŋek man madep yomni.
Do gen teban yolek uŋun kosiron da nin amɨn kɨlegɨ dɨma amaŋ. Pi kɨnda aŋek dɨma, nandaŋ gadat kosiron dagɨn amɨn kɨlegɨ amaŋ, do amɨn kɨnda da iyɨ do dɨma nandaban wɨgɨsak.
Josep uŋun Matatias dakon monji. Matatias uŋun Amos dakon monji. Amos uŋun Naum dakon monji. Naum uŋun Esli dakon monji. Esli uŋun Nagai dakon monji.
Mani padɨk padɨkni jap noknok bɨsap madepmon kɨŋ mudaŋakwa noman da dɨma, pasɨlɨkon da buŋon don kɨgɨt.
Gak da man madep gamni do mɨŋat monjɨyo gat ae monjɨ ŋakŋak gat yoyɨŋ dekdal. Man madep gamɨŋakwa uwalgo da gak abɨŋ gep do aŋtɨdok aŋek gen mapmɨt aŋ.
Uŋun da kwenon sɨŋgɨŋ madepsi kɨnda kwen binap akwan kagɨm. Sɨŋgɨŋ uŋun madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Bupmɨsi, bupmɨsi, bupmɨ madepsi mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ amɨn. Aŋelo kapbɨ kweŋni pɨsokdaŋ, aŋakwa mɨktɨmon amɨn jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ.”
Ekwaŋ bɨsapmon, yoni uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ. Uŋun pi madepsi aŋek yo morapmɨ tɨmɨgakwa mɨŋat amɨnyo da “amɨn tagɨsi” yaŋ yoŋ.
Uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa amɨn kɨmakba yopmaŋgaŋ tamo wɨtdal kɨŋakwa Piŋkop dakon amɨn morapmɨ kalɨp kɨmakba yopbi uŋun pɨdawit.
ae Gebal amɨn, ae Amon amɨn, ae Amelek amɨn, ae Pilistia amɨn ae Tair amɨn, uŋun mɨktɨm morap dakon amɨn da yo uŋun ak do nandaŋ.
Mɨktɨm gat kundu gat tagɨ pasɨljil. Mani gen teban dakon gen jɨmjɨmjok kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pasɨldɨsak. Kɨsisi bamɨ taŋ mudokdaŋ.”
Mani uŋun da mɨktɨm amɨn morap kɨsi yoyɨŋ dekgamal. Geni kɨŋ mɨktɨm morap kɨsi arɨpmɨ asak. Kundukon Piŋkop da gɨldat do ɨmal yut kɨnda wɨtjɨgɨt.
Yaŋ aŋek nap naŋ baljaŋek aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Mani gɨldat kapbɨ mudaŋakwa aeni kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.”
Ae ji Kristo dakon, ae Kristo uŋun Piŋkop dakon.
Don bɨsit aeni aŋakwan kundu da sɨkak yɨpban maŋakwan pigaga jap aeni kwawit.
Amɨn dakon aŋpak kokwin niaŋsi ani, Piŋkop da jiyo kɨsi uŋudeŋ gɨn kokwin akdɨsak.
Piŋkop dakon man madepni dagok dagogɨ mɨni taŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak teban. Uŋun asi.
Uŋun pasɨl egek amɨn kɨlegɨ do obip yamaŋgaŋ. Uŋun dɨma pasolgoŋ, do tepmɨsi yamaŋgaŋ.
Nason uŋun Aminadap dakon monji. Aminadap uŋun Atmin dakon monji. Atmin uŋun Ani dakon monji. Ani uŋun Esron dakon monji. Esron uŋun Peres dakon monji. Peres uŋun Juda dakon monji.
Gapman dakon amɨn madep da abɨsok yo amaŋ dakon geni nandɨsak kaŋ, gen pikon nipjak do nak si pasoldot. Upbalap madep nido ayɨŋ yaŋ niyɨsak kaŋ, nin da gen kobogɨ tagɨ kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨneŋ.” Kɨlda mandak da gen yaŋ yoyɨŋek amɨn muwukgwit uŋun yoyɨŋban kɨŋ mudawit.
Nido Yesu obakon yo tagɨsi morapmɨ tɨmɨkgwit. Paŋpulugaŋban gen yogokji uŋun tagɨsi, ae nandak nandak morapmɨ damgut. Uŋun da nak da Kristo dakon mibɨlɨ dayɨgɨm uŋun ji da nandaŋek yol kɨmakgwit yaŋ nolɨsak.
Ji pakyaŋsi nandani. Yokwi pakpak amɨn da Yesu aŋpak yokwisi aŋ ɨmɨŋakwa tebaisi akgɨt. Ji uŋun do nandaŋek tapmɨm yawot dɨma ani, ae butji dɨma yawotjak.
jikon da kɨnda da yaŋ iyɨsak, “Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan paŋkɨ ŋaŋalɨ egɨpbi, ae kɨŋ jap naŋek butgo tugosak”, mani ɨmal bo jap dɨma ɨmɨsak. Ɨsal gen gɨn iyɨk uŋun da niaŋ aŋpulugosak?
Amɨn abɨŋ muwugakwa Pailat da amɨn da Yesu do nandaba yokwi taŋban top yaŋek gen pikon yɨpgwit yaŋ nandagɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu aŋkutnaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon galaktok namɨn naŋ pulugaŋ yɨpbo jikon opjak, Barabas do nandaŋ bo Yesu mani kɨnda Kristo yaŋ yoŋ uŋun naŋ?”
Amɨn kɨnda suŋ kɨnda aban amɨn da yaŋba yokwi tok dɨma aŋ ɨmgwit, ae aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi, ae burɨkon da nandaŋek gen bamɨ gɨn yosok, uŋun amɨn da tagɨ egɨpjak.
Do Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ kwen wɨgɨk amɨn dakon gen do galak taŋek geni uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ.
Yesu meŋi datni yolban tobɨl Nasaret si kɨŋek bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ meŋi datni dakon geni guramɨkgɨt. Aŋakwan meŋi da uŋun yo morap agɨt do nandaban yo madep aban nandaŋek egɨpgut.
Nin da nandaŋapno on amɨn da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Yesu Nasaret amɨn da Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun tuwɨljak. Ae Moses da aŋpak nimgut uŋun kulabɨk akdɨsak.’ ”
Piŋkop da butjap nandaŋek Israel amɨn dakon monjɨ tebaisi ae tagɨsi uŋun dapban kɨmakgwit.
“Yaŋba nandaŋek amɨn tagɨ uŋun da oman monjɨ uŋun iyɨŋban opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak pi monjɨ yokwi. Gak bɨsit tebai nayɨŋbɨ goman kɨsisi yɨpmaŋ gamɨt.
ae uŋun da nak kɨsɨk kɨsɨk namgwit ae jiyo kɨsi kɨsɨk kɨsɨk damgwit. Uŋuden amɨn da pi madep aŋ uŋun do but galaksi nandaŋek man madep yomni.
Nandaki, gen kaganikon da gen yokwisi da moŋ. Uŋun emat agak sɨba geni tepmɨsi yombem. Mani yaŋ yoŋ, “Namɨn da nandaŋ nimjak?”
“Jon, monjɨno, gak don Piŋkop Wɨkwisi dakon kombɨ amɨn kɨnda yaŋ gayɨkdaŋ. Gak Amɨn Tagɨ mibɨltaŋ ɨmɨŋek kositni yuldɨsal.
Nak ji gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon tapmɨmno mɨni. Nak pasalek madepsi nɨmnɨmɨkgɨm.
Aŋek mɨktɨm tɨmjok kɨnda tap binap tosok uŋun mani Saiprus uŋun kɨsisi agɨ mudaŋek don Papos kokup papmon kɨŋ altawit. Kɨŋ altaŋek Juda amɨn kɨnda kagɨmal. Uŋun amɨn sot wamwam amɨn ae kombɨ gen toptop yogok amɨn kɨnda. Uŋun amɨn mani Ba-Yesu.
Mani nak aŋpak kɨlegɨ gɨn asat. Bupmɨ nandaŋ namɨŋek yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ nepbi.
Aŋek teŋteŋaŋ niban nin kɨsi mɨktɨmon maŋpak mudagɨmaŋ. Maŋ pagek nandaŋapbo Ibru genon da gen kɨnda yaŋ nandagɨm, ‘Sol, gak nido nak aŋupbal ak do pi asal? Gak nak dakon galaktok yol do kurak taŋek gaga naŋ tepmɨ ɨmɨsal.’
Ji pakyaŋsi nandani. Butjɨk Piŋkop da damgut uŋun da jikon aŋpak tagɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ paŋalon agɨt. Uŋun da ji paŋtagap aban jɨgɨsi tepmɨsi paŋmɨlɨp ak do pi awit, ae japmɨ nandaŋek suŋ agɨt amɨn uŋun tebaisi iyɨwit, ae Piŋkop do pasol pasol awit, ae nak nandak do galagɨ nandawit, ae suŋ agɨt amɨn uŋun aŋpakni aŋmɨlɨp ak do pi tebai awit. Ji uŋun aŋpak morap awit uŋun da jikon gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma tosok yaŋ nolɨsak.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep uŋun yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi kaŋek pasalgwit. Aŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yawit, “Mao, Piŋkop da tapmɨm madepsi amɨn do yomɨsak!”
Paŋmuwukbi mɨŋat amɨnyo Babilon ekwaŋ, uŋun mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop da ji gat kɨsi kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt, uŋun da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayaŋ. Monjɨno Mak yo kɨsi da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayɨsak.
Nandani, amɨn ji paŋgalak ak do pi aŋ, uŋun ji paŋpulugoni dakon nandak nandakni mɨni. Uŋun ji da nin nipmaŋ degek uŋun yolni yaŋ do pi aŋ.
Not kabɨ, nandak nandakjikon da amɨn monɨŋ da tɨlak dɨma egɨpni. Amɨn monɨŋ da aŋpak yokwi dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋek ekwaŋ ji uŋun da arɨpmon egɨpni. Mani nandak nandakji uŋun amɨn madep da tɨlagon egɨpni.
Yaŋ aŋakwa uŋun amɨn kabɨ kɨsi da egɨp egɨpni Piŋkopmon tosok yaŋsi nandaŋek jomjom aŋek yo agɨt uŋun do dɨma ɨŋtoni. Aŋek gen teban morapni tagɨ guramɨtni.
Yaŋ kaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Dɨma pudoneŋ. Namɨn da abɨdosak yaŋ do satu wasok aneŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋek yaŋ gɨn aba Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Ɨmalno kokwinɨgek tɨmɨkgwit, ae namɨn da paba pɨgɨkno abɨdosak yaŋ do satu wasok awit.” Do emat amɨn da yaŋ awit.
Ji kaloŋ kaloŋ but kaloŋon da egɨpni. Dɨsi do nandaba dɨma wɨgɨsak. Aŋek amɨn pɨŋbi ekwaŋ gat egɨp do dɨma kurak toni. Ji man pawɨgɨk dɨma ani.
Mani muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn da Sabat bɨsapmon Yesu da amɨn aŋmɨlɨp agɨt uŋun do butjap nandagɨt. Butjap nandaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pi agak dakon gɨldat 6 kabɨ toŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon sot amɨn apba tagɨ paŋmɨlɨp ani. Mani Sabat bɨsapmon dɨmasi ani.”
Nin pakyaŋsi nandamaŋ, nandaŋ gadatnin dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yo madepsi kɨnda. Uŋun kalɨp pasɨlɨ tagɨt mani Piŋkop da aŋnoman agɨt. Gen bamɨ nolɨgɨt uŋun yaŋ: Uŋun amɨn gɨptɨmsi paban amɨn da kawit, ae Telagɨ Wup da uŋun amɨn kɨlegɨsi yaŋ nolɨgɨt, ae aŋelo da kawit, ae amɨn da mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨŋ geni yaŋ teŋteŋok awit, ae mɨktɨm amɨn da nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit, ae uŋun Piŋkop da abɨdaŋ Kwen Kokup awɨgɨgɨt.
Ji dɨsi nandaŋ, nin dakon aŋpak yol kɨmotni kaŋ tagɨsi. Ji gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon, ɨsalsi dɨma egɨpgumaŋ.
Nin ji gat sigɨn egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon jɨgɨ morapmɨ pakdamaŋ yaŋ dayɨgɨmaŋ. Dɨsi pakyaŋsi nandaŋ, yo dayɨgɨmaŋ uŋun kɨlɨ noman tawit.
Sabat kɨndakon Yesu gat paŋdetni gat uŋun wit pi kaga kɨndakon kɨwit. Kɨŋek paŋdetni da wit bamɨ dɨwarɨ jɨmɨk dagawit.
Yaŋ yaŋakwan dam teban yut dakon kɨla amɨn teŋteŋɨ kɨnda aŋopni do yagɨt. Aŋopba abɨdaŋ pasol pasol nandaŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ Pol gat Sailas gat da buron gawagek nandaban wukwan yomgut.
Mɨktɨm amɨn da Piŋkop dakon nandak nandakni dɨwarɨ uŋun tagɨ dɨma yaŋ nandaŋ. Mani uŋun nandak nandak da amɨn dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi yapmaŋ mudosok. Ae Piŋkop dakon aŋpak dɨwarɨ da Piŋkop uŋun tapmɨmni mɨni yaŋ nolɨsak yaŋ nandaŋ. Mani uŋun aŋpakni uŋun tapmɨmni madepsi, amɨn dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋ mudosok.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek koŋni toŋ amɨn da mɨŋgaŋ kwenikon wɨgɨ obɨsi dapmaŋek ɨmalni paŋ dagaŋ yopban yut yɨpmaŋek molaŋ abɨgɨwit.
Tap wakga dakon kɨla amɨn pi madepsi aŋakwa Krit dakon tap kɨdɨpmɨŋ naŋ yolek kɨgɨmaŋ. Kɨŋ don kokup kɨnda mani Tap Waga Tamo Tagɨsi uŋudon kɨŋ altagɨmaŋ. Kokup uŋun kokup pap Lasia da kapmatjok tosok.
Juda amɨn gen uŋun nandaŋek aeni waseŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ awit.
Uŋun da Piŋkop tɨlɨmni toŋ egɨp egɨp teban egɨsak uŋun manji ɨmɨŋek dɨma gawak ɨmgwit. Yum kaŋek amɨn egɨ kɨmak kɨmak amaŋ uŋun dakon wupmɨ gat, ae mɨnam, ae bɨt kɨlapyo gat, ae bɨrombak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dakon wupmɨ wasaŋek gawak yomgwit.
Yaŋ yaŋek kɨsit bamotni ae gekgekniyo yolɨŋban paŋdetni Amɨn Tagɨni kaŋek but galak madepsi nandawit.
Nak asisi gayɨsat, don Kwen Kokup wɨtdal kɨŋakwan kokdɨsal. Kaŋaki Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kabɨ da Amɨn Dakon Monjikon wɨkwaŋ paŋgɨn akdaŋ.”
Yaŋban Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da iyɨ yaŋ nandawit, “On namɨn amɨn kɨnda da Piŋkop kulabɨŋek gen uŋun yosok? Dɨwarɨ yopyop uŋun amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi agagɨ. Uŋun Piŋkop kaloŋ dagɨn asak.”
Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomgumal.
uwalgo dakon tapmɨm pabɨŋ yopbo gak dakon pɨŋbisi egɨpni.’
Mani gen morap gat ae aŋpak morap gat kokwin tagɨsi ani. Aŋek yo tagɨsi baŋ tɨmɨgek
Mani amɨn morap kɨmokgoŋ jiyo yaŋ gɨn kɨmotdaŋ. Kɨla amɨn morap kɨmokgoŋ jiyo yaŋ gɨn kɨmotdaŋ.’ ”
Uŋun do iyɨŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Niaŋ nandaŋ? Galili amɨn kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon yokwini da Galili amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon yokwini yapgut, uŋun do aŋek jɨgɨ uŋun pawit yaŋ nandaŋ?
Yaŋ do aŋek not kabɨ ji yaŋ ani. Disi da kabɨkon amɨn 7 kabɨ manjɨŋba uŋun da jap kokwin pi ani. Amɨn nandak nandakni tagɨsi, ae amɨn da dabɨlon tagɨsi ekwaŋ, ae Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon tugaŋbi uŋuden amɨn baŋ pɨndagek tɨmɨtni. Tɨmɨkba uŋun amɨn do jap kokwin pi yomɨŋek
Amɨn uŋun paŋmuwukbikon dɨma saŋbewit amɨn da kaŋba amɨn tagɨsi asak uŋuden da kɨla amɨn man tagɨ abɨdosak. Kaŋba yokwi asak kaŋ, man yokwi paŋek Sunduk da paron yokwaldɨsak.
Uwalno da mayaktok baŋ ɨmal baŋ yaŋ pani, aŋakwa mɨŋat amɨnyo da mayaktokni uŋun pɨndatni.
Yawe, amɨn da yokwi aŋ nimɨŋakwa jɨgɨsi nandamaŋ, do bupmɨ nandaŋ nibi.
Yoyɨŋba meŋi datniyo da yaŋ yoyɨgɨmal, “Asi, on monjɨ nit dakon, dabɨlɨ mɨni naŋ meŋi da yaŋ aŋalagɨt.
Toktogɨsi amɨn dɨwarɨ jobɨt pani do yagɨt, uŋun gen yagɨt da iyɨ dakon ɨmalni agɨt. Uŋun gen yagɨt da gɨptɨm kaganigwan pakbi da yaŋ pɨgɨsak. Aŋek kɨdarɨgwan bɨt nelak da yaŋ pɨgɨsak.
Nandani, nin yaŋ yomaŋ, “Amɨn butni paŋteban aŋek yaworɨ egek jɨgɨ guramɨkgaŋ uŋun Piŋkop da gɨsamɨkban kɨsɨk kɨsɨksi ekwaŋ.” Jop dakon geni kɨlɨ nandawit. Uŋun butni aŋteban aŋek yaworɨ egek jɨgɨ morap noman taŋ ɨmgwit uŋun guramɨkgɨt. Dɨsi nandaŋ, don Amɨn Tagɨ da aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ ɨmgut. Asi nandamaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ da amɨn nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak, ae bupmɨ madepsi nandɨsak.
Yesukon altaŋek ɨmalni ɨlɨk donki bɨlagɨ da kwenon yopmaŋakwal Yesu pawɨgɨ uŋudon yɨkgɨt.
“Mani Samaria amɨn kɨnda da uŋun kositnaŋ obɨŋ amɨn uŋun kaŋek bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmgut.
Nakyo kɨsi mɨŋat amɨn morapyo da aŋpak si galaktoŋ uŋun baŋ asat. Naga aŋpulugok do aŋek dɨma asat. Mɨŋat amɨn morapyo paŋpulugoko Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak do nandaŋek asat.
Pestus uŋun gat gɨldat 8 bo 10 egɨ mudaŋakwa Sisaria pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgɨ pakgwit da wɨsa dagokdo gen pi aŋ yutnon yɨgek Pol aŋopni do yoyɨgɨt.
Mani amɨn kɨnda ‘Nak Yesu dakon amɨn dɨma’ yaŋ amɨn yoyɨsak kaŋ, nakyo kɨsi Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kabɨnikon uŋun amɨn nak dakon amɨn dɨma yaŋ yoyɨkeŋ.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen yosol uŋun bamɨ. Ji don kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji Tapmɨm Ami da amɨnsi tet do yɨkban kokdaŋ. Aŋek kaŋakwa kundukon gɨkwemon da apban kokdaŋ.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban uŋudon gɨn mɨragɨ pɨsagɨt, ae melɨ tagap taŋek gen kɨlegɨsi yagɨt.
Wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ yolɨŋban pɨndakgwit uŋun do kɨlɨ ɨŋtawit.
Bret Yisni Mɨni Bɨlak wasok wasogɨkon paŋdetni da Yesukon kɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin kɨŋ dukwan Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap paŋkosit aneŋ do nandɨsal?”
Yaŋ asal, do pasalek moneŋgo 5 tausen danari namgul uŋun aŋkɨ mɨktɨm kagagwan yɨpbo tagɨt. Moneŋgo uŋun oni.’
Nak da kalɨp Juda amɨn da aŋpak aŋ ae nandaŋ gadat aŋ uŋun yol kɨmagek egɨpgum dakon geni ji kɨlɨ nandawit. Nak Piŋkop dakon paŋmuwukbi morap paŋupbal abo mɨnisi ani do pi tebaisi agɨm.
Piŋkop da papiakon gen toŋ uŋun bamɨsi gɨn. Kalɨp Piŋkop da amɨn do geni yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋek ji piŋkop yaŋ yoyɨgɨt.
Gol uŋun yo tagɨsi, mani uŋun yapmaŋek gen tebango do but dasi galak tosot.
Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami da amɨn tet do kɨlɨ uŋun yɨtdɨsak.”
Amɨn dakon paŋpulugok uŋun yo ɨsalɨ gɨn, do nin paŋpulugaŋaki uwal gat emat tagɨ wamneŋ.
Nin on mɨktɨm dakon nandak nandak baŋ dɨma tɨmɨkgɨmaŋ. Nin Piŋkop da butgalak do yo morap nimɨsak uŋun nandaŋ pɨsoneŋ do Wup Piŋkopmon da apgut uŋun naŋ abɨdagɨmaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Yaŋ kaŋ nido Telagɨ Wup da Dewit aŋpulugaŋakwan Kristo do ‘Amɨn Tagɨ’ yaŋ iyɨgɨt? Dewit uŋun yaŋ yagɨt:
Nit papia on samɨnin Apia kɨsi do mandamak. Ae Akipus Yesu do aŋek yokwi pabɨŋ yop do nin gat kaloŋɨ emat amaŋ uŋunyo kɨsi do mandamak. Ae paŋmuwukbi Pilimon gak da yutnon muwuk muwuk aŋ uŋun kɨsi do mandamak.
Ji kwen nani baŋgɨn pɨndakgaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nak Kristo dakon amɨn egɨsat yaŋsi nandaŋ teban tosok kaŋ, uŋun amɨn pakyaŋsi yaŋsi nandɨsak, ninyo kɨsi Kristo dakon amɨn.
Ae Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Mɨŋat kɨnda da silwa moneŋ tabɨlɨ 10 kabɨ baŋ kaloŋɨ da yutnon maŋ pasɨljak kaŋ uŋun niaŋ asak? Uŋun da lamni koleŋek yutni ɨkdɨgaŋek tebaisi wɨsɨŋek don kosak.
Burɨ yokwi tawit uŋun paŋmɨlɨp aŋek wudani wamaŋ yomɨsak.
Amɨn yokwi nak aŋupbal ak do pasulɨkon da gen yaŋ paŋkosit aŋ. Aŋek nak nɨt do muwukgaŋ, do kɨlano aŋaki yo yokwi dɨma aŋ namni.
Yawe Piŋkop Tapmɨm Ami, mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo bɨsit gayɨŋakwa bɨsap niaŋ da butjap nandaŋ yobi?
Yesu Kristo, Piŋkop dakon Monji, uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi ɨdon da wasosok.
nin kɨŋ Yesu dakon paŋdet kabɨni pɨndatno uŋun gat gɨldat 7 kabɨ egɨpgumaŋ. Egapno Telagɨ Wup da paŋtagap aban Pol yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak Jerusalem dɨma kɨki.”
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ ji kalɨp Piŋkop dakon gen pabɨŋ yopgwit. Mani abɨsok Israel amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen dɨma guramɨkgaŋ. Yaŋ do aŋek ji bupmɨni abɨdawit.
Nak don egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsat uŋun gak da kɨsiron tosok. Uwalno nak aŋsopmaŋgaŋ uŋun da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nepbi.
Nak amɨn dakon nandak nandak yolek gen on dɨma yosot. Gen teban yo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yosok.
Yaŋ aban wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun agɨt dakon gen bini yoyɨŋba uŋun mɨktɨm dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨsi da nandawit.
Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadaŋek bɨsit ani kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ da sot amɨn uŋun aŋmɨlɨp aŋek aban pɨdokdɨsak. Ae yokwi agɨt kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ da dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨk ɨmjak.
Amɨn morap gat yaworɨ egɨp do pi tebaisi ani. Ae telagɨsi egɨpni. Telagɨ dɨma egɨpni amɨn uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ dɨma kokdaŋ.
Yaŋ agɨt do amɨn da ɨmal dakni paŋobɨŋ Pol da kwenon wɨtjɨŋek paŋkɨ sot amɨn do yoba tɨmɨkgwit. Tɨmɨgakwa sotni mudaŋakwa koŋni wɨŋ abɨgɨwit.
Ji but kaloŋ aŋek jap noknok bɨsap madepmon yɨkgaŋ bɨsapmon uŋun amɨn ji da binapmon yɨkgaŋ uŋun ɨmal kwakwagɨkon garak aŋ uŋun yombem. Mani uŋun ji gat yɨgek jap nok do mayagɨ dɨma nandaŋ. Uŋun amɨn iyɨ baŋgɨn paŋpulugok dogɨn nandaŋ. Uŋun gɨkwem sɨkak dɨma yopba maŋakwa mɨrɨm da pɨsoŋba dukwan dukwan kwaŋ uŋun yombem. Uŋun kɨndap bamɨ toktok bɨsapmon bamɨ dɨma pokgoŋ, ae gelɨ walɨmbɨl pɨlɨkbi, do kosit bamot kɨmakgɨt.
Yawe da yaŋ yosok, “Nak da gayɨŋ degek kosit agɨpbi uŋun golɨkdɨsat. Nawa gen gayɨŋek kɨlago akdɨsat.
Nandaŋ gadatni dɨma teban taŋbi amɨn do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomni.
Paŋkutnosak do Yawekon kɨneŋ kaŋ tagɨsi. Egɨp egɨpnin amɨn kɨndakon tosok yaŋ nandaneŋ kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ dɨma.
“Nak naga sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn tagɨsi. Datno da nak nandaŋ namɨŋakwan nak da Datno nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Uŋudeŋ gɨn sipsipno da nak nandaŋ namɨŋakwa nak da sipsipno nandaŋ yomɨsat. Aŋek sipsipno do aŋek naga dakon egɨp egɨpno parekdat.
Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨldat dabɨl pɨlɨn tuksi agɨt, do 12 kilok aŋakwan mɨktɨm kɨsi pɨlɨn tuk aŋakwan kɨŋ pɨlɨndo 3 kilok agɨt. Aŋakwan Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon yoma ɨmal uŋun kwen da sulugɨ pɨŋ mibɨlɨkon dagaŋ kɨ tɨmɨ bamorɨ agɨt.
Uwalgo da telagɨ yutgokon wɨgek yaŋ tɨdaŋek galak toknikon yo awit. Gak dakon yo kulabɨk aŋek iyɨ emaron teban tawit uŋun dakon tɨlakni baŋ yopgwit.
Pita da gen yaŋakwan gɨn gɨkwem teŋteŋɨni madep da pɨŋ ɨlɨmɨk yomɨŋakwan gen kɨnda uŋungwan da yaŋ noman tagɨt, “Uŋun Monjɨno, but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat, ae uŋun do nandabo wagɨl tagɨsisi asak. Ji geni nandani.”
Kalɨp jap do abo jap dɨma namgwit, ae pakbi do abo pakbi dɨma namgwit.
“Moses da kɨndap wal monɨŋgok sogɨt uŋun do gen mandagɨt uŋun manjɨŋek asisi nandamaŋ, amɨn kɨmoron da pɨdokdaŋ. Moses da Amɨn Tagɨ do yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Uŋun Abraham, Aisak, ae Jekop dakon Piŋkop.’
Yawe mango aŋkɨsisat. Gen tebango nayɨŋ dekgi.
Uŋun da yaŋ yoŋ, “Piŋkop da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋpulugokdɨsak.”
Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn dɨwarɨ gat Jerusalem kokup papmon da obɨŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit,
Amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨm yombem, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋek but galagon da abɨdoŋ.
Mɨŋat monjɨ kwapmɨ toŋ da monjɨ altok do aŋakwa wasaŋek tepmɨ paŋ, yaŋ gɨn uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa bɨsap madep kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandani.
Asi, ji yokwi uŋun pabɨk do emat madepsi awit, mani emat aŋakwa yawisi kɨnda dɨma mawit, don mokdaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋek mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon agek aŋpak yokwi aba Piŋkop da yum pɨndagakwan bɨlak 40 egɨpgwit.
“Saion kokup pap amɨn do gen yaŋ yoyɨki, ‘Kabɨt, kɨla amɨn madepgo abɨsak. Burɨ maŋbi da donki da kwenon yɨgek abɨsak. Donki gɨmoŋɨ da kwenon yɨgek abɨsak.’ ”
Uŋun tepmɨsi tasɨk toŋ. Ae kɨmotni uŋun pasol pasolɨsi ae yokwisi.
Bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ Yapyap Bɨlak bɨsapmon gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn da wasok kɨnda yaŋ agɨt. Mɨŋat amɨnyo da amɨn kɨnda dam tebanon yɨkdak uŋun mani yaŋakwa, Pailat da pulugaŋ yopban kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
Bɨsap kɨndakon jap kelek egek Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨŋek egɨpgwit. Yaŋ aŋakwa Telagɨ Wup da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Banabas gat Sol gat manjɨŋ yopba pi anjil do nandɨsat uŋun anjil.”
Yawe ya yaŋ iyɨŋek kap yaŋ ɨmno. Gita tɨdaŋek Piŋkopnin aŋkɨsino.
Yopbɨ iyɨ pat yɨpgwiron iyɨ yokwalni. Mani nak kosit tagɨsi agek yo kɨnda da dɨma aŋupbal asak.
Not kabɨ, nak jikon obɨŋek gen ŋwakŋwarɨkon da gen dayɨkeŋ kaŋ, niaŋon da gen uŋun da ji paŋpulugosak? Mani Piŋkop da gen pasɨlɨ nolɨgɨt uŋun dayɨkeŋ, bo nandak nandak tagɨsi dɨ dayɨkeŋ, bo kombɨ gen kɨnda dayɨkeŋ, bo dayɨndet abeŋ uŋun da ji tagɨsi paŋpulugosak.
Ae amɨn uŋun tɨlak agɨt uŋunyo kɨsi yaŋ yomgut. Ae amɨn uŋun yaŋ yomgut uŋun mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨlegɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt. Ae amɨn uŋun kɨlegɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt uŋun tɨlɨmni yomgut.
Piŋkop manji ɨmɨŋek yokwi aŋ amɨn morap uŋun kɨmakbi kokupmon paŋkɨ egɨpdaŋ.
Jap noknok tamokon ae muwut muwut yutnikon amɨn mani toŋ da yɨkgaŋ tamokon yɨt do galak toŋ.
“Nak amɨn da man madep namni do gen uŋun dɨma yosot.
Uŋudon tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgwit. Amɨn bamorɨ kɨsi tɨlak kɨndap terɨ terɨ dapmaŋakwa Yesu binapmon akgɨt.
Ae amɨn morap da yo kabɨgo yobi do gayɨŋba kaŋ yobi. Ae amɨn kɨnda da yogo kɨnda abɨdaŋ aŋkɨsak kaŋ, aŋtobɨl gamjak do tebai dɨma iyɨki.
Kɨla amɨn madep da egɨp egɨpni Yawekon tosok yaŋsi nandɨsak. Piŋkop Wukwisi, uŋun da kɨla amɨn madep do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsak, do tebaisi atdɨsak.
Mani Yesu da yo agɨt dakon geni sigɨn kɨŋ ɨreŋ tagɨt. Aŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da geni nandak do opgwit. Ae sotni paŋmɨlɨp aŋyomjak do opgwit.
Abɨŋ nandaba amɨn bamot da Yesu kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt ae amɨn kɨmakbi yaŋ gɨn pɨdokdaŋ uŋun do yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨmal. Yaŋ aŋakwal amɨn bamot do nandaba yokwi tok awit.
Paŋdetni gen uŋun nandaŋek mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek madepsi pasal nɨmnɨmɨkgwit.
Yawe mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni tapmɨm yomɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek gɨsamɨgakwan yaworɨsi ekwaŋ.
Nak Egɨp Egɨp Egɨsat Amɨn. Nak kɨmakgɨm, mani koki, nak egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨ aŋaŋ kɨsat. Kɨmot dakon yoma wɨtdal, ae amɨn kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon kokup dakon yoma wɨtdal kɨsitnokon toŋ.
Ji nandaŋ, Kristo uŋun dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt do abɨŋ noman tagɨt, ae iyɨkon dɨwarɨni mɨnisi.
Amɨn kɨnda gɨldat kɨnda do uŋun gɨldat telagɨsi yaŋ nandaŋek uŋun gɨldat da gɨldat dɨwarɨ yapmaŋdak yaŋ nandɨsak. Ae amɨn kɨnda da gɨldat morap kɨsi arɨp gɨn yaŋ nandɨsak. Amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ uŋun butnikon da ni nandak nandak naŋ abɨdosok uŋun tebai abɨdaŋek atjak.
Amɨn da aŋpakni uŋun yokwisi yaŋ kaŋ nandaŋyo ani do aŋek Piŋkop da gen tebani yoban abɨdawit. Mani amɨn da yokwi morapmɨsi aba yokwi awit da arɨpmon Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawot madepsi aŋ yomgut.
Yaŋsi noman toni do nandaŋek nak tapmɨm morapno taŋ namɨŋakwa pi tebaisi asat. Kristo da iyɨ uŋun tapmɨm paŋalon namɨŋakwan pi uŋun asat.
Kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda uŋun emat amɨni morapmɨ da uwalni arɨpmɨ dɨma pabɨŋ yopni. Ae emat amɨn kɨnda uŋun iyɨ da tapmɨmon da uwalni da kɨsiron da arɨpmɨ dɨma pasal kɨsak.
Uŋun nak da manjikon noldak. Nak yombem yokwi da kandap gwɨl napni tagɨ dɨma wɨtdalgeŋ.”
Aŋakwa paŋdetni da pɨndagek tamtam yaŋek iyɨwit, “Pik kɨndap niaŋon da tepmɨ kɨbɨdak?”
Bɨsap kɨndakon nin bɨsit agak tamokon kɨgɨmaŋ. Kɨno oman mɨŋatjok kɨnda kosiron apban domdom agɨmaŋ. Uŋun mɨŋatjok koŋni kɨnda taŋ ɨmɨŋakwan yo don altoni uŋun do yaŋkwok agɨt. Amɨn da opba yo don altoni dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋakwan kɨla amɨni da moneŋ madepsi tɨmɨkgwit.
Mɨktɨm wudɨp aŋakwan mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun yaworɨ dɨma ekwaŋ. Mani mɨktɨm dakon mibɨlɨ tebai abɨdaŋapbo tebai tosak.
Jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn. Ji gen ŋwakŋwarɨ yaŋakwa niaŋon da amɨn da gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandaba pɨsoni? Gen yaŋba ɨsalɨ akdaŋ.
Kosiron kɨŋakwa amɨn kɨnda da iyɨgɨt, “Dukwan dukwan agɨpbi uŋun nak gol awɨlgeŋ gɨn.”
Ji kɨŋ Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandaŋ kɨmotni. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Ji da paret aŋ uŋun do dɨma galak tosot. Ji da amɨn do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomni uŋun do galak tosot.’ Gen yaŋ tosok, do nandani, amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ ɨlɨt do dɨma pɨgɨm. Yokwi pakpak amɨn yaŋ ɨlɨt do pɨgɨm.”
Nak jikon Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋek uŋun dakon tomni dɨma tɨmɨkgɨm. Yaŋ aŋek nak ji dakon man pawɨgɨk do aŋek naga do nandako pɨgɨt. Yaŋ agɨm uŋun yokwi agɨm yaŋ nandaŋ, ma?
Amɨn Tagɨ, oman amɨngo nak do nandaki. Amɨn da nak do yaŋsul aŋ namaŋ. Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon manji gen yokwini dakon jɨgɨ ɨmekdat.
Yawe da nak aŋkɨlek ak do yo yokwisi aŋnamgut, mani yum nandaŋakwan dɨma kɨmakgɨm.
Nin monjɨ gwayonin do gen uŋun dɨma paŋkɨsɨbɨneŋ. Monjɨ gwayonin uŋun yoyɨneŋ. Piŋkop dakon tapmɨmni gat ae pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨt gat ae wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ agɨt uŋun do yoyɨneŋ.
Yesu yagɨt da arɨpmon Piŋkop da kɨlɨ aban pɨdak. Ɨdon dɨma egɨsak. Abɨŋ tamoni do konjil.
Yesu da amɨn telagɨ pakbi soŋ yoban paŋdetni morapmɨsi awit, yaŋ Parisi amɨn da gen bini nandawit. Jon da paŋdet tɨmɨkgɨt dakon tɨlakni uŋun yapgut yaŋ amɨn da yaŋba nandawit. (Yesu iyɨ telagɨ pakbi dɨma soŋ yomgut, paŋdetni da soŋ yomgwit.) Yesu da Parisi amɨn da gen bino kɨlɨ nandaŋ nameŋ yaŋ nandaŋek Judia Provins yɨpmaŋek tobɨl aeni Galili Provinskon kɨgɨt.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban boron wɨgakwal mɨrɨm dagagɨt.
Mani nak da naga yokwikon palɨ magɨm. Nak kandapno sagalek yaŋ nɨkban maŋek nandaŋ gadatno palɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgɨm.
Piŋkop da nin do yaŋsi agɨt, do Piŋkop gen papia da yosok uŋun da arɨpmon aneŋ. Yaŋ yosok: “Amɨn kɨnda yo kɨnda do yo madepsi yaŋ nandak do kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ dogɨn yo madepsi yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmdo.”
Yaŋ yaŋakwan tɨp madep aba kɨŋakwan Yesu kwen sɨŋtaŋban wɨgakwan yaŋ yagɨt, “Dat, gak bɨsitno kɨlɨ nandal, do ya yaŋ gayɨsat.
Mani ji but kalɨp aŋpagon dɨma ekwaŋ. Piŋkop dakon Wupni asi jikon egɨsak kaŋ, Telagɨ Wup da ji dayɨŋ pawɨlakwan ekwaŋ. Kristo dakon Wupni mɨni amɨn uŋun Kristo dakon amɨn dɨma.
Gak aŋpak kɨlegɨ do dɨma galak tosol. Aŋpak yokwi dogɨn galak tosol. Gak gen bamɨ yogok do dɨma galak tosol. Top yogok dogɨn galak tosol.
Yoyɨŋ mudaŋbal but kaloŋon da Piŋkop bɨsit yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ Tapmɨm Ami, kundu ae mɨktɨm ae tap ae yo morap uŋungwan toŋ uŋun kɨsi gak da wasaŋ yopgul.
Mani Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop dakon papia da gen kɨnda gat yaŋ yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji dakon tapmɨm kok do aŋek dɨmasi aŋkewaldo.’ ”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak yaŋ gayɨsat, yokwini kosirɨ 7 kabɨ dɨma, yokwini yopmaŋ ɨbɨ kosirɨ 77 kabɨ yaŋ asak.
Mukwa sogok mibɨltok amɨn uŋuden da nin tagɨsi paŋpulugosak. Uŋun telagɨ egɨsak, ae gulusuŋni kɨnda dɨma taŋ ɨmɨsak, ae Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi. Uŋun Piŋkop da yokwi pakpak da dubagɨkon kwensi ason Kwen Kokup yɨpgut da egɨsak.
Sabamno uŋun jap bamɨsi ae yawino uŋun pakbi bamɨsi, do amɨn kɨnda nak dakon sabamno ae yawino nosak kaŋ, egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpjak. Aŋakwan mibɨ gɨldaron kɨmoron naŋ abo pɨdosak.
Yaŋ yaŋakwal mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da pɨdaŋ agek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yoyɨki? On amɨn morap gen yaŋ gaba niaŋ nandaŋ yomɨsal?”
Piŋkop uŋun but dasi galak taŋ yomyom dakon ami, do amɨn kɨnda amɨn do but dasi dɨma galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmɨsak.
Piŋkop da dɨ dapban kɨmakgwit bɨsapmon dɨwarɨ but tobɨl aŋek tobɨl abɨŋ yolgwit.
Piŋkop da yaŋ abeŋ yaŋ kɨlɨ nandagɨt, do amɨn uŋun ji da kɨsiron yɨpgut. Yɨpban ji da amɨn yokwi da kɨsiron yɨpba uŋun da abɨdaŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt.
Nak da tagɨsi yɨtni do yosot bɨsapmon uŋun emat gɨn ak do nandaŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda da Yesu do asi Piŋkop dakon Monji yaŋ yosok amɨn Piŋkop uŋun amɨnon egɨsak, ae uŋun amɨn Piŋkopmon egɨsak.
Iyɨŋba nandaŋek Yesu uŋun boron wɨgakwan amɨn koŋ gat egɨpgut uŋun da Yesu yol do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt.
Ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ amɨn gat kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani, ae kunam takgaŋ amɨn gat kunam tatni.
Uŋun bɨsapmon gen teban yapyap amɨn da noman tokdɨsak. Noman taŋban Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da iyɨ dakon gen mɨgan naŋ aŋakban kɨmotdɨsak. Amɨn Tagɨ tɨlɨm gulgwani gat abɨŋ noman taŋek uŋun dakon teŋteŋɨ da gen teban yapyap amɨn obɨsi aŋupbal akdɨsak.
Mibɨltok Kristo da gen teban da paret ani do yosok uŋun do yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak amɨn da yo daŋgwi toŋ baŋ dapmaŋ mukwa soŋek paret ani do dɨma galak tagɨl, ae mukwa sogok dakon yo kɨndapmon wagɨl sosoŋ gat ae yokwi wɨrɨrɨt dakon mukwa sosoŋ uŋun kɨsi do gak dɨma galak tagɨl.” (Mani Moses dakon gen teban da anisi do yosok.)
Nak Piŋkop da yawi dɨwat kabɨno Israel amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjaksi do nandɨsat. Do nak dakon galaktok uŋun yaŋ: Kosit dɨ yaŋ toŋ tam nak da naga jobɨt tɨmɨgek Kristo yɨpmaŋ degapbo Israel amɨn da nak dakon tamo abɨdaŋbam.
Piŋkop dakon pi asak do gak amɨn kɨnda da kwenon kɨsitgo tepmɨsi wutjɨk do dɨma nandaki. Amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon yokwi da gagon dɨ tegaŋbam. Gak gaga do kɨla tagɨsi aŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi egɨpbi.
Mani emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn da Pol aŋkutnaŋek dɨma dapba kɨmotni do nandagɨt, do dɨma dapni do emat amɨn yaŋsop aŋyomgut. Aŋek tap pudaŋ nandaŋ amɨn tap pakbigwan maŋek uŋun da kalɨp ɨleŋon wɨgɨni do yoyɨgɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egek bɨsit pi awit. Aŋ mudaŋek kɨsitni amɨn bamot da kwenon wɨtjɨŋek yabekba kɨgɨmal.
Amɨn jap nawit uŋun 5 tausen yaŋ da nawit.
Aŋakwan Yesu da yagɨt, “Namɨn da ɨgayɨŋ namɨk?” Yaŋban amɨn morap nin dɨma dɨma yaŋakwa Pita da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, amɨn morapmɨsi da gak gat gadat gadatsi akwaŋ.”
Nak Taitus jikon opjak do tebaisi iyɨko opgut, ae uŋun notnin kɨnda gat kɨsi yabekgo opgumal bɨsapmon Taitus da galaktokni yolni do pasɨlɨkon da ji paŋkɨlɨgek yo kabɨsi tɨmɨkgɨt? Uŋun dɨmasi! Taitus gat nit nandak nandaknit kaloŋɨ ae aŋpaknit kaloŋɨsi gɨn.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨŋ ego iyɨŋbɨ tobɨl apjil.”
Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn notni dakon nandak nandak arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨndatjak. Amɨn uŋun dakon wupni butnigwan yɨkdak uŋun dagɨn pɨndakdak. Yaŋgɨn, amɨn kɨnda da Piŋkop dakon nandak nandak arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨndatjak. Piŋkop iyɨ dakon Wupni da iyɨ gɨn kaŋ nandaŋyo asak.
Nin Malta mɨktɨm tɨmon kanek kapbɨ egɨpgumaŋ. Egek don tap wakga kɨnda abɨdaŋek kosit wasagɨmaŋ. Uŋun tap wakga ais bɨsapmon uŋudon paŋabɨŋ akgɨt. Tap wakga uŋun Aleksandria kokup pap dakon. Tomnikon kokup kɨdat Sus dakon monjɨ bamotni uŋun yayat dakon wupmɨ pasɨŋ yopbi.
Isip mɨktɨmon babɨknin gak da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨl uŋun do pakyaŋsi dɨma nandawit. Gak da bɨsap morapmɨ aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomgul, mani uŋun do si ɨŋtawit. Aŋek Tap Gamikon kɨŋ altawit bɨsapmon gak kwen wɨgɨk aŋ gamgwit.
Nak mɨŋat eyo dɨma awit amɨn do Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban kɨnda tosok do dɨma dayɨkdɨsat. Mani naga dakon nandak nandak baŋ yokdɨsat, nido Amɨn Tagɨ da bupmɨ nandaŋ namɨŋek aŋtagap aban gen bamɨ yogok amɨn dagagɨm.
Mani nin Kristo tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt dakon geni dayɨŋ teŋteŋomaŋ. Aŋapno Juda amɨn da gen uŋun do nin da dɨma galak taŋek abɨdogɨ gen kɨnda naŋ yoŋ yaŋ nandaŋ. Ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da gen uŋun do nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn dakon gen kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ.
Amɨn uŋun yoni morapmɨ taŋ ɨmgwit, do gen uŋun nandaŋ burɨ jɨk taŋban si kɨgɨt.
Yawe aŋkɨsineŋ. Uŋun Israel amɨn nin dakon Piŋkop abɨsok ae don egɨ aŋaŋ kɨneŋ kɨsi dakon. Amɨn morap kɨsi da yoni, “Uŋun asi!” Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Ji Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit, aŋakwa Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni dogɨn aŋek Piŋkop da ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt. Uŋun ji da dɨsi dɨma awit. Piŋkop ɨsalsi but galak do ji do agɨt.
Niaŋɨ? Nak gen bamɨ dayɨŋek uwalji dagagɨm, ma?
Yaŋ aŋek egakwa monji mibɨltogɨ pigaga egɨpgut da yutnon obɨŋ aŋkapmat aŋek nandaban amɨn da kap kɨsɨk kɨsɨkyo awit.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi yolakwa Yesu da tobɨlek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Uŋun gen dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ. Amɨn da monjɨ paŋalaŋ uŋudeŋ altoŋ amɨn morap kɨsi da Piŋkop dakon gwakni dɨma. Monjɨ morap yaŋ teban tok kosiron da altaŋbi uŋun dagɨn Abraham dakon babɨkni.
Tebaisi atni, nido Piŋkop gen papia da yaŋ yosok: “Asi, bɨsap dubak dɨma, amɨn uŋun apdɨsak kɨlɨ uŋunjok apdɨsak. Ae tepmɨsi apdɨsak.
Mɨŋat eyo kɨlɨ abi do gen teban on damɨsat. Uŋun nak dakon gen teban dɨma, uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban. Uŋun yaŋ: mɨŋat da eni dɨma yɨpmaŋdetjak.
Mani gen paŋtobɨl amɨn mɨni kaŋ, gen ŋwakŋwarɨkon da gen yogok amɨn gen dɨma yosak. Gen iyɨ gat ae Piŋkop gat dogɨn yosak.
Amɨn da yubam tam, moneŋ madepsi tɨmɨk yoni mɨni amɨn do yomnom.” Yaŋ yaŋek mɨŋat uŋun gen tebai iyɨwit.
Aŋek kokup pap bo kokup monɨŋ ae dukwan dukwan kɨgɨt amɨn da sot amɨn muwut muwut tamokon uŋudon paŋabɨŋ yopgwit. Aŋek paba pɨgɨk dɨwatnikon ɨgayɨni do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit. Yaŋ ɨgayɨwit amɨn uŋun kɨlek taŋ mudawit.
Yawe da Israel mɨktɨm dakon kokup morap do galak tosok, mani Jerusalem do madepsi but dasi galak tosok.
Yo morap dɨma noman taŋakwa Kristo kɨlɨ egɨpgut. Ae yo morap iyɨ da kɨsiron da kɨla aŋakwan kosirɨkon toŋ.
Sisa Ogastus da gen teban yaŋ yɨpgut, do amɨn kɨsisi mani mandani do kokupni kokupni kɨŋ mudawit.
mani ɨmalni naŋ kukwaŋek pasal molaŋ molaŋ kɨgɨt.
Nak amɨn kɨnda gen arɨpmɨ dɨma nandagɨ, ae kobogɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma yogogɨ yombem.
“Nak abɨsok Piŋkop da kɨlasi asak do uŋun da kɨsiron depmaŋdat. Nandaŋ yawotni dakon geni da ji paŋteban aban yoni tagɨsi telagɨ amɨn kabɨni do yopbi uŋun tagɨ tɨmɨtni.
Jap naŋ yɨgakwa Yesu da bret kɨnda abɨdaŋ, Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek, pudaŋ paŋdetni do yomgut. Yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Tɨmɨgek noni, on nak dakon gɨptɨm tɨmno.”
“Not kabɨ, kalɨpsigwan Telagɨ Wup da Dewit aŋtagap aban Piŋkop da papiakon Judas do gen kɨnda mandagɨt uŋun gen bamɨ toŋ agɨt. Judas uŋun Yesu aŋnoman aŋyoban obip amɨn da abɨdawit.
Do yaŋsi nandani, amɨn kɨnda ɨsal nandaŋ gadat dogɨn Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ dɨma iyɨsak. Amɨn kɨnda aŋpak kɨlegɨ asak uŋun do nandaŋek amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨsak.
Aŋelo mibɨltok akgɨt uŋun da kweŋni pɨsoŋakwan ais ae kɨndap ae yawi gat paŋkolop abi gat kɨsi mɨktɨmon mawit. On mɨktɨm daman ae kɨndapyo kokwin aba kabi kapbɨ aŋakwa mɨktɨm kabi kɨnda sogɨt, ae kɨndap dakon kabi kɨnda sogɨt. Ae joŋ kaluk kalugɨ kɨsisi soŋ mudawit.
Yaŋdo, tomni abɨdokeŋsi yaŋ nandaŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek dukwan dukwan dɨma wɨsɨŋek tɨlagonsi kɨsat. Amɨn da kɨsit emat dakon aktɨdok tagɨsi aŋ uŋun da tɨlak kɨsitno ɨsal tɨmon dɨma dapmaŋdat.
Uŋudon da wɨsa dagokdo Mitilini yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm kɨnda mani Kios kapmatjok taŋban kaŋek yapgumaŋ. Ae gɨldat kɨnda do tap uŋun pudaŋ yapmaŋek Samos kokup papmon kɨŋ altagɨmaŋ. Ae uŋudon da wɨsa dagokdo Miletus kokup papmon kɨŋ altagɨmaŋ.
Piŋkop dakon gen teban kɨlegɨ da aŋpak yokwi uŋuden aŋ amɨn si kɨmotni do yosok uŋun nandaŋ, mani yum kaŋek uŋun aŋpak yokwi morap sigɨn aŋ. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, amɨn dɨwarɨ da uŋun aŋpak yokwi aŋakwa si joŋɨkgaŋ.
Opgut da mɨktɨmnikon tobɨl kɨk do aŋek bɨt madep os da amɨn ɨlɨk pawɨlgaŋ tamokon yɨkgɨt. Yɨgek kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da gen mandagɨt papia uŋun manjɨgɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋakwan tɨp tɨmɨgek aŋakba kɨmotjak do nandawit. Mani Yesu uŋun pasɨlek Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon nagal yɨpmaŋek waŋga kɨgɨt.
Amɨn Tagɨ da kapmon ae koŋ da kapmon kɨsi noni kaŋ, uŋun ma abisi aŋ. Ae Amɨn Tagɨ da tamokon ae koŋ da tamokon kɨsi jap noni kaŋ, uŋun yo kɨsi ma abisi aŋ.
Uŋun da mibɨlno nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn geno guramɨkgaŋ. Mɨktɨm dubagɨkon amɨn da nak do pasalek abɨŋ ŋwakbeŋ aŋ namaŋ.
Mani Adamon da wɨŋ Moses da bɨsapmon amɨn yokwi awit do kɨmot da mɨŋat amɨn morapyo tɨmɨkgɨt. Dɨwarɨ Adam da Piŋkop dakon gen ɨrakgɨt uŋudeŋ dɨma awit, mani kɨmot da uŋunyo kɨsi tɨmɨkgɨt. Adam uŋun Yesu don altosak dakon tɨlak agɨt, nido Adam da yo agɨt uŋun dakon bamɨ mɨŋat amɨn moropyo kɨsikon ɨreŋ tagɨt.
Kalɨp tagɨsi egɨpgul do nandaki. Gak kɨlɨ mal. Do aŋpak kalɨp agɨl uŋun do aego nandaŋek but tobɨl aŋek aŋpak kalɨp agɨl uŋudeŋ abi. Yaŋ dɨma abi kaŋ, abɨŋ lamgo uŋun si gwayekeŋ.
Uŋun jɨgɨ paŋek kɨmoronsi kɨgɨmaŋ, mani Piŋkop da kɨmoron baŋ paŋpulugagɨt, ae don yo kɨsi nin jɨgɨkon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak. Jɨgɨ morap noman taŋ nimni bɨsapmon Piŋkop da nin jɨgɨkon baŋ paŋpulugokdɨsak yaŋsi nandaŋ teban tomaŋ.
Yesu da nandak nandakni uŋun pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido butjikon da nandak nandak uŋun nandaŋ namaŋ?
Amɨn morapmɨ da yaŋ yoŋ, “Namɨn da nin paŋpulugaŋban tagɨsi egɨpneŋ?” Yawe, butgo ninon yɨpmaŋek yo tagɨsi aŋ nibi.
Sadyusi amɨn da Yesu aŋkewal do iyɨŋba gen tagɨsi yaŋakwan kobogɨ iyɨk do dɨma nandawit. Parisi amɨn da uŋun nandaŋek Yesukon opgwit.
Yaŋ awit, do Yesu Juda amɨn da bɨkbɨgon noman dɨma agɨpgut. Aŋek uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋon uŋun da kapmatjok kokup kɨnda mani Epraim uŋudon kwan paŋdetni gat egɨpgwit.
Amɨn bamot yaŋ yaŋek uŋudon gɨn tobɨl Jerusalem kɨgɨmal. Kɨŋ paŋdet 11 kabɨ gat ae notni dɨwarɨ gat muwuk egɨpgwit uŋun pɨndagakwal
Ae Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo nin amɨn dɨwarɨ da aŋ uŋudeŋ muwut muwutnin dɨma yɨpmaŋ detneŋ. Ji nandaŋ, Kristo dakon abap bɨsapni kɨlɨ abɨŋek kapmat tosok, do nin kaloŋ kaloŋ amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon but paŋteban ak do pi madepsi aneŋ.
Gulusuŋ at yaŋsi nandɨsat. Uŋun gulusuŋno toktogɨsi taŋba nandɨsat.
Mani amɨn morapmɨ abɨsok mibɨltok ekwaŋ uŋun da buŋon amɨn akdaŋ. Aŋakwa amɨn morapmɨ abɨsok buŋon ekwaŋ uŋun da mibɨltok amɨn akdaŋ.”
Yawe, gak da yo morapmɨ wasagɨl. Gak nandaŋ kokwin aŋek yo morap uŋun wasagɨl. Gak da yo morap wayɨŋ aŋek ekwaŋ wasagɨl uŋun on mɨktɨmon tugaŋbisi.
Mani Kristo da but galak do yo madepsi nimgut uŋudeŋ gɨn Piŋkop da nin morap kaloŋ kaloŋ do nandaŋ yawotni nimɨŋ nimɨŋ agɨt.
Teŋteŋɨ madep uŋun teŋteŋaŋ naban dabɨlno pɨlɨn tagɨt do amɨn agɨpgumaŋ uŋun da nak kɨsitnokon da abɨdaŋ Damaskus abɨgɨwit.
Ae mibɨltok amɨn jiyo kɨsi oman monjɨsi do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomni. Pasol pasol yomyom aŋpak uŋun yɨpni. Amɨn Tagɨ Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun ji ae uŋunyo kɨsi dakon Amɨn Tagɨ. Uŋun da mɨŋat amɨn morapyo kɨsi dakon aŋpak tɨlak kaloŋɨkon gɨn kokwinɨkdak.
Gen kɨlegɨsi baŋgɨn yoki kaŋ, amɨn da gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma kokdaŋ. Ae uwal da gen yokwi kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma niyɨkdaŋ, nandak nandak yokwini do mayagɨ pakdaŋ.
Aŋakwa Pol da emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn gat ae emat amɨni gat yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn kabɨ tap wakgakon dɨma egɨpni kaŋ, ji kɨsi pasɨldaŋ.”
Piŋkop, namɨn da nak aŋaŋ kokup pap dam tebani toŋon aŋkɨsak? Ae namɨn da nak Idom mɨktɨmon emat ak do aŋkɨsak?
Ae tɨp 5 uŋun tɨp sadonikis, uŋun gami kwakwagɨ kɨsi. Tɨp 6 uŋun tɨp gɨman konilian. Ae tɨp 7 uŋun kɨloŋkɨloŋɨ, uŋun krisolait. Ae tɨp 8 uŋun tɨp kalɨkalɨgɨ ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda uŋun beril. Ae tɨp 9 uŋun tɨp kɨloŋkɨloŋɨ ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda uŋun topas. Ae tɨp 10 uŋun tɨp krisopres. Tɨp 11 uŋun tɨp aiasin. Ae tɨp 12 uŋun tɨp gami ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda tɨp ametis.
Ae amɨn kɨnda da yɨkni ɨmegek kosit 1 kilomita kɨki do tebaisi gayɨsak kaŋ, yɨk uŋun ɨmegek 2 kilomita kɨki.
Kabap morap nido meme da yaŋ wɨgɨ mokmok awit? Ae ɨleŋ monɨŋ monɨŋ ji nido sipsip da yaŋ wɨgɨ mokmok awit?
Teŋteŋɨgo gat ae gengo bamɨ gat yopbɨ nagon obɨŋek kosit nolɨnjil. Nolɨŋbal kaŋek nomansi telagɨ ɨleŋgokon gaga egɨsalon wɨgɨkeŋ.
Wamno gami pi tebaisi aŋakwan tapmɨmno mɨnisi asak. Dabɨlno pɨlɨn taŋakwan tagɨ dɨma sɨŋtosot.
Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨsitgo aŋnɨŋnɨŋ a.” Yaŋban amɨn uŋun kɨsirɨ aŋnɨŋnɨŋ aban kɨlek taŋ kɨsirɨ terɨ kɨnda yombem gɨn agɨt.
Mɨŋat amɨn morap ji nandani. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ mɨŋat amɨn morap ji nak dakon gen do mɨrak yopni.
“Nak amɨn pakbisi baŋ telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨsat uŋun amɨn but tobɨl bamɨ aŋ dakon tɨlak asak. Mani nak da manjikon abɨsak amɨn uŋun dakon tapmɨm da nak dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋdak. Nak yombem yokwi da kandap gwɨlni tagɨ dɨma abɨdaŋ awɨlɨ. Uŋun amɨn da Telagɨ Wup gat ae kɨndap gat soŋ damdɨsak.
Dɨsi dakon tapmɨm do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma ani, ae madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek manji gen dɨma yaŋ namni.’ ”
Yaŋ aban kaŋakwa Moses gat Elaija gat altaŋbal Yesu gat gen yaŋ nandatyo aba pɨndakgwit.
Aŋakwa ais sɨkak madepsi mawit. Ais tɨm kaloŋ kaloŋ mawit dakon jɨgɨni uŋun 50 kilo da arɨp. Uŋun ais sɨkak kundukon da amɨn da kwenon maŋek, amɨn wagɨlsi dapmaŋ paŋtasɨk awit. Piŋkop da ais sɨkak uŋun yɨpban maŋ obɨsi paŋupbal aban uŋun do Piŋkop ɨbɨpgwit.
Sadyusi amɨn da amɨn kɨmakbi arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pɨdoni, ae aŋelo wupyo mɨni yaŋ yoŋ. Mani Parisi amɨn uŋun kɨsi nandaŋ teban toŋ. Yaŋ nandaŋ do aŋek gen uŋun yaŋban Parisi amɨn ae Sadyusi amɨn iyɨ uwal uwal aŋek pudaŋ kabi bamorɨ awit.
Yawe, butjapgo bɨsap niaŋ da sigɨn tosak? Oman amɨngo nin do bupmɨ nandaŋ nibi.
Uŋun dogɨn aŋek Timoti yabekgo jikon opgut. Uŋun nak dakon monjɨno but dasi galaktaŋ ɨmɨsat. Uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ dakon pi kɨlani tagɨsi asak. Uŋun da ji paŋtagap aban nak da Kristo gat gadaŋ kɨmagek kokupmɨ kokupmɨ paŋmuwukbi morap aŋpak yolni do yoyɨŋ dekgɨm uŋun do ae nandaba pɨsoni do dayɨsak.
Mani don monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ kɨŋakwa notni uŋun bɨsapmon jap kelek ekwaŋ.
Yesu Jeriko kokup pap kɨŋ aŋkapmat aŋakwan dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn kɨnda da kosit ɨleŋon yɨgek amɨn da moneŋ ɨmni do bɨsit yoyɨgɨt.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn sotni mɨni uŋun wuda wamagon dɨma kwaŋ. Amɨn sotni toŋ uŋun dagɨn wuda wamagon kwaŋ.
Jap naŋ mudaŋek Yesu da Saimon Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Saimon, Jon dakon monji, gak nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨŋ kɨmagek on amɨn kabɨ da but dasi galak taŋ namaŋ uŋun yapmaŋdal, ma?” Yaŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Asi, Amɨn Tagɨ, gaga nandɨsal. Nak but dasi galak taŋ gamɨsat.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Sipsip monɨŋ kabɨno upmokgi.”
Pɨgakwa Gamaliel da notni kabɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Israel amɨn kabɨ, ji uŋun kabɨ do yo kɨnda aŋ yom do kaŋ, pakyaŋsi nandaŋ kɨmagek ani.
Mani amɨn morapmɨ abɨsok mibɨltok ekwaŋ uŋun da buŋon amɨn akdaŋ. Aŋakwa amɨn morapmɨ abɨsok buŋon ekwaŋ uŋun da mibɨltok amɨn akdaŋ.”
Do ji kobogɨ dɨmasi yomni. Piŋkop gen papia da yaŋ yosok: “Uwalgo jap do aban kaŋ, jap ɨbi. Ae pakbi do aban kaŋ, pakbi ɨbi. Yaŋ abi kaŋ, aŋpak yokwini do nandaŋek mayagɨ pakdɨsak.”
“Gen tebano uŋun yaŋ: nak da ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat, jiyo yaŋ gɨn dɨsikon notji do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ yomɨŋ ani.
Mani Kristo Piŋkop dakon Monji da mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop dakon yut ekwaŋ uŋun kɨlani asak dakon pi taŋ ɨmɨsak. Aŋek Piŋkop dakon gen guramɨk kɨmagek pi uŋun asak. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nin pasol pasolɨ mɨni nandaŋ gadat tebaisi aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ da yo tagɨsi aŋ nimdɨsak uŋun do jomjom aneŋ kaŋ, ninyo kɨsi Piŋkop dakon yutni ekwamaŋ.
Maria Makdala kokupmon nani gat ae Maria Josep dakon meŋi gat da kaŋakwal Yesu dakon bumjotni yɨpgut.
Uŋun kokupmon amɨn da nin do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋnimgwit. Sɨkak maŋek kokup mɨrɨmɨsi agɨt do kɨndap paŋ soŋek uŋudon kɨndap alɨneŋ do niyɨwit.
Asi, yo morap ak do nandagɨm bo ae yolapbo Piŋkop da kaŋban kɨlek tosak yaŋ nandagɨm, uŋun wagɨl yo ɨsalɨsi. Nido, Amɨn Tagɨno Yesu Kristo nandaŋ ɨmɨsat uŋun do nandako yo bamɨsi asak. Do nak aŋpulugok do yo agɨt, nak uŋun do nandaŋek Kristo dakon aŋpak abɨdagɨm. Ae nandak nandaknokon da kalɨp yo dɨwarɨ yolek agɨm uŋun yo ɨsalɨsi yaŋ nandɨsat. Yesu Kristo naŋgɨn tebai abɨdaŋek
Uŋun yabekgo jikon obɨŋakwan nin niaŋ ekwamaŋ uŋun dakon geni dayɨsak, ae butji paŋteban asak, mibɨlɨ yaŋ do yabekdat.
Amɨn kɨnda mani toŋ yaŋ nandɨsak, mani uŋun mani mɨni kaŋ, uŋun amɨn iyɨ naŋ top aŋkewaldak.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nin ji do nandaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyamaŋ. Bɨsit amaŋon ji kɨsi do nandaŋek amaŋ.
Upbalap madep awit da dagaŋakwan Pol da paŋmuwukbi yaŋ yoban abɨŋ muwukba burɨ paŋteban aŋek galok gen yoyɨŋek Masadonia mɨktɨmon kɨgɨt.
Yo morap mɨrɨm paŋ uŋun Yawe aŋkɨsini! Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Yawe, gak da nak aŋkutnoki do abɨsat. Aŋpulugaŋaki uwal da dɨma abɨŋ nepni. Gak kɨlegɨsi do uwal da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nepbi.
Uŋun Grik amɨn da Pilip kɨŋ kawit. (Pilip uŋun Galili provins Betsaida kokupmon nani.) Yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn tagɨ, nin Yesu kok do abamaŋ.”
Not kabɨ, nin abɨsok Piŋkop dakon gwakni kabɨ ekwamaŋ, ae don egɨp egɨp niaŋ egɨpdamaŋ uŋun dɨma nandano pɨsosok. Mani yaŋ nandamaŋ, Kristo da abɨŋ noman tosak bɨsapmon Kristo bamɨsi kokdamaŋ, do nin iyɨ yombemsi da egɨpdamaŋ.
“Nak yaŋ dayɨt, ji nak kɨlɨ nandawit mani sigɨn dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ.
Yawe, gak tapmɨmgo madepsi. Tapmɨmgo pɨdaŋbisi.
Aŋek yaŋ yoŋ, “Yawe da nin dɨma nindasak. Israel amɨn dakon Piŋkop yo nin da amaŋ uŋun do nandaba kɨk dɨma asak.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da kabap yaŋ yoyɨkdaŋ, ‘Ji tuwɨl kɨ maŋ nin wɨtjɨŋba pasɨlneŋ!’
Aŋelo dakon kɨla amɨn da muwukgaŋon Piŋkop do si pasolgoŋ. Uŋun aŋelo kabɨ aŋgwasɨŋek akgaŋ uŋun masɨ masɨmɨ, mani Piŋkop da uŋun kabɨ si yapmaŋek wagɨl masɨ masɨmɨsi.
Pinias da yo uŋun agɨt uŋun do aŋpak kɨlegɨsi kɨnda asak yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmgwit da wuŋ abɨsok ekwamaŋon kɨsi yaŋ gɨn nandamaŋ.
Ae koko aŋelo 7 kabɨ Piŋkop da ɨŋamon akgaŋ uŋun do kweŋ 7 yaŋ yoba tɨmɨkgwit.
Telagɨ Wup da butjikon yo kɨnda ani do kɨndap da yaŋ soŋban kaŋ dɨma abɨ kɨmotjak.
Paret Yawe da galak tosok uŋun baŋ aŋek egɨp egɨpji Yawekon tosok yaŋsi nandani.
“Oman monjɨni tobɨl obɨŋ amɨn tagɨni amɨn yoyɨŋban gen yawit dakon mibɨlɨ iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban yut uŋun dakon ami uŋun da butjap nandaŋek oman monjɨni tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak tepmɨsi kokup madep da kosit madep ae kosit monɨŋon kɨŋ, amɨn yoni mɨni, ae gɨptɨmɨ yokwi taŋbi, ae dabɨlɨ mɨni, ae kandap yokwi uŋun tɨmɨk paŋopbi.’
Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun da yaŋ nolɨsak. Bɨsap morap on bret gat ae wain on kapmon noni bɨsapmon Amɨn Tagɨ dakon kɨmot do yaŋ teŋteŋaŋakwa wɨgɨ ae apjak bɨsapmon wɨgɨsak.
Amɨn nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do nandaŋ amɨn, uŋun tasɨk tokdaŋ. Uŋun kɨmakbi kokupgwan pɨgɨkdaŋ.
Obɨŋ jap noknok tamokon jap naŋ yɨgek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, jikon da kɨnda da nak uwalno da kɨsiron nepdɨsak. Uŋun amɨn nin gat yɨgek jap nomaŋ.”
Nandak nandak abɨsok yolgaŋ, uŋun Piŋkopmon da dɨma abɨsak. Piŋkop da ji iyɨkon kɨni do yaŋ ɨlɨkdak.
Amɨn gat but kaloŋ egɨp egɨp dakon mibɨlɨ dɨmasi nandaŋ.”
Uŋun da emat agak do nayɨŋ degek kɨsitno aŋteban asak, do obip tebai ain kɨnda mani bras uŋun baŋ wasaŋbi uŋun tagɨ paŋɨlɨkgeŋ.
Piŋkop da yo morap wasagɨt, uŋun kɨndasok Piŋkop da dabɨlon arɨpmɨ dɨma pasɨlɨ. Yo morap kɨsi pɨsaŋbisi ae nomansi Piŋkop da dabɨlon toŋ. Ae Piŋkop da yaŋban nin aŋpak morap agɨmaŋ gat pi morap agɨmaŋ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ iyɨŋ mudokdamaŋ.
Lebanon mɨktɨmon wit tagɨsi kwoŋ, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn da pigaga yaŋ gɨn kwoni. Joŋ morap kwaŋ ɨreŋ toŋ uŋun da tɨlak kokup papmon amɨn yaŋ gɨn ɨreŋ toni.
Piŋkop da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Ji meŋ datyo dakon pɨŋbi egek geni guramɨtni’ ae kɨnda gat yaŋ yosok, ‘Amɨn kɨnda da meŋ datyo do gen yokwi kɨnda yosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn si aŋakba kɨmotjak.’
Kalɨp gak aŋpulugok do pi tagɨ dɨma agɨt. Mani abɨsok pi tagɨsi aŋek gak gat ae nak gat kɨsi tagɨsi paŋpulugokdɨsak.
Amɨn da ɨmal baŋ gɨptɨmni wamaŋgaŋ uŋudeŋ, gak gaga naŋ teŋteŋɨ naŋ wamaŋdal. Amɨn da ɨmal yut ɨlɨkba pɨkwaŋ uŋudeŋ, gak da kundu gat ae gɨk morap gat yopmaŋdal.
Imenius gat Aleksanda gat da yaŋ abal nak da Sunduk da kɨsiron yopgum. Uŋun nandak nandak kɨlegɨ tɨmɨgek buŋon Piŋkop do gen yokwi dɨma yonjil do aŋek uŋun agɨm.
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ Piŋkop dakon gen teban dɨma abɨdawit, mani yokwi aba Piŋkop da kobogɨ do yo yokwisi aŋ yomdɨsak. Ae Juda amɨn da gen tebani abɨdawit, do yokwi aba gen tebani uŋun yolek gen yaŋ yomdɨsak.
Pita gat Jon gat da amɨn uŋun tebai kaŋek Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak nit ninda!”
Nak gen tebango do galagɨsi nandɨsat. Uŋun dɨma ɨŋtokeŋ.
“Kalɨp nakyo kɨsi Yesu Nasaret amɨn dakon man abɨŋ yɨp do pi madepsi abeŋ yaŋsi nandagɨm.
Yawe gen yosok uŋun tapmɨmɨ toŋsi yosok. Yaŋakwan amɨn morap da Yawe uŋun kɨla amɨn madep wɨkwisi yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
Bɨsit aban dagaŋban abɨŋ pɨndakban paŋdetni dɨpmɨn do yokwisi aŋek aeni dɨpmɨn sigɨn pakgwit.
Mani Kristo da Telagɨ Wup kɨlɨ daban abɨdawit. Uŋun ji gat sigɨn egɨsak, do namɨn amɨn da dayɨŋdet asak yaŋ do wɨsɨk wɨsɨk agagɨ mɨni. Telagɨ Wup da iyɨ yo morap do dayɨŋ dekdak. Ae gen morap dayɨsak uŋun top dɨma, bamɨsi baŋ dayɨsak, do Telagɨ Wup da dayɨŋ dekdak uŋun da arɨpmon Kristokon gadaŋek egɨpni.
Yesu da Nataniel apban kaŋek Nataniel do yaŋ yagɨt, “Kabɨt, Israel amɨn bamɨsi kɨnda abɨsak. Uŋun amɨn topni mɨnisi.”
Butno jɨgɨsi asak. Yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon nak aŋteban aki.
Nak aŋpak toptopmɨ do nandabo tagɨ dɨma aŋ. Mani gen tebango do but dasi galak tosot.
Misia mɨktɨmon kɨŋ altaŋek Bitinia mɨktɨmon pɨgɨk do agɨmal. Mani Yesu dakon Wup da dɨma pɨgɨnjil do kosit sopgut.
Mani Piŋkop da nin do nandaŋ yawot madepsi aŋ nimɨsak. Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋek Piŋkop dakon papia da yaŋ yosok: “Piŋkop da amɨn iyɨ dakon man pawɨkwaŋ amɨn yo ak do nandaŋ uŋun dɨma ani do kosit sopmaŋ yomɨsak, mani amɨn iyɨ do nandaba paŋ uŋun nandaŋ yawok yomɨŋek yo tagɨ aŋ yomɨsak.”
Ae bɨgal morapmɨ yabekban ɨnjɨŋ yomgwit. Ae meŋgak morapmɨ yabekban yo morapni paŋupbal awit.
Uŋun da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak paŋmuwukbi Laodisia kokup papmon ekwaŋ uŋun dakon aŋeloni do gen yaŋ mandaki: Nak Piŋkop dakon geni gat ae yaŋ teban tok geni gat do gen uŋun asisi yaŋ yogok amɨn. Nak Piŋkop dakon gen bamɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok amɨn. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ geni bamɨsi gɨn yaŋ teŋteŋosot. Piŋkop da yo morap wasagɨt dakon mibɨlɨsi nak da gen on yɨpbo gagon obɨsak.
Yawe aŋpakni uŋun tagɨsi, do ya yaŋ iyɨni. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak.
Piŋkopno, nak gak dakon galaktok yol do tagɨsi nandɨsat. Gak dakon nawa gen butnokon toŋ.”
Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Pɨndat, amɨn Sabat bɨsapmon nido gen teban yapmaŋek pi aŋ?”
Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni ji kɨsikon tosak do bɨsit asat.
Mani asisi dayɨsat, nak ji paŋpulugok do depmaŋ dek wɨgɨkdɨsat. Dɨma wɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, Paŋpulugokji jikon dɨma pɨkdɨsak. Mani nak wɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, nak da yabekgo jikon pɨkdɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek kɨŋakwa gɨk gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da kalɨp kawit aeni altaŋ yomgut. Gɨk uŋun kɨŋakwan yol aŋkɨ Monjɨ si pakgɨt yut da tɨlagon yɨkban kawit.
Nak da uwalni paŋmayak akdɨsat. Mani kɨla amɨn madepno tɨlɨm madepni gat yɨtdɨsak.”
Monjɨ ŋakŋak kalugɨ mum do galagɨ madepsi nandaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak mum tagɨsi, ae uŋudon yo yokwi kɨnda dɨma tosok, uŋun Piŋkopmon da abɨsak uŋun tɨmɨt do galagɨ madepsi nandani. Mum uŋun da wupji aŋpulugaŋban Piŋkop da egɨp egɨp kalugɨ uŋun damguron tagaŋ madep ani ae tapmɨm pani, aŋek Piŋkop gat tagɨsi egɨpni.
Do yɨk yawot kokupgwan pɨgɨsak amɨn uŋun kalɨp Piŋkop da pi wasɨp aŋek yɨk yawot agɨt, uŋudeŋ gɨn pini yɨpmaŋek yɨk yawot asak.
Yawe uŋun dagok dagogɨ mɨni kɨla amɨn madep egɨpdɨsak. Saion kokup pap amɨn ji dakon Piŋkop dagok dagogɨ mɨni Kɨla Amɨn Madep egɨpdɨsak. Yawe dakon man aŋkɨsini!
Yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek gen yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak uŋun amɨn dakon paŋdetni, mani nin Moses dakon paŋdetni ekwamaŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨgɨt, ‘Padɨgɨgo tagɨsi egɨsak da abɨk do datgo da kaŋek bulmakau monjɨ nelagɨ toŋ aŋwak.’
Yawe da amɨn kɨnda do but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn aŋteban aŋakwan kosit kɨlegɨsi agɨsak.
Yesu paŋdet kabɨni gen uŋun yoyɨŋ mudaŋek Kwen Kokup sɨŋtaŋek bɨsit yaŋ agɨt, “Dat, bɨsap kɨlɨ abɨk. Monjɨgo dakon man awɨgaki kaŋdo Monjɨgo da gak dakon man awɨgɨsak.
Yaŋgɨn Kwen Kokup Datji da amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda pasɨljak do dɨma galak tosok.”
Ae ji yokwi yɨpba gɨptɨm dɨwatji kɨsi kɨla aŋakwan aŋpak yokwi dɨma ani. Ji kɨmakbi tamokon da pɨdawit da kalugɨ ekwaŋ, do ji dɨsi baŋ Piŋkop do paret ani. Aŋek Piŋkop yɨpba gɨptɨmji kaloŋ kɨla aŋakwan aŋpak kɨlegɨ ani.
Nin wagɨlsi pabɨŋ nip do nandak nandak awit, do mɨktɨmninon Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨm yut morap toŋ uŋun soŋ mudawit.
Kɨmagakwa bɨt dakon kɨla amɨn da kokup kapmat tagɨt ae mɨktɨm dɨwarɨkon kɨŋ yo uŋun noman tawit dakon gen bin yoyɨwit. Yoyɨŋba amɨn da yo noman tagɨt uŋun kok do aŋek abɨŋ mudawit.
Ɨsal dogɨn amɨn dɨwarɨ gen yaŋ yomaŋ amɨn yum pɨndagaki nin da mɨktɨmon tagɨ dɨma egɨpni. Ae emat amɨnon yo yokwisi noman taŋ yoba pasɨlni do nandɨsat.
Nin Piŋkopmon nani. Piŋkop nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun da genin nandaŋ nimaŋ. Mani amɨn Piŋkopmon nani dɨma uŋun da genin dɨma nandaŋ nimaŋ. Yaŋon da Wup bamɨ ae wup toptopmɨ kokwin amaŋ.
Yaŋdo, on mɨktɨm gɨptɨmon ekwamaŋ, bo ae on gɨptɨm yɨpmaŋek Amɨn Tagɨkon kwamaŋ, nin bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ iyɨ aŋpak galak tosok uŋun yol do madepsi galak tomaŋ,
Yawe uŋun aŋpak kɨlegɨ gɨn asak. Yo morap wasaŋ yopguron aŋpak tagɨsi baŋ aŋyomɨsak.
Uŋun do aŋek on amɨn but teban kɨlɨ awit. Gen kalugɨ dɨ gat nandak do kurak taŋek mɨrakni paŋ sopgwit, ae dabɨlni wamaŋ sopgwit. Yaŋ dɨma awit tam, dabɨlni ae mɨrakni ae butniyo da kaŋ nandaŋyo aba pɨsaŋban nagon tobɨlba tagɨ paŋmɨlɨp abom.’
Yesu uŋun gen morap yaŋ mudaŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Gak Sunduk dakon monji. Gak aŋpak tagɨsi morap toŋ uŋun dakon uwalni. Top gen yogok mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat ae aŋpak yokwi morap uŋun gagon tugosok. Gak da Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋpak kɨlegɨsi paŋ upbal asal. Yokwi morap asal uŋun dɨma yopbi, ma?”
“Yɨgakwa kɨla amɨn madep da amɨn obeŋ uŋun pɨndat do yutnon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgɨ kaŋban amɨn kɨnda mɨŋat paŋek jap noknok aŋ bɨsapmon ɨmal tagɨsi paŋ uŋuden kɨnda dɨma pagɨt kagɨt.
Yaŋ aba Amɨn Tagɨ da tapmɨmni kalugɨ ji do damjak. Aŋek Kristo ji paŋpulugok do aŋek manjɨkbi uŋun damjak. Uŋun mani Yesu.
Piŋkop dakon Monji da nin yumaŋ naŋ nipmaŋek dɨwarɨnin wɨrɨrɨk nimgut.
Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm tagɨsikon maŋ kwawit. Uŋun bamɨ 100 taŋ taŋ awit.” Yesu da tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen on nandak do galak toŋ amɨn ji pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
Mani, Piŋkop da nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdokdɨsak. Aŋakwan amɨn kɨmakbi tamo da nak abɨdosak dakon tapmɨm dɨma taŋ ɨmdɨsak.
Jon dakon paŋdetni da Yesu da yo morap agɨt dakon geni Jon iyɨwit.
Aŋakwa kositji wagɨl wɨtdal damɨŋakwan Yesu Kristo Amɨn Tagɨnin ae Yokwikon Baŋ Tɨmɨt Tɨmɨt Amɨnin iyɨ kɨla asak da kagagwan tagɨ pɨgɨni, ae uŋudon bɨsap dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpdaŋ.
Amɨn tagɨ da oman monjɨni yaŋsi iyɨsak, ‘Gak tagap taŋek jap soŋ pɨlɨk nabɨ naŋ mudaŋapbo gak jap don noki.’
Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat tasɨk tokdamal. Ɨmal gɨraŋɨ da pudaŋ kwaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak yokwi tokdamal. Amɨn da ɨmal kulabɨk aŋ, uŋun da tɨlagon gak da kulabɨk aŋaki saŋbeŋek dɨma tokdamal. Mani gak toktok teban egɨpdɨsal.
Abɨ madepsi sosak, nido Telagɨ Wup nimgut uŋun pasol pasol aneŋ do dɨma nandɨsak. Uŋun da tapmɨm nimɨsak, ae nin paŋpulugaŋban amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomamaŋ, ae nin do kɨla aŋek aŋpak kalɨpmɨ pabɨŋ yopmaŋgamaŋ.
“Nak kɨmakbi tamogwan pɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, ni yo tagɨ kɨnda da noman tosak? Amɨn kɨmakbi da mango tagɨ aŋkɨsini? Gak da toktogɨ ninon yo tagɨsi asal dakon gen uŋun da tagɨ yaŋ teŋteŋoni? Arɨpmɨ dɨma.
Jona gɨldat kapbɨ ae pɨlɨn kapbɨ yaŋ tap kɨlap da but kagagwan egɨpgut, yaŋgɨn Amɨn Dakon Monji mɨktɨm kagagwan gɨldat kapbɨ ae pɨlɨn kapbɨ yaŋ potdɨsak.
Amɨn kɨnda yokwi aban Amɨn Tagɨ da kobogɨ ɨm do saŋbeŋek dɨma nandɨsak uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.”
Yaŋdo, nak dakon aŋpak pakyaŋsi yolni.
Mani nak da ji do bret galagɨsi, ae kabaŋ kok koron nani dabeŋ, aŋapbo butji tugokdaŋ.”
Yo morap wasagɨt uŋun Piŋkop da jobɨt yomgut. Jobɨt uŋun dɨma tɨmɨt do nandawit, mani Piŋkop da iyɨ don paŋkaluk akdɨsak uŋun nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom ani do aŋek jobɨt yomgut.
Kristo dakon yawi da nin paŋkɨlek aban nin amɨn kɨlegɨ agɨmaŋ, do uŋun da nin madepsi paŋpulugaŋek paŋkutnaŋban Piŋkop da japmɨsi nandaŋek yokwi pakpak amɨn do kobogɨ yokwisi yomjak bɨsapmon tagɨsi egɨpdamaŋ.
Nido, kombɨ amɨn dakon gen kɨnda kombɨ amɨn da galaktoknikon da yoni do dɨma noman tagɨt. Telagɨ Wup da amɨn paŋtagap aban Piŋkop gen yomgut uŋun baŋ yaŋ teŋteŋok awit.
Yesu kɨŋ Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan pɨgɨ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit amɨn uŋun yolban waŋga abɨgɨwit. Yaŋ aŋek moneŋ kulabɨk awit amɨn gat mɨnam yumaŋ nawit amɨn dakon tamo uŋun kɨsi paŋtobɨlban tagal kɨwit.
Ji kalɨp Piŋkop da dubagɨkon egek uwalsi aŋ ɨmgwit. Nido, nandak nandakji da uwal aŋ ɨmɨŋek ji aŋpak yokwisi awit.
Mɨŋat amɨn morap ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek kɨsit tɨdok ani. Ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dakon yaŋ tɨdok aŋek kap yaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsini.
Amɨn morap kɨsi do nandaba wukwan yomni, aŋek Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ do but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Piŋkop do si pasalek egɨpni. Aŋek kɨla amɨn madep do man madep ɨmni.
Uŋun da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun dakon but paŋteŋteŋ aban Piŋkop dakon mibɨlɨ nandakdaŋ. Aŋek gak dakon amɨn kabɨgo Israel dakon tɨlɨmni egɨpdɨsak.”
‘Nin kasɨsɨŋ kɨlɨ pɨsomaŋ, mani ji kap ak do dɨma nandayɨŋ. Nin bupmɨ kap yamaŋ, mani ji bupmɨ nandaŋek kunam tat do dɨma nandayɨŋ.’ ”
Gen teban yolyol uŋun nandaŋ gadat dakon yo dɨma. Uŋun iyɨ kɨnda. Nido Piŋkop gen papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Amɨn kɨnda gen teban morap kɨsi guramɨkdak uŋun egɨp egɨp abɨdosak.”
Piŋkop, bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi. Nak gagon abɨsat, kɨlano aki do nandɨsat. Pup pudɨk da meŋi da pɨt kagagwan pasɨlek ekwaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak aŋkutnaŋaki tagɨsi egɨsat. Nak yaŋ gɨn egapbo wɨgɨ aŋupbal ani dakon yo da pasɨlni.
Mani geni dɨmasi nandaŋ yomgumaŋ. Gen Bin Tagɨsi uŋun kulabɨk dɨma aŋek jikon toktogɨsi tosak do nandagɨmaŋ.
Yoyɨŋban kɨŋakwa iyɨ gɨn ɨleŋ kɨndakon bɨsit ak do wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgɨ gɨldat pɨgakwan iyɨ gɨn ɨleŋon egɨpgut.
Yawe, man bingo tagɨsi tosak do yokwino morapmɨsi uŋun wɨrɨrɨk nabi.
Piŋkop da nin tɨmɨk yɨk yawot kokupmon paŋkɨk do yaŋ teban tok agɨt. Do nin si pasalek kaŋ kɨmotneŋ, Piŋkop da jikon amɨn kɨnda uŋun kokupmon arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨkdɨsak yaŋ kɨnda dɨ kaŋban.
Aŋelo yaŋ yaŋakwan tek uŋun Kwen Kokup da aeni noman taŋek nayɨgɨt, “Gak kɨŋ aŋelo uŋun tap ɨdapmon ae mɨktɨmon bamaŋ akdak da kɨsiron papia tosok uŋun abɨda.”
Nin Gen egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ. Uŋun Gen abɨkisigwan wasok wasogɨkon kɨlɨ egɨpgut da egɨsak. Nin mɨrak yopmaŋapno gen yagɨt, ae dabɨl da kagɨmaŋ, ae kɨsit da kwenikon ɨgayɨgɨmaŋ.
Buŋon Erodias da Jon aŋakba kɨmotjak uŋun dakon kosit kagɨt. Altok altok bɨsapnikon Erot da jap noknok ak do amɨn madep paŋmuwukgɨt. Gapman dakon pi amɨn madep ae emat amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨni ae Galili mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn kɨsi paŋmuwukgɨt.
Gak Piŋkopno, do ya yaŋ gayɨsat. Gak Piŋkopno, do mango awɨgɨsat.
Aŋakwan amɨn dakon tek yombem kɨnda nandaŋapbo yo egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ 4 kabɨkon da yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda gɨldat daman kɨnda dakon pi asak dakon tomni tɨmɨtjak uŋun wit yɨgɨ monɨŋɨsok kɨnda gɨn abɨdosak, bo bali kwoba kapbɨ gɨn tɨmɨtjak. Mani gak olip nelak gat ae wain gat dɨma paŋtasɨk abi.”
Yaŋ aŋaki mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo, sipsip kabɨgo, nin toktogɨsi ya yaŋ gayɨneŋ. Ae babɨknin don altoni uŋun kɨsi da mango aŋkɨsini.
