Uŋun bɨsapmon uŋun kɨsi obɨŋ Monjɨ kaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek Piŋkop da Jerusalem amɨn paŋpulugosak do jomjom awit amɨn, uŋun baŋ Monjɨ dakon gen yoyɨgɨt.
Laion da jap do aŋ, mani Yawe wɨsɨŋ kok do pi aŋ amɨn uŋun yo tagɨsi do wadak wadak dɨma aŋ.
Yo tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon paŋmuwut do nandak nandak ani. Uŋudon yo monɨŋ da dɨma nokdaŋ, ae maŋut maŋut dɨma akdaŋ, ae kabo noknok da yutji tuwɨlek arɨpmɨ dɨma tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Parisi amɨn ae Juda amɨn kɨsisi babɨkni dakon gen teban yolek kɨsirɨ sugaŋek gɨn jap naŋ naŋ aŋ.
Uŋun da kwenon Yesu kokup pap ae kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ tawit uŋudon agek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Yabekbi 12 kabɨ kɨsi agɨpgwit.
Liwai uŋun Simeon dakon monji. Simeon uŋun Juda dakon monji. Juda uŋun Josep dakon monji. Josep uŋun Jonam dakon monji. Jonam uŋun Eliakim dakon monji.
Maria kanek kapbɨ Elisabet gat egek don kokupnikon tobɨl kɨgɨt.
Gak da bɨsitnin nandaŋ nimɨsal. Amɨn morap kɨsisi gagon opdaŋ.
Mani Dewit uŋun kombɨ amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut. Piŋkop da yaŋ teban tok gen kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt: ‘Gak dakon babɨgo kɨnda da gak da tamokon kɨla amɨn madep egɨpjak.’
Nak Israel amɨn dakon mibɨlni nandɨsat, uŋun Piŋkop dakon galaktok yol do pi tebaisi aŋ, mani Piŋkop dakon galaktok pakyaŋsi dɨma nandaŋek aŋ.
Mani, Amɨn Tagɨ Dakon Gɨldat uŋun kabo noknok da but pɨsoni mɨni abaŋ uŋun da tɨlak noman tokdɨsak. Uŋun gɨldaron kundukon wuwɨk madepsi noman taŋek yo morap kundukon toŋ uŋun kɨndap da soŋban wagɨl soŋ mudokdaŋ. Ae mɨktɨm gat ae yo morap mɨktɨmon toŋ uŋun kɨsi kɨndap da soŋban saŋbeŋek dɨma tokdaŋ.
Bɨsap mɨni abɨsok gɨn ekwamaŋ, do gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ ji kaloŋ kaloŋ paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨ do gen tagɨsi baŋ yoyɨni, aŋek burɨ paŋteban ani. Aŋpak yokwi da jikon kɨnda aŋkewalban but teban dɨ aban.
Nin aŋpak kɨlegɨsi gɨn ak do nandamaŋ, ae Amɨn Tagɨ da dabɨlon gɨn dɨma, mɨŋat amɨnyo da dabɨlon kɨsi ak do nandamaŋ.
Mani amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt uŋun amɨn gɨptɨmni dɨma mɨktagɨt.
Aŋakwan Sol mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek nandaŋakwan gen kɨnda altaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sol, Sol, nak aŋupbal ak do pi nido asal?”
Aŋakwan Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ iyɨgɨt: ‘Moses, kandap gwɨlgo ɨlɨk yopmaŋ. Mɨktɨm tɨm uŋun bamaŋ akdal uŋun telagɨ mɨktɨm.
Do ji Piŋkop dakon Monji do nandaba yo ɨsalɨ asak amɨn do niaŋsi nandaŋ? Uŋun amɨn jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ. Kristo dakon yawi da saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ aŋteban asak, uŋun da paŋmɨlɨp aban uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon amɨnsi dagawit aŋek telagɨsi egɨpgwit. Mani, abɨsok uŋun amɨn da aba yawi yo ɨsalɨsi asak. Aŋek nandaŋ yawot dakon Wup do aŋpak yokwisi aŋ ɨmaŋ.
Piŋkop gak wagɨl kɨlegɨsi. Amɨn morap dakon nandak nandak butyo pakyaŋsi pɨndak nandaŋyo asal. Amɨn yokwi aŋpak yokwi saŋbeŋek dɨma ani do kɨrɨŋɨk yobi. Mani amɨn kɨlegɨ paŋpulugaŋaki tebai atni.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “On amɨn kɨsi uŋun Abraham dakon monji kɨnda. Abɨsok Piŋkop da on yut amɨn kɨsi yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨk mudosok.
Yaŋdo, abɨsok da wasaŋek nin on mɨktɨm dakon nandak nandagon da amɨn kokwin dɨma amaŋ. Asi, kalɨp nin on mɨktɨm dakon nandak nandagon da Kristo kokwin agɨmaŋ, mani abɨsok yaŋ dɨma amaŋ.
Kokup kɨndakon kɨŋ altaŋba not dɨma aŋdamɨŋek genji dɨma nandaŋek manji damni kaŋ, kandapjikon kɨmbabaŋ toŋ uŋun kokup yɨp do aŋek tɨdaŋba kɨni. Yaŋ aŋakwa uŋun kokup amɨn da ‘Geni dɨma nandamaŋ, uŋun do aŋ’ yaŋ nandani.”
Maŋakwa naŋek arɨpmɨsi tugawit. Yo uŋun do galak tawit uŋun Piŋkop da yomgut.
Yaŋ yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji da gen ŋwakŋwarɨsi kɨnda yoŋ. Uŋun amɨn da dabɨlno aŋmɨlɨp ak, mani ji da ‘uŋun amɨn dukwan da apgut uŋun nin dɨma nandamaŋ’ yaŋ yoŋ.
Maria kɨmakbi tamo da waŋga agek kunam takgɨt. Kunam tagek tagek pagadaŋek kɨmakbi tamogwan wɨsɨgɨt.
Mani mɨŋat kɨnda busuŋni dɨma wɨtjɨŋek bɨsit asak, bo kombɨ gen yosok kaŋ, uŋun da busuŋni eni abɨŋ yɨpmaŋdak. Uŋun busuŋ daŋgwani kɨsi mandaŋ mudosok yaŋ asak.
Aŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da gen kɨnda yaŋ yoŋ ‘Elaija mibɨltok abɨŋakwan Kristo buŋon apjak.’ Gen uŋun nido yoŋ?”
Gwakno gat ae notno gat do nandaŋek Jerusalem amɨn do bɨsit yaŋ abeŋ, “Ji emarɨ mɨni tagɨsi egɨpni.”
Mani wɨli kaloŋ kaloŋ ji da dɨsi do but dasi galak toŋ, yaŋ gɨn mɨŋatji do yaŋ gɨn nandani. Ae mɨŋat ji esi do nandaba wukwan yomni.
Mɨŋat monjɨyono, Kristo dakon man do aŋek Piŋkop da yokwisi yopmaŋ damgut. Uŋun do aŋek on papia mandaŋ damɨsat.
Bɨsap yokwi kɨnda noman taŋ namɨŋakwan uwalno abɨŋ nagon emat awit. Mani Yawe da kɨlano agɨt.
Amɨn yokwi amɨn kɨlegɨ aŋakban kɨmotjak do yubɨŋ egɨsak.
Yesu da amɨn jap nok do apgwit uŋun pɨndakban tamo mibɨltogɨ nanikon gɨn yɨt do awit. Do tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Iyɨŋ mudaŋba amɨn morapmɨsi kɨŋ abɨŋ abɨŋ aŋakwa Yesu gat yabekbi kabɨni gat jap noknok dakon bɨkbɨk dɨma pɨsaŋ yomgut. Aban Yesu da yabekbi kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Opba mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon kɨno. Uŋudon egek tapmɨm pani.”
Solomon uŋun Reoboam dakon datni. Reoboam uŋun Abiya dakon datni. Abiya uŋun Asa dakon datni.
Nido Kristo yo kɨsi iyɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk pak do dɨma nandagɨt. Piŋkop gen papia da uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Piŋkop, gak do yaŋba yokwi tok awit uŋun gen da nak yo kɨsi abɨdosok.”
“Jil ason kokup tosok uŋudon kɨnjil. Uŋudon kɨŋ kaŋbal donki bɨlagɨ kɨnda amɨn da kwenikon dɨma yɨkbi uŋun napmon aŋteban abi da akban konjil. Napmɨ wɨtdalek aŋopjil.
“Amɨn Tagɨ dakon Wupni nagon tosok, nido amɨn yoni mɨnikon kɨŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨkeŋ do nak manjɨŋek but nelak tagɨl namgut. Ae dam tebanon ekwaŋ amɨn pulugaŋ kɨ abɨgɨni yaŋ yoyɨkeŋ do yabekgɨt. Ae dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn tagɨ sɨŋtoni, ae amɨn da pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun pulugaŋ yopbeŋ do yabekgɨt.
Gen uŋun yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Ananias da Pol da kapmatjok akgwit amɨn gen kaganikon aŋatni do yoyɨgɨt.
Monji da Piŋkop dakon tɨlɨm gɨlgwani gat teŋteŋosok. Iyɨ uŋun Piŋkop yombemsi asak. Geni tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun da mɨktɨm gat ae kundu gat joŋɨkban tebai tomal. Uŋun da amɨn dakon yokwini sugaŋ paŋmɨlɨp aban kɨlegɨsi awit, aŋakwa Kwen Kokupmon Piŋkop Kɨla Amɨn Madep Wɨkwisi da amɨnsi tet do yɨkgɨt.
Mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ dakon kosit aŋdɨmdɨm ani, kositni pasɨŋ aŋmɨlɨp ani.’ ”
Amɨn morap gulusuŋ aŋ, uŋun gulusuŋni dakon tomni tɨmɨtdaŋ. Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn morap dakon aŋpak kokwin ak do arɨp gɨn asak.
Tebaisi ak kɨmotni, yaŋ aŋek Piŋkop dakon galaktok tagɨ yolni. Aŋek kalɨp Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi dam do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun tagɨ tɨmɨtni.
Yaŋ nandaŋ egek Yawe yaŋ iyɨgɨm, “O Yawe, pulugaŋ nepbi!”
Piŋkop da kɨlɨ ɨŋtaŋ nimgut da bupmɨ nandaŋ nim do dɨma bo nandɨsak? Butjapni da bupmɨni sopmaŋdak bo?”
Yawe da pi madepsi aŋek yo morap wasagɨt uŋun do dɨma nandaŋ. Yaŋdo, uŋun amɨn yut kɨnda naŋ yaŋ tuwɨlek dɨma awaldɨsak.
Yaŋ aŋek egakwa Pita da abɨŋ waŋga agek yoma domon tɨdagɨt. Tɨdaŋakwan oman mɨŋat kɨnda mani Roda uŋun da yoma wɨtdal do aŋek opgut.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo madep mɨktɨmon pabɨŋ yɨtni do yoyɨgɨt.
Pɨgɨ tap wakga kɨnda abɨdaŋek Atalia kokup pap yɨpmaŋek Antiok kokupmon kɨŋ altagɨmal. Kalɨp Antiok paŋmuwukbi da amɨn bamot Amɨn Tagɨ da nandaŋ yawok yomɨŋek paŋpulugaŋakwan Piŋkop dakon pi anjil do yabekba kɨgɨmal. Kɨŋ Piŋkop dakon pi aŋ mudaŋek aeni
Piŋkop da oman amɨni Dewit manjɨŋek sipsip kɨla agɨron naŋ abɨdagɨt.
Wasok wasok do amɨn kɨlegɨ Abel aŋagek ae amɨn dɨwarɨ dapmaŋakwa wɨgɨ wasɨp do Sekaraia Telagɨ Yut Madep ae altayo da binapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt uŋun dakon kobogɨ yo jɨgɨsi amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Nak papia uŋun suŋ agɨt amɨn gat ae yokwi aŋ ɨmgut amɨn uŋun bamot do nandaŋek dɨma mandagɨm. Piŋkop da dabɨlon ji nin do but dasi galaktaŋ nimaŋ uŋun ji da pakyaŋsi nandani do nandagɨm. Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋek papia uŋun mandagɨm.
Yaŋban paŋdetni si pasalek iyɨ gɨn yawit, “On niaŋen amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm ae pakbiyo yoyɨŋban geni guramɨkgamal?”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yo nikon tɨlak ako nandani?
Aŋakwan Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak mɨktɨmon gen kokwin ak do pɨgɨm. Yaŋdo, dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn uŋun sɨŋtoni, ae dabɨlɨ sɨŋtoŋ amɨn uŋun dabɨlɨ mɨni ani.”
Yesu Ɨleŋ Olipmon yɨgakwan Telagɨ Yut Madep ason tet tagɨt. Aŋakwan Pita, Jems, Jon ae Andru da iyɨ gɨn Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit,
Yawe, gak amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal. Uŋun dakon tɨlakni kundu gat arɨp, madepsi. Ae gengo aŋteban aŋek nin tagɨsi paŋpulugosol. Tɨlakni uŋun kwen ason gɨkwem da arɨp.
Yum nandaŋaki pakbi da ɨgek nak dɨma wɨtjisak, ae pakbi ɨlarɨgwan dɨma pɨgɨ pasɨlgeŋ. Yum nandaŋaki bumjot gapma da nak dɨma galautjak.
Yoyɨŋban yaŋ yawit, “Ninon jap morapmɨ dɨma. Bret kɨsit kɨnda ae tap kɨlap bamorɨ dagɨn taŋ nimaŋ.”
Yaŋ aban paŋdet kabɨni da kaŋek burɨ yokwi taŋba yaŋ yawit, “Nidosi aŋek pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi uŋun yumsi tagaldak?
Yaŋ aba kɨla amɨn madep uŋun japmɨsi nandaŋek emat amɨni yabekban kɨŋ pi monjɨni dapgwit amɨn uŋun kɨsisi dapba mɨni awit. Aŋek kokupni sowit.
Yaŋ yaŋek tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda kokup kɨndakon kɨk do aŋek oman amɨni do pi kokwinɨk yomɨŋek yut dakon kɨla ani do yoyɨsak. Aŋek yoma sopsop dakon kɨla amɨn yoma kɨlani tebai asak do iyɨsak.
Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji on mɨktɨmon dɨwarɨ wɨrɨrɨt dakon pi asak do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨbi yaŋ nandaba pɨsosak do on amɨn aŋmɨlɨp abeŋ.” Yesu yaŋ yaŋek kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi amɨn kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak gayɨsat, gak pɨdaŋ yalɨŋ potgo tɨmɨgek yutgokon kɨ.”
Gak da butno jɨgɨsi tagɨt uŋun aŋtagap abɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap asat. Ae but yokwi nandagɨm uŋun aŋyawot abɨ but kwaktok nandɨsat.
Pita kagɨ kagɨsok da Yesu yol aŋkɨŋek, mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da nagalgwan pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨkwan obip amɨn gat kɨndapmon yɨgek kɨndapni alɨwit.
Ae dabɨlni abɨ pɨlɨn taŋakwa yo dɨma pɨndatni, ae jɨgɨ morapmɨ ɨmek yomɨŋaki manji gɨroŋɨtni, aŋek yaŋ gɨn egɨ wɨgɨni dosi nandɨsat.”
Yesu da gen yaŋ mudaŋakwan Tomas, mani kɨnda Yayat yaŋ iyɨwit, uŋun da paŋdet notni dɨwarɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ninyo kɨsi uŋun gat kɨŋek kɨsi kɨmotneŋ.”
Mani Elaija kɨlɨ apgut, aban amɨn da dɨma kaŋba pɨsagɨt, do galaktokni yolek yo yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋ ɨmgwit. Ae Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋunyo kɨsi yo yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yaŋ gɨn aŋɨmdaŋ.”
Aeni dabɨlɨ sɨŋtagɨt amɨn yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun amɨn wasok aban dabɨlgo sɨŋtak amɨn do niaŋen amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandɨsal?” Yaŋba yagɨt, “Uŋun kombɨ amɨn kɨnda.”
“Amɨn Tagɨ Tapmɨm Ami, kalɨp yagɨl uŋun da tɨlagon oman amɨngo nak but yaworon da tagɨ kɨmokgeŋ.
Mani mɨŋat amɨnyo nin Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmamaŋ nin nipban yɨk yawot kokupnigwan pɨkwamaŋ. Kalɨp Piŋkop da kokup uŋun do nandaŋek gen yaŋ yagɨt: “Do nak butjap nandaŋek yaŋ teban tok aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨm, ‘Asisi, ji nak dakon yɨk yawot kokupgwan dɨmasi pɨgɨni.’ ” Mani kalɨpsigwan Piŋkop da yo morap wasagɨt bɨsapmon pi morapni kɨsi aŋ mudaŋek yɨk yawot kokupni kɨsi aŋnoman agɨt.
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do nin yo dabɨl da si pɨndagek dɨma ekwamaŋ, nin nandaŋ gadaron dagɨn ekwamaŋ.
“Kɨla amɨn madep Agripa, gak Juda amɨn nin dakon aŋpak uŋun pakyaŋsi nandɨsal, ae pɨdok pɨdok mibɨlɨ nido amaŋ uŋun kɨsi nandaŋ mudosol. Do Juda amɨn da gen yaŋ namɨŋakwa nak naga aŋkutnok do gen kobogɨ gak da ɨŋamon yok do tagɨsi nandɨsat. Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan yɨgek gen morap gayɨkdɨsat uŋun pakyaŋsi nandaki.
Mani Israel amɨn da Piŋkop Wukwisi aŋkewalek kwen wɨgɨk aŋ ɨmɨŋek gen tebani dɨma guramɨkgwit.
Nin Piŋkop gat kɨsi pi kaloŋɨ aŋek tebaisi yaŋ dayamaŋ, “Ji Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni yɨpba bamɨ mɨni dɨ taŋban.”
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn dɨwarɨ kapmatjok akgwit uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “Nandaŋ, uŋun Elaija do yaŋ ɨmɨsak.”
Kristo da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni nim do yaŋ teban tok agɨt.
Piŋkop, nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki. Yawe, tepmɨsi abɨŋek nak aŋpuluga.
Yesu da yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek jɨkgo yanjaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aba yoyɨŋban yomakon pɨgɨ mudaŋakwa, mɨŋatjok dakon meŋi datniyo ae paŋdetni tɨmɨkban mɨŋatjok pakgɨron wɨgɨwit.
Nak dakon papia da ji butjɨk damgut, mani uŋun do bupmɨ dɨma nandɨsat. Asi, mibɨltok bupmɨ nandagɨm, mani abɨsok bupmɨ dɨma nandɨsat. Papia uŋun da butjɨk damgut, mani uŋun do bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn nandawit.
Yaŋdo, amɨn kɨnda nak tebaisi akdat yaŋ nandɨsak amɨn uŋun kaŋ kɨmotjak. Yokwikon dɨ maŋban.
iyɨkonsi egɨpbeŋ do nandɨsat. Nak gen teban tagɨsi guramɨkdat do Piŋkop da ɨŋamon nak amɨn kɨlegɨsi yaŋ dakon nandak nandak dɨmasi pasat. Nak Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsat, aŋapbo Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ nayɨsak.
Nak naga dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgum, mani Israel amɨn kabɨ da uŋun amɨn kaŋ nandaŋyo ani do aŋek telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨŋek apgum.”
Uŋun da gen teban mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ jɨgɨsi guramɨtni do dayaŋ, mani iyɨ paŋpulugaŋba guramɨtni do kɨsitjok kɨnda dɨmasi yɨpmaŋgaŋ.
Kristo da paŋmuwukbi do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek paŋpulugok do iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨpni parekgɨt, yaŋ gɨn wɨli ji mɨŋatji but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ kɨmotni.
Gak da mɨktɨm on yɨpgul da tamonikon wagɨl tebai tosok, ae arɨpmɨ dɨma duwalɨk kɨsak.
Dɨpmɨngo yopbɨ kɨt! Aŋpakgo dɨwarɨ dɨma kɨmakgwit uŋun paŋteban abi. Nido aŋpakgo kɨnda Piŋkopno da dabɨlon kɨlegɨsi yaŋ kɨnda dɨmasi kat.
Aŋakwa amɨn da yo niaŋensi kɨnda da altagɨt, uŋun kok do apgwit. Abɨŋ Yesu altaŋ ɨmɨŋek amɨn uŋun koŋni kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgwit kawit. Kaŋba amɨn uŋun Yesu da buron burɨ kɨlɨ pɨsagɨt ae ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni toŋ da yɨkgɨt. Yaŋ yɨkban kaŋ pasalgwit.
Jɨgɨ madepsi noman taŋek uŋun da nandaŋ gadatni paŋkewalgɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon bupmɨsi egɨpgwit, mani kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi aŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋpulugok do moneŋ morapmɨ paŋmuwukgwit.
Aŋpak gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi baŋ amaŋ, ae nandak nandak tagɨsi baŋ tɨmɨkgamaŋ. Jɨgɨ noman taŋ niba but yaworon da ekwamaŋ, ae mɨŋat amɨnyo do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomamaŋ. Telagɨ Wupmon tapmɨm uŋudon tɨmɨkgamaŋ. Amɨn do bamɨsi but dasi galaktaŋ yomamaŋ.
Egek Sabat bɨsapmon kokup pap dakon yoma kagakon pɨgɨ yapmaŋek waŋga pɨgɨ pakbi kɨndakon kɨgɨmaŋ. Nin uŋun pakbikon tamo kɨnda koneŋon bɨsit aneŋ yaŋon da pɨgɨgɨmaŋ. Uŋun pakbikon pɨgɨ pɨndatno mɨŋat dɨ muwukgwit pɨndak uŋudon yɨgek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨgɨmaŋ.
Nin kalɨp Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgumaŋ bɨsapmon Piŋkop da Telagɨ Wupni but galak do nimgut. Ae uŋun amɨn kabɨ do yaŋ gɨn yomgut, do nak yombem da Piŋkop tagɨ dɨma kɨrɨŋɨk ɨbom?”
Wɨgakwal pɨndagek amɨn da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨnda da yutnon wɨgɨk.”
Piŋkop da yaŋ yosok, “Namɨn amɨn da nak dakon gen guramɨkdak, uŋun manjɨkeŋ bɨsapmon, Isip ae Babilon kɨsi manjɨkeŋ. Aŋek Pilistia, Tair ae Itopia do yaŋ yokdɨsat, ‘Uŋun yo kɨsi Jerusalem amɨn gɨn.’
Yawe da amɨn iyɨ do nandaba paŋ uŋun paŋpulugosok. Mani yokwi pakpak amɨn pabɨŋ yopban mɨktɨmon maŋ pokgoŋ.
Asisi, mɨŋat amɨnyo manji gamaŋ uŋun tasɨk tokdaŋ. Amɨn gak golgwit da ae kɨlɨ gepmaŋ dekgwit, uŋun paŋupbal abɨ mɨni ani.
Piŋkop da man madep ɨmgut da iyɨ da amɨnsi tet do yɨkdak. Dat da Telagɨ Wup Monji do ɨbeŋ yaŋ kɨlɨ yaŋ teban tagɨt. Do Monji do ɨban uŋun da tagalban yo abɨsok noman tosok uŋun ji kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋ.
Gen uŋun yaŋba nandaŋek ɨmalni kukwaŋ yɨpmaŋek Yesukon opgut.
Aŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨndap dɨwat ae tap wakga dakon dɨwat baŋ tɨmɨgek ɨleŋɨkon wɨgɨni do yoyɨgɨt. Yoyɨŋban yaŋ gɨn aŋek nin kɨsin ɨleŋɨkon tagɨsi wɨgɨgɨmaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda dɨma pasɨlgɨt.
Amɨn kɨnda “nak Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨm sɨlɨp aŋ kɨmokdot” yaŋ nandɨsak, mani gen kagani dakon kɨla tagɨ dɨma aŋek gen yokwi morapmɨ yosok kaŋ, uŋun amɨn iyɨ naŋ top aŋkewaldak, ae Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨm dakon sɨlɨp asak uŋun yo ɨsalɨsi.
Uŋun da yaŋ yak, ‘Wɨgapbo ji nak wɨsɨkdaŋ, mani dɨma nandakdaŋ.’ Ae ‘Ji nak da kokup egɨpbeŋ uŋudon arɨpmɨ dɨma wɨgɨkdaŋ’ yaŋ yak. Gen uŋun niaŋon da yak?”
Wupno gak da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋdat. Yawe, gen bamɨ dakon Piŋkop, yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ nepbi.
nido jɨgɨ morapmɨ nagon noman taŋ namɨŋakwa palɨ kɨmokdot.
Ji dɨsi nandaŋ, Kristo amɨn nin yombem dagaŋek Piŋkop dakon egɨp egɨpni tugaŋ ɨmgut.
Obip amɨn da yabekbi kabɨ paŋobɨŋ gen kokwin amɨn da ɨŋamon yopba akgwit. Agakwa mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn uŋun da mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋ nandak do yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Mani buŋon yolgwit amɨn da Sol pɨlɨn kaga aŋaŋ kokup pap dakon dam madepmon kwen awɨgɨwit. Awɨgɨ gok madep kɨndakon iyɨŋba yɨgakwan nap aŋyawot aŋakwa kosit gwagak naŋ waŋga mibɨlɨkon pɨgɨgɨt.
Do iyɨ gɨn gen emat aŋek si kɨwit. Mani dɨma kɨŋakwa Pol da mibɨ gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Telagɨ Wup da kombɨ amɨn Aisaia aŋtagap aban babɨkji do gen bamɨsi kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt:
Aisak nandaŋ gadat aŋek Jekop gat Iso gat do gɨsam yomgut. Aŋek yo don noman taŋ yomdaŋ uŋun do yoyɨgɨt.
Gak do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk abeŋ. Piŋkop Wukwisi, mango awɨgɨk do kap yokeŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋba aeni yoyɨŋakwan kosirɨ kapbɨ aŋakwan yaŋ yagɨt, “Mibɨlɨ nido? Ni gulusuŋ naŋ agɨt? Aŋatno kɨmotjak da arɨpmon yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt kosot. Do yum baljaŋek yɨpbo kɨsak.”
Ae gen kɨnda uŋun yaŋ: Mɨŋat ɨmal pak do kaŋ, gɨptɨmni tagɨ wɨtjɨni uŋun da arɨpmon gɨn pani, wɨli da pɨndak galaktok ani yaŋon da ɨmal yumaŋ nogɨ wukwi baŋ dɨma pani. Busuŋ daŋgwani dɨma paŋtɨlɨm ani, ae gol kɨndɨrɨŋyo baŋ gɨptɨmji dɨma paŋtɨlɨm ani.
Apban Piŋkop da Abraham iyɨ do mɨktɨm tɨmjok kɨnda dɨmasi ɨmgut. Mani Abraham gat yawi dɨwatni gat da on mɨktɨm don abɨdoni do yaŋ teban tok gen kɨnda yagɨt. Gen uŋun iyɨgɨt bɨsapmon Abraham monjɨ mɨni egɨpgut.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Ji Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji uŋun but gat ae nandak nandak gat kɨsisi paregek but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek egɨpni.
Yaŋba yagɨt, “Nak amɨn 4 tausen do bret 7 kabɨ pɨdaŋ yomgum bɨsapmon, ji jap dɨwat yɨk madepsi niaŋ da sɨmɨlba tugawit?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yɨk madepsi 7 kabɨ.”
Nak gengo yoldosi nandagɨm, do toktogɨsi nak aŋpulugok do tagap toki dosi nandɨsat.
Tapmɨm kalugɨ namɨŋek man bini tagɨsi tosak do kosit kɨlegɨkon nayɨŋ awɨldak.
Ae amɨn kɨnda da wain kalugɨ tɨbɨrɨ meme gɨp baŋ wasaŋbi tɨbɨrɨ kalɨpmɨkon kolesak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, wain da pukwa paptaŋ meme gɨp kɨrɨŋɨgakwa wain maŋ mudokdaŋ. Amɨn da wain kalugɨ meme gɨp kalugɨkon koleŋba wain gat meme gɨp gat kɨsi tagɨ tomal.”
Mani amɨn uŋun koŋ da yɨpmaŋ dek kɨwit amɨn da Yesu yol do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban Yesu da tobɨl kɨsak do yabegek yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
Ji dakon nandak nandak paŋupbal ak do pi aŋ amɨn uŋunyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋpak yokwi aŋ. Dɨpmɨn mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ pɨndagek uŋun da paŋtagap aban yumabi aŋpak aŋek gɨptɨm tɨmni paŋupbal aba ɨŋanisi aŋ, ae Piŋkop kwen wɨgɨk aŋ ɨmɨŋek aŋelo tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ.
Nagal si gawut do asak uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma jokgaljak. Ae lam kɨmot do asak uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma aban kɨmotjak. Pi tebai aŋakwan wɨgɨ aŋpak kɨlegɨ da aŋpak yokwi wutjɨban tapmɨmɨ mɨni akdɨsak.
Amɨn on bɨsapmon ekwaŋ uŋun amɨn yokwisi gɨn. Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asat yaŋ nandak do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda kok do yoŋ. Mani kɨnda dɨma kokdaŋ. Kombɨ amɨn Jona dakon tɨlak naŋgɨn kokdaŋ.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋek yopmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Nin yaŋsi nandamaŋ, on mɨktɨmon Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugaŋakwan nin aŋpak telagɨsi amaŋ ae gen bamɨsi baŋ yomaŋ. Ae jikon yaŋ gɨnsi agɨmaŋ. Nin on mɨktɨm dakon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi dɨma yolgumaŋ. Piŋkop da nin nandaŋ yawok nimɨŋek paŋpulugagɨt, do nin aŋpak agɨmaŋ uŋun do nandano wɨgɨsak.
“Amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek amɨn monɨŋ oden kɨnda but da abɨdosak kaŋ, uŋun nak naŋ abɨdosok. Ae amɨn kɨnda nak abɨdosak kaŋ, uŋun nak naŋ gɨn dɨma abɨdosok, Datno nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun naŋ abɨdosok.”
Yɨgakwan amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun abɨŋ burɨkon muwuk mudoni. Abɨŋ muwukba kɨla amɨn da sipsip ae meme kokwinɨkgaŋ uŋun da tɨlagon amɨn kokwinɨtdɨsak.
Piŋkopno ae Kɨla Amɨn Madepno, bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ mango aŋkɨsikeŋ.
Yesu ɨleŋon da pɨŋ kɨŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo morapmɨ da yolgwit.
Nak da iyɨ do nandaba wɨkwaŋ amɨn yaŋ yoyɨsat, ‘Ji pɨbɨt tɨdok dɨma ani.’ Ae amɨn yokwi yaŋ yoyɨsat, ‘Ji dɨsi dakon man dɨma pawɨgɨni.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da koŋni toŋ amɨn kɨnda aŋaŋ Yesukon aŋopgwit. Uŋun amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni ae kadɨm. Yesu da aŋmɨlɨp aban gen yaŋek dabɨlɨ pɨsagɨt.
Uwalno burɨ paŋtobɨlbɨ gak dagɨn nak aŋpulugaŋek yokwikon naŋ abɨdosol yaŋsi nandaŋ gamni.
Do yaŋsi nandaŋ gadaneŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu dakon nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek Piŋkop da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak. Ae uŋun amɨn kabɨ kɨsi yaŋ gɨn tɨmɨkdak.”
Koŋ uŋun Yesu da nandaŋ yoban bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨni do bɨsit tebai iyɨwit.
Yawe on gɨldat uŋun nin do nimɨk. Nin kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek but galak nandaneŋ.
Mɨŋat monjɨyono, amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomneŋ uŋun genon dagɨn dɨma yoneŋ, aŋpagon da bamɨsi aneŋ.
Nido nin yaŋsi nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt, ae uŋun da nin Yesu gat kɨsi kɨmoron baŋ paban pɨdokdamaŋ, ae uŋun da nin gat ae ji gat kɨsi tɨmɨk paŋkɨ nipban iyɨ da kapmatjok egɨpdamaŋ.
Toktogɨsi gengo abɨdaŋ kɨmokdot. Aŋapbo uŋun gen da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk namɨsak.
Kalɨpsigwan Piŋkop da yo tagɨ don noman toni do yagɨt. Yaŋ teban tok uŋun Piŋkop da Abraham gat monji gat do aŋ yomgut. Piŋkop gen papia da “gak dakon gwakgo do” yaŋ dɨma yosok. Monjɨ morapmɨ do dɨma yosok. Kaloŋɨ kɨnda dogɨn yaŋek yaŋ yosok: “Gak dakon monjɨ do.” Uŋun Monjɨ uŋun Kristo.
Amɨn kɨnda da iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨpni yum do Piŋkop do moneŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma ɨmjak.
Yawe, mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo paŋpulugaŋek yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgi bɨsapmon, nakyo kɨsi abɨdoki.
Amɨn Tagɨ da ɨŋamon mani wukwisi tokdɨsak, do gak butgo tagɨsi aŋakwan kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdɨsal. Ae amɨn morapmɨ da monjɨ uŋun altosak bɨsapmon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Meŋ da butgwan yɨtjagon da Telagɨ Wup da tugaŋ ɨban egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak. Wain ae pakbi tebanyo dɨmasi nosak.
Kokup pap yoma nagalni uŋun kwensi. Uŋun yoma kagani 12 kabɨ, ae aŋelo 12 kabɨ uŋun yoma kagakon akgaŋ. Aŋakwa Israel amɨn kabɨ 12 dakon man yoma domon tawit.
Kristo tɨlak kɨndapmon akgɨt aŋek gɨptɨmni naŋ nin dakon yokwinin ɨmekgɨt. Yokwi morap yɨpmaŋ mudaŋek aŋpak kɨlegɨ yol kɨmotneŋ mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋek agɨt. Gɨptɨmni obɨsi aŋagakwa tepmɨ pagɨt uŋun da ji paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Ae mɨŋat monjɨyo, ji meŋ datji dakon gen nandaŋek yo morapmon geni guramɨtni. Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋuden aŋpak yolni do galak tosok.
“Amɨn da ji do Yesu dakon amɨn kabɨ yaŋ yaŋek yaŋba yokwi tok, ae top gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yaŋ damni, ae yokwiyo kɨsi aŋdamni kaŋ, ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.
Epraim ae Benjamin ae Manase da bɨkbɨgon tapmɨm madepgo nolɨki. Abɨŋ nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgi.
Amɨn morapmɨ da yokwi aŋ namɨŋek uwal aŋ namaŋ. Mani gengo bamɨ dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekdat.
Yawe da toktogɨsi but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak ae amɨn kabɨni tagɨsi paŋpulugosok, do ya yaŋsi iyɨni.
Mani, Kristo da paret kaloŋɨsi kɨnda gɨn agɨt, ae uŋun paret bɨsap dagok dagogɨ mɨni taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak. Yaŋ aŋ mudaŋek Piŋkop da amɨn tet do yɨkgɨt.
Mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon mɨŋat amɨni mibɨltaŋ yomɨŋek kɨgɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
“Mani babɨknin Moses dakon gen nandaŋ guramɨt do dɨma galak tawit. Geni maba kɨŋakwan burɨkon da Isip mɨktɨmon tobɨl kɨk do nandawit.
Yesu yaŋ yaŋek gen papmon da yagɨt, “Lasarus, waŋga pɨ!”
Yo morap jobɨt pabi uŋun yo morap saŋbeŋek ae dɨma tokdaŋ. Piŋkop gat ae Sipsip Monɨŋ gat dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo uŋun kokup papmon tosak. Ae Piŋkop dakon oman amɨn da gawak ɨmdaŋ.
Tepmɨ kɨmagakwan monjɨ gwayoni datni mɨni egɨpni, ae mɨŋatni sakwabat egɨpjak dosi nandɨsat.
Nin kɨsitnin da pi madepsi amaŋ. Nin da jobɨt paneŋ do yoŋ, mani Piŋkop da yo tagɨ aŋyomjak do bɨsit iyamaŋ. Nin do yo yokwisi aŋ nimɨŋakwa yaworɨsi egek jɨgɨ uŋun guramɨkgamaŋ.
Piŋkop da ji do tagɨsi nandaŋek Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do bɨkbɨk damgut. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, Kristo dakon man do jɨgɨyo kɨsi pani do nandaban tagɨsi asak.
Moses da nak do gen mandagɨt. Geni do nandaba bamɨ asak tam, nakyo kɨsi nandaŋ gadaŋ nabam.
Uŋun Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon tɨlɨm madepni da kagagwan egɨpni do nandɨsak. Yaŋ do aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi nin da yaŋ teŋteŋagɨmaŋ uŋun da ji kɨlɨ yaŋ damgut.
Abɨŋ Jerusalem amɨn yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep altagɨt uŋun dukwan yɨkdak? Nin gɨkni gɨldat wɨsak tetgɨn da kaŋek gawak ɨm do abamaŋ.”
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morap egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ, ji Yawe aŋkɨsini. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨn morap ji mani yaŋ aŋkɨsini.
Asisi, Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugok do pi madepsi agɨt, do nin wagol tagɨsisi nandamaŋ.
Yaŋba Pailat da aeni yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn ji da ‘Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep’ yaŋ iyaŋ, niaŋ aŋ ɨbeŋ do nandaŋ?”
Mani, amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop yolek yo kabɨni do nandaban arɨpmɨ taŋ namaŋ yaŋ nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yo bamɨsi tɨmɨkdak.
Do ji genji dɨ yaŋ paŋmɨlɨp ak do nandaŋ kaŋ, gen kokwin muwut muwut bɨsapmon tagɨ yaŋ paŋmɨlɨp ani.
Yaŋdo, notnoni, ji kokup kɨdat gawak yomyom aŋpak yɨpmaŋ degek pasal kɨni.
Yawe da paŋgɨsam aban mɨŋat monjɨyoni morapmɨ ɨreŋ toŋ, ae bulmakauniyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn ɨreŋ toŋ.
Nak aŋpak kɨlegɨsi agɨm, do Yawe da kobogɨ do yo tagɨsi morapmɨ namgut. Suŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨm do aŋek Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi aŋ namgut.
Yawe, gak bɨsitno do mɨrak pakyaŋsi yopbi. Nak do bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi do yaŋ tɨdosot. Yaŋ ɨlɨtno nandaki.
Piŋkop gen papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Amɨn kɨnda egɨp egɨpni tagɨsi noman taŋakwan bɨsap tagɨsi kok do nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen yokwi dɨma yosak, ae top dɨma yosak.
Bɨsit yaŋ aŋek namɨn da noman tosak yaŋ do wasok kɨnda awit. Tɨp wasok aba Matias da noman tagɨt. Noman taŋek yabekbi 11 kabɨkon saŋbegɨt.
Yawe uŋun wagɨl tagɨsisi, do aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmorɨsi. Uŋun kokup kɨdat morap yapmaŋdak, do si pasal ɨmɨmɨsi.
Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi da yoyɨŋdet uŋun agɨt do tamtam yawit.
Amɨn kɨnda amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun amɨn amɨn do aŋpak yokwi dɨma aŋyomɨsak. Yaŋdo, amɨn kɨnda amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun gen teban yol kɨmokdok.
Kɨŋakwan mɨŋat kɨnda uŋungwan agɨpgɨt. Uŋun dagaŋ mok aŋek yawini maŋakwa bɨlak 12 yaŋ agɨt, mani amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋkɨlek agagɨ.
Yaŋdo, yo dabɨl da si pɨndarɨ uŋun do dabɨlnin uŋudon dɨma yɨpmaŋ gamaŋ. Nin yo dɨma pɨndarɨ uŋun do dabɨlnin kak gɨmansi uŋudon gɨn yɨpmaŋ gamaŋ. Nido yo dabɨl da pɨndarɨ uŋun bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn tokdaŋ, mani yo dɨma pɨndarɨ uŋun toktogɨsi tokdaŋ.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban kosiron kɨŋ Itopia amɨn kɨnda kagɨt. Uŋun amɨn gapman dakon amɨn madepni kɨnda egɨpgut. Itopia dakon kɨla amɨn madep mɨŋat Kandasi dakon moneŋ kɨla amɨn madepni egɨpgut. Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gawak ɨm do Jerusalem opgut.
Wupno gak da kapmatjok gol awɨldak. Aŋakwan kɨsitgo amɨnsi tet da nak tebaisi abɨdosok.
Uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon mibɨlɨ kɨlɨ nandawit, nido Piŋkop da iyɨ kɨlɨ yolɨgɨt.
Kalɨp dabɨlɨ mɨni egɨpgut amɨn uŋun ae kosirɨ kɨnda gat iyɨŋba opban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Piŋkop man madep ɨmɨŋek yaŋ teban tok tebaisi kɨnda aŋek gen bamɨ gɨn yoki. Uŋun amɨn uŋun yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨnda yaŋ nandamaŋ.”
Gen teban uŋun jap ɨsalɨ amɨn da don naŋ mudoŋ uŋun do yoŋ. Amɨn dagɨn gen teban uŋun yopmaŋek uŋun baŋ dayɨŋ dekgaŋ.
Yaŋban Pita da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak amɨn tɨlak gen yoyɨl uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ tagɨ niyɨŋbɨ nandaneŋ?”
Kɨsi morap yabekbi dagɨn dɨma ekwaŋ, ae kɨsi morap kombɨ amɨn dagɨn dɨma ekwaŋ, ae kɨsi morap yoyɨŋdet dagɨn dɨma ekwaŋ, ae kɨsi morap wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agak amɨn dagɨn dɨma ekwaŋ,
Pakbi uŋun da telagɨ pakbi sogok dakon tɨlak asak. Piŋkop da ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do telagɨ pakbikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak. Telagɨ pakbi uŋun gɨptɨm garak wɨrɨrɨtjak do dɨma, uŋun Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨni egɨp do dakon tɨlak asak. Ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do Piŋkop da Yesu Kristo kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt.
Nin nandamaŋ, Kristo da pi aban gen teban yo ɨsalɨ agɨt, do mɨŋat amɨn morap Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun Piŋkop da dabɨlon amɨn kɨlegɨ dagoŋ.
Amɨn morapmɨ da Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek moneŋ ɨlɨkgaŋ nin uŋudeŋ dɨma amaŋ. Piŋkop da iyɨ pi uŋun nimgut, ae nin top dɨma yomaŋ. Nin egɨp egɨpnin Kristokon tosok, ae Piŋkop da dabɨlon gen nimgut uŋun but dasi nandaŋek yaŋ teŋteŋomaŋ.
Nak yokwi kɨnda dɨma aŋgabeŋ do aŋek gengo butnokon yopgum.
Toktogɨsi yokwi ak dogɨn yoŋ. Iyɨ do nandaba wɨkwaŋ do yum pɨndagaki iyɨ da paron yokwalni. Jobɨt tɨmɨtdo dakon gen ae top gen gat kɨsi yoŋ.
Yoyɨŋban Pita da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gaga abɨsal kaŋ, yaŋbɨ pakbi kwenon da bamaŋ bamaŋ gagon opbo.”
Ji dakon babɨkji da kalɨp kombɨ amɨn kɨsi morap do yo yokwisi aŋ yomgwit. Aŋek kombɨ amɨn dɨwarɨ Amɨn Kɨlegɨ don apjak do yaŋkwok awit babɨkji da uŋun amɨn dapba kɨmakgwit. Uŋun Amɨn Kɨlegɨ ji da uwal da kɨsiron yɨpba kɨlɨ aŋakba kɨmakgɨt.
Gen uŋun bamɨ. Do gak aŋpakni paŋmɨlɨp aŋek Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmotni do gen tebaisi yoyɨki.
Pakbi dabɨl kaloŋɨkon da pakbi si noknogɨ ae amɨn da dɨma noknogɨ yo kɨsi arɨpmɨ tagɨ potporɨ?
Nak da but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmagek uŋun gat toktogɨsi egɨpdɨsat. Uwal gat emat wamni bɨsapmon nak da aŋpulugaŋapbo pabɨŋ yopdɨsak.
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ da Ananias yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨki! Uŋun amɨn nak dakon man yaŋ teŋteŋosak do manjɨgɨm. Uŋun da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ, ae uŋun dakon kɨla amɨn madep kabɨni, ae Israel amɨn kabɨ kɨsikon mano yaŋ teŋteŋosak do yabetdɨsat.
Mani nin Kristo gat kɨsi kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨmaŋ, do gen teban da nin dɨma tɨmɨkdak, nin pulugaŋbi da ekwamaŋ. Do abɨsok Piŋkop do oman amaŋ uŋun Telagɨ Wup da kosit kalugɨ nolɨŋakwan oman amaŋ. Gen teban papiakon mandabi uŋun yolek oman dɨma amaŋ.
Bɨsitno pakyaŋsi tagɨsi nandaŋek gen kobogɨ nayɨki. Jɨgɨ uŋun da nak aŋupbal akdɨsak.
Yawe, nak wadak wadak amɨn, do bɨsitno nandaŋek aŋpulugoki do nandɨsat.
Mani abɨsok nak da yaŋ dayɨsat, mɨŋatgo kwɨnɨk yɨpbɨ kwan wɨli kaluk pasak kaŋ, eni gak da gulusuŋ al, do mɨŋatgo da yumabi asak. Aŋakwan wɨli uŋun kaluk pasak uŋun kɨsi yumabi asak. Do mɨŋatgo yumabi dɨma aŋakwan ɨsal dogɨn dɨma kwɨnɨkgi.”
Yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Mesaia, mani Kristo yaŋ iyaŋ, uŋun don apjak yaŋ nandɨsat. Uŋun da abɨŋ yo morap niyɨŋ paŋteŋteŋ aŋ mudokdɨsak.”
Iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Gɨldat pɨgɨk do aŋakwan ji yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Kwen gami asak, do aŋwa bɨsap tagɨsi.’
Aŋakwan Epikorian ae Stoik amɨn kabɨ bamot uŋun dakon nandak nandak amɨn dɨwarɨ da opba Pol gat gen emat aŋakwa dɨ da yaŋ yawit, “On gen pakbi amɨn ni gen naŋ yosok?” Ae dɨ da yawit, “Mɨktɨm dubagɨkon nani dakon piŋkop uŋun do bo yosok?” Pol da Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋek Yesu do yoyɨgɨt ae amɨn kɨmoron da pɨdoni do kɨsi yoyɨgɨt uŋun do aŋek gen uŋun yawit.
Yokwi uŋun asal uŋun yopmaŋek but tobɨl a. Aŋek butgokon nandak nandak yokwi toŋ uŋun wɨrɨrɨk gamjak do Amɨn Tagɨ bɨsit iyɨki.
“Yo telagɨ pɨŋan do dɨma yomni. Yoba tobɨlek ɨnjɨŋ dabam. Ae kɨndɨrɨŋji tagɨsi bɨt do dɨma yomni. Yoba kandap da dɨ bamaŋ mɨsɨŋɨkbam.”
Yawe mani wukwisi. Nin telagɨ kabapnikon wɨgek Piŋkop da kokup papgwan pɨgek aŋkɨsiŋ kɨmotneŋ kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi.
Oman monjɨ kɨnda amɨn tagɨni dakon galaktokni nandaŋek tagap taŋek galaktokni dɨma yoljak kaŋ, amɨn tagɨ da kosirɨ morapmɨ baljokdɨsak.
Aŋakwan Pita da ɨlɨkban pɨdaŋakwan yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Pɨdaŋ at! Nak madepgo dɨma.”
Monjɨno Onesimus do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ ɨbi do gayɨsat. Dam tebanon egapbo Onesimus nagon apgut bɨsapmon, nak da Kristo bamɨsi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmjak do aŋpulugagɨm. Do uŋun monjɨnosi yombem agɨt.
Egɨp egɨp dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun wukwisi. Piŋkop do moneŋ ɨmɨŋek mɨktɨmon bɨsap dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨ aŋaŋ kɨneŋ dakon kosit kɨnda dɨmasi tosok.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Liwai pɨdaŋ yo morapni kɨsi yopmaŋek Yesu yolgɨt.
Mani nak gak da kapmatjok egɨsat, uŋun da tagɨsi. Amɨn Tagɨ Yawe, gak da nak tagɨsi aŋkutnosol. Nak yo morap agɨl do yaŋ teŋteŋok abeŋ.
Kalɨp Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨma egɨpgwit, mani abɨsok mɨŋat amɨn kabɨnisi ekwaŋ. Kalɨp Piŋkop dakon bupmɨni dɨma abɨdawit, mani abɨsok kɨlɨ abɨdaŋ.
Mani pɨlɨn tuk dakon yo gat, ae amɨn aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋ gat, ae top yoŋ amɨn uŋun kokup papmon dɨma pɨgɨni. Mɨŋat amɨnyo Sipsip Monɨŋ dakon egɨp egɨp papiakon mani toŋ, uŋun dagɨn uŋun kokup papmon pɨgɨkdaŋ.
Gen tebango do but galaksi nandɨsat. Gen teban morapgo uŋun do but dasi galak tosot.
Yesu kɨmakgɨt da aeni pɨdagɨt yaŋsi nandaŋ gadamaŋ. Yaŋ agɨt do nin yaŋsi nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da amɨn Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit amɨn uŋun Yesu gat tɨmɨkban apdaŋ.
Mani dɨma. Gak tedepmɨ yaŋgok egɨsal. Gak tedepmɨsi dɨma ae mɨrɨmɨsi yo dɨma. Yaŋ do aŋek gen kaganokon da gak wandɨtdɨsat.
Not kabɨ, nin jɨgɨ ae tepmɨyo paŋek ji da nandaŋ gadat tebai aŋ uŋun dakon geni nandaŋek uŋun da butnin paŋteban asak.
Yawe, gen kagano do kɨla tagɨsi aŋaki gen yokwi kɨnda dɨma yokeŋ.
Uŋun do aŋek on amɨn nandak nandak kositni kɨlɨ sopgwit. Ae gen kalugɨ dɨ gat nandak do kurak taŋek mɨrakni paŋ sopgwit ae dabɨlni wamaŋ sopgwit. Yaŋ dɨma awit tam, dabɨlni ae mɨrakni ae butniyo da kaŋ nandaŋyo aba pɨsaŋban nagon tobɨlba nak da paŋmɨlɨp abom.’ ”
Amɨn morap gak do nandaŋ gadaŋ uŋun mayaktok dɨma pani, mani amɨn paŋkewalgaŋ amɨn uŋun mayaktok pakdaŋ.
Jomjom dɨma abeŋ. Gen tebango tepmɨsi guramɨkgeŋ.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨno Isip amɨn da yo yokwi morapmɨ aŋ yomɨŋakwa kɨlɨ pɨndat. Ae kunam wuwɨkni kɨlɨ nandat do aŋek Isip da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨt do pɨsat. Moses kɨlɨ apbɨ yabekgo Isip mɨktɨmon kɨki.’
bo notno ɨsal dogɨn yokwi aŋ ɨmgum, bo uwalno dakon yo ɨsal dogɨn kabo tɨmɨkgɨm kaŋ,
Mani Piŋkop da uwalni dakon busuŋni paŋsulɨtdɨsak. Uŋun aŋpak yokwi toktogɨsi aŋ amɨn paŋtasɨk akdɨsak.
Yaŋ kaŋ, gen teban nido tosok? Uŋun yaŋ: Piŋkop da yokwi dakon mibɨlɨ altaŋ teŋteŋosak do nandagɨt. Do yaŋ teban tok da kwenon gen tebanyo kɨsi nimgut. Gen teban sigɨn taŋakwan wɨgɨ monjɨ uŋun altagɨt. Uŋun kalɨp Piŋkop da yo ɨm do yaŋ teban tok agɨt. Piŋkop da gen teban uŋun aŋelo do yoban uŋun da binap amɨn Moses do yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aba binap amɨn uŋun da nin do nimgut.
Yaŋban Jon da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nin kaŋapno amɨn kɨnda da gak da manon koŋ yolban kamaŋ. Mani nin da kabɨkon nani kɨnda dɨma, do yaŋsop aŋ ɨmɨmaŋ.”
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit uŋun dɨma kɨmagek Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandawit. Asi, yokwi pakpak da kɨmokgoŋ uŋudeŋ yokwi awit dakon kobogɨ do kɨmot awit, mani Piŋkop da iyɨ yombem wup egɨpni do nandagɨt do Kristo dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandawit.
Nak amɨn dakon moneŋ ae yo kabɨni do pɨndak galaktok dɨma agɨm.
Gak kwensi kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamogokon yɨgek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morap gak da kapmatjok abɨŋ muwutni do yoyɨki.
Paŋdetni da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da gen kɨnda yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Elaija mibɨltok abɨŋakwan Kristo uŋun buŋon apjak.’ Gen uŋun nido yoŋ?”
Jɨgɨsi nandaŋek wagɨlsi yokwi tokdɨsat yaŋ nandɨsat bɨsapmon, Yawe niaŋsi abeŋ uŋun gak da nandɨsal. Kosiron yokwalgeŋ do amɨn da pat pɨwit.
Israel amɨn nandaŋ gadat aŋek Jeriko kokup pap aŋgwasɨŋakwa gɨldat 7 kabɨ agɨt. Aŋakwa tɨp dam madep tuwɨl kɨgɨt.
Nak tepmɨsi abɨŋ dandak do nandɨsat, mani papiakon gen on ji do mandakeŋ kaŋ tagɨsi yaŋ nandɨsat.
Aŋek ji kɨlɨ amɨn kalugɨ dagawit. Asi, Piŋkop da iyɨ ji paŋkaluk aŋek nandak nandak tagɨsi damɨŋakwan amɨn kalugɨ dagaŋek iyɨ yombemsi ekwaŋ.
Aŋakwa uŋudon gɨn wudɨp madepsi kɨnda aŋek dam teban yut dakon gwak paŋ kwakwalɨkgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan yoma kɨsi wɨtdal kɨŋ mudaŋakwa amɨn morap kɨsit kandapnikon yo paŋteban awit uŋun kɨsi wɨtdal kɨ mawit.
Paŋdetni gen uŋun nandaŋek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “Nin kabɨkon da namɨn dasi akdɨsak?”
Ji kɨndap gelɨ yopba pɨgakwa mɨktɨmon tebai akgaŋ, ae yut da gwak tebai da kwenon tebai akgaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon tebai atni. Aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi amɨn da dayɨŋ dekgwit uŋun tebaisi nandaŋ gadaŋ kɨmotni. Aŋek bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋ kɨmotni.
Yum nandaŋaki butnokon da aŋpak yokwi ak do dɨma nandakeŋ. Ae yum nandaŋaki amɨn yokwi gat muwuk agek yokwi dɨma aneŋ. Yum nandaŋaki uŋun dakon jap noknok bɨsap madepmon uŋun gat dɨma yɨtneŋ.
Do gak moneŋgo abɨdaŋek kɨ. Naga da galaktogon amɨn buŋon abeŋ uŋun gat moneŋ tɨlak kaloŋɨkon damɨsat.
Paŋdet dɨwarɨ notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “Gen uŋun niyɨsak dakon mibɨlɨ niaŋ? Yaŋ yak, ‘Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok nak saŋbeŋek ae dɨma nandakdaŋ. Ae tɨmɨsok dɨ egek donjok nandakdaŋ.’ Ae yaŋ yak, ‘Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: nak Daron kɨkdɨsat.’
Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu aeni apjak bɨsapmon yo nido nandaŋek ɨŋamnikon tebai agek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aneŋ? Ae pi agɨmaŋ dakon bamɨ yo ninaŋ yolɨno pi tagɨsi awit yaŋ nindasak? Nin ji do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aneŋ.
Amɨn da yubam tam, moneŋ madepsi tɨmɨk yoni mɨni amɨn do yomnom.”
Datno nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun da iyɨ pi asat uŋun joŋɨgek yaŋ teŋteŋok asak. Ji tekni bɨsap kɨnda dɨma nandawit, bo tomni bɨsap kɨnda dɨma kawit.
Yaŋ aba Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat monjɨyo yopba nagon apgut. Dɨma kɨrɨŋɨk yomni. Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun amɨn mɨŋat monjɨyo da tɨlagon ekwaŋ uŋuden amɨn dakon.”
Kɨsirɨ amɨn tet da gɨk 7 kabɨ tɨmɨkgɨt. Ae emat agak sɨba geni terɨ terɨ ae geni tepmɨsi uŋun gen kaganigwan da pawɨŋ tagɨt. Gɨldat da tebaisi wɨsɨsak uŋudeŋ tomno dabɨlni madepsi teŋteŋagɨt.
Mani kɨla amɨn madep nak naga Piŋkop do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdɨsat. Ae Piŋkop yol do uŋun da manon da yaŋ teban tok awit amɨn, uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani. Mani uŋun da top amɨn dakon gen kagani sopdɨsak.
Piŋkop, gak gen mapmɨt dɨma abi. Gak ɨsal dɨma yɨkgi. Piŋkop, gak ɨsal dɨma egɨpbi.
Kɨŋek mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda tap binap tosok uŋun mani Saiprus kaŋek uŋun gwandeŋ tetgɨn do taŋakwan nin amɨn tetgɨn da yapgumaŋ. Yapmaŋek Siria mɨktɨmon kɨŋ kokup Tair uŋudon tap wakga paŋkɨ akgɨt. Agakwan tap wakgakon pi monjɨ yɨk ɨlɨgakwa
“Do yaŋ dayɨsat, nak da kombɨ amɨn ae nandak nandak amɨn ae yoyɨŋdet amɨn yabekgo jikon apdaŋ. Apba ji da uŋun amɨn dɨwarɨ yolba pasal kokupmɨ kokupmɨ kɨkdaŋ. Aŋakwa dɨwarɨ tɨmɨgek dapba kɨmotdaŋ, ae dɨwarɨ tɨlak kɨndapmon dapdaŋ, ae dɨwarɨ muwut muwut yutjikon nap kɨrɨŋbaŋ baljokdaŋ.
Nak Datno arɨpmɨ tagɨ iyɨko uŋun da aŋelo 72 tausen yabekban abɨŋ nak tagɨ aŋpulugoni. Gak uŋun dɨma nandɨsal, ma?
Sisaria gɨldat morapmɨ egɨpgumal do Pestus da Pol dakon geni amɨn madep iyɨŋek yagɨt, “Peliks da amɨn kɨnda dam tebanon yɨpgut da egɨsak.
Laion da joŋ kɨlap nok do yaŋ tɨdaŋek gen kagani aŋtaŋ kwaŋ, uŋudeŋ uwalno da nak aŋupbal ak do aŋ.
Tap da tagaŋ wɨŋek ɨleŋon mɨktɨm wɨtjisak ae pakbi tek maŋakwa wɨwɨk madep asak, uŋudeŋ gɨn jɨgɨ morapmɨ da wɨtjɨŋ namɨŋakwa yokwisi nandɨsat.
Nin amɨn da pi amaŋ uŋun do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek dɨma moni yaŋon da pi amaŋon gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma amaŋ.
“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji kaŋba tapmɨmni ae tɨlɨmni gat gɨkwemon da apban kokdaŋ.
Gɨptɨmji uŋun Kristo dakon gɨptɨm dɨwatni uŋun dɨma nandaŋ, ma? Do nak Kristo dakon gɨptɨm dɨwatni kosit mɨŋaron saŋbekeŋ kaŋ uŋun tagɨ, ma? Uŋun dɨmasi!
Dɨma kurak toni do nandamaŋ. Nandaŋ gadat aŋ kɨmagek Piŋkop da yo nim do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun tɨmɨt do but yaworon da jomjom aŋ amɨn dakon aŋpak baŋ yol do nandamaŋ.
Israel amɨn dakon Piŋkop Telagɨsi bɨsap morapmɨ aŋkewalakwa nandaban yokwi tok aŋyomgut.
Uŋun amɨn maŋ mudokdaŋ. Mani nin pɨdaŋek tebai atdamaŋ.
Do aŋek mɨŋat amɨni tɨmɨk paŋkɨgɨt. Aŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ iyɨ do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt uŋun kap yaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek kɨwit.
Bɨsap kɨnda uŋun gat egek yaŋsi ani do yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Jerusalem kokup pap dɨma yɨpmaŋ detni. Datno da yo dam do yaŋ teban tagɨt uŋun abɨdok do jomjom ani. Nak kalɨp yo uŋun do kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm.
Mani Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo da tapmɨmon Piŋkop da tapmɨm nimɨŋakwan emaron teban tomaŋ, do Piŋkop ya yaŋsi iyamaŋ.
Yaŋdo, not kabɨ, kombɨ gen yok do galagɨ madepsi nandani, ae gen ŋwakŋwarɨ yogok dakon kosit sopsop dɨma ani.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ do nandaŋ yawotjok dɨ dɨmasi aŋ yomaŋ. Gen pap yaŋek iyɨ dakon man pawɨkwaŋ.
Mani busuŋ daŋgwanji kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma tasɨk tokdɨsak.
Uŋun gɨldat da pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo Yesu boron yɨgek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do kɨno.”
Amɨn morap but kalɨpmon ekwaŋ uŋun aŋpak Piŋkop da galak tosok uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
Asisi dayɨsat, oman monjɨ amɨn tagɨni dɨma yapmaŋdak. Ae gen aŋkɨsak amɨn da yabet amɨn dɨma yapmaŋdak.
Nak da Atemas bo Tikikus kɨnda gak do yabekgo opjak bɨsapmon gak nak do Nikopolis kokupmon op do kosit wɨsɨk dakon pi madepsi abi. Nido nak ais bɨsapmon Nikopolis egɨp do nandɨsat.
Yesu saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ dakon binap amɨnon apgwit. Ae Yesu dakon yawi mumumni mawiron apgwit. Uŋun yawi da yokwinin wɨrɨrɨkdak, do uŋun Abel dakon yawi yapmaŋdak. Abel dakon yawi da kobogɨ tɨmɨt do yosok.
Nak amɨn da pakbi do tep toŋ uŋun da tɨlak gen tebango do galagɨsi nandɨsat. Uŋun nandak do but dasi galak tosot.
Don aeni kwa Josep da notni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Nak naga ji dakon notji Josep.’ Yaŋ aban kɨla amɨn madep Pero da Josep dakon yawi dɨwatni dakon mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨndakyo agɨt.
Yawe da aŋpulugagɨt do nandaŋek mani aŋenokgeŋ. Jɨgɨni toŋ amɨn da uŋun do nandaŋek but galaksi nandani.
Nak dɨpmɨn dɨma pokgeŋ.
Kɨla amɨn madep dakon mɨŋatni iyɨ dakon yutgwan egɨsak. Uŋun mɨŋat tagɨsi. Ɨmal pak uŋun malɨ gol baŋ wasaŋbi uŋun baŋ paŋtɨlɨm abi.
nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt. Nin da nin aŋpak kɨlegɨ kɨnda agɨmaŋ do aŋek nin yokwikon baŋ dɨma tɨmɨkgɨt. Iyɨ dakon bupmɨ do aŋek yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt. Nin sugaŋban monjɨ ŋakŋak kalugɨ yombem aŋapno Telagɨ Wup da egɨp egɨp kalugɨ nimgut.
Uŋun do Piŋkop da mɨŋat wɨli kɨlɨ paŋmuwukgɨt, do amɨn da dɨma paŋwasekdo.”
Kɨŋ Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek yo tagɨsi aŋyomgut uŋun pɨndakgɨt. Pɨndagek but galaksi nandaŋek Amɨn Tagɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ but dasi nandaŋek yolni do yoyɨŋ paŋteban agɨt.
Nido, Piŋkop da yaŋ yagɨt: “Mɨŋat eyo kɨlɨ abi, ji yumabi aŋpak dɨma ani.” Ae yaŋ kɨsi yagɨt: “Ji amɨn dɨma dapba kɨmotni.” Do yumabi aŋpak dɨma agɨl, mani amɨn kɨnda aŋakbɨ kɨmakgɨt kaŋ, gak gen teban morap tuwɨl tuwɨl amɨn kɨnda dagagɨl.
Yaŋ yaŋban aeni Yesu abɨdok do awit, mani dɨma abɨdaŋakwa kɨgɨt.
Amɨn kɨsisi mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ tɨlɨmni gat ae yo masɨ masɨmɨsi asak uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomni.
Sabat bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek yoyɨŋdet agɨt. Uŋudon amɨn kɨsirɨ amɨnsi tetni gɨreŋɨkbi kɨnda egɨpgut.
Ji kɨsisi Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek Piŋkop dakon gwakni dagawit.
Nido ji gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon yo ŋwakŋwarɨ dɨ do nandak nandak dɨmasi agɨm. Yesu Kristo, ae tɨlak kɨndapmon kɨmot agɨt uŋun dogɨn nandagɨm.
Aŋek gen morap amɨn morapmɨ da dabɨlon yaŋ teŋteŋaŋapbo nandagɨl, uŋun Piŋkop gen tebai abɨdoŋ amɨn do yobi. Aŋaki uŋun da amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsi tagɨ yoyɨŋdetni.
Asisi, amɨn Piŋkop do pasal ɨmaŋ uŋun yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak. Aŋakwan tɨlɨmni mɨktɨmninon tokdɨsak.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak naga pɨdot pɨdot ae egɨp egɨp ami. Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨŋek kɨmotjak kaŋ, kalugɨ sigɨn egɨpdɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋek monjɨ uŋun abɨdaŋ maba waŋga pɨgakwan aŋakba kɨmakgɨt. “Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Don pi dakon ami da abɨŋ pi kɨla amɨn niaŋsi aŋyomdɨsak?
Piŋkop da ninyo kɨsi paŋpulugosak do bɨsit ani. Bɨsit iyɨŋba Kristo dakon gen kalɨp pasɨlɨ tagɨt uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋoneŋ do Piŋkop da kosit yɨpmaŋ nimjak. Nin geni aŋteŋteŋ ano mɨŋat amɨnyo da dɨma galak taŋek dam tebanon nepgwit.
Nandani, bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋtak. Asi bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun, do ji bɨrɨpmɨgɨ yutjikon kɨŋ kɨŋ akdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek nak nepba naga gɨn egɨpdɨsat. Mani Dat nak gat egɨsak do naga gɨnsi dɨma egɨpbeŋ.
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ, abɨsok nak nido jomjom asat? Nak gak do nandaŋ gadaŋek gak dagɨn aŋpulugoki do jomjom asat.
Mibɨltok yo noman taŋ namdaŋ uŋun pɨndagek don Timoti tepmɨsi yabekgo opjak.
Uŋun da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak paŋmuwukbi Piladelpia kokup papmon ekwaŋ dakon aŋeloni do gen yaŋ mandaki: Nak telagɨsi, ae aŋpak bamɨsi dakon ami. Nak da Dewit dakon yoma wɨtdal abɨdosot. Nak da yoma wɨtdaldat, amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma sop sopmɨ. Ae nak da yoma sopmaŋdat, amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma wɨtdalɨ. Gen on yɨpbo gagon obɨsak.
Yesu da Galili Pakbi Ɨdap kɨdɨpmɨŋ agek tap kɨlap do pi agak amɨn bamorɨ pɨndakgɨt. Kɨnda uŋun mani Saimon (ae mani kɨnda Pita), uŋun gat ae padɨge Andru gat pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun amɨn bamot tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni pakbi ɨdapgwan mabal pɨgakwan egɨpgumal.
Moses uŋun bɨlakni 40 aŋakwan Israel amɨn notni kɨŋ pɨndat do nandagɨt.
Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madepmon wɨgek paret yopyop tamo da kapmatjok yɨkgɨt. Yɨgek pɨndagakwan amɨn morapmɨ da paret yopgwit. Moneŋ morapmɨ taŋ yomgwit amɨn uŋun da moneŋ madep yopgwit.
Telagɨ oman amɨngo dapmaŋek bumjotni yo ɨsalɨ yaŋ nandaŋek yum pɨndagakwa sɨŋgɨŋ gat ae joŋ pɨŋan gat da gɨptɨmni noŋ.
Bamɨ mɨni pɨndagek pi kɨla amɨni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Nandaki. Nak bɨlak kapbɨ abɨŋ pik kɨndap dakon sopmɨ wɨsɨŋ wɨsɨŋ aŋek mɨni pɨndakdat. Yaŋ do kɨndap on si pasɨki. Mɨktɨm dakon tapmɨm nido ɨsal dogɨn ɨlɨk mudosok?’
Koŋni toŋ amɨn kɨnda Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon yɨkgɨt. Uŋun da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
Yaŋ yaŋban Sunduk da Yesu iyɨŋ aŋaŋ ɨleŋ dubagɨsi kɨndakon wɨgek uŋudon gɨn on mɨktɨmon mɨktɨm madep madep morap kɨsi yolɨŋban pɨndakgɨt.
Yawe aŋkɨsiŋek kulele tɨdoni. Gita napmɨ 10 kabɨ toŋ uŋun tɨdaŋakwa geni galagɨsi nandɨsak.
Piŋkop da gen bamɨ morap yaŋban nandagɨm uŋun baŋ dayɨsat. Aŋapbo ji nak nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do nandaŋ. Abraham yaŋ dɨma agɨt.
Yaŋ pɨndagek yoyɨgɨt, “Nido dɨpmɨn pokgoŋ? Paŋkewalon dɨma moni yaŋ do pɨdaŋ bɨsit abɨt.”
Nin amɨn dɨwarɨ da iyɨ dakon man pawɨkwaŋ nin yaŋ dɨma aneŋ. Ae nin dakon aŋpak uŋun gat arɨp yaŋ dɨma yoneŋ. Uŋun amɨn da iyɨ gat tɨlak aŋek aŋpakni kokwinɨkgaŋ. Ae notni dakon aŋpak iyɨ dakon gat tɨlak aŋek kokwinɨkgaŋ. Yaŋ aŋ amɨn uŋun nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma.
Gen teban morap kɨsi on gen teban kaloŋgwan gɨn tosok: “Gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.”
Yaŋ mudaŋakwan Yesu naŋgɨn kawit. Yo ɨleŋon altaŋba pɨndakgwit uŋun iyɨ dogɨn nandaba tawit. Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn dɨ dɨma yoyɨwit.
Nak ji mayagɨ dam do gen on dɨma mandɨsat. Ji monjɨ gwayono but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat, do nawa gen on dayɨsat.
Pol da buŋon nak dakon ɨŋamno ae dɨma kokdaŋ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt do bupmɨsi nandawit. Bupmɨ yaŋsi nandaŋek Pol aŋaŋ tap wakgakon aŋkɨwit.
Kɨŋ Siria ae Silisia mɨktɨmon agek Pol da paŋmuwukbi morap yoyɨŋ paŋteban agɨt.
Jikon gomanji kɨnda dɨ taŋ daban. Gomanji kaloŋɨ kɨndagɨn tagɨt da tosok uŋun ji da arɨpmɨ dɨma sopsopmɨ. Goman uŋun amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Nido amɨn kɨnda amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun gen teban yol kɨmokdok.
Ae Piŋkop gen kɨnda da yaŋ yosok: “Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ ji Piŋkop dakon amɨn kabɨ gat but galaksi nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.”
Jon iyɨ teŋteŋɨ dɨma. Uŋun da teŋteŋɨ dakon but pɨso gen gɨn yagɨt.
Yaŋ yagɨt, do gak obip amɨngo tebaisi yoyɨŋbɨ tɨp kɨnam dakon kɨla tebaisi aŋakwa wɨgɨ gɨldat kapbɨ mudoni. Yaŋ dɨma ani kaŋ, paŋdetni da abɨŋ bumjotni kabo aŋkɨsɨbɨŋ aŋkɨŋek Yesu kɨlɨ pɨdak yaŋ amɨn yoyɨkdaŋ. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, mibɨltok iyɨ do top gen yagɨt uŋun yapmaŋek top gen yokdaŋ uŋun da yo yokwisi kɨnda akdɨsak.”
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Sisaria Pilipai kokup pap uŋun dakon kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ tawit uŋudon kɨwit. Kɨŋek paŋdetni kosiron yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat amɨn da nak do namɨn yaŋ yoŋ?”
Mani ji uwalji do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomni. Aŋek amɨn do yo yomɨŋek sopni do dɨma yoyɨni. Piŋkop da yokwi pakpak ya yaŋ dɨma iyaŋ amɨn uŋun do yo tagɨ yumsi yomɨsak, do ji aŋpak tagɨsi ani kaŋ, Piŋkop Wɨkwisi da kobogɨ do yo tagɨsi damɨŋakwan monjinisi egɨpdaŋ.
Ae Kwen Kokupgwan da amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ yagɨt, “Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨno, ji kokup pap uŋun yɨpmaŋek abɨgɨni. Aŋpak yokwi asak, do uŋun gat agek yokwi dɨ abam. Ae yokwi agɨt dakon kobogɨ tɨmɨtdɨsak, do jiyo kɨsi dɨ tɨmɨkbam.
“Amɨn kɨnda da gen pikon gep do gen yaŋ gaban kaŋ, jil gen pi tamokon kɨk do aŋek kosiron kɨŋek gen uŋun tepmɨsi aŋmɨlɨp ak do pi anjil. Yaŋ dɨma anjil kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn da kɨsiron gepban uŋun da obip amɨn da kɨsiron gepban dam teban yutnon gepdɨsak.
Uŋun uwalnin yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmni yaŋon da dɨma yomaŋ. Uŋun notnin yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek, nawa gen iyɨni.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da pɨndak mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nidosi butjikon da nandak nandak yokwi uŋun nandaŋ?
Nido, Amɨn Tagɨ da amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨlani aŋek bɨsitni do mɨrak yopmaŋdak, mani yokwi pakpak do nandaban yokwi taŋ yomɨsak.”
Amɨn kɨnda don kɨmot do aŋek, yo kabɨni namɨn da tɨmɨtjak yaŋ dakon but pɨso papia kɨnda mandɨsak. Aŋek kɨmotjak bɨsapmon monjɨ uŋun papia yolek dat da yo kabɨ manjɨŋ ɨmgut uŋun tɨmɨt do nandɨsak kaŋ, mibɨltok datni asi kɨmakgɨt amɨn da yaŋ nandaŋakwa yo kabɨni tagɨ tɨmɨtjak.
Amɨn yokwi iyɨ do nandaban wɨgakwan Piŋkop wɨsɨŋ kok do pi dɨma asak. Piŋkop do nandaban yo ɨsalɨ asak.
Dat da Monji but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek yo morap asak uŋun Monji yolɨsak. Wasok agɨt uŋun si yapmaŋek Dat da wasok masɨ masɨmɨ yolɨŋban ji uŋun pɨndagek tamtam yokdaŋ.
Piŋkop dakon but yawotni ji kɨsikon tosak do bɨsit asat. Uŋun asi.
Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ mango aŋkɨsikeŋ. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni gak aŋkɨsiŋ wɨgɨkeŋ.
Yawe aŋpakni uŋun tagɨsi, do ya yaŋ iyɨni. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak.
Jap do iyɨŋba mɨnam yopban apba nawit. Ae Kwen Kokup dakon bret yoban naŋek tugawit.
Telagɨ Wup da iyɨ amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni yomɨsak. Amɨn da iyɨ egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma tɨmɨtni. Gen dayɨsat uŋun da Wup egɨp egɨp damɨsak uŋun jikon aŋabɨsak.
Nido, Kristo da paŋmuwukbi dakon busuŋɨ yɨkdak, uŋun da tɨlak wɨli uŋun mɨŋatni dakon busuŋɨ egɨsak. Paŋmuwukbi uŋun Kristo dakon gɨptɨmɨ, ae Kristo da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt.
Yesu da Maria gat Juda amɨn Maria gat apgwit uŋun kunam takba pɨndagek bupmɨ madepsi nandaŋek burɨ da yokwi tagɨt.
Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae gen kokwin amɨn kɨsi morap gat da yaŋ nandawit, amɨn dɨ yaŋ yomno abɨŋ Yesu top gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek gulusuŋ agɨt yaŋ yaŋakwa aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ nandawit.
Saŋbek saŋbek mibɨltogɨ uŋun Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨm dakon sɨlɨp dakon gen tebani taŋ ɨmgwit, ae on mɨktɨmon Telagɨ Yut kɨnda tagɨt.
Nak pɨndakgo kokup papgwan pɨdok aŋek emat aŋ, do Amɨn Tagɨ, gak da geni paŋɨŋtok abi.
Yaŋ aŋaki Juda amɨn dakon babɨkni dakon binap gen do mɨrak saŋbeŋek dɨma yopni, ae gen bamɨ manji ɨmaŋ amɨn dakon gen tebani do mɨrak dɨma yopni.
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji abɨgɨt!” Yaŋ yaŋban koŋ da amɨnon da wɨŋ kɨŋek bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨwit. Pɨgakwa bɨt uŋun tɨmtɨm yaŋek gɨlokon da pakbi ɨdapgwan maŋek pakbi naŋ kɨmakgwit.
Nak yo kɨnda bo amɨn kɨnda dakon man dɨma awɨgɨkeŋ. Dɨmasi. Nak Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon tɨlak kɨndap naŋ gɨn awɨgɨsat. Kristo da tɨlak kɨndapmon pi agɨt do aŋek koko on mɨktɨm dakon aŋpak yokwi morap uŋun ɨŋtaŋ mudagɨm, ae nak naga tɨlak kɨndapmon kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨm da on mɨktɨm dakon aŋpak yokwi morap saŋbeŋek dɨma yoldat yaŋ asak.
“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da yaŋ akdaŋ: peni kɨnda da padɨge uwal da kɨsiron yɨpban aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak, ae amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋat monjɨyoni uwal da kɨsiron yopban dapba kɨmotdaŋ, ae mɨŋat monjɨyo da meŋi datniyo do yaŋ gɨn akdaŋ.
Jikon yokwi agɨt amɨn uŋun da nak naŋ jɨgɨ dɨma namgut, uŋun da ji baŋ jɨgɨ damgut. Nak uŋun do gen tebai dɨma yok do nandɨsat.
Lot dakon mɨŋatnikon yo noman taŋ ɨmgwit uŋun do nandani!
Yaŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn morap yokwi aŋ uŋun yokwi dakon oman monjɨni ekwaŋ.
Notnonisi, ji bɨkbɨk ɨba yokwi ami da ji dɨ paŋkɨlɨkban.
Yaŋ aban Misia mɨktɨm yapmaŋek Troas kokup papmon pɨgɨgɨmal.
yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn Tagɨ kɨlɨ pɨdak da Saimon altaŋ ɨmɨk!”
Ae kunam yaŋ tɨdaŋek takgaŋ amɨn uŋun kunam dɨma takgaŋ yombem da egɨpni. Ae kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma aŋ yombem da egɨpni. Ae yo yumaŋ nok aŋ amɨn yoni mɨni yombem da egɨpni.
Gen uŋun yaŋba nandaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo gat ae kokup pap dakon kɨla amɨn gat wɨrɨpdagek upbalap madep awit.
Nak kaŋapbo Sipsip Monɨŋ da papia gɨroŋɨkbi abɨdaŋek kendol pakbi baŋ kosirɨ 7 kabɨ paŋteban abi uŋun mibɨltok nani pakdekgɨt. Pakdegakwan yo egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ 4 kabɨkon da kɨnda gen yagɨt. Geni uŋun kɨrɨrɨŋ da yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak op.”
Daron yo morap toŋ uŋun nak dakon. Uŋun do mani yat, Wup da nak dakon gen abɨdaŋek yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ damdɨsak.”
Nak naga uŋun yo morap wasagɨm.’ ”
Uŋun kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon yɨgek sɨŋtaŋban pɨŋakwan mɨktɨmon amɨn morap pɨndakdak.
Gak dakon gen uŋun gen bamɨsi. Amɨn kabɨnokon pi abɨ gengo bamɨsi uŋun da burɨkon pi aban gakdosi amɨn ani.
Uŋun da tɨlak Piŋkop da saŋbek saŋbek mibɨltogɨ agɨt uŋun aŋteban ak do yawi tagalgwit.
Piŋkop uŋun Juda amɨn dakon Piŋkop gɨn? Uŋun dɨmasi. Uŋun Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ kɨsi dakon Piŋkopni.
“Ji yo dɨwarɨ dɨ dɨma paŋek kɨni, wɨn kɨrɨŋ baŋgɨn pabɨdaŋek kɨni. Jap bo yɨk bo moneŋyo dɨma paŋek kɨni.
Amɨn da nak abɨŋ nep do awit, mani gak da pabɨŋ yopmaŋek obɨsi paŋmayak agɨl. Yaŋ agɨl do nak gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ gak dakon aŋpak kɨlegɨ do mɨŋat amɨnyokon yaŋ teŋteŋok abeŋ.
Juda amɨn gat ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ gat uŋun kɨsi Piŋkop da dabɨlon arɨp gɨn. Amɨn Tagɨ uŋun amɨn morap kɨsi dakon Amɨn Tagɨni. Uŋun da amɨn morap paŋpulugosak do bɨsit iyaŋ uŋun madepsi gɨsamɨkdak.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban monji mibɨltogɨ butjap nandaŋek yutnon wɨgɨk do kurak tagɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan datni da yomakon pɨŋek butni maŋakwan yutnon wɨgɨsak do iyɨgɨt.
Mani amɨn kɨnda Yesu do yaŋ dɨma yosak kaŋ, uŋun Piŋkop da dɨma yabekdak, uŋun Kristo dakon uwalni dakon wup da yabekdak. Uŋun don apdɨsak yaŋ kɨlɨ nandawit. Uŋun kɨlɨ abɨk da mɨktɨmon egɨsak.
Kokup ekwaŋ uŋun ɨsal tosak. Ae ɨmal yutnikon amɨn kɨnda dɨma egɨpjak dosi nandɨsat.
“Mani pi asat uŋun yo kɨnda da joŋɨgek nak do yaŋ teŋteŋok asak uŋun da Jon da yaŋkwok agɨt uŋun yapmaŋdak. Yo uŋun pi morap Datno da aŋ mudokeŋ do namgut uŋun. Uŋun aŋapbo asi Dat da nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun nandaba bamɨsi asak.
Ae jɨgɨkon tebai agek egɨp egɨpninon aŋpak kɨlegɨsi noman toŋ, ae uŋun aŋpak da nin joŋɨkban but galagon da nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom aŋek ekwamaŋ.
Amɨn yokwi uŋun yokwi ak do nandaban teban toŋ. Yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ak do tagap tok asak, ae bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ top yosok.
Yaŋdo, nak japtaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨm, ‘Asi dayɨsat, ji nak dakon yɨk yawot kokupgwan dɨmasi pɨgɨni.’ ”
Dewit Telagɨ Wup da aŋpulugaŋban iyɨ yaŋ yagɨt: ‘Piŋkop da nak dakon Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak abɨŋ nak da amɨnsi tet do yɨkbɨ don uwalgo kandap gɨbaŋgogwan yopbo gengo guramɨtni.” ’
Piŋkop manji gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Piŋkop mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon jap morapmɨ arɨpmɨ tagɨ nimjak?
Meŋi yaŋ yaŋban mɨŋat gɨmoŋ uŋun tepmɨ wɨgek Erot yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn dakon busuŋɨ abɨsok gɨn ɨdapmon yɨpmaŋ nabi.”
Do nin niaŋ yoneŋ? “Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni da madepsi ɨreŋtosak do aŋek nin yokwi sigɨn aneŋ” yaŋ tagɨ yoneŋ, ma?
Mani Yesu da mibɨlni nandaŋ mudagɨt, do but uŋun do dɨma yopgut. Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn dakon mibɨlni iyɨŋdetjak do dɨma nandagɨt, nido iyɨ amɨn dakon butni kɨlɨ pɨndak mudagɨt.
Amɨn bamot Telagɨ Wup da yabekban Selusia kokup papmon pɨgɨgɨmal. Pɨgek uŋudon da tap wakgakon da Saiprus wɨgɨgɨmal.
Pol gat notni gat kɨsi Papos kokup pap yɨpmaŋek tap wakga abɨdaŋek Pega kokup papmon kɨwit. Pega kokup pap uŋun Pampilia mɨktɨmon tosok. Jon mani kɨnda Mak uŋudon yopmaŋ degek tobɨl Jerusalem aeni pɨgɨgɨt.
Asi nak but galaksi nandaŋek egɨpbeŋ. Nido, ji da nak Piŋkop da aŋpulugaŋakwan Telagɨ Wup Yesu Kristo da yabekgɨt uŋun da nandaŋ gadatno aŋteban asak do bɨsit aŋ yaŋ kɨlɨ nandagɨm. Yaŋ aŋ do nak nandɨsat, abɨsok yo noman taŋ namaŋ uŋun da nak aŋpulugaŋban tagɨsi egɨpdɨsat.
Nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do nandaŋ amɨn uŋun nak abɨdok do pat yɨpmaŋ. Amɨn nak aŋtasɨk ak do nandaŋ amɨn yo yokwi aŋ nam do gen yoŋ. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yokwi aŋ nam do gen yaŋ paŋteban aŋ.
Mani, Piŋkop da yaŋ yolɨgɨt, yo morap noman tokdaŋ do kombɨ gen yawit, uŋun da bɨsapmon dɨma noman toni. Abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn ji da bɨsapmon noman toni do yawit. Telagɨ Wup Piŋkop da Kwen Kokup naŋ yabekban pɨgɨt uŋun da amɨn tapmɨm yoban Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋek Piŋkop da yo asak do kɨlɨ dayɨwit. Aŋelo kɨsi Piŋkop da ji do yo tagɨsi agɨt uŋun pɨndak nandaŋyo akdo tagɨsi nandaŋ.
On mɨktɨm dakon aŋpak yokwi morap uŋun Daron da dɨma abaŋ. Aŋpak uŋun yaŋ: yokwi ak do but kɨndap agak, ae pɨndak galaktok, ae yo kabɨni morapmɨ taŋ yomaŋ uŋun do pɨbɨt tɨdok aŋpak. Uŋun kɨsi on mɨktɨm dakon aŋpak.
Mani uŋun si aŋgalak aŋek top yawit.
“Datno da yo morap kɨlɨ namgut. Dat uŋun dagɨn Monji nandaŋ ɨmɨsak. Aŋek Monjɨ gat ae amɨn Monjɨ da Dat dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨsak uŋun amɨn dagɨn Datno nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
Gak kalɨp nin do butjap nandagɨl uŋun nandabɨ magɨt. Nin do japmɨsi nandagɨl, mani kulabɨk aŋek butgo magɨt.
Yaŋban aŋelo da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Telagɨ Wup da gagon obɨŋakwan Piŋkop Wɨkwisi uŋun dakon tapmɨm da gak kɨbɨtdɨsak. Uŋun do aŋek monjɨ aŋalaki uŋun telagɨ egakwan amɨn da Piŋkop dakon Monji yaŋ iyɨkdaŋ.
Telagɨ pakbikon nin Kristokon gadano kɨmot kaloŋɨ ano Piŋkop da nin Kristo gat kɨsi wayɨkgɨt. Ae Dat da tapmɨm madepnikon da Kristo kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt, do uŋun da arɨpmon nin egɨp egɨp kalugɨkon egɨpneŋ.
Uŋudon gɨn Wup da Yesu yabekban mɨktɨm amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon kɨgɨt.
Gaga yagɨl uŋun da arɨpmon yo morap tawit da abɨsokyo kɨsi toŋ gɨn. Nido yo morap kɨsi da gak dakon pi aŋ.
Nikodemus, uŋun kalɨp Yesukon kɨgɨt, uŋun kɨla amɨn gat Parisi gat da kabɨkon nani kɨnda. Uŋun da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Bɨsap 3 awa egɨ mudaŋakwa mɨŋatni yo morap uŋun noman taŋ uŋun dɨma nandaŋek apgut.
Uŋun sida kɨndapmon mɨnam da yutni aŋ. Ae bɨlak mɨnam uŋun kwat kwenon yutni uŋudon aŋ.
Antiok paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon kombɨ amɨn ae yoyɨŋdet amɨn kɨsi egɨpgwit. Uŋun dakon mani yaŋ: Banabas, ae Simeon mani kɨnda Naija yaŋ iyɨwit. Ae Lusias Sairini kokupmon nani, ae Manain uŋun monɨŋɨsogon da Erot gat kaloŋɨ egɨpgumal, ae Sol.
Amɨn kaloŋ kɨnda da gen kɨrɨŋɨt aban uŋun dakon yokwini da kɨmot aŋalon aban kɨmot da kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda da yaŋ amɨn morap pabɨŋ yopgut. Mani Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawok gat ae but galak yoni gat dakon tapmɨm da kɨmot dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋek madepsi daman. Do nin yaŋsi nandamaŋ, mɨŋat amɨn morap Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawot uŋun abɨdoŋ Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ yoyɨŋakwan amɨn kaloŋɨ Yesu Kristo da pi agɨt do aŋek mɨktɨmon egɨpjak bɨsapmon tebaisi atdaŋ.
Gɨldat kabi dɨ egɨ mudaŋakwa Peliks gat mɨŋatni Drusila gat apgumal. Drusila uŋun Juda mɨŋat kɨnda. Peliks da Pol yaŋ ɨban obɨŋ Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨm dakon mibɨlɨ do iyɨŋakwan nandagɨt.
Uŋun da amɨn kɨsi morap iyɨ dogɨn nandaŋek dɨma egɨpni do aŋek kɨmakgɨt. Kristo nin dakon tamo abɨdaŋek kɨmakgɨt da ae Piŋkop da aban pɨdagɨt uŋun do nandaŋek egɨpneŋ.
nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn botni gat datni Sebedi gat yopmaŋek yolgɨmal.
Yaŋban Parisi amɨn da uŋun gen nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Meŋgo da gak aŋalagɨron da abɨsok ekwamaŋon yokwigo madepsi taŋ gamgwit da taŋ gamaŋ, do gak nido nin niyɨŋ dekdal?” Yaŋ yaŋek yolba waŋga abɨgɨgɨt.
Piŋkop Datnin gat ae Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo gat da nandaŋ yawok damɨŋek butji paŋyawot abal yaworɨ tosak do bɨsit amak.
nido tagɨsi aŋkutnosol. Nagal tebano agaki uwalno da arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ nepni.
Kɨmagakwan ae kɨnda da pagɨt. Peni padɨgeyo 7 kabɨ kɨsi da paŋek monjɨ mɨni egek kɨmakgwit.
Mani nin uŋun amɨn Israel amɨn yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ nipdɨsak amɨn yaŋon da nandaŋ ɨmgumaŋ. Uŋun yo morap altaŋakwa Yesu aŋakba kɨmakgɨt dakon gɨldatni abɨsok kapbɨ asak.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak naga kosit, ae gen bamɨ, ae egɨp egɨp. Daron kɨgɨk kosit ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda dɨmasi tosok. Nak kaloŋgɨn.
Amɨn morapmɨsi da Yesukon sigɨn obɨŋ muwugakwa Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn on bɨsapmon ekwaŋ uŋun amɨn yokwisi gɨn. Piŋkop dakon pi naŋ asat yaŋ nandak do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda kok do yoŋ. Mani kɨnda dɨma kokdaŋ. Jona dakon tɨlak naŋgɨn kokdaŋ.
Do yokwi da kɨla amɨn madep da yaŋ yɨgek amɨn morap kɨmot aŋalon aŋ yomgut. Mani abɨsok Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni kɨla amɨn madep da yaŋ yɨkdak. Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo da pi agɨt do aŋek Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawok nimɨŋek amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ niyɨŋakwan egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdomaŋ.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu uŋun bɨsit pi aŋek egɨpgut. Bɨsit aban mudaŋakwan paŋdetni kɨnda da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Jon da paŋdetni bɨsit agak do yoyɨŋ dekgɨt, yaŋ gɨn niyɨŋ dekgi.”
Aŋakwan Jon dakon paŋdetni gen bini nandaŋek kɨŋ bumjotni abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ tɨp kɨnamon yɨpgwit.
Ae uŋun da buŋon nani mibɨltok yosok uŋun yombem gɨn. Uŋun yaŋ yosok: Gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.
Aisaia Israel amɨn do nandaŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek gen yaŋ yagɨt: “Israel mɨŋat amɨnyo tap kɨdɨpmɨŋon nɨman toŋ yombem morapmɨsi ɨreŋ tokdaŋ, mani Amɨn Tagɨ da kaloŋɨsok dɨ baŋgɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak.
Nin kaloŋ kaloŋ Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ do nandaŋek paŋtagap ano amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomni, aŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomni. Nin uŋun do nandak nandak aneŋ.
Mani yo do wadak wadak aŋ amɨn do yo yobi bɨsapmon noman amɨn da gandani do dɨma yobi.
Yawe, nak dakon but nandak nandakyo aŋkɨlɨgek koki.
Mani Juda amɨn dɨ Esia Provins da apgwit uŋun da nak abɨdawit. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ kɨsi pɨgɨmaŋ da abɨsok gak da ɨŋamon gen yaŋ namaŋ tam tagɨ. Mani dɨma pɨwit do Juda amɨn kabɨ on akgamaŋ da nak do gen dɨ yaŋ nam do nandaŋ kaŋ, abɨsok gak da ɨŋamon agek gen yaŋ namni kaŋ tagɨ.
Pol gat Banabas gat Antiok kokupmon Piŋkop dakon pi agɨmal uŋudeŋ gɨn Ikoniam kokupmon yaŋ gɨn agɨmal. Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yut kɨndakon wɨgek gen tagɨsi yoyɨŋakwal Juda ae Grik amɨn morapmɨ da nandaŋ gadat awit.
Yawe kwen egɨsak uŋun kɨsirɨ yɨpban pɨŋakwan nak yokwikon baŋ abɨdagɨt. Tap madep da nak wɨtjɨgɨt, mani ɨlɨkban wɨgɨm.
Nin nandamaŋ, gen morap gen tebanon toŋ uŋun amɨn morap gen teban da yoŋgamgwan ekwaŋ uŋun da guramɨtni do toŋ. Do amɨn kɨnda da “nak amɨn kɨlegɨ” yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨmasi yosak. Nin kɨsi morap mɨktɨmon ekwamaŋ Piŋkop da dabɨlon dɨwarɨnin toŋ.
Jikon aŋpak agɨm uŋudeŋ gɨn paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨkon yaŋ gɨn agɨm. Yo kaloŋɨ kɨnda gɨn jikon dɨma agɨm, ji da nak paŋpulugok ani do jɨgɨ dɨma damgum. Uŋun suŋ agɨm yaŋ nandaŋ? Yaŋ kaŋ dɨwarɨno yɨpmaŋ namni.
Do Yesu jap noknok tamokon da pɨdaŋ ɨmal dubakni kukwaŋ yɨpmaŋek pakbi soŋ wɨrɨrɨt ɨmal kɨnda abɨdaŋek kogɨkon wamgut.
Elisabet da monjɨ aŋalasak dakon bɨsap abɨŋakwan monji wɨli aŋalagɨt.
Yaŋ aŋek kap kalugɨsi kɨnda yaŋ yawit, “Gak da papia gɨroŋɨkbi abɨdaŋek kendol pakbi baŋ paŋteban abi uŋun arɨpmɨ tagɨ pakdekgi. Nido gɨkba kɨmagek yawigo naŋ mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop do ɨm do aŋek yumaŋ nagɨl. Asi, amɨn mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ekwaŋ, ae geni mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae gɨptɨmni mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ kɨsi yumaŋ nagɨl.
Aŋakwan yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ da nak aŋpulugaŋban monjɨ kwap awɨldat. Kalɨp monjɨ mɨni egek amɨn da dabɨlon mayagɨsi nandagɨm, mani abɨsok kɨlɨ uŋun mayagɨno mudosok.”
Pɨlɨndo yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda Arimatea kokupmon da apgut. Uŋun mani Josep. Uŋun Yesu dakon paŋdetni kɨnda.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Sakius pɨdaŋ agek Amɨn Tagɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nandaki. Nak abɨsok yo kabɨ morapno kokwinɨk kabi bamorɨ aŋakwa kabi kɨnda yoni mɨni amɨn do yobeŋ. Ae amɨn kɨnda aŋkewalek yo kabɨni dɨ tɨmɨkgɨm kaŋ, uŋun dakon kobogɨ do yo tɨmɨkgɨm uŋun do yo 4 kabɨ gat saŋbeŋek yomɨŋ yomɨŋ abeŋ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da mibɨlni amɨn dɨmasi yoyɨni do yoyɨgɨt.
Mani Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Yaŋsop dɨma aŋɨmni. Amɨn kɨnda uwal dɨma aŋdamjak kaŋ uŋun notji.”
Jiyo yaŋ gɨn, Piŋkop da oman morap ani do dayɨgɨt uŋun aŋ mudaŋek yaŋ gɨn yoni, ‘Nin oman monjɨ do, ɨsal pinin gɨn amaŋ.’ ”
Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madepmon egakwan amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni ae kandapmɨ yokwi uŋudon opba paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Bo Silom yut dubak tuwɨl kɨ maŋ amɨn 18 kabɨ wɨtjɨŋban kɨmakgwit do nandani. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ dakon yokwini da Jerusalem amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon yokwini yapgut uŋun do aŋek pasɨlgwit yaŋ nandaŋ?
Uŋun but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak, ae dam tebano arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlɨ egɨsak. Uŋun pasɨlɨ tamono, ae yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨno. Uŋun pasɨkno tebaisi, do aŋkutnaŋakwan tagɨsi egɨsat. Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ pabɨŋ yopmaŋakwan nak da yoŋgamgwan ekwaŋ.
Uŋun da gɨkwem aban teŋteŋɨsi aŋakwa ais sɨkak gat kɨndap patdet gat uŋun gɨkwemgwan da mawit.
Aŋakwan nandaŋapbo aŋelo pakbi kɨla agɨt uŋun da yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop, Telagɨ Amɨn, gak abɨsok egɨsal, ae kalɨpsigwan egɨpgul. Aŋpakgo wagɨl kɨlegɨsi, do kokwin kɨlegɨsi aŋek yo yokwisi altaŋ yomni do yagɨl.
Dagok dagogɨ mɨni Yawe dakon man aŋkɨsini.
Piŋkop dakon kokup pap dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo, ji nandani, Piŋkop da yo tɨlɨmɨ toŋ tagɨsi jikon asak.
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji kombɨ amɨn ae amɨn kɨlegɨ kalɨpsi egɨ kɨmakba yopgwit tamo paŋtɨlɨm aŋ.
Yo morap do nak da manon bɨsit yoni, uŋun nak akdɨsat.”
Bɨsap kɨndakon amɨn kɨnda da Yesukon obɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nak ni aŋpak tagɨ kɨnda naŋ aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokeŋ?”
Mani amɨn morap Yawe do pasolgoŋ uŋun iyɨ kɨlani asak. Dagok dagogɨ mɨni amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun do nandaŋek jomjom aŋ amɨn uŋun kɨlani tagɨsi asak.
Ji uŋun amɨn aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomni, aŋakwa paŋmuwukbi morap da ji da amɨn do but dasi galaktaŋ yomaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ damni. Ae nin da ji dakon man ɨsal dogɨn awɨkwamaŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani.
Mani Pol gwaktani da kosiron pasɨlɨkon da aŋatdaŋ dakon geni nandaŋek emat amɨn da yutnon wɨgɨ Pol uŋun do iyɨgɨt.
Yaŋban Saimon Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, yaŋ kaŋ kandapno gɨn dɨma sugoki. Kɨsitno ae busuŋno kɨsi sugoki.”
Nak kalɨp gen yagɨm uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ, uŋun yaŋ: ‘Nak Kristo dɨma. Piŋkop da nak yabekban mibɨltaŋ ɨmɨŋek abɨsat.’
Iyɨ dakon gen teban do, “On uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen” yaŋ yaŋek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgaŋ. Nak gawak namaŋ uŋun koko yo ɨsalɨ asak.’
Uŋun yo morap uŋun nomansi altaŋ mudawit, do kɨla amɨn madep Agripa da gen morap yosot uŋun kɨsi nandaŋ mudosok. Uŋun do aŋek pasol pasolɨ mɨni nomansi iyɨsat.
Ji pɨlɨk bamokji dakon kɨla tebaisi aŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn nandaŋ kokwini mɨni da arɨpmon dɨma agɨpni, amɨn nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi da arɨpmon agɨpni.
Aŋakwa amɨn uŋun iyɨ yaŋ nandagɨt, ‘Jap bamɨ yopbeŋ dakon tamo kɨlɨ tugaŋ, do ae dɨ gat yopbeŋ dakon tamo arɨpmɨ dɨma, do niaŋsi abeŋ?’
Yaŋ nandaŋakwan Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Saimon, nak gen kɨnda gayɨko.” Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, kɨlɨ nayɨ.”
Nak neŋak kagagwan maŋ pɨgɨgɨm da egɨsat. Mɨktɨm tebai nikon bamaŋek tebai akgeŋ? Pakbi ɨlarɨgwan agapbo pakbi da ɨgek wagɨl wɨtjɨŋban tokdɨsat.
Agripa da gen uŋun nandaŋek Pestus yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da naga uŋun amɨn dakon geni nandakeŋ do nandɨsat.” Yaŋban Pestus da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Aŋwa yaŋakwan nandakdɨsal.”
Wɨŋ kɨŋakwan amɨn da uŋun kaŋek wurɨpdagek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Mao, uŋun ni yo kɨnda da altosok? On amɨn gen ŋwakŋwarɨsi yosok. Amɨn mani toŋ da tɨlagon yosok. Koŋ gen yoyɨŋban geni guramɨkgaŋ.”
Ae Basan dakon kɨla amɨn madep Ok aŋakban kɨmakgɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Yaŋ di aŋakwa kɨla amɨn morapmɨ Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit. Mani Parisi amɨn do pasalek yaŋkwok dɨma awit. Parisi amɨn da muwut muwut yutnikon baŋ yolba waŋga egɨpni uŋundo si pasalek yaŋkwok dɨma awit.
Piŋkop da but galak do yo nimgut uŋun madepsi daman, gen kaga da arɨpmɨ dɨma yogogɨ. Do nin Piŋkop ya yaŋsi iyɨneŋ!
Piŋkop da Monji do yaŋ yagɨt: Uŋun da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni nimdosi yagɨt. Uŋun egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni Monjɨkon tosok.
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da kalɨp Troas kokup papmon paŋkɨ egek nin do jomjom awit.
Gak kɨla amɨn madep egek aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da amɨn kɨlani aŋek gen kokwin pi kɨlegɨsi asal. Gak mɨŋat amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek gengo aŋteban aŋek tagɨsi paŋpulugosol.
“Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek amɨn tagɨ da pi monjɨ kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Not, nak da gak yokwi kɨnda dɨma aŋgamɨt. Nak moneŋ 1 danari gabeŋ do gayɨko gaga but kaloŋ al.
Nido, gɨptɨmnin mɨktogɨ uŋun kulabɨk aŋek toktogɨsi tagɨsi egɨpdɨsak. Gɨptɨmnin si kɨmorɨ uŋun kulabɨk aŋek toktogɨsi kalugɨ egɨpdɨsak.
Kɨlɨ aŋelo kɨnda nagon apgut. Aŋelo uŋun aŋelo 7 kabɨ ɨdap madepmon Piŋkop dakon butjap mudosak do amɨn paŋupbal ak dakon yo yokwisi 7 kabɨ tɨmɨkgwit uŋun kabɨkon nani kɨnda. Aŋelo yaŋ nayɨgɨt, “Gak apbɨ Sipsip Monɨŋ dakon mɨŋatni abɨsok pakdɨsak uŋun golɨko.”
Amɨn jobɨt yom do tagɨsi nandagɨt, do abɨsok iyɨ jobɨt pasak dosi nandɨsat. Piŋkop da amɨn dɨwarɨ gɨsamɨtjak do bɨsit ak do dɨma nandagɨt, do uŋunyo kɨsi Piŋkop dakon gɨsam dɨma tɨmɨtjak.
Ae ji da ekwaŋ da manjigwan mɨktɨm toŋ nin uŋudon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok do nandamaŋ. Nin amɨn da pi kɨlɨ awit tamokon kɨŋ pi aŋek manin dɨma pawɨgɨneŋ.
Mani nin yokwi pakpak sigɨn egapno Kristo da nin do kɨmakgɨt. Uŋun da Piŋkop da nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak uŋun nolɨŋban komaŋ.
Amɨn morap kɨsi do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomɨsak. Aŋek yo morap wasagɨt uŋun do bupmɨkon da kɨlani asak.
“Iyɨŋban amɨn tagɨ da oman monjɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak kokup madep yɨpmaŋek kɨŋ kosit madepmon bo ae pigaga da dam kɨdɨpmɨŋ agek amɨn pɨndak tebai yoyɨŋbɨ abɨŋ yɨkba yutno tugosak.
Yaŋ yaŋek uŋun kokup papmon amɨn morapmɨ da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek upbalap madepsi awit. Aŋek Pol dakon notni bamorɨ uŋun ɨlɨk paŋpaŋ muwut muwut yut madepmon paŋkɨwit. Uŋun amɨn bamot uŋun Masadonia amɨn, Pol gat kɨsi agɨpgwit. Mani kɨnda Gaius ae kɨnda Aristakus.
Yaŋban Yesu da monjɨ bamot yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil gen uŋun yomal dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek yomal. Nak da tepmɨ madep pakdɨsat uŋun tagɨ panjil?” Yaŋban iyɨgɨmal, “Tagɨ pandeŋ.”
Uŋun nak do kuragɨsi nandaŋek gen yokwisi nayaŋ, mani uŋun gen dakon mibɨlɨ mɨni.
Yawe da toktogɨsi but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak ae amɨn kabɨni tagɨsi paŋpulugosok, do ya yaŋsi iyɨni.
Babɨkji mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon mana nawit uŋun kɨmak mudawit.
Yesu uŋun Jerusalem kɨk do aŋek provins bamot Samaria ae Galili yo da kɨlapmɨkon da kɨgɨt.
Gen uŋun altagɨt da aŋelo kweŋ abɨdagɨt uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Aŋelo 4 kabɨ pakbi madep Yupretiskon paŋteban awit da ekwaŋ uŋun wɨtdal yopbɨ kɨni.”
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jerusalem kokup pap aŋkapmat aŋek Betpage kokupmon kɨŋ altawit. (Kokup uŋun Ɨleŋ Olipmon tosok.) Altaŋek Yesu da paŋdetni bamorɨ yabegek
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Nak kɨlɨ dayɨko dɨma nandayɨŋ. Ae nido sigɨn nandak do yoŋ? Ji kɨsi paŋdetni egɨp do aŋek yoŋ, ma?”
Mani amɨn kɨnda da Telagɨ Wup abɨŋ yɨp do manji gen kɨnda yosak kaŋ, Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni dɨma wɨrɨrɨtjak. Uŋun dɨmasisi, uŋun dɨwarɨni mudok mudogɨ mɨni taŋ wɨgɨkdɨsak.”
Uŋun kɨla amɨn da Yesu Judia yɨpmaŋek Galili abɨk uŋun dakon geni nandaŋek Yesukon kɨŋek monji sot aŋ palɨ kɨmot do agɨt uŋun aŋmɨlɨp asak do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt.
Amɨn Tagɨ uŋun kaloŋɨ gɨn, ae nandaŋ gadat uŋun kaloŋɨ, ae telagɨ pakbi sogok uŋun kaloŋɨ gɨn.
Ji nandaŋ, ae Piŋkop kɨsi nandɨsak, nin da ji dɨma paŋgalak agɨmaŋ, ae ji dakon yo kabɨ do pɨndak galaktok aŋek gen tagɨ uŋun dɨma dayɨgɨmaŋ.
Yo madepsi abi do nandɨsat uŋun yaŋ: gak da mɨŋat amɨn morap yoyɨŋbɨ bɨsit mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek amɨn morap kɨsi paŋpulugosak do bɨsit iyɨni.
“Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨm, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ gak namɨn?’ “Iyɨko yagɨt, ‘Nak Yesu Nasaret amɨn naŋ aŋupbal ak do pi asal.’
Pakyaŋsi nandani, amɨn kɨnda aŋpak tagɨsi kɨnda ak do nandaŋek dɨma asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dɨwarɨni toŋ.
Juda amɨn da amɨn kɨnda mani Aleksanda yɨpba mɨŋat amɨn morap da ɨŋamon agakwan amɨn da yokwi uŋun da bo ak yaŋ nandawit. Yaŋ aŋakwa Aleksanda da Juda amɨn nin da dɨma amaŋ yaŋon da geni kobogɨ yoyɨk do aŋek upbalap dɨma yoni do kɨsirɨ da tɨlak aŋ yomgut.
Tobɨl jikon opjak do iyɨno tagɨ yaŋ yagɨt. Mani iyɨ jikon op do madepsi galak tagɨt do jikon obɨsak.
Mani not kabɨ, Amɨn Tagɨ da ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsak. Nin toktogɨsi ji do nandaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨneŋ yaŋsi nandamaŋ. Nido Piŋkop da yo morap dɨma wasaŋban noman taŋakwa ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt. Telagɨ Wup da ji paŋtelak aban gen bamɨ nandaŋ gadaŋba uŋun kosiron da ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt.
Iyɨ dakon monjɨ gwayoni baŋ dapgwit. Monjɨ gwayoni gulusuŋ dɨma awit, mani dapmaŋ paretni do Kenan amɨn dakon kokup kɨdat do ɨmgwit. Aŋakwa yawini da mɨktɨm aŋupbal aban Piŋkop da dabɨlon ɨŋani agɨt.
Ae bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ gen emat aŋekwaŋ. Amɨn aŋpak uŋuden aŋ uŋun nandak nandakni wagɨlsi upbal tawit, ae gen bamɨsok kɨnda dɨma nandaŋ. Uŋun Piŋkop dakon aŋpak do yo morap tɨmɨt tɨmɨt kosit kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋ.
Ji yaŋ aŋek babɨkji dakon yaŋ teban tok gen guramɨgek Piŋkop dakon gen maba kɨsak. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, yo morap dɨwarɨ kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ.”
“Ae oman monjɨ uŋun da buŋon nani da abɨŋ yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, nak gol moneŋ tabɨlgo uŋun naŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt pi abo tabɨl 5 kabɨ noman tawit.’
Amɨn da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨsit kandapyoni wamgwit, mani uŋun amɨn tebai do nap teban si paŋdagagɨt. Amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨdogɨ.
ae Saimon (uŋun kalɨp Selot da kabɨkon egɨpgut), ae Judas Iskariot. (Judas uŋun da don Yesu uwal da kɨsiron yɨpgut.)
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ gɨn aba amɨn kɨsi yɨk mudawit.
Akban kaŋek Sekaraia wurɨpdagek pasalgɨt.
Uŋun kokupmon Rom dakon emat amɨn 100 dakon mibɨltok amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun dakon oman amɨni si galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun sot madep aŋek kɨmotdosi agɨt.
Do ji abɨsok nido Piŋkop aŋkewalek paŋmuwukbi da kwapmon yo jɨgɨ yopmaŋgaŋ? Kalɨp babɨknin da Moses dakon gen teban uŋun guramɨt do aŋtɨdok awit, ae ninyo kɨsi uŋun guramɨt do aŋtɨdok amaŋ.
Mani koŋ da genji guramɨkgaŋ, uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dɨma ani. Ji dakon man Kwen Kokupmon mandabi da toŋ, uŋun do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.”
Nak Yawe aŋkɨsikeŋ. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ mani aŋkɨsikeŋ.
“Yaŋdo, kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn Tagɨsi ni gɨldaron apdɨsak uŋun ji dɨma nandaŋ.
Nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkopmon da altaŋbi mɨŋat amɨn morap uŋun yokwi dɨma aŋ aŋ aŋ. Piŋkop dakon Monji da paŋkutnosok, do Yokwi Ami da arɨpmɨ dɨma ɨgayɨsak.
Ji altok altok kalugɨ kɨlɨ awit, do aŋpak yokwi morap yɨpmaŋ mudoni. Top yogok aŋpak gat, ae jamba but aŋpak morap gat, ae tagɨsi ekwaŋ amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok gat, ae yaŋba yokwi tok morap gat uŋun kɨsi yɨpmaŋ mudoni.
Yaŋ nandaŋek tap pakbi ɨlarɨ bo ae kwen yaŋ kok do tɨlak yɨpba pɨgɨ 40 mita abɨdagɨt. Yaŋ kaŋek ae tɨmɨsok dɨ gat kɨŋ tɨlak aeni yɨpba pɨgɨ 30 mita abɨdagɨt.
Paŋmuwukbi dakon pi amɨn uŋun mɨŋat kaloŋɨ dakon eni egɨpjak, ae iyɨ dakon gwakni kɨla tagɨsi asak.
Yawe, gak tɨp madepno, bɨsitno nandaŋek aŋpuluga. Dɨma aŋpulugoki kaŋ, nak amɨn kɨmakbi da tɨlak egɨpbeŋ.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak gen teban ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen abo kɨŋ ɨsalɨ asak do dɨma pɨgɨm. Gen teban ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen bamɨ toŋ aŋmudoni do pɨgɨm.
Aŋakwan gen sigɨn iyɨŋakwa pɨdaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon da amɨn kɨnda yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da mibɨltok mɨŋat da kwenon tɨp aŋatjak.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋba kɨŋ Pol yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Jil dam teban yut yɨpmaŋek kɨnjil do gen kokwin amɨn madep da gen yɨpba obɨsak. Do jil but yawot gat kɨnjil.”
Yaŋ do aŋek gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Piŋkop da amɨn yokwi gen pikon yopban geni arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ yɨpdaŋ. Yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨlegɨ da kabɨkon dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
Mani nak gak gat gen toŋ. Nandaŋ gadat kaluk agɨl bɨsapmon nak do but dasi galak taŋ namgul, mani abɨsok yaŋ dɨma asal.
Yaŋdo, ji kɨŋ kosit papmon agek amɨn pɨndak yoyɨŋba apba jap pakbiyo aneŋ.’
Mani Piŋkop da nak kɨlɨ nandaŋ namgut. Asisi, tekno nandaŋek bɨsitno kɨlɨ nandagɨt.
Nin paŋmuwukbi notnin dɨwarɨ do but dasi galak taŋ yomamaŋ. Yaŋ amaŋ do aŋek yaŋ nandamaŋ, nin kɨmot dakon kosit kɨlɨ yɨpgumaŋ da egɨp egɨp dakon kosit naŋ yolgamaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda amɨn do but dasi dɨma galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun amɨn kɨmot da kosiron sigɨn agɨsak.
Nak madepsi pasoldot, aŋek kɨmot do nandɨsat. Aŋek uŋun da aban butno madepsi jɨk tosok.
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ae dɨsi nak do namɨn yaŋ yoŋ?” Yaŋban Pita da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Kristo.”
Yaŋdo, mɨktɨm wudɨp aŋakwan ɨleŋ oba tuwɨl kɨ tapmon pɨgɨni kaŋ, nin uŋun do dɨma pasolneŋ.
Kɨla amɨn kɨnda bo Parisi amɨn kɨnda da uŋun amɨn dɨmasi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgut.
Laion da amɨn dakon gɨpni paŋdagoŋ, uŋun da tɨlak dɨ aŋupbal abam. Ɨlɨk aŋaŋ tɨmɨ kɨndakon aŋkɨŋakwa amɨn da nak yokwikon naŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma dɨ abɨdaŋbam.
Yesu bot kɨnda abɨdaŋek pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda iyɨ da kokupmon kɨgɨt.
Not kabɨ, amɨn kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit kabɨkon yo ni da noman tokdaŋ uŋun ji da pakyaŋsi nandani do nandamaŋ. Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn da kɨmakbi arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨdoni yaŋ nandaŋek bupmɨ madepsi nandaŋ uŋudeŋ dɨ abam.
Babɨkni da dabɨlon Isip mɨktɨm uŋudon Soan mɨktɨm tɨmon Piŋkop da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨt.
Nin notnin paŋpulugono kɨsɨk kɨsɨk paŋek nandaŋ gadatni teban toni do pi aneŋ.
pɨlɨn tukgwan ekwaŋ amɨn da teŋteŋɨ kokdaŋ. Uŋun da kosit nolɨŋban kaŋek but yawot dakon kositnaŋ kɨneŋ.”
Abɨŋek mɨŋat amɨn morap gen pikon yopdɨsak. Aŋek aŋpak yokwi awit ae gen yokwisi yaŋ ɨmgwit dakon kobogɨ yomdɨsak.”
Uŋun da tɨp kulabɨk aban pakbi ɨdap monɨŋ kɨnda dagagɨt. Aŋek tɨp tebanon wasok aban pakbi dabɨl noman tagɨt.
Uŋun da monjɨ gwayoni dapmaŋ kokup kɨdat do paret awit.
Uŋun Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ gat jɨgɨ kaloŋɨ paneŋ yaŋ nandagɨt. Yokwi dakon aŋpak aŋek bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ak do dɨma nandagɨt.
Ji da yo morap Epaprodaitas da kɨsiron da yopba apgwit uŋun kɨlɨ tɨmɨkgɨm. Abɨsok yono tugok tugogɨsi. Uŋun but galak dakon yo yopmaŋ namgwit uŋun paret kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi yombem naŋ ji da Piŋkop do ɨmgwit. Piŋkop da paret uŋuden do galagɨsi nandɨsak.
Ji bupmɨ amɨn do but dasi galak taŋek paŋpulugoni kaŋ, ji amɨn kɨlegɨsi.
Nak nandɨsat. Depmaŋ kɨŋapbo joŋ pɨŋan yokwisi da jikon abɨŋek sipsip kabɨ paŋupbal akdaŋ.
Uŋun but dasi dɨma yolgwit. Uŋun gat saŋbek saŋbek awit uŋun kɨrɨŋɨkgwit.
Nak da gak aŋkɨsisat, nido gak da pi ŋwakŋwarɨsi aŋek nak wasaŋ nepgul. Nak pakyaŋsi nandɨsat, gak da yo morap wasagɨl uŋun ŋwakŋwarɨsi.
Ae paŋdet uŋun kɨnda mibɨltok kɨmakbi tamokon kɨgɨt uŋun kɨsi wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgɨ pɨndagek nandaŋ gadat agɨt.
Nak kɨmbabaŋon yokwisi pokdot. Yaŋ teban tok agɨl uŋun da arɨpmon abɨ pɨdaŋapbo aŋteban aki.
Mani Telagɨ Wup kɨlɨ abɨdawit, do ji kɨsisi gen bamɨ nandaŋ.
(Asi, nak amɨn kabɨ dɨ gat kɨsi telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgum. Uŋun Stepanas da yutnon egɨpgwit amɨn baŋ soŋ yomgum. Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ gat soŋ yomgum bo dɨma, uŋun nak dɨma nandɨsat.)
Nido, Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun gen gɨn yogok dakon yo dɨma. Uŋun tapmɨm dakon yo.
Ji yumabi aŋpak yɨpmaŋek pasal kɨŋ mudoni. Yokwi dɨwarɨ amɨn da aŋ uŋun gɨptɨm da waŋga aŋ, mani yumabi aŋpak asak amɨn iyɨ dakon gɨptɨm naŋ aŋupbal asak.
Yawe dakon gen kokwin pi agakni uŋun kɨlegɨsi yaŋ uŋun amɨn da nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Amɨn yokwi amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋupbal ak do yo awit, mani uŋun yo yokwi da tobɨlek iyɨ baŋ paŋupbal awit.
Mani butnikon gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yɨpban kɨgɨt, do bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok akdak. Jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ altaŋ ɨmni ae Piŋkop dakon gen dakon uwal apni bɨsapmon nandaŋ gadatni yɨpban wɨtdal kɨsak.
Yaŋban mibɨltok amɨn da gen tagɨ yoyɨsak do iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban Pol uŋun maŋ wɨgɨgon da agek upbalap dɨma ani do kɨsirɨ da tɨlak aŋ yomgut. Yaŋ aban amɨn kɨsi upbalap yɨpmaŋ mudawit. Yaŋ aŋakwa Pol da Ibru genon da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Yawe gen yaŋakwan Lebanon mɨktɨm dakon sida kɨndap gawɨkgaŋ.
Aŋaki aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyogo ae yoni mɨni amɨn gen kokwin tagɨsi aŋ yomjak.
Mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi Piŋkop do pasoldaŋ. Aŋek Piŋkop da yo uŋun asak uŋun do yokdaŋ, ae uŋun do nandaŋ egɨpdaŋ.
Kɨla amɨn madep tapmɨmɨ toŋ dapban kɨmakgwit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Pi ɨsalno Timoti da gɨldatni tagɨ damɨsak. Ae nak dakon dɨwatno Lusias, ae Jeson, ae Sosipata uŋunyo kɨsi da gɨldatni tagɨ damaŋ.
Judas uŋun moneŋ kɨla agɨt. Do amɨn dɨwarɨ da Judas kɨŋ Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨm dakon bɨsap madep dakon yo dɨ yumjak, bo ae bupmɨ amɨn do moneŋ yomjak do iyɨsak yaŋ nandawit.
“Aŋakwa kɨla amɨn madep da pi monjɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Mɨŋat pakpak dakon jap kɨlɨ paŋ noman abi, mani si yaŋ yomgum amɨn uŋun amɨn yokwi, do nak dakon jap dɨma noni.
Yaŋ yoŋ amɨn uŋun iyɨ dakon mɨktɨm wɨsaŋ yaŋ nandamaŋ.
Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat Parisi amɨn gat da amɨn yaŋ kɨlɨ yoyɨwit, “Amɨn kɨnda da Yesu uŋudon egɨsak yaŋ nandɨsak kaŋ, niyɨŋban abɨdaŋ dam tebanon yɨpneŋ.”
Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek yo tagɨsi asal, mani mɨrak yopmaŋdak amɨn dakon burɨ dɨma aŋteban asal.
Do, niaŋ nandɨsal, Sisa do takis ɨmno tagɨ asak, bo dɨma?”
Mani goman uŋun sopsop dakon moneŋ uŋun da arɨpmon dɨma taŋ ɨmgut. Do kɨla amɨn madep da uŋun amɨn gat gwakni gat oman amɨn egakwa tomni do amɨn da moneŋ ɨba gomani sopjak do yagɨt. Ae yo morapni yumaŋ naŋ mudaŋek uŋun dakon moneŋ baŋ goman sopjak do amɨn tagɨni da gen tebai yagɨt.
Teŋteŋɨ gat pɨlɨn tuk gat gen kagani mɨni, do gen arɨpmɨ dɨma yonjil. Nin da uŋun bamot dakon tekni dɨma nandamaŋ.
Yaŋ aba Yesu da nawa gen yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Parisi amɨn gat ae Erot gat uŋun dakon yis do pasalek kaŋ kɨmotni.”
Sigɨn saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn da pɨdaŋba mɨktɨm kɨnda dakon amɨn gat emat wamdaŋ. Ae kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dakon amɨn da pɨdaŋba kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dakon amɨn gat emat wamdaŋ.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dabɨlji mɨni ekwaŋ tam, yokwisi mɨni. Mani ‘dabɨlnin toŋ’ yaŋ yoŋ, do yokwisi dakon gen uŋun sigɨn taŋ damɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak.”
Mɨrɨm da mɨlɨp mɨlɨp pɨsoŋba dukwan dukwan kwaŋ, uŋun da tɨlak obɨsi paŋupbal agɨm. Uwal mabo kɨŋek neŋak da yaŋ kosiron tawit.
Kɨla amɨn madep aŋpulugaŋbɨ aŋpak tagɨsi baŋgɨn asak. Aŋaki sɨkak da maŋek jap paŋɨreŋ asak uŋun da tɨlak aŋpakni tagɨ da tagɨsi noman tosak.
Mani ji dɨsi do nin kɨlɨŋɨ dɨwarɨ yapmaŋek kɨlɨŋɨ tagɨsi yaŋ dɨma nandani. Ji da gelɨ do pakbi dɨma ɨmaŋ, gelɨ da pakbi damɨsak, do ji dɨsi do dɨma nandaba wɨgɨsak.
Yesu Matyu da yutnon yɨgek jap naŋek takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn morapmɨ ae yokwi pakpak amɨn morapmɨ da apba Yesu gat paŋdetni gat kɨsi yɨgek jap nawit.
Yaŋban Pita da Yesu gen kɨnda yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nin yo morap yopmaŋek gak naŋ gɨn gol awɨlgamaŋ.”
Kanek da kundukon tosok, uŋun da tɨlak toktogɨsi yaŋ egɨ wɨgɨkdaŋ.” Uwal da kɨla amɨn madep abɨŋ yɨpgwit bɨsapmon kunam takgwit
Mani Telagɨ Wup jikon pɨŋban tapmɨm pakdaŋ. Tapmɨm paŋek nak dakon gen Jerusalem kokup papmon yaŋ teŋteŋoni. Ae uŋudon da Judia kokup morap kɨsi, ae Samaria mɨktɨm kɨsi, ae mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋoni.”
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Piŋkop da yoni mɨni amɨn dɨma ɨŋtaŋ yomɨsak. Jɨgɨni madepsi toŋ amɨn, uŋun Piŋkop da paŋpulugosak do nandaŋ gadat aŋek jomjom aŋ. Uŋun yum pɨndagakwan ɨsal dogɨn jomjom dɨma aŋ.
Kɨla amɨn madep Agripa, gak kombɨ amɨn dakon gen nandaŋ teban tosol yaŋ nandɨsat.”
Ae pɨlak pɨlak yabekban kɨŋ pigagani yo kwawit uŋun naŋ mudawit.
Mani amɨn kɨnda egɨsak uŋunyo kɨsi nak da pi asat uŋun joŋɨgek yaŋ teŋteŋok asak. Nak nandɨsat, gen yaŋ teŋteŋok asak uŋun bamɨsi yosok.
Gen tebano uŋun yaŋ: Ji dɨsikon notji do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ yomɨŋ ani.”
Piŋkop, nak gak dakon pi madep do aeno nandakeŋ. Asi, wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kalɨp agɨl uŋun do nandakeŋ.
Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo bot pakbi ɨdap binapmon taŋakwan Yesu iyɨ gɨn tap kɨdɨpmɨŋon egɨpgut.
