Nak kalɨp Masadonia mɨktɨmon agek Gen Bin Tagɨsi dayɨko ji nandaŋ gadaŋek paŋmuwukbi kaluksi awit. Pilipai mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨsi nandaŋ, Masadonia mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋ dekgɨm bɨsapmon paŋmuwukbi mɨŋat amɨnyo kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon nani dɨ da moneŋ dɨ nak aŋpulugok do dɨma yopmaŋ namgwit. Ji dagɨn nak do yaŋ awit.
Apba kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap Yawe do yono! Piŋkop tɨp madepnin yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ nipgut uŋun do nandaŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yono.
Nido amɨn kɨnda oman amɨn egakwan Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ ɨlɨkgɨt kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Amɨn Tagɨ da dabɨlon pulugaŋbi da egɨsak. Ae yaŋ gɨn amɨn kɨnda pulugaŋbi da egakwan Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ ɨlɨkgɨt kaŋ, uŋun abɨsok Kristo dakon oman amɨni egɨsak.
Yaŋ aŋek mibɨltok Anaskon aŋkɨwit. Anas uŋun Kaiapas dakon yopmi. Uŋun bɨlagon Kaiapas da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn egɨpgut.
Ji kabɨkon dɨwarɨ kalɨp uŋuden amɨn egɨpgwit. Mani Piŋkop da sugaŋ paŋmɨlɨp aban iyɨ dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ dagawit. Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo da manon, ae Piŋkop dakon Wup da tapmɨmon Piŋkop da ji paŋmɨlɨp aban iyɨ da dabɨlon mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨlegɨsi awit.
“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da ‘Kristo oni!’ bo ‘Asoni!’ yaŋ yaŋban kaŋ, geni dɨma nandaŋ gadani.
Gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn kɨnda da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, Parisi amɨn do gen uŋun yaŋek, ninyo kɨsi pabɨŋ nipmaŋdal.”
Ae uŋun da kwenon, amɨn morapmɨ Kwen Kokup egek madepsi yaŋ tɨdoŋ dakon wuwɨk yombem nandagɨm. Yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Piŋkop aŋkɨsino! Nin dakon Piŋkop uŋun dagɨn nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt. Uŋun man madepni toŋ ae tapmɨmni toŋ.
Kɨŋ kɨla amɨn da yomakon altaŋek amɨn da upbalap madep ae gen kunamyo aŋakwa pɨndak nandaŋyo agɨt.
Aŋakwan Saimon gat notni kabɨ gat Yesu wɨsɨŋek apgwit.
Yesu uŋudon da muwut muwut yutni kɨndakon wɨgek
Uŋun tapmɨmni madep dɨma do mɨŋat amɨnyo gat ae iyɨ dakon yokwini kɨsi mudoni do paret asak.
Nin egɨp egɨpnin Piŋkopmonsi taŋakwan ekwamaŋ yaŋ yoneŋ kaŋ, Kristo da aŋpak agɨt uŋun aŋ kɨmotneŋsi.
Aŋakwan uŋun teŋteŋɨ da pɨlɨn tukgwan teŋteŋaŋban pɨlɨn tuk da dɨma aban kɨmakgɨt.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn morapmɨ nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ uŋun nandaŋ gadatni yopba wɨtdal kɨŋakwa notni do nandaba yokwi tok aŋek uwal da kɨsiron yopmaŋ yopmaŋ akdaŋ.
Piŋkop da yo uŋun akdɨsak, ji uŋun do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ. Mani abɨsok bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok dogɨn paŋkɨlɨt mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ da noman taŋ damɨŋakwa tepmɨ paŋ.
Ae aŋelo serabim bamorɨ dakon wupmɨ amɨn da wasawit da uŋun Saŋbek Saŋbek Kɨnam uŋun da kwenon yɨkgɨmal. Uŋun bamot dakon pɨrɨ da kɨnam dakon gapmɨ aŋyoŋgam anjil do wasawit. Aŋelo bamot uŋun Piŋkop uŋudon egɨsak dakon tɨlak. Mani, abɨsok uŋun yo morap dakon mibɨlɨ do arɨpmɨ dɨma yokeŋ.
Yaŋ aba Piŋkop da pi madepsi yoban jɨgɨsi nandawit. Aŋek mɨktɨmon maŋ pagakwa paŋpulugoni dakon amɨn mɨni.
Kɨŋ altaŋek wain gat pakbi ɨsipmɨ kɨnda mani mea gat ɨktagɨlek ɨmɨŋba nok do kurak tagɨt.
Piŋkop da nak da Yesu Kristo dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi dayɨsat uŋun gen naŋ ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji tagɨ paŋteban asak. Gen Bin Tagɨsi uŋun kalɨpsigwan pasɨlɨ taŋ aŋ aŋ opgut.
Yaŋ yaŋek Judia mɨktɨmon muwut muwut yut taŋ aŋaŋ kɨwit uŋudon agek Piŋkop gen yoyɨgɨt.
Yesu uŋun Jon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt dakon gen bin nandaŋek iyɨ gɨn bot kɨnda abɨdaŋek mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep Yesu uŋudon kɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek kokupni yopmaŋ yopmaŋ aŋek pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨ naŋ yol aŋkɨwit.
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da aŋsolat aŋek, ɨlɨp sul ɨmɨŋek, baljaŋek aŋakba kɨmotjak. Gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.”
Yaŋ kaŋek tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ Saimon Pita gat ae Yesu da paŋdetni kɨnda but dasi galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun bamot yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ kɨmakbi tamokon naŋ aŋabɨgeŋ. Aŋkɨ dukwan yɨpmaŋ uŋun dɨma nandamaŋ.”
Ji bɨsap dubagɨsi egek babɨkji pɨndatni do nandɨsat. Israel amɨn yaworɨ tagɨ egɨpni.
Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek yoyɨŋban kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa pasɨlɨkon da gɨk dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn Erot da yoyɨŋban apgwit. Apba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gɨk uŋun ni bɨsapmonsi altagɨt?”
Ae yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Piŋkop aŋkɨsino! Kɨndap da uŋun kokup pap sogɨt dakon mukwani dagok dagogɨ mɨni wɨgɨsak!”
Gɨptɨm wayɨkgamaŋ uŋun tɨlɨmni mɨni, mani gɨptɨm pɨdokdɨsak uŋun tɨlɨmni wagɨl tagɨsi. Gɨptɨm wayɨkgamaŋ uŋun tapmɨmni mɨni, mani gɨptɨm pɨdokdɨsak uŋun tapmɨmɨ toŋ.
Nak gulusuŋno gagon yaŋ teŋteŋosot, aŋek yokwi agɨm do bupmɨsi nandɨsat.
Kɨlek taŋakwa kɨnda da gɨptɨmno kɨlek tak yaŋ kaŋ tobɨl obɨŋek Piŋkop gen papmon da aŋkɨsigɨt.
Yo uŋun dɨma altaŋakwa gen uŋun kɨlɨ dayɨt. Do don yo uŋun bamɨ noman taŋakwa yaŋsi nandaŋ gadani, Nak Naga Uŋun Amɨn.
“Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da ji tɨmɨgek tepmɨ damɨŋek dɨkba kɨmotdaŋ. Ae ji nak nolgaŋ do aŋek amɨn kɨsi morap da ji do butjap nandaŋ damdaŋ.
Do wain kalugɨ meme gɨp kalugɨkon kolaŋ.
Yesu gen yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn paŋdetni da tobɨl abɨŋ kaŋba Yesu mɨŋat kɨnda gat gen yaŋbal pɨndagek wɨrɨpdakgwit. Mani “Gak yo nido galak tosol?” bo “Nido on mɨŋat gat gen yomal?” yaŋ kɨnda da Yesu dɨma iyɨwit.
Yo uŋun yaŋ do yosot: nandak nandak yokwi, amɨn dapba kɨmot, yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, kabo, topmon da gen pikon yopyop, ae yaŋba yokwi tok.
Yawe da Abraham gat saŋbek saŋbek uŋun agɨt. Uŋun saŋbek saŋbek agɨt uŋun dɨma kɨrɨŋɨt do Aisak naŋ yaŋ teban tok aŋ ɨmgut.
“Pi monjɨni uŋun gen aŋaŋ uŋun amɨn kabɨkon aŋkɨwit, mani geni nandak do kuragɨ nandaŋek iyɨ da galak togon kɨŋ kɨŋ awit. Kɨnda uŋun pigagani kɨgɨt, ae kɨnda moneŋ ɨlɨt pinikon kɨgɨt.
Tebaisi iyɨŋban kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak yutgokon kɨŋ Amɨn Tagɨ da gak do bupmɨ nandaŋek wasok madep ak uŋun dakon gen bin yawi dɨwat kabɨgo yoyɨŋ mudoki.”
Yesu Kristo altagɨt uŋun dakon gen yaŋ. Meŋi Maria uŋun Josep da pasak do kɨlɨ manjɨwit. Mani dɨma paŋakwan Maria uŋun monjɨ kwap kɨlɨ awɨlgɨt. Monjɨ kwap awɨlgɨt uŋun Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon da awɨlgɨt.
Aŋek yabekbi kabɨ da Yesu da kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt uŋun do tapmɨmɨ toŋsi sigɨn yaŋ teŋteŋawit. Yaŋ aŋakwa Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni da bɨkbɨknikon madepsi taŋ yomgut.
Nak mayagɨ nandaŋek yaŋ dayɨsat, nin jikon aŋpak uŋuden aneŋ dakon tapmɨmnin mɨni. Mani amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon man awɨgɨsak kaŋ, nagayo kɨsi mano awɨgɨkeŋ gɨn. (Nak nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da yaŋ yosot.)
Amɨn da kaŋba amɨnsi egɨpgut. Amɨnsi egek don gawat gawat aŋek Datni dakon galaktok yolek kɨmakgɨt. Asi, gen guramɨgek tɨlak kɨndapmon si kɨmakgɨt bɨsapmon mayaktok madepsi pagɨt.
Jon da amɨn pakbi soŋ yomgut, mani gɨldat kabisok kɨnda egek Piŋkop da Telagɨ Wup soŋ damdɨsak.”
Saimon gat notni kabɨ gat tap kɨlap ɨlɨkgwit uŋun pɨndagek tamtam yawit. Ae Saimon dakon pi ɨsal bamotni Jems gat Jon gat Sebedi dakon monji yat uŋun kɨsi tamtam yagɨmal. Aŋek Saimon Pita da Yesu ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nepmaŋ dek kɨ. Nak yokwi pakpak!” Yaŋban Yesu da Saimon yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak dɨma pasolbi. Abɨsok onda wasaŋek gak amɨn tɨmɨtdɨsal.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, Kwen Kokup dakon bret Moses da dɨma damgut. Datno da Kwen Kokup dakon bret bamɨsi ji do damɨsak.
Aŋakwa Yesu da paŋdetni dakon but pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda iyɨ akgɨron aŋobɨŋ yɨpban akgɨt.
Gak da gaga dakon gen do nayɨŋ dekgɨl, do gen uŋun dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekgɨm.
Kɨlɨ aŋelo da maban gapma kɨdagɨ mɨnikon pɨgɨgɨt. Pɨgakwan gapma uŋun dakon yoma sopmaŋek tebaisi aŋteban agɨt. Mɨktɨm amɨn morap arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋkewaljak, yaŋ do agɨt. Uŋun bɨlak 1 tausen mudaŋakwan don yɨpmaŋ dekba bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok galaktoknikon egɨpdɨsak.
Uŋun bɨsapmon emat wuwɨk gat ae dubagɨkon emat aŋ uŋun dakon gen bin apba nandaŋek butji dɨma pasolni. Uŋun yo morap altokdaŋ, mani mɨktɨm da mudosak bɨsap madep kɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ dɨma nandani.
Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Juda amɨn gɨptɨmni mandabi uŋun dagɨn gɨsamɨ toŋ ekwaŋ? Bo Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ gɨptɨmɨ dɨma mandabi uŋun kɨsi da gɨsamɨ toŋ ekwaŋ? Kɨsi bamot gɨsamɨ toŋ ekwaŋ. Nin yaŋ yomaŋ, Abraham nandaŋ gadat aban Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt.
Not kabɨ yaŋsi nandani, nak bɨsap morapmɨ jikon ap do nandagɨm. Nido Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon pi abo nandaŋ gadat awit uŋudeŋ gɨn jikon ak do nandɨsat. Mani bɨsap morapmɨ yo dɨwarɨ da kosit sopmaŋ namaŋ.
Uŋun amɨn do Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ mandabi: ‘Nandani, geno yaŋ teŋteŋosak do amɨn kɨnda yabekgo uŋun da mibɨltaŋ gamjak. Aŋek kositgo aŋnoman asak.’
Sunduk da galaktokni yolni do iyɨ da paron depban yokwalgwit. Mani gen bamɨ nandani kaŋ, nandak nandakni ae pɨsaŋakwa Sunduk da paron da kukwaŋ kɨkdaŋ.
Aŋpak yaworɨsi aŋek egakwa amɨn kɨsi da aŋpakji tagɨsi pɨndatni. Nandani, Amɨn Tagɨ kɨlɨsok uŋun apdɨsak.
Piŋkop, nak mango aŋkɨsisat. Manji dɨma namɨŋek bɨsitno nandaŋ nabi.
Gɨptɨmnin uŋun kaloŋɨ kɨnda gɨn dɨma, dɨwatni morapmɨ.
Pasalba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak da naga obɨsat. Ji dɨma pasolni.”
Yesu Betani kokupmon altaŋek Lasarus uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt da gɨldat 4 kabɨ kɨmakbi tamogwan tosok yaŋ nandagɨt.
Nak naga aŋpak dɨma galak tosot uŋun baŋ asat kaŋ, Moses dakon gen teban uŋun yo tagɨsi kɨnda yaŋ yosot.
Asi, nin ji do nandaŋek butnin tagɨsi asak, ae kɨsɨk kɨsɨk amaŋ.
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do awit. Kɨsit kɨlda amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Demitius. Uŋun amɨn silwa baŋ kokup kɨdat mɨŋat Atemis uŋun dakon wup wasagɨt. Moneŋ ɨlɨt pi aŋek pi monjɨni moneŋ madepsi tɨmɨkgwit.
Yaŋakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop nak yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun dakon galaktokni yolek pi namgut uŋun aŋ mudokeŋ uŋun da japno asak.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kokup papmon kɨŋ amɨn kɨnda kokdaŋ. Kaŋek yaŋ iyɨni: Yoyɨŋdet da yaŋ yosok, Nak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun kwaŋ tosok. Nak gat paŋdet kabɨno gat gak da yutnon apno Yapyap Bɨlak dakon jap noneŋ.”
Aŋek gak gat ae mɨŋat amɨn gak da dam madepgwan ekwaŋ uŋun kɨsi wagɨlsi tuwɨl paŋtasɨk akdaŋ. Tuwɨlba tɨp notni da kwenon dɨma taŋ taŋ akdaŋ. Nido Piŋkop gagon kɨlɨ abɨk, mani butgo dɨma pɨsak.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji niaŋ nandaŋ? Amɨn kɨnda sipsipni 100 kabɨkon da kɨnda pasɨljak kaŋ, niaŋ asak? Kaŋ 99 kabɨ ɨleŋ obakon yopban jap naŋek egakwa kaloŋɨ pasɨljak uŋun wusɨk do kɨsak.
“Yoyɨŋdet, ni gen teban da gen teban morap kɨsi yapmaŋ mudosok?”
Uŋudon pakgɨmaŋ da wɨsa dagokdo uŋun kokup pap yɨpmaŋek Sisaria kokup papmon kɨŋ altaŋek Pilip da yutnon kɨno uŋun gat egɨpgumaŋ. Pilip uŋun yabekbi kabɨ paŋpulugoni do kalɨp amɨn 7 kabɨ manjɨkbi uŋun kabɨkon nani kɨnda. Uŋun amɨn Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok amɨn kɨnda.
Mɨŋat amɨn morapyo gen tebango yɨpmaŋ dekgaŋ uŋun manji yomɨsal. Top geni uŋun suŋ tokdaŋ.
Nido, yoma ain kɨnda mani bras uŋun baŋ dapmaŋ paŋteban abi uŋun tuwɨldak, ae dam teban yut dakon dam dakon ain oba paŋjokgal jokgal asak.
Dat da mɨŋat monjɨyoni do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomaŋ uŋun da tɨlak Yawe da amɨn iyɨ do pasal ɨmaŋ amɨn do yaŋsi nandaŋ yomɨsak.
Kɨlɨ koŋ da kɨla amɨn madep gat emat amɨni gat tɨmɨk paŋabɨŋ mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda Ibru genon da Amegedon yaŋ yoŋ uŋudon paŋmuwukgwit.
Uŋun da yaŋ yagɨt, nido Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Koŋ gak on amɨn yɨpmaŋ degek wɨŋ kɨ!”
Aŋakwa Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Not kabɨ, ji tap kɨlap dɨ ɨlaŋ?” Yaŋban yawit, “Dɨma.”
Ain nap baŋ kandapnikon paŋteban aba kandapmɨ pɨlɨn tagɨt. Ae ain gɨroŋɨkbi madep kɨnda tegɨkon aŋteban awit.
Jems da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Do nak yaŋ nandɨsat, Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ but tobɨl aŋek Piŋkopmon kwaŋ uŋun nin da jɨgɨ dɨma yomneŋ do nandɨsat.
Piŋkop niaŋon da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ niyɨsak uŋun do Gen Bin Tagɨsi da nolɨsak. Nin nandaŋ gadat aŋapno uŋun do aŋek Piŋkop da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ niyɨsak. Wasok wasok uŋun nandaŋ gadat, ae wasɨpyo kɨsi uŋun nandaŋ gadat kaloŋgɨn. Gen kɨnda Piŋkop da papiakon tosok uŋun do yosok. “Amɨn kɨlegɨ uŋun nandaŋ gadat aŋek egɨpdaŋ.”
uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn da Yesu kaŋ nandaŋyo awit. Kaŋ nandaŋyo aŋek Yesu abɨk dakon gen bin saŋbeŋba mɨktɨm terɨ terɨ kɨgɨt. Kwan nandaŋek sot amɨn kɨsisi paŋabɨŋ yopmaŋakwa
Yawe uŋun kɨla amɨn madep egɨsak. Kɨla amɨn madep dakon ɨmal pasak. Asi, kɨla amɨn madep dakon ɨmal pasak, ae tapmɨmni uŋun madepsi. Mɨktɨm daman uŋun wasaŋban tebaisi tosok, arɨpmɨ dɨma puweŋ kɨsak.
Ji aŋpakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ yaŋ pɨndakba pɨsoni. Nap kelɨ toŋ da wain sop arɨpmɨ dɨma potni. Ae jal da kɨmɨp arɨpmɨ dɨma wigɨljak.
Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn dɨ da pɨndagek yawit, “Ji Sabat bɨsap dakon gen teban yapmaŋek nido yaŋ aŋ?”
Kombɨ amɨn kɨsi morap da Yesu da pi don asak do yaŋkwok kalɨpsigwan kɨlɨ awit. Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨsi morap Yesu dakon kɨlegɨ do Piŋkop da yokwini wɨrɨrɨk yomdɨsak.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Sunduk da Yesu aŋaŋ Piŋkop dakon telagɨ kokup papmon Jerusalem aŋaŋ kɨgɨt. Aŋkɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da kwenon kwensi yɨpgut.
Jerusalem kɨŋ altaŋba paŋmuwukbi gat ae kɨla amɨni gat ae yabekbi kabɨ gat da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨwit. Yaŋ yoyɨŋba Piŋkop da paŋpulugaŋakwan yo morap agɨmal uŋun dakon geni yoyɨgɨmal.
Yesu Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut yɨpmaŋek Saimon da yutnon kɨgɨt. Saimon dakon yopmi sot aŋek gɨptɨmni kɨndapmɨ sogɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan Yesu da aŋpulugosak do iyɨwit.
Notnoni, ji yo uŋun noman tosak do jomjom aŋ, do Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi egɨpneŋ yaŋ dakon pi tebaisi aŋ kɨmotni. Yaŋ aŋek yo kɨndakon gulusuŋji kɨnda dɨma tosak. Ae Piŋkop gat but kaloŋsi egɨpni. Yaŋ aŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ da gɨldaron Piŋkop da ji dakon aŋpakji tagɨsi uŋun pɨndatjak.
Mani jap si galak tawit uŋun sigɨn naŋ egakwa
“Pi ɨsalni uŋun geni nandaŋek ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek bɨsit tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan egaki don gomango gabeŋ.’
“Yoyɨŋdet, Moses da gen kɨnda yaŋ mandagɨt, ‘Amɨn kɨnda monjɨ mɨni da kɨmagakwan mɨŋatni ɨsal egɨpjak kaŋ, padɨge da paŋakwan monjɨ paŋalasak.’
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandani do tɨlak gen kɨnda gat dayɨko nandani. Amɨn kɨnda jap yet pigaga tɨŋtɨŋosok.
Paŋmuwukbi notji top gen dɨma yoyɨni. Nido, but kalɨp gat aŋpakni gat kɨlɨ yopgwit.
Wɨsa dagokdosi Yesu amɨn dɨma egɨpgwit tɨm kɨndakon kɨgɨt. Aŋakwan amɨn da wusɨŋ aŋalon aŋek dɨma yopmaŋ kɨsak do nandaŋek abɨdok do awit.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Konilias gat gen yaŋek yutnon wɨgɨ pɨndakban amɨn morapmɨsi muwukgwit.
Kalɨp mɨŋat amɨnyo egɨpgwit uŋun Piŋkop manji ɨba yum dɨma pɨndakgɨt. Kulup madep yɨpban abɨŋakwan pasɨlgwit. Mani Noa uŋun aŋpak kɨlegɨ do yaŋ teŋteŋok amɨn, do Piŋkop da Noa gat ae mɨŋat amɨnyo 7 kabɨ gat kɨsi kɨla aŋakwan tagɨsi egɨpgwit.
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ kokup kɨdatni dakon wupmɨ uŋun gol ae silwa baŋ wasoŋ. Uŋun amɨn kɨsit da wasoŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da jɨgɨlak gen yaŋek yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn kabɨ wain kalugɨ morapmɨ naŋ da but upbal aŋ.”
Uŋun nin dakon tagɨ tɨmnin do aŋek gen uŋun yagɨt. Mɨktɨm pɨdosok amɨn gat ae wit gɨp mɨsɨŋɨkdak amɨn bamot bamɨ nokdamak yaŋ nandaŋek pini amal.
Uŋun da kapmatjok kɨŋek ya yaŋ iyɨneŋ. Aŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk kap yaŋek mani aŋkɨsino.
Iyɨ dakon gen teban do, “On uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen” yaŋ yaŋek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgaŋ. Nak gawak namaŋ uŋun koko yo ɨsalɨ asak.’ ”
Nido, Yawe da mɨŋat amɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma yopmaŋ detjak. Asisi, mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ iyɨ do manjɨgɨt uŋun manji arɨpmɨ dɨma yomjak.
Gɨldat 6 mudaŋakwa Yesu da Pita, Jems, ae Jon yoyɨŋban buŋon yolba ɨleŋ dubagɨ kɨndakon wɨgɨwit. Ɨleŋon iyɨ gɨn egek kaŋakwa Yesu dakon gɨptɨm kulabɨk aŋek ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt.
Banabas uŋun amɨn tagɨsi, nandaŋ gadatni tebaisi taŋakwan Telagɨ Wup uŋun da buron tugagɨt, do amɨn morapmɨsi da Amɨn Tagɨkon kɨwit.
Mani Piŋkop da ji yokwi da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨk iyɨ dakon oman amɨn depgut da ekwaŋ. Do iyɨ paŋpulugaŋban telagɨsi egek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpdaŋ.
Mani nandaŋ gadatgo dɨma mosak yaŋ do bɨsit kɨlɨ agɨm. Gak tobɨl apbi bɨsapmon notgoni paŋteban abi.”
Amɨn kɨnda yaŋ yokdɨsak, “Amɨn kɨmakbi kosit niaŋon da pɨdokdaŋ? Ae pɨdoni bɨsapmon niaŋen gɨptɨm da pɨdokdaŋ?”
Mɨktɨm amɨn morap yumabi aŋ, bo ae amɨn dakon yo do pɨndak galaktok aŋek kabo noŋ, bo ae kokup kɨdat gawak yomaŋ amɨn si yopmaŋ dek mudoni yaŋon da dɨma yagɨm. Ji uŋuden amɨn yopmaŋdet do nandaŋ kaŋ, on mɨktɨm wagɨl yɨpmaŋdetni.
Uŋun amɨn nandak nandakni kɨlegɨ mɨni. Mani nawa gengo do but dasi galak tosot.
“Nin Piŋkop dakon monjini ekwamaŋ, do Piŋkop uŋun gol bo silwa bo tɨp yombem yaŋ dɨma nandaneŋ. Piŋkop amɨn da nandak nandagon da yo kɨsit da wasoŋ uŋun yombem dɨma.
“Don Piŋkop da Sol yaŋ dagaŋ ɨban ɨsal egakwan Dewit da kɨla amɨn madep egɨpjak do manjɨgɨt. Piŋkop da yaŋ aŋek Dewit do yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak Dewit Jesi dakon monji uŋun kaŋek butno tagɨsi asak. Uŋun da geno tagɨsi guramɨtjak yaŋ kosot.’
Sipsip Monɨŋ da kendol pakbi baŋ papia aŋteban abi 5 uŋun pakdekgɨt. Pakdegakwan amɨn kɨmakgwit dakon wupni alta da mibɨlgwan pɨndakgɨm. Kalɨp uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop dakon gen tebaisi abɨdaŋek uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋakwa uwal da dapba kɨmakgwit.
Nin tap wakga abɨdaŋek kokup pap Sirakus kɨŋ gɨldat kapbɨ uŋudon egɨpgumaŋ.
Piŋkop, mɨrakgo yopmaŋek aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot uŋun nandaki. Bɨsitno nandaki.
Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨ da yo morap uŋuden wusɨk do nandaba kɨk aŋ. Mani Datji Kwen Kokup egɨsak uŋun da ji uŋun yo morap do wadaŋ uŋun nandaŋ mudosok.
do gɨptɨmgo aŋkutnaŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon da pɨ!”
Gen teban da galaktok yokwi ninon paŋalon aban yokwi amaŋ kaŋ, gen teban uŋun yo yokwi yaŋ tagɨ yoneŋ? Uŋun dɨmasi! Gen teban da taŋek yokwino nolɨŋban nomansi pɨndakdat. Gen teban da yaŋ yosok: “Ji amɨn dakon yo do pɨndak galaktok dɨma ani.” Yaŋ dɨma yosok tam, pɨndak galaktok uŋun aŋpak yokwi yaŋ dɨma nandakom.
Ji dɨsi dakon man paukwaŋ, uŋun aŋpak tagɨ dɨma. Yis kaloŋɨsok dɨ da bret kɨsi paŋpap aŋ, ji uŋun dɨma nandaŋ, ma?
Kɨla amɨn madep uŋun dakon man madepni do dɨma ɨŋtoni dosi nandɨsat. Gɨldat da toktogɨsi tosok uŋun da arɨpmon man madepni toktogɨsi yaŋ gɨn taŋ aŋ aŋ kɨsak. Uŋun amɨn dogɨn aŋek mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn da gɨsamɨ toŋ egek kɨla amɨn madep do gɨsamɨ toŋ amɨn yaŋ iyɨni dosi nandɨsat.
Yawe, nak amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal, ae amɨn dakon aŋpak kokwin kɨlegɨsi asal uŋun do kap yokeŋ. Nak gak aŋkɨsik do kap yokeŋ.
Jerusalem, nak gak do ɨŋtaŋek yo ɨsalɨ yaŋ gandaŋek yo dɨwarɨ do nandako wɨgɨni kaŋ, Piŋkop da nak melno aŋkadɨm aban kap dɨma yokeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Nak nawa gengo do dɨma ɨŋtosot, do jɨgɨno madepsi uŋun kaŋek aŋpulugoki.
Yawi kaluk dakon monjɨ gwayo uŋun gobɨŋ da yaŋ emat amɨn kɨnda da kɨsiron toŋ.
Mɨŋat bamorɨ da plaua wasaŋek yɨgakwal kɨnda yapmaŋek kɨnda abɨdokdɨsak.
Wɨsa dagokdo da wɨgɨ pɨlɨndosi uwal da nɨt do pi aŋ. Amɨn morapmɨ da iyɨ do nandaba wɨgakwa abɨŋ nep do aŋ.
Uŋun bɨsapmon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae Israel dakon kɨla amɨn uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Kaiapas uŋun da yutnon muwukgwit.
Yaŋ yaŋek bɨsit tebai saŋbek saŋbek iyɨwit, “Nin nolbɨ on mɨktɨm tɨm dɨma yɨpmaŋ detneŋ.”
Nomansi yaŋsi dayɨsat, uŋun da iyɨ dakon galaktok yolek paret awit. Moneŋ yomyomɨ dakon tɨlak yapmaŋek madepsi yomgwit.
Kɨŋakwal Pol gat Banabas gat Antiok sigɨn egek amɨn dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi yoyɨŋdet pi awit. Aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen yoyɨŋ teŋteŋawit.
Amɨn da yo morap gawak yomɨŋek piŋkopnin yaŋ yoŋ uŋun do uwal akdɨsak. Uŋun yo morap pabɨŋ yopmaŋek iyɨ dakon man awɨgɨkdɨsak. Aŋek Piŋkop da Telagɨ Yut Madepmon pawɨgɨ yɨgek “Nak naga Piŋkop” yaŋ yokdɨsak.
Iyɨ do pasolgoŋ amɨn yo nido galak toŋ uŋun yoban tɨmɨkgaŋ. Bɨsitni nandaŋek yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak.
Jerusalem amɨn ji Yawe aŋkɨsini. Saion amɨn ji Piŋkopji aŋkɨsini.
Gak da amɨn kɨlegɨ do yo tagɨsi aŋ yomɨsal. Emat dakon pasɨk da yaŋ taŋek paŋyoŋgam asal, ae kɨlani tagɨsi aŋaki tagɨsi ekwaŋ.
Gen yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn Kwen Kokup aŋelo morapmɨsi da pɨŋ notnikon muwugek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yawit:
Yawe, bɨsitno nandaki. Nak gak da aŋpulugoki do yaŋ tɨdosot. Nak dakon kunamno nandaŋ nabi.
Paŋdetni 10 kabɨ gen uŋun nandaŋek Jems gat Jon gat do butjap nandawit.
(Paŋdetni jap yum do kokup papmon kɨlɨ kɨwit.)
Ɨleŋ Olipmon wɨgakwa Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun da arɨpmon ji manji namdaŋ. Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn aŋakgo kɨmagakwan sipsip waseŋ kɨ iyɨ iyɨ kɨkdaŋ.’
Amɨn yokwi da kɨsiron naŋ gwayeki, aŋek amɨn nɨkba kɨmotdɨsat da kɨsiron baŋ nak abɨdoki.
Ji gen bamɨ yolgwit, yaŋ aŋek dɨsi Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨni awit. Aŋek Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ. Do abɨsok pi madepsi aŋ kɨmagek but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ kɨmotni.
Piŋkop da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ don tɨmɨtdɨsak dakon geni uŋun kombɨ amɨn da kalɨpsigwan kɨlɨ yawit. Gen uŋun yaŋ tosok:
Gak da sɨkak morapmɨ yopbɨ maŋek mɨktɨm aŋyawot aŋakwan pakbini toŋ aŋakwa jap gɨsamɨgaki bamɨ tagɨ toŋ.
Dɨsi nandaŋ, mɨŋatjok sakwabat dɨwarɨ kosit kɨlegɨ kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgwit da Sunduk yolgaŋ.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, nak wain ae dɨma naŋek egɨ wɨgɨ Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Agak kokupmon don wain kalugɨ nokeŋ.”
Uŋudon Yesu do nandaba wukwan ɨmɨŋek jap pakbiyo madep awit. Aba Mata da jap pɨlɨk yomɨŋakwan Lasarus gat amɨn dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi yɨgek Yesu gat jap nawit.
Nak papia mandaŋ damgum bɨsapmon yaŋ yagɨm, “Ji yumabi aŋpak aŋ amɨn gat kɨsi dɨma egɨpni.”
Yaŋbal yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Niaŋ abeŋ do nandamal?”
Piŋkop Wɨkwisi Madep uŋun telagɨ kokup papnikon egɨsak. Uŋun kokupmon pakbi madep kɨnda pagek amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk yomɨsak.
Amɨn da uŋun aŋpak morap aŋakwa Piŋkop da pɨndakban yokwi aŋ. Mani ji kɨsitji dɨma sugaŋek jap noŋ uŋun da yokwi dɨma asak.”
Gak da jɨgɨ namgul uŋun tagɨsi agɨl. Uŋun da gengo do nayɨŋdet tagɨsi agɨt.
Pɨdaŋ gɨldat morapmɨ altaŋ yoban amɨn Yesu gat kɨsi Galili da Jerusalem pɨgɨwit uŋun da kawit. Abɨsok Yesu kawit amɨn da uŋun dakon geni Juda amɨnon yaŋ teŋteŋoŋ.
Mani gen kaga uŋun tapmɨmni madep do amɨn kɨnda da iyɨ dakon gen kaga kɨla arɨpmɨ dɨma asak. Bɨsap morapmɨ gen kaga gen yokwi morapmɨ yosok. Uŋudon amɨn dapdap marasin yokwi madepsi tugawit da toŋ.
Amɨn morapmɨ da uŋun amɨn dakon yumabi aŋpakni mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun yoldaŋ. Yaŋ aba amɨn da aŋpak bamɨ dakon kosit do yaŋba yokwi tok akdaŋ.
Mani, gak mɨŋat amɨnyo Yesu yolyol dakon gen madep madep morap toŋ uŋun yol kɨmotni do yoyɨŋ dekgi.
Not kabɨ, nin mibɨ genin uŋun yaŋ: Ji Piŋkop da nin paŋpulugosak do bɨsit ani. Aŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen da tepmɨsi kɨŋ ɨreŋ taŋakwan ji da geni do nandaba wɨgɨgɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn da yaŋ gɨn nandani.
Papia uŋun mandaŋ damgum uŋun ji paŋkɨlɨk dandak do mandagɨm. Ji yo morapmon nak dakon gen guramɨkgaŋ bo dɨma, uŋun kok do aŋek mandagɨm.
Nak Yawe da mɨŋat amɨnyo Saion kokup pap do uwal aŋ, uŋun mayaktok yomɨŋek pabɨŋ yopmaŋek yolban tobɨlek kokupnikon kɨni dosi nandɨsat.
Gengo uŋun aŋteban aŋaki dagok dagogɨ mɨni toktogɨsi tosok uŋun kalɨpsigwan kɨlɨ nandagɨm.
Piŋkop da yokwi pakpak dakon geni dɨma nandaŋ yomɨsak yaŋ nandamaŋ. Mani amɨn galaktokni yolek gawak ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun geni nandaŋ yomɨsak.
Timoti jikon da ninon tobɨl abɨŋek gen tagɨsi kɨlɨ niyɨk. Ji da nandaŋ gadat tebai aŋek amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ uŋun do niyɨk. Ae bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nin do nandaŋek tagɨsi nandaŋ yaŋ yosok. Nin ji dandakdosi nandamaŋ, yaŋ gɨn jiyo kɨsi nin nindakdosi nandaŋ yaŋyo kɨsi niyɨk.
Aŋteban aŋek bot yɨpmaŋek pɨgakwa uŋudon gɨn mɨŋat amɨnyo da Yesu kaŋ nandaŋyo awit.
Gen uŋun nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn terɨ terɨ sɨŋtaŋek amɨn bamot ae dɨma pɨndakgwit. Yesu iyɨ gɨn kawit.
Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨgɨmal, “Gak Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋaki Piŋkop da gak gat ae yutgokon amɨn ekwaŋ gat kɨsi yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak.”
Nandaŋ pɨsoni. Yut kɨnda dakon ami kalbi kabo noknok ni bɨsapmon apdɨsak yaŋ nandagɨt tam, kɨla aŋakwan yutni arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlban.
Mani mɨŋat amɨnyo aŋpakni yaworɨ, uŋun Piŋkop da mɨktɨm morap kɨsi yomdɨsak. Uŋun yɨyɨt wagɨl tagɨsi aŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk egɨpdaŋ.
Mani tap wakga nɨman madep kɨnda tap binap tagɨt uŋudon wukwan abɨdagɨt. Tap wakga dakon tomno nɨmanon tebaisi tegaŋek tagɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan tap da tap wakga dakon buŋɨ tɨdaŋ tuwɨlgɨt.
Ae mɨŋat amɨnyo uwalnin da kapmatjok kɨŋek “Yawe da yo tagɨsi aŋ damɨŋek gɨsam damjak” yaŋ dɨmasi yoyɨni dosi nandɨsat.
Yaŋ aŋek Pol do os kɨnda kɨsi aŋnoman aŋek Pol aŋkutnaŋ aŋaŋ gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn madep Pelikskon aŋkɨni.”
Piŋkop da Amɨn Tagɨ kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt, ae iyɨ da tapmɨmon nin dakon gɨptɨmnin paban pɨdokdaŋ.
Yesu kokup monɨŋ ae kokup pap kɨsi agek Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutni taŋ taŋ awiron wɨgek amɨn yoyɨŋ degek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi do yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Aŋek gɨptɨmnikon sot wudaniyo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ tawit uŋun paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Mani, amɨn iyɨ do pasal ɨmaŋ ae Yawe da nin do but dasi bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ galak taŋ nimɨsak yaŋsi nandaŋ gadaŋ amɨn uŋun do galak taŋ yomɨsak.
Yawe, tap pakbi madep uŋun da madepsi tamalɨkgaŋ. Aŋek wɨwɨk madepsi yaŋek sulukwaŋ, ae ɨleŋɨkon tebaisi tɨdoŋ.
Sonda morapmon ji morap kɨsi kaloŋ kaloŋ pi agak da butgwan moneŋ tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun kokwinɨgek kabi kɨnda yopmaŋ yopmaŋ ani. Aŋakwa nak opbeŋ bɨsapmon moneŋ paŋmuwut dakon pi dɨma ani.
Uŋun dakon kɨlɨŋɨ da tap madep Mediterenian da arɨpmon kɨwit. Ae terɨ kɨnda do gɨgɨ da kwaŋek pakbi madep Yupretis da arɨpmon kɨwit.
Ain ɨdap notnikon tɨdaŋ tɨdaŋ aŋek aŋkɨsini. Uŋun tɨdaŋba gen madepsi yaŋakwa aŋkɨsini.
Nak Pol da on nandani do nandɨsat: Nak ji gat ae Laodisia mɨŋat amɨnyo gat ae mɨŋat amɨn morap dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi da nak dakon ɨŋam dɨma kawit amɨn nak ji kɨsi paŋpulugok do pi madepsi asat.
Piŋkop da Rebeka yaŋ iyɨgɨt: “Monjɨ mibɨltok altosak uŋun da padɨge dakon oman amɨni egɨpdɨsak.”
Do Kwen Kokup Piŋkop ya yaŋsi iyɨneŋ. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Aŋek topmon da man madep ɨmɨŋ mudaŋek ɨmal gami ɨlɨgek iyɨ dakon pabɨ pɨgɨk paŋ ɨmgwit. Paŋ ɨmɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak do ɨlɨk aŋaŋ kɨwit.
Nak amɨn yokwi da yo uŋun aŋ dakon mibɨlɨ wɨsɨŋ kok do agɨm, mani aŋtɨdok agɨm.
Israel amɨn da Piŋkop manji ɨmgwit bɨsapmon Piŋkop da mɨktɨm amɨn morap kɨsi paŋpulugaŋek yo tagɨsi morapmɨ aŋyomgut. Ae Israel amɨn Piŋkop dakon aŋpak yɨpmaŋ dekgwit bɨsapmon Piŋkop Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ do yo tagɨsi aŋyomgut. Yaŋ agɨt do yaŋsi nandaneŋ, Israel amɨn Piŋkopmon ae tobɨl apni bɨsapmon, mibɨltok agɨt uŋun si yapmaŋek mɨktɨm amɨn morap kɨsi do yo wagɨl tagɨsisi morapmɨ aŋyomdɨsak.
Aŋelo 6 kweŋni pɨsoŋakwan gen kɨnda noman taŋban nandagɨm. Alta gol baŋ wasaŋbi, Piŋkop da ɨŋamon tosok, uŋun dakon kodɨgɨ 4 kabɨkon jom 4 kabɨ tawit uŋudon da yagɨt.
Tap uŋun yo galagɨsi. Mani tap dakon galagɨ pasɨljak kaŋ, niaŋsi aŋek galagɨni aŋkaluk aneŋ? Ji tap yombem egek notji gat but kaloŋsi egɨpni.”
Ae wɨli ji mɨŋatji but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ kɨmotni, aŋek burɨ si yokwi toni da arɨpmon aŋpak yokwi dɨma aŋyomni.
Piŋkop da uŋun Gen naŋ gɨn yo morap kɨsisi wasaŋ mudagɨt. Kosit ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨndakon da yo kɨnda dɨma noman tagɨt.
Ji kabo noknok pɨndagek not aŋyomaŋ. Aŋek yumabi amɨn gat kɨsi akwaŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda dam tebanon pɨgɨsak do manjɨkbi kaŋ, uŋun dam tebanon pɨgɨkdɨsak. Ae amɨn kɨnda emat agak sɨbakon kɨmotjak do manjɨkbi kaŋ, emat agak sɨbakon kɨmotdɨsak. Yo uŋuden noman taŋba, Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ butni yaworɨ taŋakwa tebai agek nandaŋ gadatni tebaisi abɨdoni.
Piŋkop da yo morapmɨ damɨŋakwan ji da amɨn dɨwarɨ tagɨ paŋpulugoni. Ae ji da paret paŋmuwutni uŋun nin da wadak wadak amɨn do yomɨŋapno uŋun do Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨkdaŋ.
Ji on amɨn do nandaba kɨk dɨma ani. On amɨn kosit yolɨk amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni yombem. Dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda da notni kɨnda kosit yolɨsak kaŋ, kɨsi bamot gapmakon mokdamal.”
Bo ae Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda mukwa sogok amɨn do yosok uŋun kɨsi dɨma manjɨŋ nandaŋyo awit? Mukwa sogok amɨn Sabat bɨsap morapmon gen teban yapmaŋek pi aŋ, mani dɨwarɨni mɨni ekwaŋ.
Asi, nak ji da dubagɨkon egɨsat, mani butnokon da ji gat egɨsat. Aŋek nak naga uŋun dakon aŋpak kɨlɨ kokwinɨkgɨm.
Yaŋ yaŋek tobɨl Yesu akban kagɨt. Mani Maria da uŋun Yesu yaŋ dɨma kaŋban pɨsagɨt.
Isip amɨn da but galak dakon yo tɨmɨgek Jerusalem opdaŋ. Aŋakwa Itopia amɨn da Piŋkop do kɨsitni paŋenagek gawat gawat akdaŋ.
Wamaŋ ɨmɨŋek top iyɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Gɨldat tagɨ, Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep!”
Yawe da nin sigɨn nandaŋ nimɨŋek gɨsamɨtjak. Uŋun da Israel mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ gat ae Aron dakon amɨn kabɨ kɨsi gɨsamɨtjak.
Aŋek Mata da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak ɨdon egɨpgul tam, olapno dɨma kɨmakgɨt.
Mani datni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Dat, gak yaŋ nido asal? Nak oman monjɨ ɨsalɨ kɨnda da yaŋ bɨlak morapmɨ egek omango aŋ egɨsat. Aŋek gengo bɨsap kɨndakon dɨma kɨrɨŋɨkgɨm. Notnoni gat kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aneŋ do memesok kɨnda dɨmasi namgul.
Israel amɨn Meriba pakbikon yokwi aba Piŋkop butjap nandaŋ yomgut, do uŋun aŋpakni do aŋek Moses jɨgɨ madep pagɨt.
Gak da pɨlɨn tuk abɨ noman taŋakwan koron joŋ bɨt kɨlapyo akwaŋ.
Piŋkop, mɨŋat amɨnyo da gak dakon man kundu yapmaŋek kwensi awɨgɨni do nandɨsat. Tapmɨmgo yɨpbi mɨktɨm morap kɨsikon nomansi teŋteŋosak. Yaŋ aŋaki mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi da man madepgo do nandani.
Uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda yut kwenon egakwan yo kabɨni yutgwan toni kaŋ, yo kabɨni tɨmɨt do yutnon dɨmasi pɨgɨsak. Ae pigaga egɨpjak amɨnyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn yutnon yo kabɨni tɨmɨt do dɨmasi tobɨl kɨsak.
Emat amɨn da Pol aŋaŋ yutnikon awɨgɨk do aŋakwa emat amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn Grik genon da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gen kɨnda tagɨ gayɨkeŋ?” Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Gak Grik gen nandɨsal, ma?
Mani Yawe da amɨn kɨlegɨ yɨpmaŋ dekban amɨn yokwi da arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋakban kɨmotjak. Ae amɨn yokwi da amɨn kɨlegɨ gen pikon yɨpjak kaŋ, Yawe da yum kaŋakwan gen pikon arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ yɨpjak.
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do ji gapman do takis yomaŋ, nido gapman dakon pi amɨn uŋun Piŋkop dakon oman amɨni ekwaŋ, ae uŋun toktogɨsi pini aŋkɨmokgoŋ.
Aŋakwa yo 4 kabɨ egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun da yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun asi.” Yaŋ yaŋakwa kɨla amɨn kabɨ da maŋ pagek gawak yomgwit.
Asi, dɨwarɨ da geni dɨma guramɨkgwit. Yaŋ awit do Piŋkop da yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun tagɨ kɨrɨŋɨtjak?
Gen tebango nagon toktogɨsi tosok, do nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi amɨn kɨnda dagaŋek uwalno dakon nandak nandak yapmaŋdat.
Yaŋban paŋdetni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn da gadat gadat tebaisi aŋakwa namɨn da ɨgayɨŋ namɨsak yaŋ nido yosol?”
Amɨn kɨnda Piŋkop dakon gen teban morap kɨsi guramɨgek kaloŋɨ kɨnda naŋgɨn kɨrɨŋɨkdak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gen teban morap kɨsi kɨrɨŋɨkdak da arɨp gulusuŋni toŋ.
Yesu da nandak nandakni da arɨpmon Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋek tɨlak gen uŋuden morapmɨ yoyɨgɨt.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jeriko kokup papmon kɨŋ altawit. Yesu uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋ degakwan paŋdet kabɨni gat ae mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep gat kɨsi kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa kosit ɨleŋon amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda yɨkgɨt, mani Batimeus, uŋun Timeus dakon monji. Uŋun amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni do amɨn da moneŋ ɨmni do bɨsit yoyɨŋek yɨkgɨt.
Nandaŋ yawot uŋun amɨnon tugagɨt da tosok, do nin kɨsisi gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ paŋpulugaŋakwan gɨsamɨ toŋ ekwamaŋ.
Maria Yesu akgɨron kɨŋ kaŋek kandapmɨkon maŋ pagek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak ɨdon kɨsi egɨpgumaŋ tam olapno dɨma kɨmakgɨt.”
Yabekban kɨŋ kosiron pakgwit da wɨsa dagokdo aeni kɨŋ Jopa kokup pap aŋkapmat aŋakwa gɨldat binap agɨt. Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn Pita bɨsit pi ak do yut kwenon wɨgɨgɨt.
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do jɨgɨ uŋun guramɨkdat. Mani uŋun do mayagɨ dɨma pasat, nido amɨn uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsat uŋun kɨlɨ nandaŋ ɨmgum. Ae nak da kɨsitnikon yo yɨpgum uŋun kɨlani tagɨsi aŋakwan wɨgɨ Kristo apjak Gɨldaron wugɨsak yaŋsi nandaŋ kɨmokdot.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo dakon Piŋkopni ae Datni aŋkɨsineŋ. Nin Kristo dakon amɨn kabɨ agɨmaŋ uŋun do aŋek nin gɨsamɨgek wupnin paŋpulugok do Kwen Kokup dakon yo tagɨsi morap nimgut.
Yaŋ ani kaŋ, iyɨ don paŋpulugoni dakon yoni morapmɨ paŋmuwutdaŋ, ae uŋun yoni morapmɨ tebai tokdaŋ. Aŋek egɨp egɨp bamɨsi abɨdokdaŋ.
Piŋkop da amɨn yokwi yo yokwisi aŋ yomjak bɨsapmon, amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Amɨn kɨlegɨ da amɨn yokwi dakon yawi baŋ kandapni sugokdaŋ.
Yawe aŋkɨsikeŋ. Nak butno naŋ yaŋ iyɨsat, gak gwɨnɨmbɨl mani telagɨ aŋkɨsiki.
Yawe, wɨsa dagokdo morap gak do bɨsit asat. Wɨsa dagokdo gak do bɨsit tebaisi asat. Bɨsitno dakon kobogɨ nabi do jomjom asat.
Nin mɨktɨm dakon gɨptɨm gat sigɨn egek jɨgɨ paŋek iyoŋ iyoŋ yomaŋ. Mani on mɨktɨm gɨptɨm wagɨl yɨpmaŋdet do dɨma nandamaŋ. Nin gɨptɨm kalugɨ uŋun abɨdono uŋun da gɨptɨmnin kɨmot asak uŋun ɨmal naŋ yaŋ waban egɨp egɨp teban egɨpneŋ dosi nandamaŋ.
Amɨn da amɨn yokwi dakon kɨla amɨni uŋun tɨmɨgek maba tɨp domon pɨgɨni bɨsapmon Yawe dakon gen uŋun bamɨsi yaŋ nandaba pɨsokdaŋ.
Nak Juda amɨn ae Grik amɨn but tobɨl aŋek Piŋkopmon kɨŋek Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do gen madepsi yaŋ teŋteŋagɨm.
Mani nin morap Piŋkop da sɨlɨp yɨpgut uŋun da arɨpmon pɨdokdamaŋ. Mibɨltok Kristo, ae don tobɨl apjak bɨsapmon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morapni nin kɨmoron da pɨdokdamaŋ.
Pol saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Kɨla amɨn madep Agripa, nak Kwen Kokup dakon yo uŋun kaŋek geni dɨma kɨrɨŋɨkgɨm.
Nandani. Gɨptɨm mandak do teban teban aŋ amɨn uŋun amɨn dɨwarɨkon man madep pak do aŋek aŋ. Uŋun pasalek yaŋ nandaŋ, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ da nin Kristo dakon tɨlak kɨndap do nandaŋ gadamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ nimni kaŋ, yo yokwi aŋ nimdaŋ.”
Gɨldatno tagɨ Rupas do ɨmni. Uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ yol kɨmokdok. Ae gɨldatno tagɨ meŋi do kɨsi ɨmni. Uŋun nak dakon meŋno kɨsi egɨpgut.
Uŋun kokup pap kapbɨ gwasɨŋek Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn dakon but paŋteban aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨmal, “Yesu dɨma yɨpmaŋ degek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek tebaisi atni. Mibɨltok jɨgɨ morapmɨ paŋek don Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asagon kɨkdamaŋ.”
Mani amɨn kɨmoron da pɨdaŋek egɨp egɨpmon tagɨ egɨpni do kokwinɨkbi kabɨ uŋun bɨsapmon mɨŋat eyo dɨma akdaŋ.
Nido jɨgɨ madepsi paŋ amɨn manji dɨma yomɨsak. Tepmɨ jɨgɨyo paŋ amɨn uŋun do nandaban yo ɨsalɨ dɨma asak. Uŋun manji dɨma yomɨsak. Paŋpulugosak do yaŋ tɨdaŋba bɨsitni nandaŋ yomɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn tagɨni da bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek goman madepni yɨpmaŋ ɨmɨŋakwan ɨsal kɨgɨt.
amɨn dɨwarɨ tagɨ ae dɨwarɨ yokwi yaŋ nandaŋ yaŋ asak. Yaŋ aŋek ji kokwin amɨn dagaŋek nandak nandak yokwikon da kokwin aŋ.
Monjɨ gwayoni mɨŋat amɨnyo da binapmon man madepni toŋ da egɨpdaŋ. Amɨn kɨlegɨ uŋun dakon dɨwatni Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi aŋyomdɨsak.
aŋkɨ iyɨ dakon tɨp kɨnam amɨn kɨmakbi do kaluk pasɨŋbi uŋungwan aŋkɨ yɨpgut. Yɨpmaŋek tɨp madepsi kɨnda aŋtobɨlban abɨŋ yoma sopmaŋakwan yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Tiopilas, nak kalɨp papia kɨnda mandagɨm. Uŋun papiakon Yesu wasaŋek pi agɨt ae Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋ dekgɨron da kwen wɨgɨgɨt uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ mandagɨm. Yesu yabekbi kabɨni manjɨgɨt uŋun altaŋ yomɨŋek Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨm ɨmɨŋakwan pi ani do yoyɨŋ mudaŋakwan Piŋkop da abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨt.
Altaŋ yoban tobɨl kɨŋ notni dɨwarɨ yoyɨŋbal nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt.
Mani emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn Pol da gen uŋun yagɨt do nandaban yo ɨsalɨ aŋakwan tap wakga abɨdok amɨn gat ae tap wakga dakon ami gat dakon nandak nandakni yolgɨt.
Yesu da gen uŋun yoyɨŋban paŋdetni dɨwarɨ tobɨl kɨŋek Yesu saŋbeŋek dɨma yolgwit.
Yoyɨŋban but galak nandaŋek moneŋ ɨmni do yaŋ teban tawit. Judas uŋun nandaŋek Yesu kɨsitnikon yɨpjak dakon kosit wɨsɨgɨt.
Nido yokwi da gen tebanon tapmɨm paŋek nak aŋkɨlɨgek nɨkban kɨmakgɨm.
Yoyɨŋban gɨk noman tagɨt dakon bɨsap iyɨŋba nandaŋek Betlehem kokupmon yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kɨŋ monjɨ uŋun kɨlegɨsi wusɨŋ koni. Kaŋek abɨŋ nayɨŋba nakyo kɨsi kɨŋ gawak ɨbeŋ.”
Yoni mɨni amɨn do yo morapmɨ yomɨsak. Man bini amɨn da binapmon taŋakwan uŋun do nandaba wukwan ɨmaŋ. Aŋpakni tagɨsi uŋun do amɨn da dɨma ɨŋtoni.
Ae wɨsa dagokdosi ji yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Gɨkwem pɨli ae kwen gami asak, do sɨkak mɨrɨmyo akdɨsak.’ Ji gɨldat wɨsayo pɨndagek kokwin tagɨsi aŋ, mani abɨsok bɨsap ekwamaŋ uŋun kaŋek kokwin tagɨ dɨma aŋ.
Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep yaŋ ɨlɨkban apba yoyɨgɨt, “Gen dayɨko mɨrak yopmaŋek nandaba pɨsosak.
Nak Piŋkop aŋkɨsikeŋ bɨsapmon mɨŋat amɨnyo jɨgɨ paŋ da uŋun kaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Ae mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop wɨsɨŋ kok do pi aŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da butni paŋteban akdɨsak.
“Yaŋ nayɨŋban nak da wasaŋek yaŋapbo Telagɨ Wup ninon mibɨltok pɨgɨt uŋun amɨn kabɨkon yaŋ gɨn pɨgɨt.
Uŋun da jɨgɨlak yaŋ namɨŋek nabɨpmaŋgaŋ. Mani gak dakon gen teban yoldat, do yum pɨndagaki gen uŋuden dɨma nayɨni.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo morap, ji Piŋkop dakon tapmɨm madepni do yaŋ teŋteŋoni. Uŋun Israel amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madepni. Kundukon tapmɨm madepni nomansi komaŋ.
Jɨgɨni toŋ amɨn paŋpulugaŋek amɨn da pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn uŋun paŋenakban tagɨsi ekwaŋ.
Yawe Kwen Kokup ae mɨktɨmyo wasagɨt, uŋun da iyɨ nin tagɨsi paŋpulugosok.
gen papmon da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yesu, Amɨn Tagɨ, bupmɨ nandaŋ nibi!”
Bɨsap morapmɨ mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon kwen wɨgɨk aŋakwa bupmɨsi nandagɨt.
Aŋpak uŋuden do galak toni. Nido kalɨp bɨsapmon mɨŋat telagɨ egek Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi yom do yaŋ teban tok aŋyomgut uŋun do jomjom aŋek uŋun tɨlɨm pawit. Aŋek eni dakon pɨŋbini egɨpgwit. Sara uŋun aŋpak yolek Abraham dakon gen guramɨgek amɨn madepno yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Ae ji aŋpak kɨlegɨsi yolek yo kɨnda do dɨma pasolni kaŋ, ji uŋun Sara dakon gwakni.
Ae don nandaŋ gadat amɨn 500 yapmaŋdak uŋun kabɨkon altaŋ yomgut. Uŋun kabɨkon morapmɨ abɨsok ekwaŋ, mani dɨwarɨ kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit.
Yaŋban kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Judia mɨktɨmon Betlehem kokupmon altosak. Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda da kalɨpsigwan yaŋ mandagɨt,
Pilip uŋun gwi 4 kabɨ. Uŋun amɨnon dɨma yopbi. Mɨŋat kabɨ uŋun kombɨ gen yogok mɨŋat egɨpgwit.
Do Judas da Rom dakon emat amɨn dɨ gat ae Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon obip amɨn dɨwarɨ gat tɨmɨkban uŋudon kɨwit. Obip amɨn uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat Parisi amɨn gat da yabekgwit. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ lam ae kalɨŋ ae emat dakon yo kɨsi tɨmɨkgwit.
Yaŋdo, pakyaŋsi nandani, Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Wup da amɨn kɨnda aŋtagap aban “Yesu jobɨt tagɨ pasak!” yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma yosak. Ae Telagɨ Wupni mɨni amɨn da “Yesu uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ” yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma yosak.
Iyɨ dakon notni yokwi aŋ yomdaŋ, aŋek nandak nandak gulusuŋ morapni tepmɨsi yoldaŋ. Uŋun iyɨ do amɨn madep yaŋ nandakdaŋ. On mɨktɨm dakon aŋpak kɨsɨk kɨsɨgɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun do galagɨsi nandaŋek Piŋkop do but dasi dɨma galaktokdaŋ.
Uŋun da busuŋnin yɨgakwan gɨptɨm dakon saŋbek morapni uŋudon saŋbeŋakwa gɨptɨm tebaisi tosok. Aŋakwan gɨptɨm dɨwat morap kaloŋ kaloŋ pini aŋakwa amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak aŋakwa gɨptɨm tebaisi tagosok.
Yawe da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni do galak taŋ yomɨsak. Aŋek amɨn iyɨ do nandaba pɨŋbi aŋ uŋun yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak.
Konilias uŋun kaŋek pasol pasol madep aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ yo kɨnda ni?” Iyɨŋban aŋelo da iyɨgɨt, “Bɨsit pi asal ae yoni mɨni amɨn paŋpulugosol Piŋkop da uŋun aŋpak kaŋban tagɨsi asak.
Donkikon yɨgek kɨŋakwan amɨn da ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk dubakni kosiron yalɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨwit.
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Uŋun da niaŋsi aŋgamɨk? Niaŋon da dabɨlgo sɨŋtak?”
Yaŋba Jon da iyɨ dakon mibɨlni dɨma aŋkɨsɨbɨgɨt. Yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak Kristo dɨma.”
Yaŋ teban tok agɨl da arɨpmon aŋteban aŋaki egɨpbeŋ. Aŋaki yo abɨdok do nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat uŋun dɨma suŋ tosak.
Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Gen yaŋ gamaŋ amɨn da abɨŋ altaŋakwa gengo don nandakeŋ.” Yaŋ iyɨŋek obip amɨni yoyɨŋban Pol kɨla amɨn madep Erot da kalɨp yut madep agɨt uŋudon yɨpmaŋek kɨlani ani do yoyɨgɨt.
Gen yosot uŋun ji da dɨma nandaba pɨsosok. Nido geno abɨdok do dɨma nandaŋ.
Uŋun amɨn da gakdosi amɨn ani do aŋek egɨp egɨpno kaloŋ gak do gamɨsat.
Israel dakon Sipsip Kɨla Amɨn, gak Josep dakon amɨn kabɨ sipsip baŋ yaŋ kosit yolɨsal. Bɨsitnin nandaŋ nibi. Aŋelo madep serabim bamot da binapmon kɨla amɨn madep yɨgek tɨlɨmgo mɨŋat amɨn kabɨgo do yolɨŋbɨ pɨndatni.
Amɨn dakon paŋpulugok uŋun yo ɨsalɨ gɨn, do nin paŋpulugaŋaki uwal gat emat tagɨ wamneŋ.
Mandaŋ dagaŋban Yesu da obip amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nak do kabo noknok kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋek emat agak sɨba ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋ tɨmɨgek nak abɨdok do abeŋ, ma?
Mani mɨktɨmni kalɨpmɨ uŋun yapmaŋek mɨktɨm wagɨl tagɨsisi uŋudon egɨp do galak tawit, mɨktɨm uŋun Kwen Kokup. Uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop do, “Gak nin dakon Piŋkop,” yaŋ iyɨŋakwa Piŋkop mayagɨ dɨma pasak, nido uŋun amɨn do kokup pap kɨnda kɨlɨ aŋnoman agɨt da tosok.
Kalbi dɨpmɨn pokdok ae gɨldat kalba waŋga waŋga agakwan jap yet kwoŋ. Mani niaŋsi aŋek kwoŋ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandɨsak.
‘Piŋkop da yaŋ yosok, Mibɨ gɨldat kwaŋ taŋakwan Wupno amɨn morap kɨsi do tagal yobeŋ. Aŋapbo monjɨ gwayosi da kombɨ gen yokdaŋ. Ae monjɨ bɨlagɨ da dɨpmɨn yombem pɨndatdaŋ. Ae amɨn pelaŋ da dɨpmɨn pɨndatdaŋ.
Yesu Jerusalem kokup papmon kɨŋek paŋdetni 12 kabɨ tɨmɨkban iyɨ gɨn kosiron kɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Yaŋ aŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen tapmɨmɨ toŋsi ɨreŋ taŋ aŋaŋ kokupmɨ kokupmɨ kɨgɨt.
Mani nin duwalɨk pɨgek pasɨlneŋ dakon amɨn dɨma. Nin nandaŋ gadat aŋek egɨp egɨp teban abɨdoneŋ dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo da ekwamaŋ.
Piŋkopnin da nin paŋpulugaŋakwan tagɨsi ekwamaŋ. Amɨn Tagɨ Yawenin da nin paŋpulugaŋakwan dɨma kɨmokgomaŋ.
“Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda nak dakon gen nandaŋek Dat yabekban pɨgɨm uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak. Uŋun amɨn gen pi tamokon dɨma atjak. Uŋun kɨmot yɨpmaŋek egɨp egɨp kɨlɨ abɨdosok.
Yaŋ yaŋban Mata da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, asi gak Kristo, Piŋkop dakon Monji, mɨktɨmon apjak do yaŋbi amɨn yaŋ nandaŋ gamɨsat.”
Yoyɨŋban aŋelo mibɨltogɨ da ɨdap madepni mɨktɨmon tagalgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan wuda teban yokwisi tepmɨni madepsi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ amɨn joŋ kɨlap yokwisi dakon tɨlakni taŋ yomgwit, ae wupni wasaŋbi do gawak ɨmgwit, uŋun da gɨptɨm tɨmon yɨkgwit.
Aŋakwan paŋdetni mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨŋ Piŋkop dakon geni yoyɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ uŋun gat egek paŋpulugaŋakwan wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ aŋek geni joŋɨk paŋteban agɨt.
Pol Piŋkop da aŋpulugaŋakwan wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ ŋwakŋwarɨsi morapmɨ agɨt.
Ae amɨn kɨnda da yo kɨnda ɨbi do gayɨsak kaŋ, ɨbi. Ae amɨn kɨnda da gagon goman ak do gayɨŋban kaŋ, manji dɨma ɨbi.”
Nandak nandakji mɨni amɨn, mɨrak yopmaŋek butji pɨsoni! Ji ŋugɨgɨsi. Ni bɨsapmon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi amɨn dagoni?
Uŋun do nak yaŋ dayɨsat, Piŋkop da iyɨ Amɨn Kɨla Asak jikon tosok uŋun ji da kɨsiron naŋ gwayeŋ amɨn kabi kɨnda bamɨ tagɨ paŋalon agagɨ uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpdɨsak.
Nak aŋpak asat uŋun mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaŋek asat. Aŋpak si ak do nandɨsat uŋun dɨma asat. Mani aŋpak dɨmasi ak do nandɨsat uŋun baŋ asat.
Yaŋban meŋi da oman amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo kɨnda do dayɨŋban kaŋ uŋun ani.”
Asisi dayɨsat, mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn da Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋek mɨŋat on da yo ak uŋun dakon gen bin kɨsi yoyɨŋakwa nandakdaŋ. Aŋakwa uŋun mɨŋat dakon man bini dɨma pasɨldɨsak.”
Piŋkop da aŋpakji kokwin asak bɨsapmon uŋun ji pulugaŋ depmaŋdak dakon gen teban uŋun do nandaŋek kokwin akdɨsak. Do ji uŋun do nandaŋek amɨn do bupmɨ nandaŋek toktogɨsi gen yogokji gat ae aŋpakji gat dakon kɨla tagɨsi ani.
Aŋek amɨn bamot tɨmɨgek gen pikon yop do nandawit, mani pɨlɨn tok do agɨt do aŋwa don yaŋ nandaŋek dam teban yutnon yopgwit.
Butno aŋtagap abɨ gak dakon gen do galagɨ nandaŋek yo do pɨndak galaktok dɨma abeŋ.
Asisi Erot ae Pontias Pailat, ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ amɨn, ae Israel amɨn uŋun kɨsi da on kokup papmon telagɨ oman amɨngo Yesu gak da pigo asak do manjɨgɨl, uŋun amɨn abɨŋ yɨp do muwukgwit.
Amɨn morapmɨ Jon da telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomjak do abɨŋakwa yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ dakon gwakni kabɨ. Piŋkop da butjap nandaŋek yokwi pakpak do yo yokwisi aŋ yomdɨsak. Piŋkop dakon butjap apdɨsak yaŋ namɨn da uŋun dakon but pɨso dayɨk da uŋun yap do pasal kwaŋ?
Ae yo morap Piŋkop da wasagɨt uŋun dakon geni kɨsi nandagɨm. Yo morap Kwen Kokup ekwaŋ, ae mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ, ae mɨktɨm kagagwan ekwaŋ, ae tap kaga ekwaŋ kɨsi dakon geni nandagɨm. Uŋun da yaŋ yawit, “Amɨn uŋun kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon yɨkdak, ae Sipsip Monɨŋ gat kɨsi, nin jil dakon tɨlɨm gat ae tapmɨm gat pɨndagek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek dagok dagogɨ mɨni man madep damamaŋ.”
Yesu da bupmɨ nandaŋ yomjak do koŋ da bɨsit tebai yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin gapma kɨdagɨ mɨni uŋungwan pɨgɨneŋ do dɨma niyɨki.”
Pi on naga da nandak nandagon asat tam tomni tagɨ tɨmɨkgom. Mani naga da nandak nandagon dɨma asat. Piŋkop da namgut baŋ asat.
Yokwi da gɨptɨmjikon kɨmot paŋalon aŋdaban kɨmot akdaŋ. Mani Kristo butjikon egɨsak kaŋ, ji amɨn kɨlegɨ dagawit, ae wupji kalugɨ ekwaŋ.
Nak Pita, Yesu Kristo dakon yabekbini. Papia on mandɨsat uŋun Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo ji uwal da jɨgɨ daba waseŋ kɨ provins Pontus, ae Galesia, ae Kapadosia, ae Esia, ae Bitinia uŋudon kɨŋ kɨŋ awit da ekwaŋ ji do mandɨsat.
Paŋmuwukbi notji gat domdom ani bɨsapmon but dasi tɨmɨtni. Piŋkop dakon telagɨ paŋmuwukbi ɨdon ekwaŋ uŋun da ji do gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayaŋ.
“Yaŋban pi kɨla amɨn da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, yum kaŋbɨ bɨlak kɨnda gat atjak. Aŋakwan mibɨlɨkon mɨktɨm wayɨgek yalɨk yopbeŋ.
“Ae kɨnda yoŋ uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda da alta do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, tagɨ kɨrɨŋɨtjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda da altakon paret toŋ do geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, tagɨ dɨma kɨrɨŋɨtjak.’
Yaŋ aŋakwa aŋelo da mɨŋat bamot yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil dɨma pasoljil. Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakbi naŋ wusɨk do abamal yaŋ nandɨsat.
Butni tagɨsi taŋakwan yoŋ bo butni tagɨ dɨma taŋakwan yoŋ nak uŋun do nandaba kɨk dɨma asat. Yo madep uŋun Kristo dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋoŋ. Nak uŋun do but galaksi nandɨsat, ae don but galak madep sigɨn nandakeŋ.
Yaŋban yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Barabas naŋ yɨpbɨ kɨsak.” Barabas uŋun kabo noknok, ae amɨn dapmaŋek yoni gwayaŋ amɨn kɨnda.
Paŋmuwukbi kabɨ Lista kokup pap ae Ikoniam kokup papmon egɨpgwit amɨn da Timoti do amɨn tagɨsi kɨnda yaŋ yawit.
Yawe do yo kaloŋɨ kɨnda do bɨsit asat. Uŋun da nandaŋ naban mɨktɨmon egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ iyɨ da yutnon egɨpbeŋ do nandɨsat. Aŋek Yawe uŋun wagɨl tagɨsisi do dabɨlno uŋudongɨn yɨpmaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek egɨpbeŋ. Aŋek Telagɨ Yut Madepnikon Yawe dogɨn nandaŋek egɨpbeŋ.
Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Sisa dakon.” Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo Sisa dakon uŋun Sisa iyɨ do ɨmdo, ae yo Piŋkop dakon uŋun Piŋkop iyɨ do ɨmdo.”
Nak da obɨŋ altokeŋ bɨsapmon paretji Jerusalem paŋkɨni do dɨsi amɨn kabi dɨ manjɨni. Aŋakwa nak da but pɨso papia kɨnda mandaŋ yobo abɨdaŋek kɨni.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yoko nandabɨt. Amɨn kɨnda da wain pini aŋek nagal aŋ uŋun nagalon wain sop bamaŋ tɨl do gapma kɨnda wayɨkgɨt. Wayɨk mudaŋek kabo noknok pɨndat do yut dubak kɨnda aban wɨgɨgɨt. Yut aŋ mudaŋek amɨn da moneŋ pini dɨ aŋek pi ami do bamɨ dɨ paŋ ɨmni yaŋ nandaŋek pi uŋun da kɨsiron yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm dubagɨkon kɨgɨt.
Ae kandapgo da yokwi aki do gayɨŋban kaŋ, kandapgo mandaŋ dagoki. Gwɨnɨmbɨl egek Tɨpdomon kɨndap tebanon pɨgɨki yaŋ do kandapgo mandaŋ dagaŋek tagapmɨ egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn aki.
Ae wain kalɨpmɨ nosok amɨn wain kalugɨ nok do kuragɨ nandaŋek yaŋ yosok, ‘Wain kalɨpmɨ uŋun tagɨsi.’ ”
Pita gen sigɨn yaŋakwan Telagɨ Wup amɨn morap mɨrak paŋek yɨkgwit uŋun kabɨkon pɨgɨt.
Iyɨŋba nandaŋek amɨn bamot pawɨgɨ dam teban yutnon yut monɨŋ kɨnda yutgwansi tagɨt uŋudon yopgut. Yopmaŋek dɨma abɨgɨnjil yaŋ do kandapni kɨndap kwuk baŋ paŋteban agɨt.
Kalɨpsigwan nin dakon babɨknin gak dakon oman amɨngo Dewit Telagɨ Wup da aŋtagap aban gen yaŋ yagɨt: ‘Amɨn kabi kabi mibɨlɨ nido japmɨsi nandaŋek iyɨ do nandaba wukwanek ɨsal dogɨn yo yokwi ak do gen yaŋ paŋteban aŋ?
Uŋun bɨsap uŋun Piŋkop da amɨn do kobogɨ yokwisi yomdɨsak dakon bɨsap. Yaŋ aban gen mandabi uŋun kɨsi bamɨ toŋ akdaŋ.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban Juda amɨn dɨwarɨ da Pol gat Sailas gat dakon gen nandaŋek nandaŋ gadat aŋek amɨn bamoron saŋbewit. Aŋakwa Grik amɨn morapmɨ Piŋkop gawak ɨmgwit amɨn ae kɨla amɨn mɨŋat morapmɨ kɨsi amɨn bamot yolgwit.
Sabat bɨsap mudaŋakwan pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo Maria Makdala kokupmon nani, ae Maria Jems dakon meŋi, ae Salome, uŋun mɨŋat kapbɨ da bɨt nelak, ae yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi, Yesu dakon bumjotni soŋ ɨm do yumaŋ paŋkosit awit.
Nak yokwi asat yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Yaŋ nandaŋ kaŋ yokwi asat uŋun ji da tagɨ aŋteŋteŋ ani. Mani gen bamɨ yosot kaŋ, nido geno do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak?
Mɨŋat uŋun nandak nandak pak do tagɨsi nandaŋ, mani gen bamɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoni.
Aŋek ɨlɨp sul ɨmɨŋek kɨndap kɨrɨŋ kɨsirɨkon yɨpgwit uŋun gwayeŋ busuŋɨkon kosirɨ morapmɨ baljawit.
“Wadak wadak amɨn do yo yom do aki bɨsapmon jamba but amɨn dɨwarɨ da muwut muwut yutnon ae kosit madepmon aŋ, uŋudeŋ amɨn kɨnda yabekbɨ mibɨltaŋ gamɨŋek kweŋ dɨma pɨsosak. Yaŋ aŋ amɨn uŋun amɨn da nandaba wukwan yomni yaŋ do aŋ. Nak asisi dayɨsat, uŋun kobogɨ kɨsisi wagɨlni tɨmɨkgaŋ.
Amɨn kapmatjok akgwit da gen uŋun nandaŋek Pol yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak Piŋkop dakon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨsal, ma?”
Mani Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn morap gen teban yolek Piŋkop da dabɨlon nin amɨn kɨlegɨ tagɨ aneŋ yaŋ nandaŋ uŋun jobɨt yomdɨsak. Nido, Piŋkop gen papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Amɨn kɨnda gen teban papiakon gen teban morap toŋ uŋun dɨma guramɨtjak kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn jobɨt ɨmdɨsak.”
Not kabɨ, amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak uŋun Piŋkopmon da abɨsak, do amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomneŋ. Amɨn morap amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ uŋun Piŋkopmon da altaŋbi, ae Piŋkop nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo paŋdetni pakbi ɨdapmon pɨgɨwit.
Pita gat Jon gat nagalgwan pɨgɨk do aŋakwal moneŋ ɨmjil do bɨsit yoyɨgɨt.
Ji pi aŋek uŋun dakon bamɨ paŋ noni. Ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek tagɨsi egɨpdaŋ.
Ji kalɨp Yesu yolek jɨgɨ noman taŋ daba jɨgɨ ɨsal dogɨn pawit, ma? Nak da ɨsal dogɨn pawit yaŋ dɨma nandɨsat.
Gak da nin but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsal, do bɨsitnin nandaŋ nibi. Aŋek tapmɨm madepgokon da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨgaki nin tagɨsi egɨpneŋ.
gak gen abɨdagɨl uŋun guramɨk kɨmagek amɨn da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ gamni da arɨpmon yo kɨnda dɨma abi. Tebaisi guramɨk kɨmagaki wɨgɨ Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo da noman altosak bɨsapmon wugɨsak.
Yaŋ aki kaŋ, nin gak dɨma gepmaŋ detneŋ. Gak da paŋpulugaŋbɨ tagɨ egek bɨsit aŋ gamɨŋek mango awɨgɨneŋ.
Gak da yaŋ yagɨl, “Naga dakon amɨno manjɨŋek uŋun gat saŋbek saŋbek kɨlɨ agɨm. Oman monjɨno Dewit uŋun do yaŋ teban tok kɨlɨ agɨm.
Yaŋ yaŋakwan kombɨ amɨn kɨnda da kalɨpsigwan gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ:
Ae nak da dayɨkeŋ kaŋ, kobogɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma nayɨkdaŋ.
nido nandaŋ gadat kosiron da amɨn kɨlegɨ egɨp do dɨma nandawit. Uŋun iyɨ da teban tebanon da kɨlegɨ man pak do nandawit. Uŋun Yesu dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit, do tɨp kɨnda da yaŋ kosiron taŋakwan kandapni tɨdaŋek maŋ pakgwit.
Paŋkewal altaŋ namgwit bɨsapmon ji nak dɨma nepmaŋ dekgwit. Nak gat kɨsi egɨpgumaŋ.
“Nak Daron kɨŋek ji gen pikon depdɨsat yaŋ dɨma nandani. Moses da ji paŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban toŋ, mani dɨma. Moses da iyɨ gen pikon depdɨsak.
Ae mɨrakni toŋ, mani gen arɨpmɨ dɨma nandani. Ae mɨrɨm dɨma paŋ.
Amɨn da Jems, Pita ae Jon uŋun paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn yaŋ pɨndakgwit. Uŋun kɨla amɨn da Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek pi uŋun namgut uŋun nandaŋek Banabas gat nit dakon kɨsit ɨlɨgek notninsi yaŋon da nit tɨmɨkgwit. Aŋek nit Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon pi aŋapdo uŋun da Juda amɨn nandaŋ gadat dɨma abi kabɨkon pi ani do but kaloŋ agɨmaŋ.
Yaŋ egek Yawe do yaŋ tɨdaŋba paŋpulugaŋek jɨgɨni uŋun wɨrɨrɨkban pasɨlgwit.
Mani Piŋkop uŋun paŋpulugokno. Amɨn Tagɨ da tapmɨm namɨŋakwan sigɨn egɨsat.
(Atens mɨŋat amɨn morap ae amɨn dubagɨkon da apba egɨpgwit uŋunyo kɨsi yaŋ awit, bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nandak nandak kalugɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun do yaŋ nandat aŋ egek bɨsapni madepsi naŋ naŋ awit.)
Yawe da yo masɨ masɨmɨsi agɨt, do kap kalugɨ kɨnda yaŋ ɨmno. Tapmɨmni madepsi ae aŋpakni telagɨ, do emaron teban tagɨt.
Nandani. Gak kokup kɨdat do yo bamɨ dɨma yaŋ nandaŋek kokup kɨdat gawak yomyom yutnon wɨgɨ jap uŋun naŋaki notgo dɨma noknogɨ yaŋ nandɨsak amɨn kɨnda da gandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun yo kɨsi burɨ pɨdaŋban jap uŋun kokup kɨdat do parekbi uŋun nokdɨsak.
Yaŋban gen tebaisi yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn Juda mɨktɨm kɨsisi agek amɨn yoyɨŋ degakwan kwen wɨgɨk aŋ. Galili mɨktɨmon da pi wasaŋek aŋakwan obɨŋ ɨdon obɨk.”
Amɨn kɨnda yut kwenon egɨpjak kaŋ, yo kabɨni tɨmɨt do yutgwan pɨgɨk do nandak nandak dɨmasi asak.
Piŋkop da nin pɨlɨn tuk da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nipmaŋek monji Yesu uŋun but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsak uŋun da kɨla asak da kagagwan nipgut.
Tap gat kɨndap gat amɨn kɨsikon altosak.
uŋun dagɨn kalɨp Kristokon pi agɨt. Kristo kɨmakban Piŋkop dakon tapmɨm madepnikon da Piŋkop da aban pɨdaŋban awɨgɨ Kwen Kokup iyɨ da amɨn tet do yɨpban yɨkgɨt.
Yesu uŋun boron wɨgek pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do wɨgakwan amɨn morapmɨsi abɨŋ muwukgwit.
Dɨmasi. Gɨptɨm dakon dɨwatni tapmɨmni madep dɨma yaŋ pɨndakgamaŋ uŋun dɨma ekwaŋ tam gɨptɨm tagɨ dɨma taŋban.
Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ da abɨŋ amɨn paŋkewalba yokwi aŋek maŋ mudokdaŋ. Mani uŋun yokwi ani do dayɨkdaŋ amɨn, awa!
Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat uŋun gak dakon gɨn. Gak da mɨktɨm gat yo morap uŋudon toŋ gat wasagɨl.
Yawe, nak but dasi nandaŋek ya yaŋ gayɨsat. Piŋkop toptopmɨ da dabɨlon kap yaŋek mango yaŋ aŋkɨsisat.
Ae amɨn kɨnda Kwen Kokup do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo gat ae Piŋkop iyɨ tamonikon yɨkdak uŋun gat kɨsi do geni yaŋ aŋteban asak.
Uŋun amɨn nandaban amɨn morapmɨ obɨŋ yapmaŋ kɨŋakwa nandaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nibaŋ aŋ?”
Piŋkop uŋun gen kokwin kɨla amɨn kɨlegɨsi. Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ yokwi pakpak do japmɨ nandaŋek pabɨŋ yopmaŋdak.
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do tɨlak gen gɨn yosot. Amɨn uŋun dabɨl sɨŋtaŋek koŋ, mani yo kɨnda dɨma koŋ. Mɨrak paŋek nandaŋ, mani dɨma nandaba pɨsosok.
Pɨlɨn taŋakwan paŋmuwukbi da Pol gat Sailas gat yabekba Beria kɨgɨmal. Kɨŋ altaŋek Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgɨgɨmal.
Yaŋ yaŋban Pita aŋelo yol aŋkɨgɨt. Mani aŋelo da uŋun asi asak yaŋ Pita dɨma nandaban pɨsagɨt. Butno pɨsaŋakwan dɨpmɨn yombem kɨnda kosot yaŋ nandagɨt.
Yawe, gak kaloŋ gɨn nak dakon yo morapno. Yo morapno gak da kɨsiron gɨn toŋ. Yo morapno paŋkutnaŋ namɨsal.
Telagɨ Wup gat ae mɨŋat uŋun Sipsip Monɨŋ pakdɨsak gat da yaŋ yomal, “Gak apbi.” Ae amɨn morap gen on nandani ji kɨsi yaŋ yoni, “Gak apbi.” Amɨn kɨnda tegɨ bap tosak kaŋ tagɨ apjak. Amɨn kɨnda pakbi nok do nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn abɨŋek egɨp egɨp yomyom pakbi tagɨ nosak. Uŋun Piŋkop da but galak do yumsi nimɨsak.
Oman monjɨ uŋun amɨn tagɨni da tobɨl abɨŋ kaŋban pini tagɨsi asak kaŋ tagɨsi.
Yawe, suŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨm, mani tepmɨsi nak gat emat wam do tagap taŋ. Jɨgɨno do kaŋek abɨŋ aŋpuluga!
Gak da nak dakon but nandaŋ mudosol. Kalbi abɨŋ aŋkɨlɨk nandaŋek nagon nandak nandak yokwi kɨnda dɨma taŋban kal. Gen yokwi kɨnda dɨma yokeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Gɨldat si pɨgɨk do aŋakwan amɨn da notni sot mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ awit uŋun Yesukon paŋopgwit. Paŋopba Yesu da kɨsitni kwenikon kaloŋ kaloŋ wutjɨŋek paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Piŋkop, Yawe, gak paŋpulugokno. Gɨldarɨ ae kalbi gak do yaŋ tɨdosot.
Aŋek yutnon wɨgek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido kunam kugɨyo madepsi aŋ? Mɨŋatjok uŋun dɨma kuŋwak, uŋun ɨsal dɨpmɨn pokdok.”
Piŋkopno, ae Kɨla Amɨn Madepno, mɨŋat amɨn morap da gandaba gak emaron teban tal da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek abɨsal. Kɨsi morap da gandaŋakwa telagɨ yutgogwan wɨgɨsal.
Yawi kaluk ji kɨla amɨn da yoŋgamgwan egɨpni. Ji morap pɨŋbi egɨp egɨp yol kɨmagek Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo da yoŋgamgwan egɨpni. Nin nandamaŋ: “Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo iyɨ dakon man pawɨkwaŋ uŋun pabɨŋ yopmaŋdak. Mani amɨn pɨŋbi ekwaŋ uŋun nandaŋ yawok yomɨŋek yo tagɨsi aŋ yomɨsak.”
Ya yaŋ iyɨk do paret anisi. Ae kap yaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek yo tagɨsi agɨt uŋun do mɨŋat amɨnyokon yaŋ teŋteŋonisi.
Aŋenagek gen yaŋ aŋteban agɨt. Piŋkop egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨsak, kundu gat ae yo morap kundukon toŋ, ae mɨktɨm gat ae yo morap mɨktɨmon toŋ, ae tap gat ae yo morap tap kagagwan toŋ uŋun wasagɨt Amɨn da manon gen yaŋ aŋteban aŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun mudokdɨsak. Piŋkop ae saŋbeŋek jomjom dɨma akdɨsak.
Nak Piŋkop dakon gen awɨgɨsat. Asisi, Yawe dakon gen awɨgɨsat.
Israel amɨn Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ kabɨkon mɨŋat eyo aŋek uŋun dakon aŋpak yokwini yolek awit.
Mani Yesu da uŋun jamba but amɨn yaŋ nandaŋ yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido nak aŋkewalgaŋ? Moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda aŋabɨŋ naba koko.”
Yaŋ yaŋek mɨktɨmon kɨmbabaŋ tɨmɨk busuŋnikon maba wugakwa, bupmɨ kunam yo aŋek but yokwisi aŋek egɨpdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘Kokup pap madep awa, bupmɨsi! Tap wakga dakon ami morap tap ɨdapmon akwaŋ uŋun kokup pap dakon moneŋ morapni baŋ tɨmɨgek yoni morapmɨ amɨn dagawit. Bupmɨsi! Bɨsap awa kaloŋɨ dogɨn uŋun kokup pap wagɨlsi tasɨk tosok!’
Piŋkop gak bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋek dɨma nipmaŋ dekdal. Yaŋ asal do nin dakon man dɨma pawɨgɨneŋ. Gak dakon man madepgo naŋgɨn aŋkɨsineŋ.
Kɨlɨ nak Piŋkop aŋkɨsisat. Tapmɨmni madepsi, do kɨlasi aŋakwan arɨpmɨ dɨma mokdaŋ. Uŋun da tɨmɨk paŋkɨ depban iyɨ gat tɨlɨmnikon egek gulusuŋji mɨni ae kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi taŋ damdɨsak.
Wɨtdal kɨŋakwan Telagɨ Wup kɨnarɨm da mɨktɨmon paŋ uŋun da tɨlak Yesukon pɨgɨt. Aŋakwan Kwen Kokupgwan da gen kɨnda yaŋ altagɨt: “Gak Monjɨno. Butdasi galak taŋ gamɨsat. Butno gak do tagɨsi asak.”
Mɨŋat da, “Uŋun amɨn da yo morap kalɨp agɨm uŋun nayɨŋ mudak” yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek Samaria amɨn morapmɨ uŋun kokup papmon nani da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit.
Yaŋ kosok, do kɨŋ koŋ 7 kabɨ iyɨ yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi gat tɨmɨkban kwa uŋun yutnon egek aŋpak yokwisi aŋ. Mibɨltok uŋun amɨn yokwi egɨpgut, mani abɨsok uŋun yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi egɨsak.”
Ae Kristo kɨsi, iyɨ dakon man awɨgek mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dɨma dagagɨt. Piŋkop da iyɨ uŋun pi asak do manjɨgɨt. Piŋkop da yaŋ iyɨgɨt: “Gak Monjɨno. Abɨsok nak Datgo dagosot.”
Aŋek Pol da Piŋkop dakon gen dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomgut. Gen uŋun asi bamɨ noman taŋ mudaŋ yaŋ yoyɨŋek yagɨt, “Kombɨ amɨn da Kristo tepmɨ paŋek kɨmagek don aeni pɨdosak do yaŋkwok kalɨpsigwan kɨlɨ awit. Uŋun Yesu do dayɨŋ teŋteŋosot, uŋun Kristo yaŋsi dayɨsat.”
Yaŋ do nin babɨknin Abraham do niaŋ yoneŋ?
Nak gen mapmɨt aŋek gen kɨnda dɨma yagɨm. Ae yo tagɨ kɨsi do genjok kɨnda dɨma yagɨm. Mani butjɨkno uŋun madepsi tagaŋek paptaŋ madepsi agɨt.
Aŋkɨ yɨpmaŋek top amɨn dɨ kokwinɨk yopba sɨtnok aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep gat ae gen teban Moses da mandagɨt gat do yaŋba yokwi tok asak.
Nandani, nin gen bamɨ kɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsagɨmaŋ, aŋek don si nandaŋ mudaŋek yokwi da aŋpagon agɨpneŋ kaŋ, yokwi uŋun wɨrɨrɨt dakon mukwa sogok kɨnda gat dɨmasi tosok.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, Abraham dɨma altaŋakwan nak kɨlɨ egɨpgum da egɨsat.”
Yaŋba nandaŋek Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn Galili amɨn kɨnda bo dɨma?”
Mani uŋun kokup papmon amɨn kabi bamorɨ pudaŋ kɨwit. Kabi kɨnda Juda amɨn gat akgwit, ae kabi kɨnda yabekbi bamot gat akgwit.
Bɨsit yaŋ aneŋ kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi. Piŋkop Yokwikon Baŋ Tɨmɨt Tɨmɨt Amɨnin uŋun da yaŋ aneŋ do tagɨsi nandɨsak.
Amɨn mɨrakni toŋ da Telagɨ Wup da paŋmuwukbi do gen yosok uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani.”
Aŋakwan Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn da geni uŋun nandaŋ wurɨpdagek yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn papia yut dɨma wɨgek nandak nandak madep dukon pagɨt?”
Yo morap akdɨsat uŋun uwal da paŋupbal ak do pi aŋ. Toktogɨsi nak aŋupbal ak do kosit wusɨk aŋ.
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi namɨn da yaŋ mudaŋ namgut da pi asat uŋun dɨma dayɨkeŋ.”
Gak amɨn sugaŋek aŋpakni kokwin asal, mani gagayo kɨsi aŋpak yokwi yaŋ gɨn asal. Gak Piŋkop da gen yaŋ gaban tagɨ pulugaŋ kɨkeŋ yaŋ nandɨsal, ma?
Mani ɨdon amɨn da Kristo dakon gen bin kɨlɨ nandawit, do nak ɨdon pino mɨni, ae bɨlak morapmɨ nak ji dandak do si nandagɨm da nandɨsat.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jeriko kokup pap yɨpmaŋ degakwa mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo madepsi da yolgwit.
Gen tebango uŋun wagɨl tagɨsisi do aŋek guramɨkdat.
Uŋun wain sop bamaŋ tɨl tamo madep kokup pap da waŋga tagɨt, wain sop uŋudon bamaŋ tɨlgwit. Aŋakwa uŋungwan da yawi madepsi pak abɨgek mɨktɨm kɨsi wɨtjɨŋban 300 kilomita da arɨp agɨt. Aŋakwan yawi wɨŋaŋ wɨŋ os da gen kagakon ain tɨm tosok uŋun da arɨpmon wɨgɨgɨt.
Gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ nak da ɨŋamon telagɨsi ae kɨlegɨsi egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ.’
Piŋkop da butjapni paneŋ do dɨma manjɨgɨt. Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo da pi agɨt do aŋek nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak do manjɨgɨt.
Piŋkop da nin gat ae ji gat kɨsi Kristokon gadaŋek paŋteban aban tebaisi akgamaŋ. Ae uŋun da nin gat ae ji gat kɨsi iyɨ do manjɨgɨt.
Yesu gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Uŋun sot asak mani wagɨl dɨma kɨmotjak. Piŋkop gat Monji gat da man madep panjil do sot uŋun asak.”
Piŋkop dagɨn nak aŋteban aŋakwan tebai akdat. Ae kosit agɨsat bɨsapmon kɨlano tagɨsi asak.
Aban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da silwa moneŋ uŋun tɨmɨgek yaŋ yawit, “Moneŋ on yawi dakon tomni. Do telagɨ yut dakon moneŋ gat kɨsi yopneŋ kaŋ, gen tebanin yapdamaŋ.”
Not kabɨ, Stepanas gat yutnikon ekwaŋ amɨn gat da Akaia provinskon mibɨltoksi but tobɨl aŋek Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ. Ae Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋpulugok do iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨp parekgwit. Nak gen tebai yaŋ dayɨsat,
Amɨn agɨpgwit gat akwaŋ bo yaŋ nandaŋek agakwal gɨldat kɨnda mudagɨt. Don dɨwatni ae notni agɨpgwit da bɨkbɨknikon wusɨgɨmal.
“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem amɨn, ji kombɨ amɨn dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Amɨn Piŋkop da yabekban jikon abaŋ uŋun ji da tɨpbaŋ dapba kɨmokgoŋ. Pup meŋi da monjini paŋmuwuk pɨrɨgwan yopmaŋdak, uŋun da tɨlak nak da bɨsap morapmɨ ji paŋmuwut do nandagɨm, mani ji da kurak taŋ namgwit.
Piŋkopnin Kwen Kokup egɨsak. Uŋun yo kɨnda ak do nandɨsak kaŋ si akdɨsak.
Tɨmɨsok dɨ egek amɨn kɨnda da kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gakyo kɨsi uŋun da kabɨkon nani kɨnda.” Iyɨŋban Pita da yagɨt, “Nak dɨma!”
Aŋakwan Pita obɨŋ yoma wɨlaŋon wukwan Konilias uŋun Pita da akgɨron kɨŋ ŋwakbeŋ aŋek gawak ɨmgut.
Yum pɨndagakwa jap gat joŋ gat kɨsi kwaŋakwa bamɨ pakpak bɨsapmon jap bamɨ pakpak pi monjɨno yaŋ yoyɨkeŋ: Mibɨltok ji joŋ yokwi kɨndapmon sok do baljaŋ gwɨlɨk yopni. Aŋek jap bamɨ paŋ ɨlɨgek jap yutnokon pawɨgɨ yopni.’ ”
Laion da yaŋ pasɨlɨkon yɨgek kɨla tebai asak. Uŋun pasɨl yɨgek tapmɨmni mɨni amɨn paron yokwalban ɨlɨk paŋkɨsak.
Ji kɨsisi Yawe da buron kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek kap yoni, nido Yawe mɨktɨm amɨn morap gen kokwin aŋ yom do abɨsak. Gen kokwin kɨlegɨsi akdɨsak.
Yaŋba Yesu da nandaŋ yoban koŋ da amɨnon da wɨŋek bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨwit. Pɨgakwa bɨt uŋun pasal abɨgɨŋek pakbi ɨdap tagɨt uŋungwan pɨgek kɨmakgwit. Bɨt kaloŋɨsok dɨma, 2 tausen da kɨmakgwit.
Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da Yesu Sabat bɨsapmon amɨn paŋmɨlɨp aban kaŋek gen yaŋ ɨmneŋ yaŋ do kaŋ egɨpgwit.
Piŋkop da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ Isip mɨktɨmon agɨt, ae yo ŋwakŋwarɨsi Tap Gamikon aban mɨŋat amɨnyo madepsi wɨrɨpdakgwit.
Uŋun do aŋek nin gak do but galaksi nandaŋek ya yaŋsi gayamaŋ.
Aŋakwan wuda wamak morapmɨ da aŋpulugok do pi aŋtɨdok aŋakwa tepmɨ madepsi nandaŋek egɨpgut. Wuda wamak yumaŋ nok do aŋek moneŋni kɨsi yomɨŋ mudagɨt. Aban sotni dɨma tagap tagɨt, si madep tagɨt.
Yo tagɨsi do galak tosot uŋun arɨpnokonsi namɨsak. Yaŋ aŋakwan nak aeno amɨn kalugɨ dagaŋek sɨŋgɨŋ da yaŋ tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨsat.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn kɨmakbi uŋun pɨdaŋ yɨgek wasaŋek gen yagɨt. Yaŋban Yesu da meŋi do ɨmgut.
Sailas, nak da koko uŋun Yesu yolyol notnosi, ae pi bamɨsi gɨn asak, uŋun da nak aŋpulugaŋban gen pɨsɨpmɨ on ji do mandɨsat. Nak ji dakon but paŋteban akdo, ae Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ jikon tosok uŋun dolɨk do aŋek papia on mandɨsat. Ji uŋun do nandaŋek tebaisi atni.
Gɨptɨmon dabɨl dagɨn tosok tam, niaŋ aŋek gen nandɨsak? Ae gɨptɨmon mɨrak dagɨn tosok tam, niaŋ aŋek yo dakon kɨbaŋɨ nandɨsak?
Mani nak asi pini asat. Yaŋdo, ji geno do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak kaŋ, pi asat uŋun kaŋek nandaŋ gadat ani. Aŋek yaŋsi nandani, Dat uŋun nagon egɨsak ae nak Daron egɨsat.”
Butno wagɨlsi jɨk tosok. Yawe, bɨsap niaŋ da jɨgɨ paŋegɨpbeŋ?
Uŋun da nugɨm yokwisi madep kalɨpsigwan egɨpgut uŋun abɨdagɨt. Mani kɨnda Koŋ, ae mani kɨnda Sunduk yaŋ yoŋ. Aŋelo da nap teban naŋ wamaŋ aŋteban aban bɨlak 1 tausen egɨpgut.
Nak ji gat egɨpneŋ do ji da dɨma manjɨŋ nepgwit. Nak ji gat egɨpneŋ do manjɨgɨm. Aŋek ji kɨŋ pi aba bamɨ dɨma yokwi taŋek toktogɨ toni do manjɨgɨm. Do nak da manon yo nido bɨsit ani uŋun Dat da tagɨ damjak.
Egɨ wɨgɨ si apbeŋ bɨsapmon gak pi madepsi aŋek Piŋkop gen mɨŋat amɨnyo morapmɨ muwutnikon manjɨŋ yobi, ae mibɨlɨ yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yobi, ae Piŋkop dakon aŋpak do yoyɨŋ dekgi.
“Niaŋsi aŋgabeŋ do nandɨsal?” Iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nak sɨŋtok do nandɨsat.”
Gɨldat kɨnda do Pol amɨn 4 kabɨ uŋun tɨmɨkban gɨptɨm paŋkɨlek ak dakon aŋpak aŋek egɨpgwit. Yaŋ aŋek Telagɨ Yut Madepmon wɨgɨ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn ni bɨsapmon wasɨp aŋek, ae amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ dakon paretni mukwa soni uŋun do Pol da but pɨso yoyɨgɨt.
Not kabɨno, yaŋsi nandani. Dam tebanon nepmaŋ uŋun da Gen Bin Tagɨsi dakon kosit sopsop dɨma asak. Uŋun da Gen Bin Tagɨsi aŋɨreŋ asak.
Jap bamɨ pakpak amɨn uŋun tomni tɨmɨkdak. Jap bamɨ paŋmuwukdak uŋun egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do paŋmuwukdak. Yaŋdo, jap kwaot kwaot amɨn gat ae jap bamɨ pakpak amɨn gat kɨsi da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ anjil.
Nak yabekbi Pol da papia on mandɨsat. Yabekbi pi abeŋ do amɨn da dɨma yabekgwit, bo amɨn da dɨma manjɨŋ nepgwit. Yesu Kristo gat ae Piŋkop Datni kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt uŋun da nak yabekgɨmal.
Uŋun bɨsapmon yabekbi kabɨni gat muwugek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, gak abɨsok Israel amɨn nin paŋpulugaŋbɨ aenin mɨktɨmnin kɨla aŋek egɨpneŋ bo dɨma?”
Tɨlak gen on dakon wasɨpmɨ do Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yaŋgɨn notji da yokwi aŋdaba yokwi yopyop but dasi nandaŋek dɨma ani kaŋ, Kwen Kokup Datno da yo jɨgɨ yaŋ gɨn aŋ damdɨsak.”
Ji abɨŋek Piŋkop da yo agɨt uŋun pɨndatni. Yo masɨ masɨmɨ amɨn da binapmon agɨt uŋun do pɨndatni.
Ae aŋpak mayagɨ dɨma asak, ae iyɨ dogɨn dɨma nandɨsak, ae butjap tepmɨ dɨma nandɨsak, ae amɨn da yokwi aŋ ɨba yokwini do dɨma nandaŋ egɨsak.
Gak da nin but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsal, do bɨsitno nandaki. Aŋek tapmɨm madepgokon da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨgaki nin tagɨsi egɨpneŋ.
“Nandani! Amɨn kɨnda da jap yet tɨŋtɨŋok do pigaga kɨgɨt.
Kalɨpsigwan Piŋkop Dat da ji kɨlɨ nandaŋ damɨŋek iyɨ dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dagoni do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt. Uŋun Telagɨ Wup da paŋpulugaŋban egɨp egɨpji kɨsi Piŋkop do parek ɨmɨŋek telak taŋek Yesu Kristo dakon gen yol kɨmotni, aŋakwa Yesu dakon yawini da ji sugaŋ depban Piŋkop da dabɨlon gwaljɨgɨ mɨni ani, yaŋ do aŋek ji kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt. Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawot madepsi aŋ damɨŋek butji paŋyawot aban yaworɨsi tosak do bɨsit asat.
Banabas uŋun Sus yaŋ iyɨŋek Pol uŋun gen yogok amɨn do Emes yaŋ iyɨwit.
Gen tebani uŋun yaŋ: Monji Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmneŋsi, ae iyɨ niyɨgɨt uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomneŋ.
Mani Yawe da yo agɨt uŋun do tepmɨsi ɨŋtawit. Aŋek mibɨltok Piŋkop da si yoyɨŋakwan yo ak do dɨma nandawit. Iyɨ da nandak nandagon da yo awit.
Gak pi morap aŋdɨwarɨkgɨmaŋ uŋun paŋwasɨp abi yaŋ do aŋek Krit mɨktɨmon gepgum. Do gayɨgɨm uŋun da arɨpmon kokup morapmon paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn manjɨki.
Gen uŋun yaŋ, Uwal dakon kɨla amɨn madep gat ae emat amɨn morapni gat kɨsi pasal kwaŋ. Aŋakwa mɨŋat kokupmon ekwaŋ da amɨn emaron yo tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun kokwin aŋ.
Nak geno wasɨp ak do yaŋ yosot. Ji Amɨn Tagɨkon gadawit, do tapmɨm madep morapni do nandaŋek tebaisi atni.
Yawe, nak Jerusalem kokup papmon gak da telagɨ yutnon paret uŋun abeŋ. Yawe aŋkɨsini!
Yawe da aŋpulugosak do yaŋ tɨdosot. Uŋun telagɨ kabapnikon egek yaŋ ɨlɨtno dakon kobogɨ namɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋek yagɨt, “Yesu, gak kɨla amɨn madep man paki bɨsapmon nandaŋ nabi.”
Yaŋdo, ji dɨsi do kɨla tagɨsi ani. “Notgo kɨnda yokwi aban kaŋ, tebai iyɨŋbɨ egɨp egɨpni aŋmɨlɨp asak. Ae but tobɨl aban kaŋ, yokwini yɨpmaŋ ɨbi.
Ae si pasalgɨm bɨsapmon yaŋ yagɨm, “Amɨn kɨsi morap uŋun top amɨn gɨn.”
Yawe, gak Piŋkop Wɨkwisi egɨsal. Ya yaŋ yaŋek kap yaŋek mango aŋkɨsineŋ kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi.
Nin Tair kokup yɨpmaŋek kɨŋ Tolemes kokup papmon altagɨmaŋ. Uŋudon Yesukon saŋbewit amɨn kabɨ gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨno uŋun gat gɨldat kɨnda egɨpgumaŋ.
Judas uŋun yo yokwi agɨt dakon tomni tɨmɨgek mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda yumaŋ nagɨt. Uŋun mɨktɨmon Judas da maŋ sulugakwan kok wamɨyo kɨsisi mɨktɨmon maŋ mudawit.
Nak mibɨltok opgum da ae uŋun da manjikon opbo egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon kalɨp yokwi awit amɨn gat ae amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsi mama gen yoyɨgɨm. Ae abɨsok dubagɨkon egek aeno yaŋ yoyɨsat, aeno jikon tobɨl opbeŋ kaŋ, yokwi awit amɨn kobogɨ yomdɨsat.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋuden nandak nandak yolek nandaŋ gadatni kɨlɨ yɨpmaŋ dekgwit. Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawot jikon tosak do bɨsit asat.
Ae Piŋkop do bɨsit aba nin amɨn yokwi da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨtjak. Ji dɨsi nandaŋ, amɨn morapmɨ Kristo dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ.
Don altaŋ altaŋ ani amɨn da omani aŋɨmdaŋ. Amɨn da Amɨn Tagɨ do yaŋ teŋteŋok aŋakwa don altoni amɨn da nandaŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ.
Piŋkopnin, gak do ɨŋtaŋ gamgumaŋ, bo ae kɨsitnin amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ dakon piŋkopni do yopno kɨŋakwa bɨsit agɨmaŋ tam gaga nandabim. Nin da butgwan nandak nandak morap pasɨlɨ toŋ uŋun nandaŋ mudosol.
Yaŋ yaŋek meŋi ae datni dɨma paŋpulugosok. Aŋek ji da uŋun amɨn do yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Uŋun amɨn tagɨ asak nido yo uŋun Piŋkop do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt.’
Emat dakon os uŋun tapmɨmni madepsi, mani uwal da kɨsiron baŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋpulugosak.
Mani Piŋkop da amɨn yokwi do yaŋ yosok, “Ji nido gen tebano ɨsaldogɨn gen kagakon da yoŋ? Ae nak dakon saŋbek saŋbekno dakon gen nido yoŋ?
Gak kaloŋ gɨn pasɨlɨ tamono. Gak da kɨlano asal, do jɨgɨ da nak arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ nepni. Gak da nak jɨgɨkon naŋ pulugosol, do nak aŋgwasɨŋek akgaŋ amɨn da but kwaktok kap yoŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda “Nak Piŋkop but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat” yaŋ yosak, mani paŋmuwukbi notni kɨnda do nandaban yokwi tok aŋɨmɨsak kaŋ, uŋun top amɨn kɨnda. Amɨn kɨnda notni noman pɨndakdak uŋun but dasi dɨma galak taŋ yomɨsak, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dɨma kokogɨ uŋun but dasi arɨpmɨ dɨma galak taŋ ɨmɨsak.
Ae kundukon tɨlak kɨnda gat noman tagɨt. Tɨlak uŋun yaŋ: nugɨm yokwisi gɨptɨmɨ gami madepsi kɨnda noman tagɨt. Uŋun nugɨm yokwisi uŋun busuŋni 7 kabɨ. Aŋakwan jomɨ 10 yaŋ busuŋɨkon kwawit. Aŋakwan kɨla amɨn madep pelɨt 7 kabɨ da busuŋɨkon tawit.
Iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun kɨŋ Juda amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yesu da nak aŋmɨlɨp agɨt.”
Yokwikon naŋ abɨdaŋek dɨwarɨ morapno wɨrɨrɨk nabi. Yum pɨndagaki nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn da yaŋsul dɨma aŋ namni.
Juda amɨn dɨwarɨ Pita da jamba but aŋpak agɨt uŋun yolba kɨsi da awit. Ae Banabas kɨsi yolek gulusuŋ agɨt.
Ji yaŋ gɨn yoni kaŋ tagɨ, “Amɨn Tagɨ da galak tosagon nin sigɨn egek yo uŋun ak do nandamaŋ uŋun aneŋ.”
Nak kosit agɨsat bo ae dɨpmɨn pokdoron niaŋ egɨsat uŋun gak da nandɨsal. Gak aŋpakno kɨsisi nandaŋ mudosol.
Gen pikon paŋkɨ depmaŋakwa gen ni baŋ yoneŋ ae gen kobogɨ niaŋ yoyɨneŋ yaŋ nandaŋek pasol pasol dɨma ani. Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn ni gen baŋ yoyɨni uŋun Piŋkop da dolɨkdɨsak.
Ae Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek kɨmakgwit amɨn uŋun pasɨlgwit.
Kwen Kokupmon wɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, gak uŋudon egɨpdɨsal. Ae kɨmakbi tamogwan pɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, uŋudon kɨsi egɨpdɨsal gɨn.
Gak dakon gen tebango uŋun toktogɨsi tokdaŋ. Yawe, gak dakon yut dagok dagogɨ mɨni telagɨsi tokdɨsak.
Amɨn yokwi wagɨl tasɨk taŋ mudokdaŋ. Mani mɨŋat amɨnyo nandaŋ gadat aŋek Yawe da paŋpulugosak do jomjom aŋ, uŋun mɨktɨmnikon tagɨsi egɨpdaŋ. Do gak butjap yɨpbisi. Ae nandaba kɨk yo kɨsi dɨma abi. Yaŋ abi kaŋ, uŋun da gak ɨlɨk aŋkwan yokwi akdɨsal.
Mani gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan Piŋkop da wasok aban kɨmoron da pɨdaŋban aŋalon aŋ yoban amɨn dɨwarɨ da kawit.
Yaŋ aŋakwan Parisi amɨn uŋun Yesu yaŋ ɨmgut iyɨ burɨkon da yaŋ nandagɨt, “On amɨn asi kombɨ amɨn kɨnda tam, on mɨŋat kɨsirɨ kwenikon wɨtjɨsak uŋun yokwi pakpak mɨŋat kɨnda yaŋ nandaban.”
Aŋakwan kɨla amɨn 24 kabɨ iyɨ da kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamokon Piŋkop da ɨŋamon yɨkgaŋ, uŋun ŋwakbeŋ aŋek tomni dabɨlni mɨktɨmon yopmaŋek Piŋkop gawak ɨmgwit.
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak kɨlɨ dayɨt, nak uŋun mani. Ji nak wɨsaŋ kaŋ, on amɨn kabɨ yopba kɨni.”
Mani nak amɨn dɨma, nak waleŋ yombem yo ɨsalɨ. Amɨn morap da nandaba yokwi tok aŋnamɨŋek manji namaŋ.
Mani nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkop kaloŋɨ kɨnda dagɨn egɨsak, uŋun Datnin. Uŋun da yo morap wasagɨt, ae uŋun dagɨn egɨp egɨp nimɨsak. Ae Amɨn Tagɨ kaloŋɨ kɨnda gɨn egɨsak uŋun Yesu Kristo. Piŋkop da Yesu obakon da yo morap wasagɨt, ae uŋun obakon da gɨn nin morap kɨsi egɨp egɨp nimgut.
Yaŋ awit do Piŋkop da yum pɨndagakwan yokwi dakon galaktok yolek notni da gɨptɨmon yumabi aŋpak ɨŋanisi aŋ aŋ awit.
Yesu da yabekbini 12 kabɨ tɨmɨk iyɨ baŋgɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nandani. Nin Jerusalem kɨkdamaŋ. Kɨŋapno gen morap kalɨp kombɨ amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji do mandawit uŋun kɨsisi bamɨ toŋ akdaŋ.
Yawe, gak butnokon yo ni da toŋ uŋun kokwin aŋek bamɨsi nandaŋ namɨsal.
Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon yɨyɨtni tagɨsi tosak do nandaŋek pi madep asak kaŋ, egɨp egɨpni pasɨl ɨmjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda nak do nandaŋek egɨp egɨpni do nandaban yo madep dɨma asak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak.
Yawe, Kwen Kokup aŋelo gak da yo tagɨsi agɨl uŋun do kap yaŋek mango awɨkwaŋ. Gak da gengo guramɨkdal uŋun do nandaŋek kap yoŋ.
Bret kaloŋ kɨnda dagɨn tosok, nin amɨn morapmɨ da uŋun naŋgɨn nomaŋ, do nin morapmɨ da gɨptɨm kaloŋ amaŋ.
Yo amɨn but nandak nandagon da wɨsak uŋun yaŋ: nandak nandak yokwi, yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, yo kabo, amɨn dapdap,
Nak asisi dayɨsat, bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak, ae kɨlɨ abɨk, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn kɨmakbi Piŋkop Monji dakon gen nandaŋek egɨp egɨp abɨdokdaŋ.
Amɨn yokwi yo do goman aŋek sop do dɨma nandɨsak. Mani amɨn kɨlegɨ amɨn dɨwarɨ do yo morapmɨ yomɨsak.
Nak da oman amɨno Dewit kɨlɨ manjɨgɨm, aŋek yɨpbo ji dakon kɨla amɨn madep dagagɨt.
Yawe da paŋpulugosak do jomjom aŋ amɨn morap ji butji paŋteban aŋek atni.
Yawe Piŋkop, gak da lamno yɨpbɨ teŋteŋosok, aŋek nagon pɨlɨn tuk yoldal.
Emat dakon yo tɨmɨkgamaŋ uŋun on mɨktɨm dakon dɨma. Uŋun Piŋkop dakon tapmɨmni uŋudon tosok, do uwal dakon tapmɨm arɨpmɨ tagɨ abɨsak.
Muwut muwut yutnikon ae jap noknok bɨsap madepmon amɨn mani toŋ da yɨyɨt tamokon yɨt do galak toŋ.
Mani amɨn morapmɨ yaŋ yoba abɨŋek top gen morapmɨ yawit, mani asi gulusuŋ kɨnda agɨt yaŋ dɨma kawit. Don amɨn bamorɨ da abɨŋ yaŋ yagɨmal,
Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat pasɨldamal, mani nak dakon gen uŋun dɨmasi pasɨldɨsak.”
Yɨgakwa Yesu da bret 5 kabɨ gat ae tap kɨlap bamot gat kɨsi tɨmɨk Kwen Kokup sɨŋtaŋek gɨsamɨkgɨt. Aŋek bret gat ae tap kɨlap gat paŋdagaŋek paŋdetni do yomɨŋakwan amɨn do kokwinɨk yomgwit.
Niniwe amɨn Jona da Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋban but tobɨl awit. Mani ji da binapmon amɨn kɨnda egɨsak uŋun da Jona yapmaŋ mudosok, mani ji but tobɨl dɨma aŋ. Do gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon Niniwe amɨn da pɨdaŋ agek abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn kabɨ dakon aŋpak yokwi uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋokdaŋ.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn kabɨ Yesu gat jap naŋek yɨkgwit uŋun iyɨ gɨn yaŋ yawit, “On niaŋen amɨn kɨnda da dɨwarɨ yopyop asak?”
Uŋun amɨn mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon moneŋni tɨmɨt do nandaŋek yoyɨŋdet gulusuŋ aŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ gat ae gwakni morap kɨsi gat dakon nandaŋ gadat paŋupbal aŋ. Do gen uŋuden dɨma yoni do yaŋsop aŋ yobi.
Nak gak do nandaŋek jap kelek egapbo ŋwak tukwalno tapmɨmɨ mɨni ak. Nak amɨn kɨdarɨ gɨn agɨm.
Yesu uŋun mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madepsi yoyɨŋban kɨŋakwa iyɨ boron wɨgek Magadan tet do kɨgɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋek dɨwarɨ da ɨlɨp sul ɨmɨŋek kɨsit da aŋakgwit. Ae dɨwarɨ da mogɨm kulbak aŋagek
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni yopmaŋek yolgɨmal.
Yawe, mango bɨsap mudok mudogɨ mɨni taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak. Babɨkon da babɨkon man bingo do nandaŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ.
Mani paŋdetni gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ pasɨlɨ taŋ yomgut, do dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt. Ae gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do aŋek iyɨk do si pasalgwit.
Asisi, bɨt madepsi kamel uŋun da ɨmal bupbup da kosit gwagagon arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨgɨ asak. Mani uŋun yapmaŋek yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pɨgɨgɨ asak.”
Paŋmuwukbi kabɨ da yabekbi dakon gen nandak do galagɨ madepsi nandawit. Ae but da notni baŋgal baŋgal aŋek, jap aŋwa nok do ae bɨsit ak do saŋbek saŋbek muwukgwit.
“Nak naga wain obi ae ji kɨlɨŋno morap. Amɨn kɨnda nagon saŋbeŋban nak uŋun amɨnon saŋbekeŋ kaŋ, bamɨ morapmɨ tokdɨsak. Ji nak nipmaŋ degek yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban kokupmɨ kokupmɨ agek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋek amɨn dakon sotni paŋmɨlɨp awit.
Yesu dakon paŋdetni dɨ Sisaria egɨpgwit uŋun gat kɨsi wɨgek uŋun da nin paŋkɨ Nason da yutnon nipba egɨpgumaŋ. Nason uŋun kalɨp Yesu kɨlɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgut. Mɨktɨmni uŋun Saiprus.
Dɨsi nandaŋ, Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgwit bɨsapmon kokup kɨdat dakon wupmɨ gen dɨma yoŋ uŋudon kɨni do amɨn da dayɨŋba kokwin dɨma aŋek kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
Bɨsit yɨpmaŋ derɨ mɨni aŋek egɨpni.
“Yaŋ paŋ muwugek pi monjɨ pɨlɨndosi abeŋ uŋun do moneŋ 1 danari yomɨŋ yomɨŋ agɨt.
Amɨn Dakon Monji niaŋon da kɨmotdɨsak do yaŋbi uŋun da tɨlak kɨmotdɨsak. Mani uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn, awa!”
Wɨsa dagok morap gak da nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsal uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok aneŋ kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi. Ae kalbi morap bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ paŋpulugaŋek dɨma nipmaŋ dekdal uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok aneŋ kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi.
Nak dakon man jikon tosok do aŋek amɨn kɨsi da nandaba yokwi tok madepsi aŋdamdaŋ.
Aŋek yokwi pakpak amɨn aŋpakgo yoyɨŋ dekgo tobɨlek gagon opni.
Yawe da nandak nandakni mɨni amɨn paŋkutnosok. Kalɨp tapmɨmno mɨni da egapbo pulugaŋ nepgut.
Kwen Kokup kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon yɨkdak amɨn jɨkgo yanjaŋ yomɨsak. Amɨn Tagɨ da jɨgɨlagon da pabɨŋ yopmaŋdak.
Kalɨp babɨkni da awit, uŋudeŋ gɨn, kwen wɨgɨk aŋek Piŋkop manji ɨmgwit. Uŋun obip gɨreŋɨ dɨkdɨk suŋ yamaŋdak uŋun yombem.
Kɨŋ kaŋba tɨp madep tɨp kɨnam sopgut uŋun kɨlɨ aŋtobɨlba kɨgɨt kawit.
Amɨn kɨnda uŋun nandaŋ gadatni tebai, do jap morap kɨsi tagɨ nosok. Mani amɨn kɨnda uŋun nandaŋ gadatni tebai dɨma, do bɨt kɨlapyo dɨma nosok.
Ae Israel amɨn kalɨp paŋsanɨkgɨt uŋun nandaŋ gadat ani kaŋ, kɨndap obikon aeni saŋbekdɨsak. Nido Piŋkop iyɨ aeni saŋbesak dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmɨsak.
Sabat bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu da Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut kɨndakon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Yesu dakon man do tepmɨ paŋek mayaktok tagɨ pamaŋ yaŋ nandawit. Yaŋ nandaŋek gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ yopmaŋ degek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi nandaŋek kɨwit.
Aŋakwan amɨn kabɨ kɨnda da amɨn kɨsit kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi kɨnda wamaŋ uŋudon aŋapgwit. Aŋapba Yesu da nandaŋ gadatni pɨndagek amɨn uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Monjɨ, dɨma pasolgi, dɨwarɨgo wɨrɨrɨk gamɨsat.”
Gɨldat tepmɨsi soŋek, amɨn uŋun obɨsi soŋ yomgut. Aŋakwan Piŋkop ɨbɨpgwit. Piŋkop da nandaŋakwan yo yokwisi uŋun altaŋ yomgwit, mani but tobɨl aŋek mani dɨma yaŋ aŋkɨsiwit.
Yaŋ yaŋba amɨn kɨnda bɨkbɨknikon yɨkgɨt, mani Kaiapas, uŋun bɨlak do mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn egɨpgut, uŋun da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nandak nandakji mɨni.
Uŋun amɨn Pol da Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋakwan mɨrak paŋakwan Pol da uŋun amɨn kɨlek tosak dakon nandaŋ gadatni taŋban kagɨt.
Piŋkop, gak da nak aŋpulugagɨl, do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ ya yaŋ gayɨkeŋ. Aŋek mɨŋat amɨnyogo da dabɨlon mango awɨgek “Piŋkop da nak do yo tagɨsi aŋ namɨsak” yaŋ yokdɨsat.
Nandak nandakno yaŋ tosok, ji dakon nandaŋ gadat da nak aŋteban aŋakwan nak dakon nandaŋ gadat da ji paŋteban asak.
Nido but yokwi nandɨsat? Nido butno jɨk tosok? Nak Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadaŋek uŋun da yokwikon baŋ kukwaŋ nepjak do jomjom abeŋ. Uŋun Piŋkopno, do aeno mani yaŋ aŋkɨsikeŋ.
Ji uŋun amɨn da aŋ uŋudeŋ dɨma ani, nido Datji dɨma iyɨŋakwa yo morap do wadak wadak aŋ uŋun nandaŋ mudosok.
Amɨn Tagɨ, gak nin dakon yutsi yombem. Kalɨp babɨknin gagon egɨpgwit, ae abɨsokyo kɨsi, nin yaŋ gɨn gagon ekwamaŋ.
Kalɨpsi Isip amɨn pabɨŋ yopgut bɨsapmon, Piŋkop da gen teban uŋun Israel amɨn nin do nimgut.
Kalɨp kombɨ amɨn telagɨ da yaŋ yawit,
Jon da ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk paŋ egɨpgut uŋun bɨt madep kɨnda mani kamel uŋun dakon daŋgwani baŋ wasaŋbi. Aŋek bɨt gɨp kɨnda bobaŋ napmɨ do wamgut. Japni uŋun pɨlak pɨlak ae kabaŋ kok.
Gulusuŋ iyɨ asak uŋun da iyɨnaŋ wɨtjɨŋ ɨmɨsak. Ae butjap ematyo amɨn dɨwarɨ do aŋ yom do nandak nandak asak, uŋun da tobɨlek iyɨ naŋ aŋupbal asak.
Gengo da nandak nandak tagɨsi namɨsak, do aŋpak yokwi morap do dɨmasi galak tosot.
Ji nandaŋ kokwinji tagɨ mɨni! Piŋkop da manji baŋ gɨn dɨma, burɨ gat kɨsi wasagɨt.
Uŋun kɨsitni toŋ mani yo arɨpmɨ dɨma ɨgayɨni. Ae kandapni toŋ, mani kosit arɨpmɨ dɨma agɨpni. Ae gen kɨnda tegɨkon da dɨma noman tokdaŋ.
Iyɨ mibɨltok kɨŋek mɨŋat amɨni tɨmɨk paŋabɨŋakwan tap ɨdap pudawit. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
Egɨp egɨp namɨŋaki mango aŋkɨsikeŋ. Gengo da aŋpulugosak do nandɨsat.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Uŋun bɨsapmon tɨlak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gɨldat dabɨlon, ae kanegon, ae gɨgon noman tokdaŋ. Aŋakwa mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morapmɨ nandaŋakwa tap da madepsi tamalɨgakwan pasol pasol madepsi aŋek butni tagɨ dɨma tokdɨsak.
Yesu da Lasarus aban pɨdaŋban kaŋek Juda amɨn morapmɨ da kɨla amɨni yopmaŋ degek Yesukon kɨŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋdo, mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da Lasarus kɨsi aŋakba kɨmotjak do gen paŋkosit awit.
Pego dakon gwakni Piŋkop da iyɨ do manjɨgɨt, uŋun da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ gayaŋ.
Yaŋ ani, nido Piŋkop da aŋpak ninon asak uŋun kɨlɨ aŋkɨlɨk kawit, aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ uŋun tagɨsi yaŋ kɨlɨ nandawit.
Nak asisi gayɨsat, gak dam tebanon sigɨn egaki wɨgɨ moneŋ niaŋ yopbi do gayɨni uŋun kɨsisi yopmaŋek don waŋga kɨkdɨsal.”
Eli uŋun Matat dakon monji. Matat uŋun Liwai dakon monji. Liwai uŋun Melki dakon monji. Melki uŋun Janai dakon monji. Janai uŋun Josep dakon monji.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek kokup pap uŋun yɨpmaŋ waŋga pɨgek uŋun pɨlɨn kaga Betani kokupmon paŋkɨ pakgɨt.
nido nak uŋun pi aŋapbo, Piŋkop da jikon yo tagɨsi aŋ damɨŋakwan, Israel amɨn dabɨnoni da uŋun kaŋek, ninon yaŋ gɨn asak tam tagɨsi yaŋ nandani do nandɨsat. Yaŋ nandaŋakwa Piŋkop da dɨwarɨ yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak kaŋ tagɨsi yaŋ nandɨsat.
Sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agak dakon tapmɨm Yesukon da apgut, do amɨn morap kɨsitni kwenikon ɨgayɨk do awit. Yaŋ aŋek kɨlek tawit.
Namɨn da toktogɨsi egek arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨmotjak? Namɨn da tebaisi egek kɨmakbi tamokon arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨsak? Amɨn kɨnda mɨnisi.
Mani yaŋ dɨma aŋ. Ji dɨsi paŋmuwukbi notji baŋ paŋkewalek yokwi aŋyomaŋ.
Do nido nak nayɨsal? Gen yaŋapbo nandawit amɨn baŋ yoyɨ. Gen yagɨm uŋun da nandaŋ.”
Yut uŋun dakon kɨdarɨ Kristokon gadawit do aŋek kɨsi morap tagɨsi gadaŋek toŋ. Piŋkop da yut uŋun sigɨn wɨtjɨŋakwan yut uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ dakon telagɨ yut asak.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da donki kɨnda kaŋ uŋun da kwenon yɨkgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt.
Uŋun bɨsapmon oman amɨn kabɨno mɨŋat ae wɨli kɨsi do Wupno tagal yobo uŋun da kombɨ gen yokdaŋ.
