Don Sol Jerusalem kɨŋek Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn kabɨkon saŋbek do kɨgɨt. Mani nandaŋ gadat amɨn notnin kɨnda yaŋ dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgwit, do kɨsi morap da kaŋ pasalgwit.
Abɨsok jap do aŋ amɨn ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ. Don jap naŋ tugokdaŋ. Abɨsok kunam takgaŋ amɨn ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ. Don jɨkgo yanjakdaŋ.
Yesu da kɨndap uŋun yaŋ kaŋek yagɨt, “Buŋon bamɨ dɨmasi toki, aŋaki amɨn da dɨmasi paŋ noni dosi nandɨsat.” Gen yagɨt uŋun paŋdetni da nandawit.
Ji jap noknok bɨsap madep do Jerusalem kɨni. Nak dakon bɨsap dɨma ak, do naga dɨma kɨkeŋ.”
Uwalno kɨsi da muwugek gen pɨsɨgon da yo yokwisi kɨnda da altaŋ ɨmɨk yaŋ yaŋek yaŋ yoŋ,
On amɨn da Telagɨ Yut Madep aŋupbal aban telagɨ dɨma tosak do pini aŋakwan abɨdagɨmaŋ. Do gak da gaga iyɨŋaki gen morap yaŋ ɨmamaŋ uŋun bamɨ yomaŋ yaŋ iyɨ yaŋakwan nandaki.”
Kalɨp Piŋkop da Abraham gat babɨkni gat do mɨktɨm morap kɨsi yom do yaŋ teban tok agɨt. Abraham gen teban yolakwan uŋun do aŋek yaŋ teban tok dɨma aŋ ɨmgut. Nandaŋ gadat gɨn aŋakwan amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨŋek yaŋ teban tok aŋ ɨmgut.
Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namjak kaŋ, Piŋkop gen da yosok uŋun da arɨpmon burɨkon da pakbi morapmɨ egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ dasi pak aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak.”
Gak da tap madep paptaŋ tamalɨgakwan aŋyawot aŋaki wayɨŋɨ mɨni tosok. Ae mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ egɨ aŋaŋ kwaŋ gen pap yaŋek pɨdok pɨdok aŋ uŋun gak da paŋyawot asal.
Piŋkop kaloŋ dagɨn gen teban paŋalon agɨt, uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn Gen Kokwin Amɨn egɨsak. Ae uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn mɨŋat amɨnyo yokwikon baŋ tagɨ tɨmɨtjak, ae tagɨ paŋupbal asak. Do gak namɨn da amɨn dakon aŋpakni kokwin asal?
Gak nin do butjap nandɨsal, do nin paŋupbal asal. Gak nin do butjap nandɨsal, do madepsi pasolgomaŋ.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋba amɨn kɨsi muwut muwut yut yɨpmaŋek yomakon pɨgɨwit. Pɨgakwa Juda amɨn morapmɨ gat ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon nani morapmɨ Juda amɨnon saŋbeŋek Piŋkop but dasi gawak ɨmgwit amɨn gat kɨsi Pol gat Banabas gat yolgwit. Yolakwa amɨn bamot da Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni do nandaŋek tebaisi agek egɨ aŋaŋ kɨni do yoyɨŋ paŋteban agɨmal.
Gak ‘Moneŋno morapmɨ ae yo kabɨno morapmɨ toŋ. Yo kɨnda do wadak wadak dɨma asat’ yaŋ yosol. Mani dɨma. Amɨn da bupmɨsi nandaŋ gamni da tɨlagon yokwisi egɨsal. Gak yogo mɨnisi da egɨsal, ae dabɨlgo mɨni, ae molaŋ molaŋ agɨsal. Aŋek gaga dɨma nandabɨ pɨsosok.
Aŋakwa jikon da amɨn dɨwarɨ da pɨdaŋ paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon da amɨn dɨwarɨ buŋon yolni do top gen yoyɨkdaŋ.
Nak mɨktɨmon egɨsaron nak naga on mɨktɨm dakon teŋteŋɨ.”
Ae aŋelo uŋun da buŋon nani kweŋni pɨsogɨt. Aŋakwan yo kɨnda kabap madepsi yombem si soŋakwan, maba tap kaga pɨgɨ magɨt. Uŋun tap kokwin aba kabi kapbɨ aŋakwa kabi kɨnda yawi dagagɨt.
Kwen kundukon yo tebai toŋ uŋun da kwakwalɨtdaŋ, do amɨn morapmɨ da jɨgɨ morap mɨktɨmon noman tokdɨsak do nandaba kɨk aŋek pasol pasol madepsi aŋek ɨŋam kɨmot akdaŋ.
Yawe da geni uŋun nandaŋek Jekop do butjap nandaŋ yomgut. Israel dakon amɨn kabɨ do kɨndap yɨpban pɨŋakwan japmɨsi nandaŋ yomgut.
Yaŋ nandagɨt, Kristo dakon man do mayaktok pakeŋ kaŋ, uŋun da Isip dakon yoni tagɨsi morap uŋun yapmaŋdak. Yaŋ nandagɨt nido Piŋkop da tomni do yo tagɨsi ɨmdɨsak uŋun do nandaŋek egɨpgut.
Yesu pɨndak egakwan yoni morapmɨ amɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon paret ɨdapmon paretni yopgwit.
Nak uwal pɨdok pɨdokyo noman tosak do pɨgɨm. ‘Amɨn kɨnda da datni uwal aŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae gwa kɨnda da meŋi uwal aŋ ɨmdɨsak. Aŋakwan mɨŋat kɨnda da namdi uwal aŋ ɨmdɨsak.
Paŋdetni dɨwarɨ da Telagɨ Yut Madep kaŋek yawit, “Amɨn da tɨp kɨldani toŋ tagɨsi gat, ae yo dɨwarɨ yo kɨldani tagɨsi Piŋkop do paret awit uŋun baŋ aŋtɨlɨm awit.” Yaŋba Yesu da yagɨt,
Gen morap uŋun do kalɨp kombɨ amɨn da papiakon kɨlɨ mandawit uŋun da arɨpmon aŋ mudawit. Yaŋ aŋek bumjotni don tɨlak kɨndapmon naŋ kukwaŋ aŋkɨ kɨmakbi tamokon yɨpgwit.
Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo Yesu gat paŋdetni 12 kabɨ gat uŋun yutnon opgwit.
Yolek amɨn wuda tebani toŋ kɨnda da Yesukon kɨŋ ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tokeŋ do nandɨsal kaŋ, tagɨ aŋmɨlɨp abɨ kɨlek tokeŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Do gak yo pɨndakdal uŋun dakon geni mandaki. Yo abɨsok toŋ, ae yo don noman tokdaŋ, uŋun do mandaki.
Yawe da nak do yo tagɨsi aŋ namɨsak, do kobogɨ do yo ninaŋ ɨbeŋ?
amɨn dakon geni nandaŋ yomɨŋek Yesu kɨmotjak do yaŋ dagok agɨt.
Piŋkop da gen yoyɨgɨt uŋun do pasalgwit. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Amɨn bo bɨt kɨlap yo kɨnda kabapmon wɨgɨsak kaŋ tɨpnaŋ aŋakba kɨmotjak.”
Uŋun do aŋek Piŋkop da nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsikon da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak da kombɨ amɨno gat ae yabekbi kabɨno gat uŋun amɨn kabɨkon yabetdɨsat. Yabekgo dɨwarɨ dapba kɨmotdaŋ, ae dɨwarɨ yo yokwisi aŋyomdaŋ.’
Yaŋ yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Jil niaŋon da Amɨn Tagɨ dakon Wup wasɨp iyɨk do but kaloŋ amal? Pɨndat, amɨn ego gapmagwan yɨpmaŋ amɨn uŋun yoma kagakon akgaŋ. Uŋun amɨn da gakyo kɨsi wamaŋ aŋkɨkdaŋ.”
Mani on gɨn nandɨsat, kokup morap agɨsaron butnokon Telagɨ Wup da yaŋsi nayɨsak. Don amɨn da dam teban yutnon nepdaŋ, ae jɨgɨ namdaŋ uŋun kɨsi nayɨŋakwan agɨsat.
kɨla amɨn 24 kabɨ da Amɨn uŋun kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamokon yɨkdak uŋun da buron maŋ pokgoŋ. Maŋ pagek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨsak Amɨn uŋun gawak ɨmaŋ. Ae pelɨtni kɨldani toŋ gol baŋ wasaŋbi uŋun kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo tosok uŋudon noman ɨlɨk yopmaŋek kap yaŋ yoŋ,
Tɨmɨgek maba kɨndap tebanon pɨgek uŋungwan kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋek egɨpdaŋ.”
Kɨmagakwa bɨt kɨla amɨn da tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ kokupmon bɨt gat ae koŋni toŋ amɨn gat dakon geni amɨn yoyɨwit.
Yumaŋ naŋek amɨn kɨla ani do manjɨŋ yopgul, ae nin dakon Piŋkop dakon oman ani do mukwa sogok amɨni manjɨŋ yopgul. Uŋun da kɨla amɨn madep egek mɨktɨmon amɨn kɨlani akdaŋ.”
Nak aŋkɨlek akdo pi dɨma agɨl bɨsapmon kositgo yapgum. Mani abɨsok gengo guramɨkdat.
Kɨlɨ aŋelo 7 da ɨdap madepni kundukon tagalgɨt. Aŋakwan Piŋkop da Telagɨ Yut Madepgwan, kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon da amɨn kɨnda dakon gen kaga da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Kɨlɨ uŋun mudosok.”
Gak da kanek wasagɨl da uŋun da bɨlak dakon kanek morap dakon tɨlakni asak. Ae gɨldat dabɨl ni bɨsapmon pɨgɨsak uŋun gɨldat da iyɨ nandɨsak.
Jap yet kosiron mawit, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋ dakon tɨlak. Amɨn nandaŋ gadat aba Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak yaŋ do Sunduk da abɨŋ butnikon Piŋkop dakon gen gwayesak.
Yaŋban uŋun gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, tagɨsi yosol. Uŋun asisi, Piŋkop uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn egɨsak, ae Piŋkop kɨnda dɨma egɨsak.
Yesu uŋun Jeriko kokup pap wɨgɨ yapmaŋek kɨk do agɨt.
Yaŋ kaŋ Piŋkop da galak tosagon nak kɨsɨk kɨsɨgon da jikon opbo kɨsin da tapmɨm paneŋ.
Mani geni kobogɨ yaworɨ ae aŋpak tagɨsikon da paŋtobɨl yomni. Ae Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlegɨsi egɨpni. Yaŋ aba Kristo yol do aŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋakwa gen yokwi dayaŋ amɨn uŋun mayagɨ pakdaŋ.
Demitius uŋun iyɨ dakon pi monjɨni ae kɨsit kɨlda amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsi yaŋ yoban muwukba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨsi nandaŋ, pi on amaŋon moneŋ madepsi tɨmɨkgamaŋ.
Aŋakwa Yesu kɨndapmon kɨŋek bret ae tap kɨlap tɨmɨgek paŋdetni do yomgut.
Mani dɨsi Moses dakon gen maba kwanek yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Amɨn kɨnda da meŋi bo datni yaŋ iyɨsak, “Nak yo on kɨlɨ Piŋkop do manjɨgɨm. Dɨma tam tagɨ paŋpulugokom.” ’
Butgo oman amɨngo nagon yɨpmaŋek yo tagɨsi aŋ nabi. Gen teban morapgo do nayɨŋ dekgi.
Yaŋba pɨndagek Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kɨŋ mukwa sogok amɨn gɨptɨmji yolɨni.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban kɨŋakwa gɨptɨmni kɨlek tawit.
Do mukwa sogok kalugɨ uŋun altak uŋun Melkisedek yombem, ae yaŋsi nandano pɨsosak, uŋun da Liwai kabɨkon mukwa sogok amɨn yapmaŋ mudosok.
Aŋakwan Yesu Liwai da yutnon kwan yɨgek jap nawit. Moneŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn ae yokwi pakpak amɨn morapmɨ Yesu gat paŋdetni gat jap nawit. (Uŋuden amɨn morapmɨsi da Yesu yolgwit.)
Yaŋba Pailat da aeni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon galaktok on amɨn bamoron baŋ namɨn naŋ pulugaŋ yɨpbo kɨsak do nandaŋ?” Yoyɨŋban “Barabas naŋ” yaŋ yawit.
Amɨn kabɨ uŋun manjɨŋ yabekbi kabɨ da ɨŋamon yopba akgwit. Agakwa pi uŋun ani do kɨsitni kwenikon wutjɨŋek gɨsam yomɨŋek bɨsit awit.
Piŋkop dakon papia da uŋun aŋpak do yaŋ yosok: “Juda amɨn ji da aŋpak yokwi aŋ do aŋek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ da Piŋkop dakon man abɨŋ yɨpmaŋek jɨgɨlak gen yaŋ ɨmaŋ.”
Mani joŋ kɨlap da ekwaŋ tɨmon gak da nin paŋupbal agɨl. Aŋek pɨlɨn tuk madep naŋ nin wɨtjɨgɨl.
Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon egɨp egɨpni do but dasi galak tosak kaŋ pasɨl ɨmjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda mɨktɨmon egɨp egɨpni uwal aŋɨmjak kaŋ, egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak.
Nak da uwalni bamaŋ yomdɨsat, aŋek amɨn nandaba yokwi taŋ ɨmni amɨn dapbo kɨmotdaŋ.
Gak da gaga da tapmɨmon nin kwaokgɨl, do abɨsok abɨŋ nin paŋpulugoki. Nin wain nap bulagɨ yombem baŋ gak da paŋteban abɨ tebaisi awit.
Gen yaŋ yaŋban Erot burɨkon jɨgɨ nandagɨt, mani amɨn jap nawit uŋun da ɨŋamon yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun do pasalek gen yagɨt dɨma kɨrɨŋɨkgɨt. Obip amɨni yoyɨŋban mɨŋatjok da gen iyɨgɨt uŋudeŋ aŋek
Muwut muwut tamokon amɨn da nak do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ. Ae pakbi teban naŋek but upbal aŋ amɨn da abɨŋ nep do kap yoŋ.
Gen yaŋ yagɨt: “Amɨn kɨnda nak da manjikon apdɨsak. Uŋun dakon tapmɨm da nak dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋdak. Nak oman monjɨni dakon pɨŋbinisi egɨsat, do kandap gwɨlni dakon nap pabɨŋ yɨgek tagɨ dɨma wɨtdalgeŋ.
Yaŋdo, niaŋ yoneŋ? Israel amɨn Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tok do pi tebaisi awit, mani dɨma kɨlek tawit. Piŋkop da amɨn dɨwarɨ baŋgɨn manjɨŋban uŋun dagɨn kɨlek tawit. Aŋakwan dɨwarɨ Piŋkop da but yomani sopmaŋ yomgut.
Gak da yum pɨndagaki amɨn kabɨ nin da ɨleŋon ekwaŋ uŋun da abɨŋ nin dakon mɨktɨm abɨdok do emat aŋ. Uwalnin da yaŋsul aŋ nimɨŋek yanjaŋ nimaŋ.
Jɨgɨ tepmɨyo uŋun da noman taŋ daba dɨ da nandaŋ gadatji dɨma yɨpmaŋ detni yaŋ do yabekgɨmak. Dɨsi nandaŋ, jɨgɨ ae tepmɨyo uŋuden paneŋ do Piŋkop da kɨlɨ nandagɨt.
Yesu gen on Pita kosit niaŋon da kɨmagek Piŋkop man madep ɨmjak uŋun do yagɨt. Yaŋ yaŋek iyɨgɨt, “Nak nolgi.”
Kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ Jerusalem aŋgwasɨŋek taŋ aŋaŋ kɨwit uŋun dakon amɨn morapmɨ da sot amɨn ae amɨn koŋ da paŋupbal abi amɨnyo kɨsi paŋapba kɨlek tawit.
Not gɨmano Gaius, aŋpak yokwi dɨma yolek abi, aŋpak tagɨsi baŋ yolek abi. Amɨn kɨnda aŋpak tagɨ asak uŋun Piŋkop dakon amɨn. Mani amɨn kɨnda aŋpak yokwi asak uŋun Piŋkop dɨma kaŋbi.
Kɨla amɨn madep dakon yo morapni kɨla aŋ uŋun dakon mibɨltok amɨn morapni kɨla agɨt. Ae kɨla amɨn madep nandak nandak ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨ uŋun yoyɨŋdetjak dakon tapmɨm kɨsi taŋ ɨmgut.
Amɨn kɨnda da dɨma namgut, ae amɨn da dɨma nayɨŋ dekgwit. Yesu Kristo da iyɨ nolɨŋban kagɨm.
Yaŋakwan amɨn da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Uŋun amɨn dɨma, piŋkop kɨnda da yosok.”
Uŋun aŋpakji da nin dakon but paŋteban asak. Asi, ji da butnin paŋteban awit, mani uŋun gɨn dɨma, nin kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi agɨmaŋ, nido ji da Taitus dakon nandaba kɨkni aŋmɨlɨp aba butni yaworɨsi tagɨt.
Aŋek ɨmal naŋ dabɨlɨ wamaŋ sopmaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun namɨn da gɨkdak yaŋ do kombɨ gen yaŋ ka!”
Mani mɨŋat busuŋ daŋgwani dubagɨ kaŋ, uŋun mɨŋat dakon tɨlɨmni tagɨsi, nido Piŋkop da busuŋni wɨtjɨsak do ɨmgut.
Amɨnon goman morap agɨl uŋun sopbi. Takis mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yopyopmɨ uŋun yopni. Ae kɨla amɨn mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ morap do gawak yomɨŋek man madep yomni.
Mɨŋat amɨngo dapmaŋakwa yawi da tagal kɨŋek Jerusalem pak pukwaŋ. Ae bumjotni wayɨtni amɨn kɨnda dɨma egɨsak.
Yaŋba Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep yoyɨŋban mɨktɨmon yɨkgwit. Yɨgakwa bret 7 kabɨ tɨmɨgek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek paŋdetni da kokwinɨk yomni do yomgut. Yoban mɨŋat amɨnyo do yomgwit.
Piŋkop mango wukwisi, do amɨn yokwi da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nepbi. Tapmɨmgo madepsi do aŋpulugaŋbɨ tagɨsi egɨpbeŋ.
Nak gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalon ji gat kɨsi egɨ egɨ agɨmaŋ, mani nak dɨma abɨdawit. Mani abɨsok on ji dakon bɨsap. Abɨsok pɨlɨn tuk dakon tapmɨm da madepsi asak.”
Gak monɨŋɨsok egɨpgul bɨsapmon Piŋkop dakon gen telagɨ papianikon toŋ nandak nandak uŋudon wasaŋek pagɨl. Papia uŋun da nandak nandak kɨlegɨ tagɨ gamjak. Nandak nandak kɨlegɨ uŋun yaŋ: Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋaki Piŋkop da gak yokwikon naŋ abɨdosak.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Jiyo kɨsi dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoŋ?
Wɨli kɨnda da mɨŋat kɨnda pasak kaŋ, mɨŋat uŋun iyɨ do pasak. Paŋakwan wɨli dakon notni da agek mɨrak yopmaŋek geni nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asak. Abɨsok kɨsɨk kɨsɨk da nak da buron tugosok.
Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda yokwi asak do yabetjak kaŋ, uŋun dakon kobogɨ yokwisi. Yabet dɨma aŋakwan amɨn da wit mɨsɨŋɨt tɨp madep tegɨkon wamaŋ maba tap ɨlarɨgwan pɨgek kɨmotjak kaŋ uŋun da tagapmɨ.
Yawe Piŋkopnin egɨsak, uŋun yombem kɨnda mɨni. Uŋun kwensi kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon yɨkdak.
Yawe do kap kalugɨ kɨnda yaŋ ɨmni. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn ekwaŋ, ji Yawe do kap yaŋ ɨmni.
Josep yaŋ nandaŋek egakwan Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo kɨnda da dɨpmɨnon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Josep, Dewit da kabɨkon nani, Maria da monjɨ kwap uŋun Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon awɨlak, do Maria pak do dɨma pasolgi.
Piŋkop dakon amɨn uŋun tagɨsi. Nak uŋun gat egɨp do tagɨsi nandɨsat.
Jikon jap dɨma tɨmɨtneŋ yaŋon da dɨma. Jap nimnisi do tagɨ dayɨnom, mani yaŋ dɨma agɨmaŋ. Nido, aŋpak tagɨsi dɨsi yolek ani, nin uŋun dolɨk do aŋek uŋun do yaŋ agɨmaŋ.
Piŋkop, namɨn da nak aŋaŋ kokup pap dam tebani toŋon tagɨ aŋkɨsak? Ae namɨn da nak Idom mɨktɨmon emat ak do tagɨ aŋkɨsak?
Ji bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsap madep gat, ae kanek kalugɨ dakon bɨsap madep gat, ae bɨlak kalugɨ dakon gawat gawat bɨsap madep uŋun yol kɨmotdosi nandaŋ.
Uŋun aŋpak yokwi morap manji yomɨŋek, aŋpak tagɨsi baŋgɨn asak. Uŋun amɨn gat but kaloŋ ak do dakon pi aŋ kɨmotjak.
Yawe, gak gawak gamaŋ amɨn pasɨl mudaŋ. Gak golgaŋ amɨn kɨnda dɨma kokdɨsal, do abɨŋ nak aŋpuluga.
Kokup kɨdat dakon wupmɨ wasoŋ amɨn uŋun kokup kɨdat wup yombem aŋ. Ae amɨn morap egɨp egɨpni kokup kɨdaron toŋ yaŋsi nandaŋ uŋun kɨsi kokup kɨdat yombem gɨn aŋ.
Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, kuraktok aŋpak tɨmɨgek yut dɨwarɨkon agɨ agɨ aŋ. Ae kuraktok aŋpak gɨn dɨma, amɨn dɨwarɨ da yo aŋ uŋun dakon geni nandak do galagɨ nandaŋ. Aŋek gen morapmɨ dɨma yogogɨ yoŋ.
yo yokwisi gagon arɨpmɨ dɨma noman toni. Ae sot teban gak da yut da kapmatjok arɨpmɨ dɨma apni.
Do amɨn kɨnda iyɨ dakon man awɨgɨsak uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da dabɨlon mani mɨni. Mani amɨn kɨnda Amɨn Tagɨ da mani awɨgɨsak uŋun amɨn mani toŋ.
Amɨn da Jon dakon gen uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin niaŋsi aneŋ?”
Ji yo morapmon aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ. Ji Piŋkop tebaisi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ, ae gen tagɨsi yoŋ, ae nandak nandakji toŋ, ae Piŋkop dakon pi ak do galagɨ madepsi nandaŋ. Ae nin do but dasi galaktaŋ nimaŋ. Yaŋdo, nandaŋ yaworon da paret ak do nandaŋ uŋun but dasi nandaŋek kɨlegɨsi ani.
Uŋun da yaŋ nolɨsak, Piŋkop dakon yɨk yawot kokup uŋun tosok, mani amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋungwan dɨma pɨgɨwit, nido uŋun amɨn kabɨ kalɨp Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandawit, mani geni abɨŋ yɨpgwit.
Nak aŋpulugosak amɨn kɨnda kapmat dɨma akban kosot. Amɨn kɨnda da kɨlano dɨma asak, ae amɨn kɨnda da nak do bup taŋek dɨma aŋkutnosok.
Jekop uŋun Josep dakon datni. Josep uŋun Maria dakon eni. Aŋakwan Maria da Yesu aŋalagɨt. Yesu uŋun Kristo yaŋ iyaŋ.
Piŋkop da pi madepsi aban kawit, mani uŋun amɨn kabɨkon morapmɨ da aŋpak yokwi aba tagɨ dɨma nandaŋ yomgut. Do mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon paŋupbal aban kɨmagakwa bumjotni tɨmɨ dukon dɨ taŋ taŋ awit.
Jiyo kɨsi yaŋ ɨlɨt nandaŋek Yesu Kristo da kabɨkon saŋbewit.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyogo aego paŋteban abɨ nin kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek gak aŋkɨsineŋ.
Uŋun da ais yopban sipsip dakon daŋgwi da yaŋ maŋ mɨktɨm yalɨsak. Aŋek gɨk sɨtnaŋ yopban abɨlak da yaŋ maŋ tayɨŋɨkwaŋ.
Yaŋba Pilip da kɨŋ Andru iyɨŋban kɨsi Yesukon kɨŋek gen uŋun iyɨgɨmal.
Ae jap yet tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop gen nandaŋ abɨdaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ dakon tɨlak. Mani gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yɨpban kɨgɨt. Do nandaŋ gadat bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok aŋek paŋkewal altaŋ yoba tepmɨsi Piŋkop manji ɨmɨŋ mudoŋ.
Egakwan mɨrɨm madep aŋakwan paŋdetni pakbi wayɨt do aŋtɨdok aŋakwa pɨndakgɨt. Yaŋ pɨndagek wɨsa wɨsa do pakbi ɨdapmon bamaŋ bamaŋ kɨŋek kɨŋ paŋdetni yap do agɨt.
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨm, ‘Rom amɨn ninon gen teban kɨnda yaŋ tosok. Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn kɨnda gen yaŋ ɨmjak kaŋ, amɨn uŋun da geni yaŋ ɨmjak amɨn da ɨŋamon agek gen yaŋ ɨban kobogɨ tagɨ yosak. Yaŋ aban asi yo yokwi kɨnda agɨt kaŋ, kobogɨ do yo yokwi tagɨ aŋ ɨmɨmɨ. Yaŋ dɨma ani kaŋ, Rom nin dakon gen teban yapmaŋgaŋ.’
Mani Yesu da mɨŋatjok kɨsirɨkon abɨdaŋek gen papmon da yagɨt, “Gwano, pɨda!”
Yaŋ aban kaŋek Yesu tebai abɨdawit.
Mɨŋat gɨmoŋɨ kɨla amɨn madep pak do nandɨsal, gak nak dakon gen do mɨrak yopmaŋek uŋun do nandaki. Gak mɨŋat amɨnyo kokupgokon ekwaŋ uŋun ɨŋtaŋ yobi, ae yawi dɨwatgo kɨsi ɨŋtaŋ yobi.
“Yaŋ aba wain pi dakon ami da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak niaŋsi abeŋ? Nak monjino but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat uŋun naŋ yabekgo kwan nandaba wukwan ɨmni bo.’
Dabɨlno da pɨndagapbo uwalno tasɨk taŋ mudawit. Mɨrakno yopmaŋek uwalno yokwisi dakon kunam wɨwɨk nandagɨm.
Butdasi nandaŋek bɨsit iyaŋ amɨn Yawe uŋun amɨn da kapmatjok egɨsak.
“Nak gen teban kalugɨ kɨnda damɨsat uŋun yaŋ: ji dɨsikon notji do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋ yomɨŋ ani. Nak ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat, yaŋ gɨn ji dɨsikon notji do yaŋ gɨn nandani.
Aŋek butnokon da nandaba kɨksi agɨm. Nak sigɨn nandaŋek butno da jɨgɨ madepsi nandagɨm, do gen yagɨm.
Monjɨ tagaŋ teban taŋek nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi taŋ ɨmgut. Ae Piŋkop dakon gɨsamni madepsi taŋ ɨmgut.
Yawe, gak da mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal. Gengo do nayɨŋdet abi.
Mani ji da yaŋ yokdaŋ, “Nin da kɨndap obikon saŋbeneŋ do aŋek kɨlɨŋɨ uŋun Piŋkop da paŋsanɨkgɨt.”
Ae uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn da notni gat ae peni padɨk padɨkni yo yoyɨŋ degek “Ji Amɨn Tagɨ nandaŋ ɨmni” yaŋ dɨma yokdaŋ. Nido kɨsi morap nak nandaŋ namdaŋ gɨn. Uŋun amɨn ɨsalɨ bo ae man madepni toŋ uŋun nandaŋ namdaŋ gɨn.
Ɨleŋon egek kaŋakwa Yesu dakon gɨptɨm ŋwakŋwarɨsi agɨt. Aŋakwan tomno dabɨlniyo gɨldat da yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Ae ɨmalniyo kɨsi kwakwagɨsi ae teŋteŋɨni toŋsi agɨt.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomni, ae notji paŋpulugok do yo kabɨsi baŋ notji do yomɨŋ yomɨŋ ani. Uŋun aŋpak do dɨma ɨŋtoni, nido uŋun paret kɨnda, Piŋkop da uŋun do galak tosok.
Mani amɨn kɨnda da iyɨ pi kɨnda ak do nandɨsak kaŋ, pi uŋun binap amɨn kɨnda do arɨpmɨ dɨma ɨban. Piŋkop uŋun kaloŋɨ gɨn, ae uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn Abraham do yaŋ teban tok aŋ ɨmgut.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ uŋun yut da nagalon kɨndap soŋek yɨgakwa Pita yo kɨsi uŋun gat yɨkgwit.
Ae ni bɨsapmon sot asal yaŋ gandaŋek kɨlago agɨmaŋ, ae ni bɨsapmon dam teban yutnon yɨkdal yaŋ gandaŋek abɨŋ gandagɨmaŋ?’
Uŋun abɨŋek but yawot dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Gen uŋun Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ ji Piŋkop da dubagɨkon egɨpgwit gat ae Juda amɨn nin kapmatjok egɨpgumaŋ amɨn gat kɨsi do yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Uŋun da kɨlanin aŋakwan sigɨn ekwamaŋ, ae sagalek dɨma nindapmaŋgaŋ.
Yaŋdo, jikon jɨgɨ noman toŋ bɨsapmon paŋmuwukbikon dɨma saŋbeŋbi ae paŋmuwukbi da dabɨlon mani mɨni amɨnon jɨgɨsi uŋudon nido paŋkwaŋ?
Yawe, bupmɨ nandaŋ nabi. Nak do but dasi galak taŋ namɨŋek gengo guramɨgek kɨlano dagok dagogɨ mɨnisi abi do nandɨsat.
Ae amɨn nandaŋ gadatni dɨma teban taŋbi gat egɨsat bɨsapmon, nandaŋ gadatno dɨma teban taŋbi da tɨlak uŋun gat egɨsat, nido uŋun amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do nandɨsat. Nak amɨn morap kɨsi dakon aŋpak tɨmɨkgɨm, nido kosit morap kɨsi aŋkɨlɨgek amɨn dɨwarɨ yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do nandɨsat.
Yaŋban Mata da iyɨgɨt, “Asi, mibɨ gɨldaron pɨdot pɨdot bɨsap madepmon don pɨdokdɨsak yaŋ nandɨsat.”
Jap do ae dɨma akdaŋ, ae pakbi do dɨma akdaŋ. Gɨldat da gɨptɨmni tebai dɨma pɨndatjak, ae yo kɨnda da gɨptɨmɨkon pɨndakban tedepmɨ dɨma nandakdaŋ.
“Amɨn butdasi galak taŋ damaŋ baŋgɨn butdasi galak taŋ yomni kaŋ, ji amɨn tagɨ dɨma. Yokwi pakpak amɨn uŋun kɨsi amɨn butdasi galak taŋ yomaŋ baŋ butdasi galak taŋ yomaŋ.
Do nin jɨgɨnin toŋ bɨsapmon bɨsit aŋek pasol pasolɨ mɨni Piŋkop da kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamonikon kɨneŋ. Uŋun nandaŋ yawot amɨnsi, uŋun da bupmɨ ae nandaŋ yawok nimɨŋek nin tagɨ paŋpulugosak.
Ji tebaisi akgaŋ yaŋsi nandaŋ teban tosot. Ji do tagɨsi nandɨsat, ae ji da butno aŋteban aŋ. Jɨgɨ morapmɨ noman taŋ nimaŋ, mani ji do nandaŋek uŋun da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madep namɨsak.
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ da nandɨsak, bɨsap kɨnda noman tokdɨsak, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn yokwi pasɨl mudokdaŋ, do Yawe da jɨkgo yanjaŋ yomɨsak.
Yaŋ aban uŋun da buŋon nani da kwabatni uŋun paŋek monjɨ mɨni da kɨmakgɨt.
Aŋek yaŋ yokdaŋ, ‘Kokup pap madep, wagɨl bupmɨsi! Kalɨp ɨmal kwakwagɨ tagɨsi, ae ɨmal gami mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ baŋ pagɨl. Yaŋ aŋek gɨptɨmgo gol, ae tɨp kɨldani tagɨsi, ae kɨndɨrɨŋ yumaŋ nogɨ wukwisi baŋ paŋtɨlɨm agɨl.
Kwen Kokup gat ae Kwen Kokup ekwaŋ amɨn morap ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani! Mani mɨktɨm gat ae tap gat yagosil! Nido Sunduk jikon kɨlɨ pɨk. Pɨk da bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok egɨpdɨsat yaŋ nandɨsak, do butjap madepsi nandɨsak.”
Kwen Kokup da iyɨ yaŋ teŋteŋaŋek yaŋ yosok, “Piŋkop uŋun aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi. Uŋun iyɨ gen kokwin agak ami.”
Kokup pap dukwan dukwan amɨn da amɨn dɨwarɨ gat ae yo morap gat paŋupbal aŋ. Kosit ɨleŋon notni pabɨŋ yopmaŋek yoni gwayek do paŋkewalgaŋ.
Yaŋ aba Pita da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nin ɨdon egɨp do tagɨsi nandamaŋ. Nin yut kabeŋ kapbɨ aneŋ. Kɨnda gak do, kɨnda Moses do, ae kɨnda Elaija do aneŋ.”
Mani Yawe da yokwi pakpak obɨsi paŋupbal akdɨsak. Uŋun dakon dɨwatni wagɨl tasɨk taŋ mudokdaŋ.
Kap yaŋek man madepni yaŋ aŋkɨsini. Man madepni madepsi yaŋ aŋkɨsini.
Yawe da aban Kenan mɨktɨmon jap do madepsi awit. Aŋek japni paŋpasɨl agɨt.
Pakbi aŋtobɨlban yawi dagaŋba arɨpmɨ dɨma noknogɨ agɨt.
Moses da gen teban morap mɨŋat amɨnyo do yoyɨŋ mudaŋek bulmakau monɨŋ gat ae meme gat dakon yawini tɨmɨk pakbi gat ɨktagɨlgɨt. Aŋek isop kɨndap dakon kɨlɨŋɨ nap gami baŋ wabi uŋun sipsip daŋgwan baŋ wasaŋbi uŋun yawikon sɨbɨgɨt. Aŋek abɨdaŋ awɨlakwan yawi dakon mumumɨ da Piŋkop dakon gen teban papia ae mɨŋat amɨn morap da kwenon mawit.
Yesu bɨlakni 30 da tɨlak aŋakwan pini wasagɨt. Yesu uŋun Josep dakon monji amɨn da yaŋ nandawit. Josep uŋun Eli dakon monji.
Ais madep yopban tɨp da yaŋ mɨktɨmon moŋ. Aŋek uŋun da aba kokup mɨrɨmɨsi aŋakwan amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm abɨŋ yɨpmɨ mɨni.
Bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ Yesu dakon meŋi datniyo Yapyap Bɨlak kok do Jerusalem kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
Yaŋ pɨndagakwan Pita da iyɨgɨt, “Nak moneŋno mɨni. Mani yo taŋ namaŋ uŋun tagɨ gabeŋ. Yesu Kristo Nasaret kokupmon nani uŋun da tapmɨm namgut do gayɨko pɨdaŋ kosit agɨp!”
Top amɨn da aŋpak yokwi dɨ dɨma agɨmon gen yaŋ namaŋ.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu amɨn yoyɨŋ degakwan Parisi amɨn ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨnyo kɨsi paŋobɨŋ yɨkgwit. Uŋun amɨn Jerusalem, ae Galili dakon kokup morap toŋ, ae Judia mɨktɨmon da opgwit. Yesu Amɨn Tagɨ dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmgut, do sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agɨt.
Yawe Wukwi Madep da yoŋgamgwan egɨpbi kaŋ,
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsal, do kɨlek taŋek kɨki.” Yaŋ iyɨŋban uŋudon gɨn dabɨlɨ sɨŋtaŋek Yesu yolgɨt.
Yaŋdo, naga gagon dɨma abɨt. Mani gak da kɨlek tosak do yaŋaki tagɨ kɨlek tosak.
“Amɨn da saŋbeŋek yo kabɨni dɨma yumdaŋ, do moneŋ ɨlɨt ɨlɨt amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun da Babilon do nandaŋek bupmɨ kunam yo aŋek but yokwisi aŋek egɨpdaŋ.
Yawe, jɨgɨkon naŋ tagɨ abɨdoki? Yawe, tepmɨsi abɨŋek nak aŋpulugoki.
Ji uŋun yo morap altawit uŋun pɨndakgwit, do uŋun dakon gen bin mɨŋat amɨn morapyo yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokni.
Amɨn morap burɨ kɨlegɨsi toŋ, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop kokdaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu da wasaŋek paŋdetni yoyɨŋ degek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji da tepmɨ madepsi pakdɨsak. Aŋakwan kɨla amɨn, ae mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da manji ɨmɨŋek aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Kɨmagek gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.”
Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn Parisi da kabɨkon nani uŋun da Yesu dakon paŋdetni do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji jap pakbiyo takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat nido aŋ?”
Piŋkop da ɨmal kwakwagɨsi tagɨsi, teŋteŋɨni madepsi, ae gwaljɨgɨ mɨni uŋun mɨŋat do ɨmgut.” (Uŋun ɨmal kwakwagɨsi ae tagɨsi uŋun Piŋkop dakon amɨn da aŋpak kɨlegɨsi awit dakon tɨlak asak.)
Yesu uŋun gen manjɨŋ mudaŋek papia gɨroŋɨgek kɨla amɨn do ɨmɨŋek yɨkgɨt. Yɨgakwan uŋun muwut muwut yutnon amɨn kɨsi dabɨlni Yesukon gɨn taŋakwan yɨkgwit.
Nak Piŋkop dakon nandak nandak kɨnda dɨma wutjɨko tagɨt. Kɨsisi dayɨŋ teŋteŋagɨm. Nak abɨsok but pɨso wagɨl dayɨsat. Do jikon da amɨn kɨnda Tɨpdom do amɨn asak kaŋ, uŋun nak dakon gulusuŋ dɨma.
Mani gak bɨsit ak do nandɨsal kaŋ, yutgokon wɨgɨ yoma sopmaŋek Datgo pasɨlɨ egɨsak uŋun bɨsit iyɨki. Yaŋ aŋaki Datgo yo pasɨlɨ pɨndakdak uŋun da kobogɨ tagɨsi gamdɨsak.
Gak da amɨn yokwi morap sɨbɨt sɨbɨt gɨn yaŋ nandaŋ yomɨŋek mabɨ kwaŋ, do gengo do but dasi galak tosot.
Gapman dakon kɨla amɨn madep mibɨltogɨ Erot da Yesu dakon gen bini nandagɨt. Dɨ da Yesu kaŋek Jon kɨmoron da aeni pɨdagɨt yaŋ yawit, do Erot but morap agɨt.
Iyɨŋakwan uŋudon gɨn Elisabet monjɨ burɨgwan yɨkgɨt uŋun wɨgɨ mok agɨt. Aŋakwan Elisabet Telagɨ Wup da burɨkon pɨgɨ tugaŋban
Yaŋakwa amɨn madep uŋun da bɨkbɨgon Parisi amɨn dɨ akgwit uŋun da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, paŋdetgoni kɨrɨŋɨk yom.”
Piŋkop da nin iyɨ do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt, do namɨn da gen pikon nipjak? Piŋkop da iyɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨlegɨ yaŋ niyɨsak.
Gengo guramɨt do galagɨsi nandɨsat. Aŋpakgo kɨlegɨsi, do egɨp egɨpno aŋkutnoki.
Yesu gen uŋun yaŋek mɨktɨmon ɨlɨp sulek mɨktɨm gat dagapmɨkban neŋak aban dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn da dabɨlon wɨrɨrɨkgɨt.
Nak Jerusalem wɨgɨgɨm bɨsapmon Juda amɨn dakon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨni gat, ae kɨla amɨni gat da uŋun amɨn gen yaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ ɨmɨŋek suŋ agɨt dakon kobogɨ nak da yaŋ dagok aŋapbo kobogɨ yokwi abɨdosak do yawit.
Gɨptɨm morap uŋun arɨp gɨn dɨma. Amɨn uŋun gɨptɨmni ŋwakŋwat, ae bɨt kɨlapyo gɨptɨmni ŋwakŋwat, ae mɨnam gat ae tap kɨlapyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn.
Piŋkop do kuraktok aŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop do butjap madepsi nandawit, mani gak da butjap madepsi pakdɨsal bɨsap kɨlɨ uŋun noman tosok. Abɨsok amɨn kɨmakgwit gen pigokon opni dakon bɨsap. Abɨsok pi monjɨgo do tomni tagɨsi yomdɨsal dakon bɨsap. Uŋun kombɨ amɨn, ae gaga dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ, ae gak dakon man do pasalek ekwaŋ amɨn, uŋun amɨn mani toŋ ae mani mɨni kɨsi do tomni tagɨsi yomdɨsal. Abɨsok mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋupbal awit amɨn, uŋun paŋtasɨk aki dakon bɨsap.”
Yawe da yaŋ aŋakwan but galak nandaŋ ɨmdɨsat. Nak aŋpulugokdɨsak do tagɨsi nandaŋ ɨmdɨsat.
Nak Piŋkop da Saion amɨn kɨnda yabekban abɨŋ Israel amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak do nandɨsat. Yawe da mɨŋat amɨni paŋpulugaŋban aeni tagɨsi egɨpni bɨsapmon, Israel amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Asi, but galaksi egɨpdaŋ.
Uŋun nak dakon yo. Naga dakon galaktok yolek moneŋno tagɨ kokwinɨk dabeŋ. Nak amɨn do yo tagɨsi aŋapbo gak nido nandaba yokwi tok asal?’ ”
Yaŋdo, nin gapman da kobogɨ yokwi aŋnimdɨsak uŋun do pasalek geni guramɨtneŋ. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, butningwan da suŋ kɨnda dɨma aŋek kɨlegɨsi ekwamaŋ yaŋsi nandaneŋ do aŋek geni guramɨtneŋ.
Jems gat Jon gat da uŋun pɨndagek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nit da yondo Kwen Kokup kɨndap da pɨŋ soŋba mɨni ani do tagɨ nandɨsal?”
Pol Sabat morapmon Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yutnikon wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨkwan Juda ae Grik amɨn Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do gen emaron da nayɨŋbi gayɨko awit.
Nak dakon bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok yɨpgul. Gak da dabɨlon nak dakon bɨsap yo ɨsalɨ. Amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm yawɨk pɨsosok, amɨn morap uŋun da tɨlak mɨktɨmon bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn ekwaŋ.”
Mani wasok wasogɨkon Piŋkop da amɨn wasaŋek ‘mɨŋat ae wɨliyo kɨsi wasagɨt.’
Yaŋ aba ji nak nolgaŋ do aŋek amɨn kɨsi morap da ji do butjap nandakdaŋ. Mani tebai agek egɨ wɨgakwa bɨsap madepmon wɨgɨsak amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak.”
Ji gen yokwi gat ae top gen gat yoŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdet morapni yɨpmaŋek pasal kɨŋ mudawit.
Ji da jɨgɨ madepsi paŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ tagɨsi egɨpni yaŋon da dɨma yosot. Nin kɨsi tɨlak kaloŋɨkon gɨn egɨpneŋ do nandɨsat.
Amɨn da yaŋ aŋakwa kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da kombɨ gen kɨnda yagɨt uŋun bamɨ toŋ asak. Gen uŋun yaŋ yagɨt: ‘Ji bɨsap morapmɨsi gen nandakdaŋ, mani mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsokdɨsak. Bɨsap morapmɨ dabɨl sɨŋtaŋek kokdaŋ, mani dɨma kaŋba pɨsokdɨsak.
Yawe, butno tapmɨmɨ mɨni aban nandɨsat, do bɨsitno nandaŋek tepmɨsi aŋpulugoki. Dɨma pasɨl nabi. Yaŋ abi kaŋ, amɨn kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit uŋun da tamokon kɨkeŋ.
Ae mɨrak da “Nak dabɨl dɨma, do gɨptɨm dakon dɨwatni dɨma” yaŋ tagɨ yosak, mani uŋun gɨptɨm dakon dɨwatni sigɨn tosok.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun bɨsapmon nani dɨma kɨmagakwa yo morap uŋun kɨsi altaŋ mudokdaŋ.
“Amɨn tagɨni bɨsap dubagɨ egek aeni tobɨl apgut. Abɨŋ moneŋni yomgut uŋun dakon pini niaŋ awit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do yoyɨgɨt.
Kaiapas gen yagɨt uŋun iyɨ da nandak nandagon da dɨma yagɨt. Uŋun bɨlak do mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn egek kombɨ gen yaŋek Yesu da Juda amɨn kɨsi do aŋek kɨmotjak do yagɨt.
Paŋdetni gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandaba pɨsawit. Mibɨlɨ pasɨlɨ tagɨt, do gen uŋun mibɨlɨ nido yosok uŋun dɨma nandaba pɨsagɨt.
Uŋun da yaŋsul sigɨn yaŋ namɨŋek gen yokwisi nayaŋ. Dɨma galak taŋ namɨŋek mam noŋ.
Nolbɨ gak da dubagɨkon dɨma egɨpbeŋ. Telagɨ Wupgo nagon egɨsak uŋun dɨmasi gwayeki.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Joŋ pɨŋan uŋun mɨktɨmgwan yutni toŋ. Ae mɨnam kwen akwaŋ uŋun yutni toŋ. Mani Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun dɨpmɨn potpot tamoni mɨni.”
Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon Piŋkopni ae Datni uŋun aŋkɨsineŋ. Uŋun Datnin bupmɨ ami, ae amɨn morap jɨgɨ paŋ uŋun butni paŋteban asak dakon Piŋkop.
Ji amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomni, nido uŋun aŋpak da aŋpak morap yapmaŋ mudosok. Ae uŋun da aŋpak tagɨsi morap kɨsi joŋɨkban pi kaloŋɨ aŋ.
Kɨla amɨn madep aŋpak kɨlegɨ asak, uŋun do ɨleŋ madep ae monɨŋɨkon jap bamɨ tagɨsi pani.
Yesu iyɨ gen kɨnda yaŋ yagɨt, “Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda iyɨ da mɨktɨmon amɨn da dɨma nandaba wɨkwan ɨmaŋ.”
Yesu burɨ da bupmɨsi nandaŋek paŋdet kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pigaga jap bamɨ madepsi taŋ pektaŋ, mani pi monjɨ bamɨ pakpak amɨn morapmɨ dɨma.
Parisi amɨn da uŋun amɨn yabekba apgwit.
Pakbi teban morapmɨ naŋek obɨgɨ abɨgɨ aŋ uŋun da tɨlak tap wakgakon agɨpgwit. Ae tap wakga awɨl do aŋtɨdok awit.
Mani nin Yesu komaŋ. Piŋkop da bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok yɨpban aŋelo dakon pɨŋbini egɨpgut. Mani Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek Yesu yabekban mɨŋat amɨn morap dakon tamo abɨdaŋek tepmɨ madepsi paŋek kɨmakgɨt, do Piŋkop da aŋenagek tɨlɨm gɨlgwani tagɨsi gat ae man madep gat ɨmgut.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo gak dakon tapmɨm tɨmɨgek Saion Kabapmon wɨgɨk do but dasi galak toŋ, uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ ani.
But kaloŋ aŋpak uŋun kalbi gɨk sɨtnaŋ Emon Kabap ae Saion Kabapmon moŋ uŋun yombem tagɨsi. Yawe da but kaloŋ ekwaŋ amɨn gɨsamni yomɨsak. Egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni uŋun yomɨsak.
Yaŋban Yesu agek amɨn uŋun abɨdaŋ aŋopni do yoyɨgɨt. Yoyɨŋban kapmat aŋapba Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
Mani amɨn kɨnda gen tebani guramɨkdak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop pakyaŋsi but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek egɨp egɨpni Piŋkopmonsi taŋakwan egɨsak.
Kaŋek madepsi yaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak pɨdaŋ bamaŋ at!” Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun wɨgɨ maŋek wasaŋek kosit agɨpgut.
Uŋun kokupmon uwal dakon gobɨŋni gat, ae pasɨkni gat, ae emat agak sɨbani gat jokgalgɨt. Piŋkop da emat dakon yo morapni paŋupbal agɨt.
Mani Yawe da tapmɨm madepni yolɨk do nandagɨt, ae man bini dɨma mosak do yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨgakwan dɨma yokwi tawit.
Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma. Nin da binapmon daŋgap dubagɨsi kɨnda tosok. Yaŋ tosok do ɨdon ekwaŋ amɨn jikon arɨpmɨ dɨma kɨkɨgɨ, ae uŋudon ekwaŋ amɨn ɨdon arɨpmɨ dɨma obopmɨ.’
Amɨn Tagɨ gak aŋteban ak do gak da kapmatjok egɨsak. Butjap nandɨsak bɨsapmon kɨla amɨn madep madep gat emat wamaŋek obɨsi pabɨŋ yopdɨsak.
(Barabas uŋun kalɨp amɨn kɨnda aŋakban kɨmakgɨt, ae Jerusalem kokup papmon Rom gapman gat emat wamgwit, uŋun do dam tebanon yɨpgwit.)
Mani amɨn mɨrakni mɨni yombem geni dɨma nandaŋ yomɨsat. Nak kadɨm yombem, do aŋtaŋ yok kɨnda dɨma asat.
Jon nawa gen morapmɨ gat kɨsi amɨn dakon but pɨsoni do yoyɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ yomgut.
Amɨn bamot Jon dakon gen nandaŋek Yesu yolgɨmal, kɨnda mani Andru uŋun Saimon Pita dakon padɨge.
Yum nandaŋaki uwalno da nak dɨma abɨdoni. Uŋun topmon da gen yaŋ namɨŋek nak aŋupbal akdo aŋ.
Gak pi amɨnsi dagok do pi tebaisi abi, aŋaki Piŋkop da pigo do nandaban tagɨsi asak. Yaŋ aŋek mayaktok dɨma pakdɨsal, ae Piŋkop dakon gen bamɨ kɨlegɨsi yoyɨŋdetdɨsal.
Ae gɨptɨm dakon dɨwatni mani mɨni yaŋ pɨndakgamaŋ uŋun baŋ kɨla tagɨsi amaŋ. Ae gɨptɨm dakon dɨwatni mayagɨ yaŋ nandamaŋ uŋun baŋ tagɨsi wɨtjamaŋ.
Babɨknin Abraham yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Nak asisi uwalji da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ depbo pasol pasolɨ mɨni egek oman amɨno egɨpdaŋ.
Disi jap morap kɨsi tagɨ noknogɨ yaŋ nandaŋ, mani uŋun amɨn yaŋ dɨma nandɨsak. Nak jap morap kɨsi tagɨ noknogɨ yaŋ nandɨsat. Do nido amɨn kɨnda da jap uŋun noneŋ kaŋ uŋun suŋ amaŋ yaŋ nandaŋakwan jap uŋun yopbeŋ?
Not kabɨ, nak ji da gen pasɨlɨ kɨnda tosok uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandaba pɨsosak do nandɨsat. Yaŋ kaŋ dɨsi do dɨma nandaba wɨgɨsak. Gen pasɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: Israel amɨn dɨwarɨ Piŋkop da but yomani sopgut uŋun yaŋ egɨ wɨgakwa Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ niaŋ da iyɨkon apni do tɨlak yɨpgut uŋun da arɨpmon iyɨkon apdaŋ.
Nit kaloŋɨ ekwamak yaŋ gɨn uŋun amɨn kaloŋɨsi egɨpni, yaŋ do tɨlɨm namgul uŋun kɨlɨ yomgum.
Ae mɨktɨm uŋun Piŋkop dakon kandap yɨpyɨp tamoni, do mɨktɨm da manon genji dɨma yaŋ paŋteban ani. Ae Jerusalem uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ Madep Wɨkwisi dakon kokup papni, do Jerusalem da manon genji dɨma yaŋ paŋteban ani.
Piŋkop iyɨ dakon Monji dɨma aŋkutnaŋek nin morap paŋpulugosak do yabekgɨt. Yaŋ agɨt do yo morap kɨsi but galagon da nimdɨsak.
Gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk taŋakwan niaŋon da notgo ‘Dabɨlgokon jɨmjɨm tosok uŋun paŋ gamdɨsat’ yaŋ tagɨ iyɨki?
Nak dakon notno iyɨ dakon notni gat emat aŋ. Aŋek kalɨp notni gat saŋbek saŋbek awit uŋun tuwɨldak.
Gen bamɨ dɨma nandaŋ yaŋon da on gen dɨma mandaŋ damɨsat. Ji gen bamɨ nandaŋ, ae gen bamɨ da top gen dɨma paŋalon asak yaŋ nandaŋ do aŋek papia on mandaŋ damɨsat.
Pulugaŋ nepmaŋaki neŋak kagagwan dɨma pɨgɨ pasɨlgeŋ. Nak do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ namaŋ amɨn da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ nepmaŋaki pakbi ɨlarɨgwan dɨma pasɨlgeŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋba Pita da tebaisi yaŋek yagɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun yoŋ nak dɨmasi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Top yosot kaŋ, Piŋkop da nak tagɨ aŋupbal asak!” Yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn pup gen yagɨt.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat aeni Jerusalem kɨŋ altawit. Aŋek Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan pɨgɨ agɨpgut. Agakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ, ae gen teban dakon yoyɨŋdet amɨn, ae kɨla amɨn Yesukon opgwit. Obɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit,
gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ anjil.’ Gen yaŋ tosok, do amɨn wam da bamorɨ dɨma, gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ amal.
Uŋun monjɨ mɨni, gwi kaloŋɨ kɨnda gɨn bɨlakni uŋun 12 da tɨlak, uŋun da si kɨmot do agɨt. Yesu yutnikon kɨk do kosiron kɨŋakwan amɨn madepsi, do gɨtni gɨtni aŋakwa kɨgɨt.
Mani, nandamaŋ, yut awaldak amɨn dakon man da yut dakon man yapmaŋdak. Do Piŋkop da Yesu do man madep ɨmgut uŋun da Moses dakon man madep yapmaŋdak.
nido nin kɨsi morap Kristo da ɨŋamon gen pikon atdamaŋ. Agek mɨktɨm gɨptɨmon egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon aŋpak tagɨ bo yokwi agɨmaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon tomni tɨmɨtdamaŋ.
Nak gak dakon mɨŋat amɨnyogo do amɨn yokwi da gen yoŋ uŋudeŋ yoyɨgɨm tam, top yoyɨkom.
Mani gɨptɨm dakon dɨwatni dɨwarɨ mayagɨni mɨni uŋun yum pɨndagapno ɨsal toŋ. Piŋkop da gɨptɨm dakon dɨwatni kɨsi wasaŋ yopmaŋek dɨwatni nin da yo madep dɨma yaŋ pɨndakgamaŋ uŋun do man madep yomgut.
Piŋkop da yo kɨnda ak do nandɨsak kaŋ, arɨpmɨ dɨmasi aŋtɨdok asak.”
Yaŋ yaŋban Sakius da tepmɨ pɨŋ but galak nandaŋek Yesu abɨdaŋban yutnikon wɨgɨgɨmal.
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn gen uŋun nandaŋ japtaŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Epesas nin dakon Atemis uŋun da wukwisi madep!”
Piŋkopno, uwalno da kɨsiron baŋ nak abɨdoki. Kɨlano aŋaki dɨma aŋupbal ani.
Bɨsap awa kaloŋɨ dogɨn moneŋ morap uŋun gat ae tɨlɨm gat uŋun wagɨl tasɨk taŋ mudaŋ.’ “Tap wakga pawɨlgaŋ amɨn morap gat, ae tap wakgakon da mɨktɨm ŋwakŋwarɨkon kwaŋ amɨn morap gat, ae tap wakgakon pi aŋ amɨn morap gat, ae amɨn morap tap ɨdapmon moneŋ ɨlɨt pi aŋ amɨn, uŋun kɨsi Babilon da dubagɨkon agek
Nido, mɨŋat amɨnyo morapmɨ da Kristo dakon tɨlak kɨndap do uwal aŋek aŋpak yokwisi aŋ. Bɨsap morapmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋuden do kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm, ae abɨsok dabɨl pakbino si maŋakwa aŋpak yokwi aŋ uŋun do aeno dayɨsat.
Geni uŋun tuŋon amɨn dakon pakbi emarɨ toŋ yombem. Mɨrakni ɨŋtagɨt, do
Mani amɨn morap not aŋ ɨmɨŋek mani nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon monjɨ gwayonisi ani do yagɨt.
Wɨkwan Mata dakon padɨge mani Maria uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da kandap mibɨlon yɨgek geni nandagɨt.
Nin da nin uŋun pi arɨpmɨ dɨma aneŋ, do nin da yo kɨnda agɨmaŋ yaŋ dɨma yoneŋ. Piŋkop kaloŋɨ dagɨn tapmɨm niban pi uŋun amaŋ.
Uŋun yɨpmaŋek oman monjɨ kɨnda dakon aŋpak yolek amɨn dagaŋek altagɨt.
Mani butno yaworɨ dɨma tagɨt, nido notno Taitus dɨma kagɨm. Do nak Troas kokup pap amɨn galok gen yoyɨŋek Masadonia provinskon kɨgɨm.
Ae oman amɨn kɨnda dakon madepni uŋun nandaŋ gadat amɨn kɨnda kaŋ, oman amɨn uŋun “notno gɨn do geni tagɨ abɨŋ yɨpbeŋ” yaŋ dɨ nandaban. Dɨma, uŋun yaŋsi nandɨsak, “Amɨn uŋun Yesu yolyol amɨn kɨnda, do pini aŋ ɨmɨŋek but dasi galak taŋ ɨbeŋ” yaŋ nandɨsak. Aŋakwan nandak nandak uŋuden da aŋtagap aban pi tagɨsi akdɨsak. Gak bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo aŋpak kɨlegɨ baŋ ani do yoyɨŋ dekgi, aŋek aŋpak gayɨgɨm uŋun ani dosi yoyɨki.
Amɨn kɨnda gulusuŋ agɨt dakon yokwini Piŋkop da wɨrɨrɨk ɨmɨsak, uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak.
Yawe gak kɨlegɨsisi. Ae gen teban morapgo kɨsi kɨlegɨ gɨn.
Gak da nandaŋ yawot aŋ nabi do yaŋ teban tok agɨl, do yaŋsi abi do bɨsit gayɨsat.
Amɨn da gen teban yapmaŋakwa Piŋkop da butjap nandaŋ yomɨsak. (Mani gen teban mɨni kaŋ, gen kɨrɨŋɨt dakon dɨwarɨni mɨni.)
Uŋun nandaŋek kokup kɨnda mani Nasaret, Galili mɨktɨmon tosok, uŋudon paŋkɨ egɨpgwit. Yaŋ aba kombɨ amɨn dakon gen bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Nasaret amɨn yaŋ iyɨni.”
Amɨn do butjap madepsi nandaŋek kobogɨ yokwisi yomdamal dakon gɨldat madep kɨlɨ uŋun abɨk. Namɨn amɨn dasi tapmɨmni uŋun abɨŋ yɨpmaŋek tagɨ egɨpjak?”
Mani jap niaŋen dɨ baŋ nomaŋ uŋun da nin Piŋkop da kapmatjok arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋkɨsak. Jap uŋun dɨma noneŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon uŋun gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma asak. Ae jap uŋun noneŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon dɨma kɨlek toneŋ.
Kɨsɨk kɨsɨknin da madepsi tugaŋ tosak, yaŋ do gen on mandaŋ damamaŋ.
Yesu iyɨ tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek kokup pap yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm tɨm kɨndakon kɨwit, mani Busuŋ Kɨdat. Ibru genon da Golgata yaŋ yoŋ.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak gak gat gen yomak nak uŋun amɨn mani.”
Yut kabeŋ ɨmalnaŋ wasaŋbi uŋun guramɨk awɨlgwit uŋun nak dakon yut dɨma. Dɨsi dakon kokup kɨdatji Molek uŋun dakon yutnaŋ awɨlgwit. Ae kokup kɨdatji Repan uŋun dakon gɨk wup wasaŋek uŋun kɨsi pawɨlek gawak yomgwit. Yaŋ awit do nak da ji dolbo mɨktɨmji yɨpmaŋek Babilon umogap tetgɨn do kɨni.’ ”
Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon kɨnda egɨpgut mani Judas Iskariot. Uŋun da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨkon kɨŋek Yesu kɨsitnikon yɨpjak do yoyɨgɨt.
Dɨwarɨ dam teban yutnon pɨlɨn tukgwan egɨpgwit. Amɨn da nap teban baŋ paŋteban aŋek jɨgɨ yomgwit.
Nak dakon gen nandaŋek burɨkon yɨpmaŋdak uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da saŋbeŋek nandak nandak ɨmdɨsak. Mani geno nandaŋek burɨkon dɨma yɨpmaŋdak uŋun amɨn geno dɨwarɨ nandagɨt uŋun pasɨl ɨmdaŋ.”
Bret Yisni Mɨni dakon bɨsap madep uŋun kwaŋ tagɨt. Uŋun bɨsap do Yapyap Bɨlak yaŋ yoŋ.
Yesu da uŋun wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ aban kaŋek amɨn da yaŋ yawit, “Asisi, Piŋkop da kombɨ amɨn mɨktɨmon yabet do yagɨt oni.”
Mani Yesu da yoyɨŋban opba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nandaŋ, Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ dakon amɨn tagɨ da iyɨ do nandaba wukwanek pi madepsi amɨn do yoba aŋ. Ae geni guramɨk kɨmotni do nandaŋ.
Amɨn kɨsisi mɨrak paŋ egakwa Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Pɨlɨndo Yesu gat paŋdetni gat jap naŋek yɨkgwit. Sunduk da Judas, Saimon Iskariot dakon monji, uŋun da Yesu uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak do nandak nandak kɨlɨ ɨmgut.
Mani tuŋon amɨn da Ip aŋkewalgɨt uŋudeŋ jikon yaŋ gɨn noman tosak do pasoldot. Nandak nandakji upbal taŋba aŋpak gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi gat ae Kristo dogɨn nandaŋek egɨp egɨp uŋun dɨ yɨpmaŋ dekbam.
“Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn tagɨ da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Gak pi monjɨno gen guramɨt tagɨsi agɨl. Aŋek pigo dakon kɨla tagɨsi agɨl. Yo monɨŋɨsok gabo kɨla tagɨsi agɨl, do yo madep gabo kɨla tagɨ aki. Gak apbɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ando.’
Joŋ tɨmon sipsip morapmɨsi ekwaŋ ae galegɨkon wit morapmɨsi kwaŋek toŋ, do yo morap kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek kap yoŋ.
Mani, Yawe dam madepno arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlɨ egɨsak. Piŋkopno da tagɨsi aŋkutnosok.
Uŋun bɨsapmon ji Kristo gat dɨma gadaŋbi. Ji Israel amɨn kabɨ da waŋga egɨpgwit. Piŋkop da yaŋ teban tok aŋek saŋbek saŋbek Israel amɨn gat aŋakwan ji uŋun amɨn kabɨ da waŋga egɨpgwit. On mɨktɨmon egek yo tagɨ kɨnda tosok do don noman tokdɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek jomjom dɨma awit. Ji Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmgwit.
Aŋek on oman monjɨ kurak tok amɨn waŋga abɨgɨ maba pɨlɨn tukgwan pɨgɨsak. Uŋudon kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdɨsak.”
Butjɨk paŋek ekwamaŋ, mani bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwamaŋ. Nin yoni mɨni amɨn da ekwamaŋ, mani amɨn paŋpulugono yo morapmɨsi tɨmɨkgaŋ. Yonin mɨni, mani yo morap kɨsi nin dakon gɨn.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak yaŋsi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban wugɨsak kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn abɨŋ yɨpdɨsak. Aŋek iyɨ do nandaba paŋ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da pawɨgɨkdɨsak. Do takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn uŋun yutnikon tobɨl kɨŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon dɨwarɨni mɨni egɨpgut. Mani Parisi amɨn uŋun dɨma.”
Nak uŋun da binapmon pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ amɨn kɨnda da dɨma agɨt uŋun baŋ agɨm. Yaŋ dɨma agɨm tam, yokwini dakon gen kɨnda dɨma tosok. Mani nak da wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨm uŋun pɨndakgwit, mani nak gat Datno gat kɨsi do nandaba yokwi tok aŋnimaŋ.
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji jap tam galagɨsi pi kagasi toŋ uŋun paŋ kabi 10 kabɨ kokwinɨgek uŋudon baŋ kabi kɨndanaŋ Piŋkop do paret tagɨ aŋ. Mani gen tebanon gen madep madep toŋ uŋun yapmaŋ mudoŋ. Amɨnon gen kokwin kɨlegɨ ani do yosok, ae amɨn bupmɨ nandaŋ yomni do yosok, ae nandaŋ gadat dakon bamɨ aŋpak jikon noman tosak do yosok. Ji uŋun dɨma aŋ. Gen tebanon gen madep madep toŋ uŋun guramɨk mudaŋek paret do yosok uŋun kɨsi guramɨtni kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi.
Gak Piŋkopno. Amɨn yokwi da dɨma abɨdoni yaŋ do gagon obɨŋ pasɨldat. Yaŋ aŋapbo nido manji namɨsal? Nido uwal da abɨŋ nepmaŋakwa butno obɨsi jɨk tosok?
Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋ yutnikon kɨgɨt.
“Nak yutnon dɨma kɨkeŋ, ae dɨpmɨn potpot tamokon dɨma pokgeŋ.
Gɨldatno tagɨ Ubanus do ɨmni. Uŋun pi ɨsalno Kristo dakon pi kaloŋɨ amak. Ae notnosi Stakis kɨsi do gɨldatno tagɨ ɨmni.
Yawe uŋun wukwisi egek amɨn iyɨ do nandaba paŋ amɨn uŋun nandaŋ yomɨŋek kɨlani asak. Mani iyɨ do nandaba wɨgɨsak amɨn uŋun yum dabɨl dagɨn pɨndakdak.
“Nak gagon obɨŋek mɨktɨmon saŋbeŋek dɨma egɨpbeŋ. Mani uŋun amɨn kabɨ da mɨktɨmon sigɨn egɨpdaŋ. Telagɨ Dat, mango tapmɨmɨ toŋsi namgul uŋun naŋ paŋkutnoki. Yaŋ aŋaki nit da kaloŋɨsi ekwamak, uŋun amɨn kabɨ da kaloŋɨsi yaŋ gɨn egɨpni.
Nido on mɨktɨmon nin dakon kokup pap toktogɨ kɨnda dɨma tosok. Mani kokup pap kɨnda don noman tokdɨsak nin uŋudon kɨneŋ dosi nandamaŋ.
Mani amɨn kɨnda nandaŋ gadat aŋakwan Piŋkop da uŋun do amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨsak uŋun amɨn da yaŋ yosok, “Ji dɨsi butjikon da ‘Namɨn da Kwen Kokup wɨgɨsak?’ yaŋ dɨma yoni. Gen uŋun yoni uŋun da Kristo mɨktɨmon abɨk do nandaŋ yaŋ asak.
Gak dakon gen si teban taŋek guramɨk kɨmokgeŋ dosi nandɨsat.
Abraham uŋun Aisak dakon datni. Aisak uŋun Jekop dakon datni Jekop uŋun Juda gat ae peni padɨk padɨkni gat dakon datni.
Kɨlɨ amɨn madep gat ae kɨla amɨn morap dɨwarɨ kɨsi paŋpulugosak do bɨsit ani. Yaŋ aŋek kaŋdo tayaŋgok egek butnin yaworɨ taŋakwa Piŋkop dakon galaktok morap yolek telagɨsi egɨpneŋ.
Gak da gɨptɨm dɨwat morapno kɨsi wasagɨl. Meŋ da butgwan nak uŋungwan wasaŋ mudagɨl.
Gɨldat wɨsagon da si pɨgɨsak tet uŋun dubagɨsi. Uŋun da tɨlak Piŋkop da dɨwarɨnin wɨrɨrɨkban dubagɨsikon toŋ.
“Amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋpulugagɨt da nido iyɨ aŋpulugok do aŋtɨdok asak? On Israel amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madepni ma! Kaŋ tɨlak kɨndapmon da pɨŋban kaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmneŋ.
Yaŋ aŋek amɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan yoni tɨmɨgek kɨŋ ap dɨma ani do yaŋsop aŋyomgut.
Mɨktɨmon amɨn morap gak gawak gamaŋ. Kap yaŋek mango yaŋ aŋkɨsaŋ.”
Geni Jekop do ɨmgut. Nawa geni Israel amɨn do yomgut.
Nin dakon aŋpak yokwinin da Piŋkop dakon aŋpak kɨlegɨsi nomansi aŋteŋteŋ asak kaŋ niaŋ yoneŋ? Piŋkop da yokwinin dakon kobogɨ niban suŋ asal yaŋ tagɨ iyɨneŋ? Uŋun dɨmasi! Uŋun amɨn dakon nandak nandak gɨn. Piŋkop bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ aŋpak kɨlegɨkon da pi dɨma asak kaŋ, niaŋon da mɨŋat amɨn morapyo kokwin akdɨsak?
Wɨsa dagokdosi aeni Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan pɨgakwan amɨn morapmɨ iyɨkon apgwit. Abɨŋakwa Yesu pabɨŋ yɨgek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Bɨsap niaŋ da oman amɨngo nak jomjom sigɨn abeŋ? Yo yokwi aŋ namaŋ amɨn do ni bɨsapmon kobogɨ yokwi aŋ yobi?
Amɨn kɨnda nak teŋteŋɨkon egɨsat yaŋ yosak, mani paŋmuwukbi notni kɨnda do nandaban yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn pɨlɨn tukgwan sigɨn egɨsak.
Amɨn but kalɨp aŋpagon ekwaŋ uŋun but kalɨp dakon galaktok baŋgɨn yolgaŋ, mani amɨn Telagɨ Wupmon ekwaŋ uŋun Telagɨ Wup dakon galaktok yolgaŋ.
“Nin kɨŋ dam teban yut dakon yoma kono beŋgan tebaisi abi, ae obip amɨn yoma domon akba pɨndamaŋ, mani yoma wɨtdal wɨgɨ amɨn kɨnda dɨma ekwan kamaŋ.”
Sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn yokwi moneŋ do nandaŋek pi asak uŋun sipsip dakon ami dɨma, do joŋ pɨŋan abɨsak bɨsapmon si pasalek sipsip yopmaŋ kɨsak. Yopmaŋ kɨŋakwan joŋ pɨŋan da obɨŋ sipsip dapmaŋ nok do aŋakwan waseŋ kwaŋ.
Ae Piŋkop da mɨŋat do nandaŋek wɨli dɨma wasagɨt. Wɨli do nandaŋek mɨŋat wasagɨt.
Yesu telagɨ yut nagalgwan egek amɨn yoyɨŋ degek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn da gen kɨnda yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Kristo uŋun Dewit dakon yawi dɨwatni.’ Mibɨlɨ nido yaŋ yoŋ?
Tap madepsi tamalɨgakwan tarak madepsi aŋek ɨleŋ oba paŋkwakwalɨtjak kaŋ, nin uŋun do dɨma pasolneŋ.
Uŋun da Juda amɨn dakon gen teban gat ae gen tebani monɨŋ monɨŋ dɨwarɨ morap gat kɨsi wɨrɨrɨk mudagɨt. Uŋun da amɨn kabi bamorɨ paŋmuwukban amɨn kaloŋɨ kɨnda kalugɨ asak uŋun do aŋek yaŋ agɨt. Yaŋ aban but kaloŋ agɨmaŋ.
Pol saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak kɨŋ gɨldat binap 12 kilok da tɨlagon Damaskus aŋkapmat aŋapbo teŋteŋɨ madep kɨnda Kwen Kokup da pɨŋ aŋbinap aban nak binapmon akgɨm.
Jon pini aban mudok do aŋakwan yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, ‘Ji nak do namɨn yaŋ nandaŋ? Nak ji da jomjom aŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn dɨma. Mani nandani, amɨn wukwisi kɨnda nak da buŋon noldak. Nak uŋun amɨn dakon pɨŋbisi egɨsat do uŋun dakon kandap gwɨl napni nak da arɨpmɨ dɨma wɨtdalɨ.’
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, yo aeni kalugɨ mudoni uŋun bɨsap madepmon Amɨn Dakon Monji man madep paŋek kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamoni tɨlɨmɨ toŋ uŋudon yɨtdɨsak. Aŋakwan ji nak nolgaŋ amɨn uŋun bɨsapmon kɨla amɨn madep tamo 12 kabɨ uŋudon yɨgek Israel amɨn kabi 12 dakon gen kokwin kɨla agak pi akdaŋ.
Uŋuden amɨn tagɨsi egɨpdaŋ, ae monjɨ gwayoni uŋun da mɨktɨmni abɨdokdaŋ.
Jɨgɨ uŋun aŋmɨlɨp awit do Piŋkop dakon gen da madepsi ɨreŋtaŋ aŋaŋ kɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan Jerusalem kokup papmon Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn madepsi paptaŋ ɨreŋ tawit. Aŋakwa mukwa sogok amɨn morapmɨ da but tobɨl aŋek nandaŋ gadat awit.
Mɨktɨm morap dakon kɨla amɨn madepni emat ak do tagap toŋ. Uŋun muwugek Yawe gat ae amɨn uŋun mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni kɨla asak do bɨt nelak tagal ɨbi amɨn gat pabɨŋ yop do gen yaŋ paŋteban aŋ.
Yaŋdo, nak amɨn kapbɨ uŋun yabekgo mibɨltaŋ jikon obɨŋ paŋpulugaŋba paret uŋun yop do yawit uŋun paŋmuwutni do nandɨsat. Do nin da opneŋ bɨsapmon amɨn da ji but galagon da paret aŋ yaŋ dandani. Nin da teban teban yaŋapno aŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani.
ae joŋ kɨlap gat ae bulmakau ae yo monɨŋ morap egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ gat ae mɨnam gat, ji kɨsisi Yawe aŋkɨsini.
Nak dɨma mandaŋ nal, mani yutgokon si wɨron da wasaŋek mɨŋat on da kandapno mandaŋ nak da sigɨn mandaŋ nosok.
Yawe do pasal ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨ, Yawe aŋkɨsini. Jekop dakon dɨwatni kabɨ, Yawe man madep ɨmni. Israel dakon dɨwatni kabɨ, Yawe gawak ɨmni.
Buŋon paŋdetni bamorɨ da kokup kɨndakon kɨk do kɨŋakwal Yesu da gɨptɨmɨ kulabɨk aŋek altaŋ yoban amɨn ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda yaŋ kagɨmal.
Yaŋban Pita da wasɨp yaŋek yagɨt, “Gak da gen uŋun yosol nak dɨma nandɨsat.”
Nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi morap gat ae nandak nandak tagɨsi morap gat uŋun yo tagɨsi yumaŋ nogɨ wukwisi yombem da Kristokon pasɨlɨ toŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda jap nawitgwan da gen uŋun nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kokupmon yɨgek jap nokdaŋ amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da kɨsitni amɨn uŋun da kwenon wɨtjɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Kɨlek toki do nandɨsat, do pasɨl gamni!” Yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn wudani kɨbɨdaŋakwa gɨptɨmni kɨlek tagɨt.
Mani not dɨwarɨ da nak gok kɨndakon nepmaŋek tɨp dam dakon kosit gwagagon da nap aŋyawot aŋakwa mɨktɨmon pɨgɨgɨm. Yaŋ aŋakwa kɨla amɨn da kɨsiron da pulugaŋ kɨŋek kɨgɨm.
Nagon jɨgɨ noman tak uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ, do paŋmayak aŋek paŋɨŋtok abi. Uŋun iyɨ dakon man pawɨgɨk do aŋek nak abɨŋ nepmaŋgaŋ, do mayaktok yomɨŋek mani pabɨŋ yopbi dosi nandɨsat.
Nak tapmɨmno kɨsi paregek tɨmtɨm yaŋek tɨlagon kɨŋ altaŋek tomnino uŋun abɨdokeŋ do pini asat. Tomni uŋun yaŋ: Nak Yesu Kristo pakyaŋsi nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek Piŋkop dakon yaŋ ɨlɨt yolek Kwen Kokupmon wɨgɨkeŋ.
Piŋkop yaŋsi iyɨni, “Yo morap asal uŋun wagɨl tagɨsisi. Tapmɨmgo uŋun madepsi, do uwalgo da madepsi pasolgoŋ.
Gɨldatno tagɨ Erodion do ɨmni. Uŋun nak dakon dɨwatno kɨnda. Gɨldatno tagɨ Nasisus dakon dɨwatni Amɨn Tagɨ da kabɨkon ekwaŋ uŋun do yomni.
Nak sɨŋgɨŋ da yaŋ mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon yokwisi egɨsat. Ae kalbi dakon mɨnam da kokup amɨn da aŋtasɨk abi do amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon ekwaŋ uŋun da arɨp egɨsat.
Gɨldat gat kanek gat wasagɨt. Toktok teban nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨŋ kɨmokdok.
On amɨn do nak kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm, ‘Amɨn kɨnda nak da buŋon abɨsak uŋun da nak si ŋwapmaŋdak, nido nak dɨma altaŋapbo kɨlɨsi egɨpgut.’
Uŋun amɨn da Juda amɨn nin do galak taŋ nimɨsak, ae muwut muwut yutnin wɨtjɨŋ nimgut.”
Do pakyaŋsi kaŋ kɨmotni. Pi teban aŋek yo abɨdawit uŋun dɨ yɨpmaŋ dekbam. Pakyaŋsi kaŋ kɨmotni kaŋ, uŋun dakon tomni tagɨ tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Jap yet kwaŋek bamɨ tok do aŋakwa joŋ yokwi kɨsi kwaŋ wɨwit.
Kɨŋ Betlehem kokupmon altaŋ egakwal Maria monjɨ altosak dakon bɨsapni apgut.
Tɨlak kɨndapni guramɨgek dɨma noljak amɨn paŋdetno arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpjak.
Yawe dakon tapmɨm madepni da nin paŋpulugaŋban emaron teban tagɨmaŋ! Yawe dakon tapmɨm madepni da yo uŋun agɨt!”
Do gak da butjap nandaŋ yomɨŋek dapbɨ kɨmotni kaŋ tagɨsi. Amɨn yokwi uŋun dapbɨ pasɨlni. Yaŋ aŋaki mɨŋat amɨnyo da gak do Piŋkop, ae Israel amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep, ae dukwan dukwan kɨsi dakon kɨla amɨn madep egɨsal yaŋ nandaŋ gamni.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yokwi amaŋ do gen dɨma yaŋ nimɨsak. Ae butjapni bɨsap dagok dagogɨ mɨni dɨma taŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak.
Nak pulugaŋbi da egɨsat. Nak amɨn kɨnda dakon oman monjɨ dɨma egɨsat. Mani mɨŋat amɨn morapmɨ Kristokon paŋap do aŋek oman amɨni dagagɨm.
Yabekbi kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat ae paŋmuwukbi morap gat da iyɨkon amɨn bamorɨ pɨndakba Pol Banabas gat Antiok kɨni do yawit. Yaŋ yaŋek Judas mani kɨnda Basabas gat ae Sailas gat yaŋ manjɨwit. Uŋun amɨn paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn bamot egɨpgumal.
Bɨsap kɨndakon pakbi ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon mɨŋat amɨnyo aeni yoyɨŋ dekgɨt. Amɨn madepsi da abɨŋ uŋudon muwugakwa Yesu boron wɨgɨgɨt. Boron yɨgakwan amɨn morap ɨleŋɨkon yɨkgwit.
Uŋun kɨsit kɨlda kɨnda, Maria dakon monji. Padɨk padɨkni uŋun Jems, Josep, Judas ae Saimon. Ae samɨni binapninon ekwaŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋek ɨŋtaŋ ɨmɨŋek nandaba pɨŋban ɨmgwit.
Piŋkop da ji iyɨkon gɨn gadaŋek egɨpni do nandɨsak, ae nakyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn nandɨsat. Nak da ji Kristo do manjɨgɨm, mɨŋatjok gɨmoŋɨsi amɨn gat dɨma pakbi amɨn kɨnda pasak do manjɨkbi uŋun da tɨlak ji Kristo do manjɨgɨm.
Amɨn uŋun kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamokon yɨkgɨt, uŋun da yaŋ yagɨt, “Nandani, yo morap abo kalugɨ aŋ mudoŋ.” Aeni saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen on mandaki. Nido gen gayɨsat uŋun bamɨsi. Amɨn morap kɨsi da uŋun do tagɨ nandaŋ gadagɨ.”
Piŋkop da yaŋ iyɨŋban Kaldia mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋek Aran mɨktɨmon paŋkɨ egɨpgut. Paŋkɨ egakwan datni kɨmagakwan Piŋkop da yabekban ji da abɨsok on mɨktɨm ekwaŋon apgut.
Uŋuden amɨn gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma aŋ. Yawe dakon aŋpak baŋgɨn yolgaŋ.
Ae pi aban amɨn gen pikon yopyop dakon bɨsap apdɨsak yaŋ nandani, nido on mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep uŋun kobogɨ yokwi tɨmɨtdɨsak.
Aŋek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nido pasolgoŋ? Sigɨn dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ, ma?”
Amɨn yokwi nɨkba kɨmokgeŋ do jomjom aŋ. Mani, gen tebango do nandaŋ egɨpbeŋ.
Nin Telagɨ Wup kɨlɨ abɨdagɨmaŋ, do nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni do yo tagɨsi morap dɨwarɨ yom do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun gat kɨsi yomdɨsak. Nin Piŋkop da tɨmɨkban iyɨ gat kɨsi egɨpneŋ bɨsapmon yo uŋun tɨmɨtdamaŋ. Aŋek nin Piŋkop dakon tɨlɨm madepni do nandaŋek mani aŋkɨsɨkdamaŋ.
Aŋakwan Kenan mɨktɨmon Piŋkop da mɨktɨm 7 uŋun dakon amɨn paŋupbal aŋek mɨktɨmni Israel amɨn do wagɨl yomgut.
Mani amɨn kabisok kɨnda Sadis ekwaŋ uŋun ɨmalni dakon kɨla aŋek garak dɨma awit. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ dakon aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi, do ɨmal kwakwagɨ paba nak gat tagɨ agɨpneŋ.
Esekia uŋun Manase dakon datni. Manase uŋun Emon dakon datni. Emon uŋun Josaia dakon datni.
Gak notgo dɨma noknogɨ yaŋ nandɨsak amɨn uŋun yokwi aŋ ɨmɨsal bɨsapmon Kristo yo kɨsi yokwi aŋ ɨmɨsal.
Yoni morapmɨ amɨn da yutnon kwoba ɨdapyo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ toŋ. Dɨwarɨ gol ae silwa baŋ wasaŋbi, ae dɨwarɨ kɨndap baŋ wasaŋbi, ae dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm baŋ wasaŋbi. Uŋun kabɨkon dɨwarɨ pi tagɨsi ak do toŋ, ae dɨwarɨ pi ɨsalɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ak do toŋ.
Yo morap don noman taŋ mudaŋakwa nandaŋ gadat ani yaŋ do mibɨltok gen on dayɨsat.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji ɨmalji paŋek lamji koleŋek tagap taŋek egɨpni.
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨkgaŋ uŋun meŋno ae padɨk padɨknoni.”
Yaŋ yaŋek Pita, Jems, ae Jon kɨsi tɨmɨkban kɨwit. Kɨŋ burɨkon jɨgɨ madepsi nandaŋek
Iyɨŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nandani. Gen kagani sopni kaŋ, tɨp da iyɨ yaŋ tɨdokdaŋ.”
Ji but kalɨp aŋpagon egɨpni kaŋ, si kɨmotdaŋ. Mani Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon gɨptɨm dakon aŋpak yokwi pabɨŋ yopni kaŋ, kalugɨ egɨpdaŋ.
Uŋun wit dakon sɨbɨt sɨbɨt wɨrɨrɨt kɨndap kɨrɨŋni kɨsitnikon taŋakwan apdɨsak. Abɨŋek bamɨ kokwinɨk tamonikon yopmaŋek sɨbɨt sɨbɨt wɨrɨrɨk maban kɨndap kɨmot kɨmorɨ mɨni uŋudon sokdaŋ.”
Awuki Sabat bɨsap uŋun abɨŋakwan uŋun kokup pap dakon amɨn morapmɨsi da Piŋkop dakon gen nandak do abɨŋ muwukgwit.
Nido kɨla amɨn madep da mɨŋat tagɨsi yaŋ gandaŋek but dasi galak taŋ gamɨsak. Uŋun amɨn tagɨgo, do man madep ɨmɨŋ kɨmokgi.
Amɨn kɨlegɨ ji butji tagɨsi taŋakwan Yawesi aŋkɨsini. Butji gwaljɨgɨ mɨni amɨn, ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk nandaŋek yaŋ tɨdoni.
Piŋkop dakon aŋpak ak do gɨp dagɨn akdaŋ. Aŋek Piŋkop da egɨp egɨpnikon pi asak dakon bɨkbɨk dɨma ɨmdaŋ. Gak uŋuden amɨn da dubagɨkon egɨpbi.
Yaŋban mɨŋat amɨn morapyo da dabɨlon Yesu aŋkewalno suŋ kɨnda yaŋban abɨdoneŋ yaŋ dakon kosit kɨnda dɨma kawit. Geni kobogɨ yoyɨgɨt do nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi aban tayaŋgok akgwit.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Nak kɨlɨ gayɨgɨm, nak nandaŋ gadaŋ nabi kaŋ, gak Piŋkop dakon tapmɨm madepni kokdɨsal.”
Nak kalɨp jap do abo jap naba nagɨm, ae pakbi do abo pakbi naba nagɨm, ae kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon da apbo but dasi abɨdaŋba yutjikon paŋkɨ egɨpgum.
Yesu kɨŋ Betpage ae Betani paŋkapmat agɨt. Uŋun kokup bamot Ɨleŋ Olipmon tomal. Uŋudon da paŋdetni bamorɨ yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Nak Piŋkop gawak ɨmɨsat. Nak uŋun dakon amɨn. Uŋun dakon aŋelo kɨnda da kalbi abɨŋ nak da kapmatjok agek
Nak toktogɨsi kɨmot da kapmatjok kɨŋ kɨŋ asat. Mani nawa gengo dɨma ɨŋtokeŋ.
Amɨn kaloŋɨ da gen kɨrɨŋɨt aban uŋun do aŋek amɨn morap kɨsi yokwi pakpak amɨn dagawit. Yaŋ gɨn amɨn kaloŋɨ da gen guramɨt aban mɨŋat amɨn morap kɨsi amɨn kɨlegɨ dagokdaŋ.
Aŋelo da Kwen Kokup tobɨl wɨgakwa sipsip kɨla amɨn da notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Nin Betlehem kokupmon wɨgɨ Amɨn Tagɨ da gen niyɨsak uŋun dakon bamɨ kono.”
Erot yokwi kɨnda gat sigɨn saŋbeŋ aŋek Jon dam tebanon yɨpgut.
Kɨŋakwa mɨŋat kɨnda da abɨŋ manjigwan da Yesu dakon ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni ɨleŋɨkon ɨgayɨgɨt. Mɨŋat uŋun dagaŋ mok aŋek yawini maŋakwa egakwan bɨlak 12 agɨt.
Aŋek don Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon nani gat ae Juda amɨn gat ae kɨla amɨni gat kɨsi da yaŋ nandat aŋek Pol gat Banabas gat yokwi aŋ yomɨŋek tɨpbaŋ dap do awit.
Aŋkewalno suŋ kɨnda yaŋakwan gen pikon yɨpneŋ yaŋon da iyɨwit.
Kɨla Amɨn Madep tɨlɨmni toŋsi uŋun namɨn? Uŋun Yawe kaloŋ gɨn. Tapmɨmni madepsi, emaron teban tosok.
Yaŋ aŋek Amɨn Tagɨ da nayɨgɨt, uŋun da tɨlagon uŋun moneŋ baŋ mɨktɨm kwoba wasawit mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda yumaŋ nawit.”
Ae Nikodemus kalɨp Yesu kalbi kɨŋ kagɨt uŋunyo kɨsi uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn apgut. Uŋun yo kɨbaŋɨ toŋ tagɨsi dɨ tɨmɨk paŋapgut. Uŋun kɨndap bamorɨ dakon gawoŋɨ baŋ ɨktagɨlek wasawit. Yo kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi uŋun dakon jɨgɨni uŋun 30 kilo da arɨp.
Ji uwalji do dɨma pasolni. Uwalji do dɨma pasolni kaŋ uŋun da yaŋ yolɨsak: Piŋkop da ji yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ depdɨsak, mani uwalji si pasɨldaŋ.
Yaŋ ak do aŋakwan Pol da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gɨptɨmgo goman dɨ abɨm! Dam teban yutnon amɨn nin kɨsi morap oni ekwamaŋ.”
Do amɨn uŋun mɨŋatjok uŋun pasak kaŋ, uŋun aŋpak tagɨ asak. Mani dɨma pasak kaŋ, uŋun da wagɨl tagɨsi asak.
Kɨŋapno Rom amɨn dɨwarɨ Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn da nin abamaŋ yaŋ nandaŋek nin tɨmɨt do kosiron apgwit. Apba kokup kɨnda mani Apius Maket uŋudon nin amɨn dɨwarɨ gat domdom agɨmaŋ. Ae dɨwarɨ kokup kɨnda mani Yumaŋ Naŋek Pokgoŋ Yut Kapbɨ uŋudon pɨndakgɨmaŋ. Pɨndagek Pol tapmɨm paŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨgɨt.
Uŋun kɨsi tagɨ dɨma abɨŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsini? On amɨn mɨktɨm ŋwakŋwarɨkon nani dagɨn abɨk.”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn monɨŋ kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨŋek egakwan yokwi asak do yabetjak kaŋ, uŋun dakon kobogɨ yokwisi. Yabet dɨma aŋakwan amɨn da wit mɨsɨŋɨt tɨp madep tegɨkon wamaŋ maba tap ɨlarɨgwan pɨgek kɨmotjak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ.
Yo morapji gat ae tɨlɨmji gat kɨlɨ mɨktaŋ mudaŋ. Ae ɨmal morapji yo monɨŋ da kɨlɨ naŋ mudaŋ.
Ji gen pikon kwaŋ uŋun da ji Kristo tagɨ dɨma yolgaŋ yaŋ nolɨsak. Ji yum pɨndagakwa yokwi aŋdamni kaŋ tagɨ. Ae yum pɨndagakwa yo kabɨsi tɨmɨtni kaŋ tagɨ.
Mani amɨn kabɨ kɨnda 40 yapmaŋdak uŋun da jap pakbiyo dɨma aŋek Pol kosiron pasɨlɨkon da aŋatno kɨmagakwan don noneŋ yaŋ aŋteban awit. Yaŋ dɨma aneŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da nin tagɨ nindapjak yaŋ yawit. Do gak dɨma nandaŋ yobi. Gak da geni nandaŋek nandaŋ yobi do sɨŋtaŋ ekwaŋ.”
Ae don Piŋkop da yaŋban pakbi da kulup madep aŋek on mɨktɨm wɨtjɨŋban mɨktɨm obɨsi yokwi tagɨt.
Nak kaloŋgɨn ji dakon Yawe ae Piŋkopji egɨsat. Nak naga Isip mɨktɨmon baŋ ji tɨmɨk paŋopgum. Gen kagasi aŋtaŋ kɨŋakwa upmokgeŋ.
Melkisedek meŋi ae datniyo dakon but pɨsoni dɨma mandabi, ae babɨkni kabɨ yo kɨsi dakon but pɨsoni mɨni. Meŋi da aŋalagɨt bɨsap mɨni ae ni gɨldaron kɨmakgɨt dakon bɨsapni mɨni. Uŋun Piŋkop dakon Monji da yaŋ egɨpgut. Uŋun mukwa sogok toktogɨsi egɨsak.
Yaŋdo, nak mɨktɨmon egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon Yawe gat kaloŋɨ agɨpdeŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋban pɨdaŋ kwen sɨŋtaŋek amɨn bamot dɨma pɨndakgwit, Yesu naŋgɨn kawit.
Ji but kalɨp dakon aŋpagon arɨpmɨsi agɨpgwit, aŋek Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn da aŋpak aŋ uŋun ak do galagɨsi nandawit. Aŋpak uŋun, yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, ae pakbi teban naŋek but upbal agak, ae jap pakbiyo madepsi aŋek pakbi teban morapmɨ naŋek aŋpak yokwi agak, ae aŋpak wagɨl yokwisi kɨnda uŋun kokup kɨdat do gawak yomyom aŋpak, uŋun aŋpak morap awit.
Nido, Piŋkop da nak do yoma kɨnda wɨtdal namɨk da mɨŋat amɨn morapmɨ paŋpulugoko Yesu yolyol amɨn dagoŋ. Mani amɨn morapmɨ da uwal aŋnamaŋ.
Nak jap do abeŋ kaŋ, but pɨso dɨma dayɨkdɨsat. Mɨktɨm madep gat ae yo morap uŋungwan toŋ uŋun kɨsi nak dakon gɨn.
“Kɨsitgo da yokwi aki do gayɨŋban kaŋ, kɨsitgo mandaŋ dagoki. Gwɨnɨmbɨl egek Tɨpdomon kɨndap tebanon pɨgɨki yaŋ do kɨsitgo mandaŋ dagaŋek tagapmɨ egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn aki.
Yokwi pakpak gat egɨp do dɨmasi nandɨsat. Ae uŋun gat yɨt do dɨmasi galak tosot.
Mani ji uŋun nak dakon sipsip kabɨ dɨma, do dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namaŋ.
Not kabɨ, ji Juda amɨn dakon gen teban yɨpmaŋek nak yombemsi dagoni do tebai dayɨsat. Nak naga gen teban yɨpmaŋek ji yombemsi agɨm. Yaŋ aŋapbo ji da gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma aŋ namgwit.
Kɨlɨ aeno kaŋ egapbo aŋelo morapmɨsi dakon geni nandagɨm. Uŋun aŋelo dakon tɨlakni milion morapmɨsi ae tausen morapmɨsi da arɨp. Uŋun aŋelo kɨla amɨn madep yɨtyɨt tamo ae yo egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ ae kɨla amɨn kabɨ baŋ paŋgwasɨŋek akgwit.
Piŋkop, butno aŋkaluk abɨ kɨlegɨsi asak. Butno aŋkaluk abɨ gak naŋgɨn golbeŋ.
Amɨn morap Piŋkop bɨsit iyaŋ uŋun yo tɨmɨkgaŋ, ae yo wɨsaŋ amɨn uŋun bamɨ koŋ, ae yoma domon tɨdoŋ amɨn uŋun wɨtdal yomɨsak.
Piŋkop ji yaŋ damgut uŋun da jikon pi aban uŋun yo morap noman tokdaŋ, nido Piŋkop gen yosok uŋun dɨmasi yapmaŋdak.
“On amɨn yokwi morapmɨsi paŋalon aban komaŋ. On mɨktɨmon kokup kɨsi morapmon Juda amɨn dakon burɨ sugaŋban emat upbalapyo madepsi aŋ. Ae Juda amɨn nin nipmaŋ degek nandaŋ gadat ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda awit. Amɨn da uŋun kabɨ do Nasaret Amɨn yaŋ yoŋ. Uŋun amɨn kabɨ dakon mibɨltok amɨni oni akdak.
Iyɨŋban nandaŋek Yesu paŋdetni gat kɨsi kɨwit.
Yawe, gengo nayɨŋ dekbɨ guramɨk egapbo bɨsapno mudosak.
Ae Piŋkop da yo morap nido wadak wadak aŋ uŋun arɨpjikon damjak, nido Piŋkop dakon yo tagɨsi morap uŋun Yesu Kristokon toŋ, do asi damdɨsak.
Dat, mɨktɨm dɨma noman taŋakwan nak gak gat egek tɨlɨmno taŋ namgut. Abɨsok gak da ɨŋamon uŋun tɨlɨm aego nabi.
Yaŋ yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak uŋun amɨn kɨlɨ kal. Gen gayɨsak amɨn uŋun mani.”
Yesu da mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak naga mɨktɨm dakon teŋteŋɨ. Amɨn kɨnda nak noljak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn pɨlɨn tukgwan dɨma agɨpjak. Egɨp egɨp dakon teŋteŋɨ da uŋun amɨnon tosak.”
Yawe, butjap nandɨsal mani gen tebai dɨma nayɨki. Butjap madepsi nandɨsal mani nak aŋmɨlɨp ak do tepmɨ pi dɨma nabi.
Yaŋ yaŋba Pol muwut muwut tamo yɨpmaŋek kɨgɨt.
Nak si egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon Yawe do kap yokeŋ. Nak mɨktɨmon egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsat uŋun da arɨpmon Piŋkopno sigɨn yaŋ aŋkɨsikeŋ.
Gen tebango tepmɨsi guramɨtdɨsat. Nido, gak da nandak nandak dɨ gat saŋbeŋek namdɨsal.
Mani abɨsok Epaprodaitas naŋ yabekgo jikon tobɨl opjak do nandɨsat. Uŋun notno ae pi ɨsalno. Nit Amɨn Tagɨ dakon emat amɨn ekwamak. Ji da yabekba nagon obɨŋ nak aŋpulugagɨt.
Mani ji yo uŋudenon dɨma abɨŋ altawit. Saion Kabapmon kɨlɨ apgwit. Jerusalem Piŋkop egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ dakon kokup pap Kwen Kokup tosok uŋudon kɨlɨ apgwit. Uŋudon aŋelo tausen morapmɨsi da muwugek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ.
Saimon Pita da emat agak sɨbani ɨlɨk mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman monjɨ dakon mɨragɨ amɨn tet nani mandaŋ dagagɨt. Oman monjɨ uŋun dakon mani Malkus.
Sipsip Monɨŋ da kendol pakbi baŋ papia aŋteban abi 4 uŋun pakdekgɨt. Pakdegakwan nandaŋapbo yo egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ 4 da yaŋ yagɨt, “Gak op.”
Yesu abɨdawit amɨn da Yesu abɨŋ yɨp do jɨgɨlak yaŋ ɨmɨŋek baljawit.
Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek aŋpulugagɨt amɨn uŋun da.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨŋ aŋpak yaŋ gɨn abi.”
Nak Piŋkop Wukwisi do yaŋ tɨdosot. Uŋun da aŋpulugaŋban galaktokni tagɨ yolgeŋ.
Uŋun da nak dakon gen abɨdaŋek dayɨŋ teŋteŋaŋban uŋun da nak dakon tɨlɨm madepno akdɨsak.
Gak da nak yokwikon naŋ abɨdoki do jomjom aŋek butjɨksi nandɨsat, aŋek tapmɨmno mɨnisi ayɨŋ. Mani gengo da nak tagɨ aŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban taŋek jomjom asat.
Tɨmɨgek dɨwarɨ iyɨ do yopmaŋakwan mɨŋatni uŋun kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨt. Aŋek kɨsisi paŋabɨsat yaŋ top yoyɨŋek moneŋ dɨwarɨ gɨn yabekbi kabɨ do yomgut.
Gak da tap ɨdap tapmɨmɨ toŋ uŋun kɨla asal. Tap ɨdap si pɨdosok bɨsapmon gak da abɨŋ yɨpmaŋaki wayɨŋ dɨma asak.
Amɨn morap mani egɨp egɨp papiakon dɨma toŋ uŋun kɨsi maba pakbi ɨdap kɨndap sosok uŋudon pɨgɨwit.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek kɨsit kandapyoni yolɨgɨt.
Kalɨp nin morap kɨsi uŋun amɨn kabɨ gat egɨpgumaŋ. Nin but kalɨpnin dakon galaktok yokwi ae nandak nandak yokwi yolgumaŋ. Yaŋsi egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon Piŋkop da tomni yokwisi mɨŋat amɨn morap aŋpak uŋudeŋ aŋ da abɨdoni do aŋnoman agɨt uŋun abɨdogɨ.
Yaŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesu aŋkewal do aŋek iyɨŋba wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda aŋakwan, asi Piŋkop da yabekban pɨgɨt da pini asak yaŋ kok do nandawit.
Tɨlɨmni uŋun madepsi, do uŋun da Yawe dakon wasokni do nandaŋek kap yoni dosi nandɨsat.
Piŋkop dakon gen guramɨkgaŋ amɨn uŋun nak dakon meŋno ae padɨk padɨkno ae samɨno kabɨ.”
Gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ nak do yaŋ asal. Pakbi da ɨgek mɨktɨm morap kɨsi wutjɨsak, uŋun da tɨlak amɨn da nak aŋgwaseŋ.
Yaŋba Amɨn Tagɨ da yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji uŋun mastat yet yombem monɨŋɨsisok taŋ damjak kaŋ, on kɨndap pɨlɨgɨ tap kagagwan pɨgɨsak do iyɨŋba genji tagɨ guramɨtjak.”
Aŋek mɨŋat yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gen yaŋbɨ nandaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmamaŋ. Mani uŋun dogɨn dɨma. Nin da nin iyɨ dakon gen nandaŋek yaŋsi nandamaŋ, uŋun amɨn asi mɨktɨm amɨn morap yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn yaŋ nandamaŋ.”
Mani Yawe, gak dakon tapmɨmgo uŋun pɨdaŋbisi. Tap pakbi madepsi tamalɨkgaŋ uŋun dakon tapmɨm yapmaŋdak, ae ɨleŋɨkon tɨdoŋ uŋun dakon tapmɨm yo kɨsi yapmaŋdak.
Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak on gen yoŋ nandɨsal?” Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen yoŋ uŋun nandɨsat, mani ji gen kɨnda tosok uŋun dɨma manjaŋ? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Gak mɨŋat monjɨyo gat ae monjɨ ŋakŋak gat paŋtagap aŋaki mango yaŋ aŋenokgoŋ.’ ”
“Amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋat pakpak dakon soŋnogon yaŋ gaban kɨki kaŋ, tamo mibɨltogɨ nanikon dɨma yɨkgi. Tamo uŋun amɨn madep kɨnda gak gwapmaŋdak uŋun do manjɨkbi naŋ dɨ yɨkbɨm.
Nandani, nak tɨlak kɨnda abeŋ. Bɨsap morapmɨ sɨkak mosok, aŋakwan mɨktɨm da sɨkak abɨdaŋek pi awit amɨn paŋpulugaŋek jap tagɨsi paŋalon aŋ yomjak kaŋ, Piŋkop da on mɨktɨm do yo tagɨsi asak.
Aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨm, ‘Israel dakon kɨla amɨn madep noman taŋ noman taŋ ani uŋun gak da kabɨkon dagɨn noman tokdaŋ. Babɨkon da babɨkon gak da kabɨkon nani kɨnda da kɨla amɨn madep yɨyɨt tamokon yɨtdɨsak.’ ”
Dabɨlni abɨ pɨlɨn tuk ani, aŋek yo saŋbeŋek dɨma pɨndatni. Manji paŋupbal abɨ tebai dɨma atni dosi nandɨsat.
Egakwal Pol Atens kokup papmon pɨgɨ altaŋek iyɨ gat pɨgɨwit amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji tobɨl Beria wɨgɨ Timoti gat Sailas gat yoyɨŋba tepmɨ pɨnjil.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban wɨgɨwit.
Ji uŋun yumabi mɨŋat da amɨn do aŋpak yokwisi niaŋ aŋyomgut, uŋun aŋpak yaŋ gɨn aŋ ɨmni. Uŋun da pakbi teban tebaisi kapmon wasagɨt.
Nak bulmakau wɨli bo meme ji da nagalon baŋ tɨmɨt do dɨma nandɨsat.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Stiwen da odeŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Not ae dat kabɨ, nandani! Datnin Abraham uŋun Aran mɨktɨmon dɨma kɨŋ egek Mesopotemia mɨktɨmon egɨpgut bɨsapmon Piŋkop tɨlɨmni uŋun Abrahamon altaŋ ɨmgut.
Yaŋban iyɨ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kobogɨ ni gen kɨnda naŋ iyɨneŋ? ‘Piŋkop da yabekgɨt’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, gen tebai yaŋ niyɨsak, ‘Ji nido dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit?’
Yapyap Bɨlagon amɨn Piŋkop gawak ɨm do Jerusalem egɨpgwit uŋun bɨkbɨkgwan Grik amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsi egɨpgwit.
Yaŋba gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda mani Yesu yaŋ iyaŋ uŋun da mɨktɨm baŋ neŋak wasaŋek dabɨlnokon wɨrɨrɨgek yaŋ nayɨk, ‘Gak kɨŋ Silom Pakbi Ɨdapmon pakbi soki.’ Yaŋ nayɨŋban kɨŋ pakbi soŋek dabɨlno kɨlek taŋban yo pɨndat.”
Piŋkop da dabɨlon gak dakon but tagɨ dɨma tosok do Piŋkop dakon pi amaŋ uŋun gak gat arɨpmɨ dɨmasi agagɨ.
Nido but yokwi nandɨsat? Nido butno jɨk tosok? Nak Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadaŋek uŋun da yokwikon baŋ kukwaŋ nepjak do jomjom abeŋ. Uŋun Piŋkopno, do aeno mani yaŋ aŋkɨsikeŋ.
Don Peor mɨktɨmon kokup kɨdat Bal gawak ɨmɨŋek kokup kɨdat egɨp egɨpmɨ mɨni uŋun do paret abi uŋun nawit.
Piŋkop, gak da nin manji kɨlɨ nimgul, ma? Nin dakon emat amɨn dɨma paŋpulugok do nandɨsal, ma?
“Nayɨŋban iyɨgɨm, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, nak ninaŋ abeŋ?’ “Gen uŋun yoko Amɨn Tagɨ da nayɨgɨt, ‘Gak pɨdaŋ Damaskus kokupmon pɨgaki amɨn kɨnda da pi morap aki do yaŋ mudaŋ gamgum uŋun do gayɨsak.’
Aŋek Jon dakon paŋdetni da kɨŋ Jon yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yoyɨŋdet, amɨn uŋun Jodan Pakbi terɨ kɨnda gak gat egek mibɨlni yaŋbɨ nandagɨmaŋ, abɨsok amɨn kɨsisi da uŋun amɨnon kwa telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomɨsak.”
Ae mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da yaŋ mudaŋ ɨmgwit da ɨdon apgut. Abɨŋ amɨn mango yaŋek bɨsit aŋ amɨn uŋun tɨmɨk dam tebanon yop do apgut.”
Papia on mandaŋek yaŋsi nandɨsat, gak da nak dakon gen on guramɨtdɨsal. Nak nandɨsat, Onesimus do aŋpak akdɨsal, uŋun da aŋpak abi do gayɨsat uŋun yapdɨsak.
Nak ji do tɨlak gen dayɨkdɨsat. Nak da yo kalɨpsigwan noman tawit uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ do yokdɨsat.
Yo mɨŋat da agagɨ kɨlɨ aban dagak. Nak kɨmokgo gapmakon nepni do uŋun mɨŋat da pakbi kɨbaŋɨ toŋ naŋ kɨlɨ soŋ namɨk.
Pol gat dabɨni gat Ampipolis kokupmon kɨŋ altawit. Kokup uŋun yɨpmaŋek Apolonia kokup papmon kɨŋek Tesalonaika kokup papmon kɨŋ altawit. Uŋun kokup papmon Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut kɨnda tosok.
Gen kokwin asak amɨn da uŋun amɨn gulusuŋni toŋ yaŋ kosak. Ae uŋun amɨn dakon bɨsitni kɨsi dɨwarɨni toŋ yaŋ kosak.
Nak Pol, Yesu Kristo dakon yabekbi kɨnda. Piŋkop da iyɨ da galak togon yabekbi pi abeŋ do nak manjɨgɨt. Nak gat ae notnin Timoti gat nit da
Yawe emaron teban tagɨt uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok agɨt. Aŋpakni kɨlegɨ yolɨŋban mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn kɨsi da kawit.
“Gen teban gat ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen gat yaŋ teŋteŋaŋba Jon da bɨsapmon wugɨt. Mani Jon da bɨsapmon da wasaŋek Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋoŋ. Aŋakwa amɨn uŋungwan pɨgɨk do pi tebaisi aŋ.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jerusalem kɨŋ altawit. Kɨŋ altaŋek Yesu Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan pɨgɨ pɨndakban amɨn moneŋ ɨlɨt pi awit. Uŋun wasaŋek amɨn yolban waŋga abɨgɨwit. Yaŋ aŋek moneŋ kulabɨk awit amɨn dakon tamo, ae mɨnam baŋ moneŋ ɨlɨt awit amɨn dakon tamo uŋun kɨsi paŋtobɨlban tagal kɨwit.
Amɨn Tagɨ iyɨ dakon gen dayamaŋ uŋun yaŋ: Amɨn Tagɨ tobɨl apjak bɨsapmon nin kalugɨ ekwamaŋ amɨn da amɨn kɨmakbi mibɨl taŋ yomɨŋek dɨma kɨkdamaŋ.
Piŋkop gen papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Nak Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgum, do yaŋ teŋteŋok agɨm.” Ae yaŋ gɨn ninyo kɨsi nandaŋ gadat amaŋ, do yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ.
Piŋkop uŋun kokwin agakni uŋun kɨlegɨsi, do ji da pi tagɨsi awit uŋun do dɨma ɨŋtokdɨsak. Ji Piŋkop but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek uŋun da paŋtagap aban mɨŋat amɨni paŋpulugawit. Ae yaŋ gɨn sigɨn aŋ.
Yo morap dɨma altaŋakwa wasok wasogɨkon Gen uŋun egɨpgut. Gen uŋun Piŋkop gat egɨpgumal, ae Gen iyɨ Piŋkop uŋun.
Pup da pudɨgɨ pɨrɨgwan wutjaŋ uŋudeŋ Yawe da tagɨsi aŋkutnosak. Uŋun toktok teban kɨlago aŋek pasɨkgo asak.
‘Kɨla amɨn pini tapmɨmɨ toŋsi aŋek ain win kɨrɨŋ naŋ uwalni pudaŋ monɨŋ monɨŋ akdɨsak, amɨn da mɨktɨm kwoba pudaŋ monɨŋ monɨŋ aŋ uŋun da tɨlagon akdɨsak.’ Datno da yaŋ mudaŋ namgut, uŋun da tɨlak uŋun amɨn do yaŋ mudaŋ ɨbeŋ.
Gɨldat kɨnda do Jon gat paŋdetni bamorɨ gat uŋudon gɨn akgwit.
Kwen Kokup Datji gwaljɨgɨ mɨni kɨlegɨsi egɨsak, do jiyo yaŋ gɨn gwaljɨgɨ mɨni kɨlegɨsi egɨpni.”
Juda amɨn da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak dakon bɨlakgo 50 dɨma aŋakwan gak da nak Abraham kagɨm yaŋ yosol, ma?”
Ji paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨ do but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ yaŋ yolɨkdo, kɨsitni ɨlɨgek si bedoni. Kristo dakon paŋmuwukbi morap da gɨldatni tagɨ yɨpba jikon obɨsak.
Uŋun amɨn aŋpakgo kɨlegɨ do gɨldat kɨnda kaloŋ uŋun do nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek mango aŋkɨsaŋ.
Paŋmuwukbi da muwut muwuron mɨŋat gen yoni kaŋ uŋun mayagɨ, do gen kɨnda dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do kaŋ, yutnikon eni baŋ yoyɨŋba tagɨ yoyɨni.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da aŋpakno kokwinɨgek abɨŋ nepmaŋba kobogɨ do gen uŋuden baŋ yoyɨsat.
Butno madepsi jɨk tosok, do nak gak do nandɨsat. Nak Jodan Pakbi tet do ae Ɨleŋ Emon ae Ɨleŋ Misa uŋudon egek aeno nandaŋ gamɨsat.
Mani amɨn bamot da kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Pɨlɨn tokdɨsak do gak nit gat egɨpneŋ.” Yaŋ iyɨŋbal amɨn bamot gat kɨsi yutnon wɨgɨwit.
Uŋun bɨsapmon gɨn Yesu amɨn sotni mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ taŋ yomgwit uŋun paŋmɨlɨp aŋek koŋni taŋ yomgwit uŋun yol yomgut. Ae dabɨlni mɨni morapmɨ paban pɨsawit.
Jerusalem, nak gak do ɨŋtokeŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da nak aŋɨŋtok aban saŋbeŋek gita dɨma tɨdokeŋ.
Amɨn mɨrakni toŋ da Telagɨ Wup da paŋmuwukbi do gen yosok uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani. Amɨn kɨnda emaron teban tosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn kɨmot da ae kɨnda gat arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋupbal asak.”
Ae nin notnin kɨnda gat yabetno amɨn bamot gat kɨsi kwaŋ. Bɨsap morapmɨ pi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨkon aŋkɨlɨk kono pi but dasi aban kagɨmaŋ. Uŋun ji da pi tagɨsi akdaŋ yaŋsi nandɨsak, do pi uŋun ak do galagɨsi nandɨsak.
Ji mɨktɨm amɨn da tɨlagon dɨma egɨpni. Ji yum kaŋakwa Piŋkop da nandak nandakji paŋkaluk aban aŋpakji kɨsi kalugɨsak. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, Piŋkop dakon galaktokni tagɨ nandaba pɨsokdɨsak. Aŋek aŋpak tagɨsi gat, ae aŋpak Piŋkop da si galak tosok gat, ae aŋpak gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi uŋun tagɨ nandaba pɨsokdɨsak.
ae tagɨsi ekwaŋ amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok nandak nandak, ae pakbi teban naŋek but upbal aŋpak, ae kwen wɨgɨk aŋek gen papmon da yaŋ tɨdok aŋpak, ae aŋpak yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ odeŋ. Nak nawa gen kɨlɨ dayɨgɨm, ae abɨsok uŋun gen kaloŋ baŋgɨn yosot: mɨŋat amɨn morap aŋpak uŋudeŋ aŋ, uŋun Piŋkop da kɨla asak da kagagwan arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨkdaŋ.
Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ gen kokwin aŋyomɨŋek madepsi dapban kɨmotdaŋ. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨla amɨn madep madep obɨsi pabɨŋ yopdɨsak.
Piŋkop, nak gak da telagɨ yutnon wɨgɨgɨm bɨsapmon nandak nandakno pɨsagɨt. Aŋek amɨn yokwikon yo noman tokdaŋ uŋun do nandako pɨsagɨt.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek egɨpni.
Yawe, apbi. Yum pɨndagaki mɨktɨm amɨn da teban taŋek dɨma abɨŋ gepni. Mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn dɨma nandaŋ gamaŋ uŋun gaga da ɨŋamon yopmaŋek gen kokwin aŋ yobi.
Amɨn kokup kɨdat gawak yomɨŋek paŋkɨsaŋ uŋun mayak tok paŋ. Kokup kɨdat, ji Yawe gawak ɨmni.
nin da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsit pi ae Piŋkop gen yaŋ teŋteŋok pi gɨn aneŋ.”
Nin dakon man dɨma pawɨgek, emat ani do amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon but dɨma sugoneŋ. Ae tagɨsi ekwaŋ amɨn do nandaba yokwi tok nandak nandak dɨma aneŋ.
Saion kokup pap amɨn gat, ae Juda mɨktɨmon kokup pap taŋ aŋaŋ kwaŋ uŋun dakon amɨn gat da uŋun nandaŋek, gen kokwin tagɨsi asal uŋun do but galak nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ.
Amɨn iyɨ do nandaba paŋ uŋun kositni kɨlegɨ yolɨsak, ae aŋpakni kɨlegɨ yoyɨŋ dekdak.
Uŋun da kokup papji dakon wigat paŋteban aŋek amɨn kabɨgo gɨsam yomɨsak.
Aŋek yaŋ teban tok awit uŋun yapmaŋgaŋ, do gulusuŋni taŋ yomɨsak.
Yaŋdo, japmon notno yokwikon yɨpbeŋ kaŋ, nak buŋon bɨt kɨlapyo dɨmasi nokeŋ. Yaŋ aŋek notno yokwikon dɨ yɨpbom.
Yaŋ iyɨŋba Yesu gat kɨsi kɨwit. Kɨŋ yutni aŋkapmat aŋakwa mibɨltok amɨn da notni dɨ yabekban obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mibɨltok amɨn da gak do yaŋ yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, pi madep dɨma gabeŋ. Nak amɨn pɨŋbisi, do nak da yutnon wɨki uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak.
Yesu da tɨmɨsok dɨ kɨŋek Jems, Sebedi dakon monji gat padɨge Jon gat pɨndakgɨt. Uŋun bamot boron yɨgek tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni bɨsawɨk paŋmɨlɨp aŋyo aŋakwal pɨndakgɨt.
Kɨla amɨn, ji oman monjɨsi aŋpak tagɨsi ae kɨlegɨsi baŋ aŋyomni. Dɨsi nandaŋ, jiyo kɨsi oman monjɨ egakwa Kɨla Amɨnji Kwen Kokup egɨsak.
Nandaba kɨkji yɨpmaŋek Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun wɨsɨŋ kok do pi ani. Yaŋ aŋakwa yo dɨwarɨ do wadak wadak aŋ uŋun kɨsi damdɨsak.”
Nak butno yaworɨ taŋakwan Yawe da aŋpulugosak do jomjom agɨm. Aŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋapbo nak da tetgɨn do tobɨlek tekno nandagɨt.
‘Tɨpdomon namat dɨma kɨmokgoŋ, ae kɨndap dɨma kɨmokdok.’
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Gerasa mɨktɨm tetgɨn kɨŋ altawit. (Gerasa mɨktɨm uŋun terɨ kɨnda taŋakwan Galili mɨktɨm uŋun pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda tosok.)
Mani kaloŋɨ dɨma pagek egɨ wɨgɨ Maria da monjɨ wɨli kɨnda aŋalagɨt. Aŋalaŋban Josep da mani Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt.
Mani nak do amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ nayɨki do nandaŋ amɨn, uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk dakon yaŋ tɨdok aŋek burɨ tagɨsi toni dosi nandɨsat. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ yaŋ yoni, “Yawe uŋun mani wukwisi! Oman amɨni tagɨsi egɨpjak do but galaksi nandɨsak.”
Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae gen kokwin amɨn kɨsi morap gat da yaŋ nandawit, amɨn dɨ yaŋ yomno abɨŋ Yesu top gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋek gulusuŋ agɨt yaŋ yaŋakwa aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ nandawit, mani Yesu suŋ kɨnda dɨma agɨt yaŋ kawit.
Mani Juda amɨn kalɨp Piŋkop da iyɨ Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan pɨgɨni do manjɨkbi uŋun maban pɨlɨn tukgwan pɨgɨkdaŋ. Uŋungwan kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdaŋ.”
On man sɨlɨp uŋun Yesu Kristo dakon babɨkni dakon man sɨlɨp. Yesu uŋun Dewit da kabɨkon nani. Aŋakwan Dewit uŋun Abraham da kabɨkon nani.
Yawe, amɨn tagɨsi butni kɨlegɨ uŋun amɨnon aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyobi.
Ji mɨktɨm amɨn da tɨlagon egɨpni kaŋ, mɨktɨm amɨn da notnin dɨ yaŋon da but dasi galak taŋ damdaŋ. Mani ji on mɨktɨm dakon amɨn dɨma. Nak da ji on mɨktɨmon baŋ kɨlɨ manjɨŋ depgum. Uŋun do aŋek mɨktɨm amɨn da nandaba yokwi tok aŋdamaŋ.
Piŋkop Dat da man madep ɨmɨŋek, teŋteŋɨ tagɨsi uŋun ɨban noman taŋ ɨmgut. Aŋek Piŋkop iyɨ Kwen Kokup teŋteŋɨ madepsi tosok uŋudon da Yesu do yaŋ yagɨt, “On Monjɨno, but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat ae but galaksi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat.”
“On mɨŋat amɨn kabɨyo nin gat gɨldat kapbɨ ekwamaŋ. Kɨlɨ japni kɨsi naŋ mudaŋ, do bupmɨ nandaŋ yomɨsat.
gak uŋudon egɨpdɨsal gɨn. Aŋek kɨsitgo da nak abɨdaŋek kosit nolɨkdɨsal. Tapmɨmgo madep, do nak aŋpulugokdɨsal.
Aŋpakgo kɨlegɨ uŋun toktogɨsi taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdaŋ. Ae nawa gengo uŋun bamɨsi.
Yaŋ yaŋba Pol da geni kobogɨ yoyɨk do agɨt. Mani Galio da Juda amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Juda amɨn, on amɨn Rom gapman dakon gen teban kɨnda yapgut, bo ae aŋpak yokwi kɨnda agɨt kaŋ, ji dakon gen tagɨ nandakeŋ.
“Ji da amɨn yabekba Jonon kwa Jon da nak do yaŋkwok bamɨsi agɨt. Mɨktɨm amɨn kɨnda da nak dakon gen aŋteban asak uŋun da yo madep dɨma asak. Mani ji yokwikon baŋ pulugaŋ kɨni yaŋ do Jon da yaŋkwok agɨt uŋun do dayɨsat.
Pakbi madep ji kɨsit tɨdoni. Kabap ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek kap yoni.
Saion kokup pap uŋun yokwi tak, mani oman amɨngo da yut agak tɨp morapni do but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ. Abɨsok yokwi tak, mani kosit madepni dakon kɨmbabaŋ pɨndagek uŋun da but yokwi yomɨsak.
Asi, Piŋkop da Pita do tapmɨm ɨban Juda amɨnon yabekbi pi asak, yaŋ gɨn nak do tapmɨm naban Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon yabekbi pi asat.
Nandani! Yoni morapmɨ amɨn ji do gen yɨpmaŋdat. Kunam tagek yaŋ tɨdoni! Nido jɨgɨ madepsi da jikon noman taŋ damdɨsak.
“Mani yaŋ dayɨsat, gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon ɨsal dogɨn gen yum yawit amɨn morap Piŋkop da mibɨlɨ nido yawit uŋun do yoyɨŋban kobogɨ iyɨŋ iyɨŋ akdaŋ.
Gak aŋpak yokwi morap do manji yomɨŋek aŋpak tagɨ baŋgɨn abi. Yaŋ abi kaŋ, dagok dagogɨ mɨni mɨktɨmon tagɨsi egɨpdɨsal.
Juda amɨn morapmɨ Yesu Betani kokupmon egɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek uŋudon apgwit. Yesu kok do gɨn dɨma, Lasarus kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt uŋunyo kɨsi kok do apgwit.
Dɨpmɨn potpot tamokon pagek obɨsi pak ɨŋtosot. Ae don pɨdaŋek tagɨsi egɨsat, nido Yawe da kɨlano tagɨsi asak.
Kalbi emat amɨn gen uŋun guramɨgek Pol abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ kokup pap Antiparis uŋudon aŋkɨwit.
Nandak nandaknokon gen tagɨsi morapmɨ toŋ. Nak kap on mandaŋ yobo kap yoŋ amɨn da kɨla amɨn madep do yaŋ ɨmni. Gen kagano uŋun kɨlda mandak tagɨsi dakon kɨlda mandak yombem.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Pita yoma sigɨn tɨdaŋban nandaŋek yoma wɨtdalek Pita kaŋek but morap awit.
Bɨsap kɨndakon gɨldat tobɨl do 3 kilok burɨ pɨsaŋakwan dɨpmɨn yombem kɨnda kagɨt. Kaŋakwan Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kɨnda yutnon wɨgɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Konilias!”
Yokwi yaŋ egek Yawe do yaŋ tɨdaŋba jɨgɨni uŋun wɨrɨrɨkban pasɨlgwit.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Pita da Yesu iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, nin ɨdon egɨp do tagɨsi nandamaŋ. Gak da tagɨ yaŋ nandabɨ kaŋ, nak da yut kabeŋ kapbɨ abeŋ. Kɨnda gak do, kɨnda Moses do ae kɨnda Elaija do abeŋ.”
Uŋun kalɨpsigwan yo morap dɨma altaŋakwa Piŋkop gat egɨpgumal.
Yaŋba Yesu da paŋdet kabɨni pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn iyɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma ani, mani Piŋkop da yo morap ak do tagɨ asak.”
Jɨgɨ noman taŋ namgwit bɨsapmon Yawe do yaŋ tɨdoko bɨsitno nandaŋ namgut.
Aŋek yokwini wɨrɨrɨk yom do nak uŋun gat saŋbek saŋbek kɨnda abeŋ.”
Obip amɨn uŋun kaŋ pasal nɨmnɨmɨk maŋ pagek kɨmakbi yombem awit.
Notnin Apolos dakon gen uŋun yaŋ. Not dɨwarɨ ji dandak do kɨwit bɨsapmon uŋun gat kɨni kaŋ tagɨsi yaŋ iyɨgɨm. Mani uŋun bɨsapmon op do dɨma galak tagɨt. Iyɨ gwagak kaŋek don obɨŋ dandɨsak.
Jon telagɨ pakbi sogɨt bɨsapmon, Piŋkop da yabekban pi agɨt bo amɨn da yabekba agɨt?” Yaŋban iyɨ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “ ‘Piŋkop da yabekgɨt’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, gen kobogɨ yaŋ niyɨkdɨsak, ‘Yaŋ kaŋ ji nido dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit?’
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban emat wasagɨt amɨn da Moses ukwayɨkban kɨŋakwan yaŋ iyɨgɨt: ‘Namɨn da kɨla amɨn ae gen kokwin amɨnin gepmak?
Kɨlɨ Yesu Tair kokup yɨpmaŋek Saidon kokup kɨŋ yapmaŋek Dekapolis mɨktɨm uŋun kɨsi yapmaŋek Galili Pakbi Ɨdap uŋudon kɨgɨt.
Yaŋdo, nak Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo iyɨ do manjɨgɨt paŋpulugokeŋ do butno aŋteban aŋek uŋun jɨgɨ morap pasat. Nak Yesu Kristo da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak do nandɨsat, ae uŋun gat kɨsi toktogɨsi tɨlɨmnikon egɨ wɨgɨni do nandɨsat.
“Nandani. Nak tepmɨsi kabo noknok da tɨlagon jikon opdɨsat. Amɨn kɨnda dɨma pagek yɨk ɨmalni iyɨ da kapmatjok toni kaŋ, uŋun amɨn kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asak. Nido, uŋun amɨn molaŋ molaŋ dɨma agɨpjak, aŋakwan amɨn da mayagɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma kokdaŋ.”
Ji Moses dakon gen teban dɨma yapni do aŋek monjɨsi dakon gɨptɨmni Sabat bɨsapmon kɨsi mandaŋ gɨn. Ji yaŋ aŋ, do nak da Sabat bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda aŋmɨlɨp agɨm uŋun do butjap nido nandaŋ namaŋ?
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn pawɨl pawɨl dakon kɨla amɨn iyɨŋban os pabɨdaŋakwan Pilip gat amɨn uŋun gat mɨktɨmon maŋ pɨŋek pakbikon pɨgɨgɨmal. Pɨgek Pilip da telagɨ pakbi soŋ ɨmgut.
Nandaŋ kokwinji tagɨsi amɨn, ji uŋun yo morap do pakyaŋsi nandaŋek egɨpni. Yawe da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun do nandani.
Aŋpak yokwi da butnikon tugawit, do uwalno but pɨsoni mɨni tepmɨsi kɨmotni do nandɨsat. Kalugɨ sigɨn egek kɨmakbi kokupmon kɨnisi.
Do ji Piŋkop da emat dakon yo damɨsak uŋun kɨsi morap tɨmɨgek bɨsap yokwikon emaron tebai tagɨ atni. Ae emat dagosak bɨsapmon ji tebai sigɨn atni.
Mani Yesu da nandak nandakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek amɨn kɨsirɨ gɨreŋɨkbi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak pɨdaŋ amɨn da ɨŋamon at.” Iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun pɨdaŋ akgɨt.
Nak ji depmaŋ dekgo meŋ datyoni mɨni da tɨlagon dɨma egɨpdaŋ. Nak jikon tobɨl apdɨsat.
Sunduk do yoma dɨma wɨtdal ɨmni.
Ae nandaŋapbo emat amɨn oskon yɨkgwit dakon tɨlakni yawit, uŋun 200 milion yaŋ. Tɨlakni nandaŋapbo yawit.
